MsgEn: Please select a pawn to train

MsgJp: 育成を開始しました
MsgEn: Raising has started

MsgJp: 育成方法を選んでください
MsgEn: Please choose a raising method

MsgJp: 育成状態の確認
MsgEn: Check training status

MsgJp: 育成状況を確認する
MsgEn: Check raising status

MsgJp: 胞子が集まり始めている――
MsgEn: Spores are starting to gather

MsgJp:
胞子の広がりを阻止――
クリア時のボーナス報酬が追加！
MsgEn:
Prevent the spread of spores!
Bonus reward is added!

MsgJp: 脅威となる敵発見。慎重に！
MsgEn: Threatening enemy detected. Be careful!

MsgJp: 脅威の排除を完了
MsgEn: Complete threat elimination

MsgJp:
腐れモゴックめ――
ただですむと思うなよ
MsgEn:
Mogok, you rotten scoundrel――
Don't think you'll get off easy.

MsgJp:
腕試しに一戦やるか？
おっと、そんな顔するな――冗談さ
MsgEn:
You want to try your hand at a fight?
Oops, don't give me that look--I'm kidding.

MsgJp:
自信持っていいんじゃない？
あんたなら、できそうな気がする
MsgEn:
You should have confidence.
I think you can do it.

MsgJp:
自分に言い聞かせようとしているが
なかなか――な
MsgEn:
I'm trying to tell myself that
but it's not easy to--

MsgJp: 自分のような者で良ければ――
MsgEn: If it's okay with someone like myself —

MsgJp: 自室の照明
MsgEn: Arisen's Room Lighting

MsgJp: 自室の管理
MsgEn: Room Management

MsgJp: 自室の管理から鉢植を設定してください
MsgEn: Set up a potted plant from Manage My Room

MsgJp: 自室の装飾
MsgEn: Arisen's Room Decor

MsgJp: 自室訪問設定
MsgEn: My Room Visit Setup

MsgJp:
自由に振る舞う覚者が増えていますが
白竜様あっての覚者であることだけは
心に留めておいてください
MsgEn: There are more Arisen behaving freely, but please always keep in mind that it is thanks to The White Dragon that they exist.

MsgJp: 興奮してるみてぇですね！　攻撃には注意してくださいよ！
MsgEn: It looks agitated! Be careful of the attacks!

MsgJp: 興奮状態です！　敵が暴れるかも知れません！
MsgEn: Excitement! The enemy may be out of control!

MsgJp: 興奮状態を確認、警戒を――
MsgEn: Check for excitement, be alert--.

MsgJp: 舐めてかかると、痛い目見そうだな。ありゃ
MsgEn: If you underestimate me, you're in for a world of hurt. Well then...

MsgJp: 良い旅になるように精一杯尽くすわ
MsgEn: I'll do my best to make it a good trip.

MsgJp:
良かった、
無事に家までお送りできた――
MsgEn: It's good. I was able to safely take you home.

MsgJp: 良き夢を、覚者殿
MsgEn: Sweet dreams, Master.

MsgJp: 良き旅になるよう、全力を尽くします
MsgEn: I will do my best to make it a pleasant journey.

MsgJp: 良き連携のために、最大限努力しよう
MsgEn: Let's do our utmost for good cooperation.

MsgJp: 英霊眠りし道
MsgEn: Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path

MsgJp: 落ち着いて、もう大丈夫よ
MsgEn: Calm down, everything's fine now

MsgJp: 落ち着け――落ち着くのだ
MsgEn: Calm down――You need to calm down.

MsgJp: 落ち込みます――
MsgEn: It's depressing —

MsgJp: 蘇りし絶望の炎
MsgEn: Resurrection of the Flame of Despair

MsgJp: 血を見たくはないのですが
MsgEn: I don't want to see blood.

MsgJp: 行き先はどこなんですか？　楽しみだな
MsgEn: Where are we going? I'm looking forward to it.

MsgJp: 行き先選択
MsgEn: Select Destination

MsgJp: 行くしかない、ですか
MsgEn: We have to go, right?

MsgJp: 行ったり来たり、ご苦労だね
MsgEn: Going back and forth, you've had it tough.

MsgJp:
行ってきまーす！
覚者さま、お土産期待しててくださいね
MsgEn: I'm off! Please expect some souvenirs from me, Lord Arisen!

MsgJp: 行動の優先の最終確認
MsgEn: Final confirmation of priority of actions

MsgJp: 行動の優先を変えたい項目を選択してください
MsgEn: Please select the item you want to change priority

MsgJp: 行動の優先度
MsgEn: Priority of actions

MsgJp: 行動の優先度を上げる
MsgEn: Increase priority of action

MsgJp: 行動の優先度を下げる
MsgEn: Decrease priority of action

MsgJp:
衣食の面倒までは見切れないから
自分でなんとかしてくれ
MsgEn:
I can't take care of your food and clothing, so
you're on your own.

MsgJp: 衰弱する覚者たち
MsgEn: Weakening Arisen

MsgJp: 装備のアイテムランクが<QCND 0>以上（平均IR）
MsgEn: Item Rank of <QCND 0> or more (average IR)

MsgJp: 装備・道具には重々の確認を
MsgEn: Check your equipment and tools very carefully.

MsgJp: 装備品
MsgEn: Equipment

MsgJp: 装備品のカスタマイズ
MsgEn: Customizing Equipment

MsgJp: 装飾
MsgEn: Decoration

MsgJp: 襲われた村
MsgEn: Attacked Village

MsgJp: 襲われる展望城
MsgEn: Lookout Castle under attack

MsgJp:
見たところセシリーは、無垢な心を持った
乙女という風情だが――
MsgEn: From the looks of it, Cecily has the air of a maiden with an innocent heart...

MsgJp: 見た目を変える
MsgEn: Change appearance

MsgJp: 見つかった財宝
MsgEn: Treasures found

MsgJp: 見てください、庭に何か来ているみたいです
MsgEn: Look, it looks like something is coming to the garden.

MsgJp: 見て！　庭に何か来てるわ！
MsgEn: Look! There's something in the garden!

MsgJp: 見切った！
MsgEn: I saw through it!

MsgJp:
規律なくして人は動かぬ
例外は――ない
MsgEn:
Without discipline, people will not work.
There are no exceptions.

MsgJp:
覚悟はしていたけどね――
いやいや、挫けてなるものか！
MsgEn: I was prepared, you know— No, no, I will not be deterred!

MsgJp:
覚者が一緒じゃないと戻ってこられないから
君たち、その時はよろしくたのむよ
MsgEn: I cannot return without the Arisen being present, so I ask you all to take care of me at that time.

MsgJp: 覚者が攻撃している敵
MsgEn: Attacked by Arisen

MsgJp: 覚者が攻撃している敵を優先して狙う
MsgEn: Prioritize enemy targets attacked by Arisen

MsgJp:
覚者さま
付近にジョブ修練敵がいるようです
MsgEn: Lord Arisen, It appears that there are job training enemies nearby.

MsgJp:
覚者さま――
やはり冒険は――ポーンを同行させるより
覚者同士で助け合う方が好ましいのでしょうか？
MsgEn: Dear Arisen— Is it still preferable to have Arisen helping each other rather than having a pawn accompany you on your adventures?

MsgJp: 覚者さま――、この戦技で支援します！
MsgEn: Lord Arisen, I will support you with this war technique!

MsgJp:
覚者さま――あ、あの
遠征成果の取り忘れには、お気を付けください――
MsgEn: Arisen—oh, um, please be careful not to forget to take the results of your expedition—and.

MsgJp:
覚者さま――あ、あの、お役にたてるなら
どんな事でもやりますから
――なんでも言ってくださいね
MsgEn: Master—oh, um, if I can help you, I'll do whatever you need me to do. Please tell me anything you need me to do.

MsgJp:
覚者さま――あのう
クランショップから≪ポーン遠征隊≫を購入すれば
スポットを探索できるようになる、みたいです――
MsgEn: Lord Arisen, if you purchase a "Pawn Expedition" from the Clan Shop, it looks like you'll be able to explore spots.

MsgJp:
覚者さま――ご命令いただいた
《<VAL SPOT>》探索、完了です
お宝を見つけたので持ち帰ってきたのですが
これで、よかったですか――？
MsgEn: Master—your order; 《<VAL SPOT》 search is complete. I found a treasure and brought it back to you. Is this what you wanted?

MsgJp:
覚者さま――ぼく――
迷子になっちゃったかと思いました
MsgEn: Master, me, I thought I got lost!

MsgJp:
覚者さま――手持ちに<VAL>個の空きが無いため、
遠征成果を渡すことができないようです
MsgEn: Master, I don't have <VAL> free space on hand, so it seems I can't hand over my expedition results.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、
ここらで宝でも探してみましょうや
MsgEn: Dear Arisen,  Let's try searching for treasures around here.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、
この近くに貴重な宝がありそうです
MsgEn: Arisen, It seems that there is a valuable treasure nearby.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、
付近に希少な宝があるかも知れません
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, there may be a rare treasure in the vicinity

MsgJp:
覚者さま、
思いがけぬ敵に遭遇しました
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I have encountered an unexpected enemy!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、
見事修練を達成されたようです！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, It appears that you have achieved remarkable mastery in your training!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、
近くに何かありそうです、ご確認を
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, there may be something nearby, please check.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、《<VAL SPOT>》の
探索で宝を発見しました
危ない所でしたが、なんとか
持ち帰る事に成功いたしました！
MsgEn: Dear Master, We found the treasure in our search for 《<VAL SPOT》. It was a close call, but we managed to bring it back!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、あ、あんなのと戦うんですか？
MsgEn: Oh, Arisen, are you going to fight with that thing?

MsgJp:
覚者さま、あなたにお仕えしてきたおかげで
私の意思疎通力が上がりました！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, thanks to my service to you, my communication skills have improved!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、あの、冒険に行きませんか？
今まで以上に、お役に立ってみせますから――
MsgEn: Dear Master, um, would you like to go on an adventure? I will be more useful to you than ever before.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、ありがとうございました！
手に入れた力で
とことんお助けしますからね！
MsgEn: Thank you very much, Arisen! We'll help you with the power we've got!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、おかえりなさい
MsgEn: Welcome back, Master!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、お帰りなさい
MsgEn: Arisen, welcome back

MsgJp: 覚者さま、お帰りなさいませ
MsgEn: Welcome back, Master!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、お庭に何かが――
MsgEn: Arisen, something has appeared in the garden...

MsgJp: 覚者さま、お見事です
MsgEn: Good work, Arisen!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、この辺で宝探ししてみませんか？
MsgEn: Arisen, would you like to try treasure hunting around here?

MsgJp: 覚者さま、この辺り、何かありますよ！
MsgEn: Arisen, there's something around here!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、ご無事で戻られて何よりです
MsgEn: Arisen, it's a relief that you have returned safely

MsgJp:
覚者さま、さらにご報告がございます――
どうやら《<VAL SPOT>》に
異変が起きているようです
クランメンバーの皆さんで、探索を行いましょう！
MsgEn: Dear Master, I have a further report— It seems that there is an anomaly in 《<VAL SPOT》. Let's search for it with all the clan members!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、せ、戦術育成――どうですか――？
MsgEn: Arisen, h-how about tactical training?

MsgJp:
覚者さま、それじゃあ――探索に行ってきます
うぅ、うまくいくといいなぁ
MsgEn: Master, in that case, I'll go explore. Wow, I hope it goes well!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、ただいまエリア探索から戻りました
MsgEn: Arisen, I have returned from exploring the area.

MsgJp: 覚者さま、エリア探索より戻りました
MsgEn: Arisen, I have returned from exploring the area.

MsgJp: 覚者さま、エリア探索より戻りましたぁ
MsgEn: Arisen, I have returned from exploring the area

MsgJp:
覚者さま、ジョブ修練達成ですね！　
やったぁ！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, you have achieved your job training! Yay!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、ポーン遠征隊をご所望ですか？
クランショップから《ポーン遠征隊》を購入すると
スポットを探索できるようになりますよ
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, would you like to purchase a Pawn Expedition? Purchase a Pawn Expedition from the Clan Shop, and you will be able to explore spots!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、一休みしていかれますか？
MsgEn: Would you like to take a break, Master?

MsgJp:
覚者さま、今日はどこへ
探索に行かれるんでしょうか――
MsgEn: Dear Master, where are you going to explore today?

MsgJp: 覚者さま、今日はぼくが戦技のご提案をします！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, today I am going to propose a war technique!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、今日は戦技のご提案をさせてください！
MsgEn: Arisen, please allow me to propose a battle technique today!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、今日は私から戦技のご提案があります！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, today I have a proposal for a warfare technique!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、今日は私から髪型のご提案があります！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I have a hair style suggestion for you today!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、今日は髪型のご提案があります！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I have a hair style suggestion for you today!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、何してるんですか？
MsgEn: Arisen, what are you doing?

MsgJp: 覚者さま、修練が達成されましたよ
MsgEn: Arisen, your trial has been accomplished!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、冒険のご準備ですか？
MsgEn: Arisen, are you ready for an adventure?

MsgJp: 覚者さま、大丈夫ですか！
MsgEn: Lord Arisen! Are you alright?

MsgJp: 覚者さま、属性を付与しますね！
MsgEn: Arisen, I will bestow upon you a new attribute!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、戦術育成などいかがですか？
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, how about tactical training and such?

MsgJp: 覚者さま、敵があんなところに！
MsgEn: Arisen, the enemy is over there!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、新しい家財を入手されたのですね！
一層快適になりそうです！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I see that you have acquired new household goods! It will become even more comfortable!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、新しい家財を入手されたんですね！
これは快適になりそう――
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I see that you have acquired new household goods! This is going to be comfortable —

MsgJp: 覚者さま、新しい特技、閃めきましたぜ
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I've got an idea for a new skill.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、新たなる力を身につけるため
ご相談があります
MsgEn: Arisen, I have a matter to discuss with you in order to acquire a new power.

MsgJp: 覚者さま、新たな特技を閃きました！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I've got a new Special Skill up my sleeve!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、本日もお気をつけて行ってらっしゃいませ
MsgEn: Take care of yourself today, Master.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、申し訳ありません――
本日はスポット探索に派遣済みのため、
探索に参加することができません
MsgEn: Sorry, Master. I have already been dispatched to explore the spot today, so I will not be able to participate in the exploration.

MsgJp: 覚者さま、疲れてたら一休みしていきましょう
MsgEn: Arisen, let's take a break if you're tired

MsgJp: 覚者さま、私はあなたと共に――！
MsgEn: Master, I am with you!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、私を冒険に同行させて下さい　
あなたをサポートさせていただきます
MsgEn:
Dear Arisen, please allow me to accompany you on your adventures
I will be happy to support you!

MsgJp:
覚者さま、貴方のおかげで
新たな力を身につけることができました
改めてあなたをサポートさせていただきます
MsgEn:
Thanks to you, Master,
I have gained new strength
I will support you once again!

MsgJp: 覚者さま、近くに希少な宝があるような――
MsgEn: Arisen, it seems there is a rare treasure nearby--

MsgJp:
覚者さま、遠征成果の取り忘れはないですか？
ぼくらのがんばり、ちゃんと受け取ってくださいね！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, did you forget to get the results of the expedition? Please accept our efforts!

MsgJp:
覚者さまがお供させてくださったおかげで
ぼく、意思疎通力が上がりました！
MsgEn: Thanks to the Arisen who let me accompany him I have improved my communication skills!

MsgJp: 覚者さまがご無事でよかったです！
MsgEn: Arisen, I'm glad you're safe, my lord!

MsgJp: 覚者さまが休めると安心です
MsgEn: Lord Arisen can rest and be at ease.

MsgJp:
覚者さまが雇ったポーンの特技――
僕も覚えました！
MsgEn: The special skill of the pawn Master hired-- I learned it too!

MsgJp: 覚者さまにお仕えしてきたおかげで、意思疎通力が上がりました！
MsgEn: Thanks to the Arisen who I have served, I have improved my communication skills!

MsgJp: 覚者さまのお力になります！
MsgEn: I will assist the Arisen!

MsgJp:
覚者さまのご命令通り
《<VAL SPOT>》に探索に行って
<VAL EMNAME>たちと戦ってきましたよ！
ちゃんと<VAL>体倒してきたんですから！
MsgEn: I went to 《<VAL SPOT》 to search for them and fought against <VAL EMNAME>, as ordered by My Lord! I've successfully defeated <VAL>!

MsgJp: 覚者さまより強くなって、きっと守りますから！
MsgEn: I will become stronger than you and I will protect you!

MsgJp: 覚者さまを無事お送りする任務、完了！
MsgEn: Mission to safely escort the Arisen has been completed!

MsgJp:
覚者さま！
《<VAL SPOT>》へ探索に行き
発見した宝を持ち帰りました！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen! I went to 《<VAL SPOT》 to explore and brought back the treasure I found!

MsgJp:
覚者さま！
報酬の取り忘れには、ご注意くださいませ
MsgEn: Dear Arisen! Please be careful not to forget to pick up your rewards!

MsgJp:
覚者さま！　ご命令通り
《<VAL SPOT>》の探索へ行き
さらに宝を発見しましたので、持ち帰りました！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen! As you ordered, I went to 《<VAL SPOT》 to search and found more treasures, which I brought back!

MsgJp: 覚者さま！　それでは探索へ行って参ります
MsgEn: Master! I will go now to explore.

MsgJp: 覚者さま！　ボク、新しい特技を閃きました
MsgEn: Dear Arisen! I've got a new trick up my sleeve!

MsgJp: 覚者さま！　今日はどこに探索しにいきますか？
MsgEn: Lord Arisen! Where would you like to explore today?

MsgJp: 覚者さま！　本日はどちらへ探索に参りましょうか
MsgEn: Dear Master, where shall we go exploring today?

MsgJp: 覚者さま！だ、大丈夫ですか？
MsgEn: Lord Arisen! Are you, are you alright?

MsgJp: 覚者じゃないこの身が恨めしいよ
MsgEn: This body that is not an Arisen is filled with resentment.

MsgJp:
覚者であることには慣れたか？
道は――見えたか？
MsgEn:
Have you become accustomed to being an Arisen?
Did the path become visible?

MsgJp:
覚者といえども軍規には従ってもらう
仲間の命を守るためだ
MsgEn: Even though they are Arisen, they must obey military regulations. It is to protect the lives of their comrades.

MsgJp:
覚者として生きることに
見返りを求めたことはなかったが
MsgEn: As an Arisen, I have never sought anything in return for living this way.

MsgJp:
覚者として生きるということは
白竜と世界の行く末を見届ける――ということだ
MsgEn: To live as an Arisen means to witness the fate of The White Dragon and the world.

MsgJp: 覚者とは
MsgEn: What Are the Arisen?

MsgJp:
覚者とは、常に責務を負う者
白竜に、地に、人に――
すべてに仕える者だということを忘れるな
MsgEn:
The Arisen is someone who always bears responsibility.
To the White Dragon, to the land, to the people—
never forget that they serve everyone.

MsgJp:
覚者と騎士団の反目に巻き込まれて
僕は処世術を学んだんだ
MsgEn: I learned the art of worldly wisdom being caught up in the conflict between the Arisen and the knights.

MsgJp:
覚者になってまだ日が浅いのに
《ブラッドオーブ》を持ち帰るなんて――
MsgEn: Even though it has only been a short time since becoming an Arisen, I can't believe you brought back a "Blood Orb."

MsgJp:
覚者に力を与えたぶんだけ
白竜自身の回復が遅れる――
そう考えることもできる
MsgEn: For the Arisen, the more power they are given, the slower The White Dragon's recovery becomes— It can be thought of that way.

MsgJp:
覚者のことは覚者に任せるしかない
よく見ていてやるんだぞ
MsgEn: We have to let the Arisen take care of the Arisen. You're going to have to watch them very closely.

MsgJp: 覚者のさらなる成長・戦技の継承
MsgEn: Further growth of Arisen and inheritance of warfare skills

MsgJp: 覚者のさらなる成長・竜力の継承
MsgEn: Arisen's Further Growth and Dragon Force Augmentation

MsgJp: 覚者のさらなる成長・絶技の継承
MsgEn: Further growth of the Arisen, inheritance of exquisite skills

MsgJp: 覚者の使命、ゆめゆめ忘れるな
MsgEn: The mission of the Arisen, don't ever forget it.

MsgJp: 覚者の基本成長
MsgEn: Basic Growth

MsgJp: 覚者の基本能力
MsgEn: Basic Abilities

MsgJp:
覚者の本分は白竜の回復を助けることだ
――ゆめゆめ忘れるなよ
MsgEn: The Arisen's true duty is to aid in the recovery of The White Dragon. - Never, ever forget that.

MsgJp: 覚者の自室
MsgEn: Arisen's Room

MsgJp: 覚者の部屋着
MsgEn: Arisen's Loungewear

MsgJp:
覚者は勝手な連中が多いが――
貴殿は悪習に染まるなよ
MsgEn:
Arisen often tend to be a bunch of troublemakers, but...
Don't let yourself be tainted by bad habits.

MsgJp: 覚者ひまなし――いつものことだ
MsgEn: There is no free time for an arisen――as always.

MsgJp:
覚者よ
我が目となり、耳となり――頼むぞ
MsgEn: O Arisen One, Be my eyes and ears - I beseech you.

MsgJp:
覚者よ
若い人間の不安定な心――
MsgEn: Arisen. The unstable mind of a young human—

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
レスタニアを巡り、民の力となれ
我が加護を、あまねく伝えるのだ
MsgEn: Arisen. I call upon you to travel throughout the land of Lestania and help your people. Spread my blessing far and wide.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
事を急げ――
邪気は日ごと強くなる――
MsgEn: Arisen ones—Hasten your actions—The malevolent energy grows stronger every day—

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
我が力、レスタニアの外へは届かぬ
大地と人を味方にして力とするがいい
MsgEn: Arisen—My power cannot reach beyond the borders of Lestania. Let earth and man be your allies and your strength!

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
新たなるポーンとの《戦徒の契り》を望むか
ならばその資格たる証――
<COL b92828><SPAI NAME> <SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を我に示せ
MsgEn: Arisen— Do you desire a new "Myrmidon's Pledge" with a pawn? If so, prove to me your qualification by presenting <COL B92828><SPAI NUM> pieces of <SPAI NAME></COL>.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
自らの出自を忘れるな
MsgEn: O Arisen one—Remember where you come from.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
自らの闇を凝視せよ――
MsgEn: Arisen, Gaze upon your own darkness—

MsgJp: 覚者よ――人の時代を記憶し――愛でるがいい
MsgEn: Arisen, remember the era of humans and cherish it with love.

MsgJp: 覚者よ――何用だ
MsgEn: Arisen, what do you want?

MsgJp:
覚者よ、頼んだぞ
おまえたちの働きが大勢を決める
MsgEn: Arisen, I'm counting on you. Your work will determine the outcome for many.

MsgJp: 覚者よ、風となり大地を駆けよ――我が魂を運べ
MsgEn: Arisen, become the wind and race across the earth - carry my soul.

MsgJp:
覚者を育てるのは、結局のところ経験だ
いや、これは覚者に限らないがな
MsgEn: The cultivation of an Arisen ultimately comes down to experience. No, this applies not only to Arisens.

MsgJp:
覚者様――《<VAL SPOT>》へ
探索に行き、なんとか<VAL EMNAME>
<VAL>体くれぇは討伐してきましたぜ――
イテテ、ちょっと無理しちまったみたいだ
MsgEn: Dear Master, I went to [<VAL SPOT>] to search and managed to kill <VAL><VAL EMNAME>—I think I pushed myself a little too hard.

MsgJp:
覚者様、《<VAL SPOT>》の
探索に行ってきましたぜ
まぁまぁの成果ってところですね
で、こっちは探索中に見つけたお宝です
MsgEn: Dear Master, I went to explore 《<VAL SPOT>》 and got so-so results, and here are the treasures I found during my exploration!

MsgJp:
覚者様、ボク、
もっともっとお役に立ちたいんです
だからひとつお願いがあります！
MsgEn: Dear Learner, I want to help you more and more. So I have one request!

MsgJp: 覚者様、今回のエリア探索は大収穫ですぜ！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, this exploration of the area has been a great success!

MsgJp: 覚者様、今日は俺から戦技のご提案をさせてもらえませんかね！
MsgEn: Master, may I propose a combat technique to you today?

MsgJp: 覚者様、今日は俺から髪型のご提案があるんですよ！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I have a haircut suggestion for you today!

MsgJp: 覚者様、修練敵がいますぜ！
MsgEn: Lord Arisen, there are training enemies!

MsgJp:
覚者様、手に入れたこの力で、
今までよりもお力になれるはずです――
お任せくだせぇ
MsgEn: Arisen, with the power I have obtained,  I should be able to be of more help than before――  Please entrust it to me.

MsgJp:
覚者様、手持ちに<VAL>個の空きがねえんじゃ
この遠征成果は受け取ってもらえませんや
MsgEn: Dear Master, I don't have <VAL> free slots on hand, so I won't be able to receive the results of this expedition.

MsgJp:
覚者様、新しい家財を入手されたんですか！
こりゃぁいいや！
MsgEn: Dear Master, did you get new household goods? That's good!

MsgJp:
覚者様、申し訳ねぇんですが
クランショップから≪ポーン遠征隊≫を買わねえと
スポットを探索できるようにならないみてぇで――
サクッと買っちまいましょうや
MsgEn: Sorry, Master, but you have to buy a "Pawn Expedition" from the clan store, or you won't be able to explore the spot—let's buy it quickly and easily!

MsgJp:
覚者様、遠征成果を受け取り忘れないでくださいよ
――おっと、俺なんかに
言われるまでもねぇことですね
MsgEn: Master, please don't forget to receive your expedition results. Oops, I don't need to tell you that.

MsgJp: 覚者様がご無事で何より！
MsgEn: I am glad to hear that you are safe and sound, Arisen!

MsgJp: 覚者様が仰るんなら
MsgEn: If the Arisen says so

MsgJp:
覚者様に従ってきたおかげで
俺の意思疎通力が上がったんで！
MsgEn: Thanks to following the Arisen My communication skills have improved!

MsgJp: 覚者様の邪魔してんじゃねぇぞ、おう！
MsgEn: Don't get in the way of the Master of the Arisen!

MsgJp:
覚者殿、《<VAL SPOT>》へ
探索に行って参りましたよ
ええ、それから<VAL EMNAME>
<VAL>体などの討伐をこなしました
MsgEn: Dear Lord Arisen, I went to 《<VAL SPOT>》 to explore. Yeah, and then to <VAL EMNAME>. <VAL> I completed a subjugation of the enemy and such.

MsgJp:
覚者殿、お喜びください
あなたのための私の力が、
完全なものとなりました
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, please rejoice my power for you is now complete!

MsgJp: 覚者殿、お庭に小さなお客様がいらしてます
MsgEn: Arisen, there are small guests in the garden.

MsgJp: 覚者殿、ご用があれば何なりと
MsgEn: Arisen, please let me know if you need anything.

MsgJp: 覚者殿、エリア探索より舞い戻りました
MsgEn: Arisen, I have returned from exploring the area.

MsgJp: 覚者殿、今日は私から戦技のご提案を致しましょう
MsgEn: Arisen, today I will make a combat technique proposal

MsgJp: 覚者殿、今日は私から髪型のご提案があります！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, I have a hair style suggestion for you today!

MsgJp:
覚者殿、私の能力をより完全なものと
するために、今日は特別なお願いがあります
MsgEn: Arisen, I have a special request today to make my abilities more complete

MsgJp:
覚者殿、貴方様にお仕えしてきたおかげで
私の意思疎通力が上がりました！
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, my communication skills have improved thanks to my service to you!

MsgJp: 覚者殿にも、そして私にも、休息は必要です
MsgEn: The Master needs his rest, and so do I!

MsgJp:
覚者殿のお望みのものを
探しにまいりましょう
MsgEn: Let's go find what you want, Arisen!

MsgJp:
覚者殿も感じてらっしゃるでしょう
この辺り、何かありますね
MsgEn: I'm sure you're feeling it too, Arisen. There's something going on around here.

MsgJp: 覚者隊の結成
MsgEn: Formation of the Arisen Corps

MsgJp: 解ったぜ！
MsgEn: Got it!

MsgJp: 解ったわ！
MsgEn: Understood!

MsgJp:
解放軍が勢い付いたことで
アッカーシェランの混乱はますます
拡大するだろう
MsgEn: With the recent momentum gained by the People's Liberation Army, the chaos in Acre Selund is expected to further escalate.

MsgJp:
解放軍はここに来てずいぶん敵を
刺激したからね
反撃は覚悟しないと
MsgEn: The Liberation Army has certainly stimulated the enemy since they have arrived here. We must be prepared for counterattacks.

MsgJp:
解決の方法も、何かあるのかもしれない
うまく聞きだして、手助けしてやりなさい
MsgEn: I will do everything I can. At the very least, I will support you with my prayers.

MsgJp:
言うまでもないことだろうが――
城の奪回はそう簡単なことではないだろう
MsgEn:
I guess it goes without saying--
Taking back the castle won't be so easy.

MsgJp:
言っておくが、俺が面倒を見てやれるのは
おまえが行くべき場所――
戦うべき相手の指示だけだ
MsgEn:
Let me make it clear, the only thing I can do for you is
to give you directions on where you should go -
only instructions on who you should engage in battle with.

MsgJp: 討伐対象を捕捉
MsgEn: Capture the target for extermination

MsgJp: 託された未来
MsgEn: The future entrusted to us

MsgJp: 記憶の手掛かり
MsgEn: Memory Clues

MsgJp: 記憶の断片
MsgEn: Memory fragments

MsgJp: 記憶を無くした娘
MsgEn: The Girl Who Lost Her Memories

MsgJp:
記憶デバイスの
空き容量が不足しています
空き容量を確保してください
MsgEn:
Insufficient free space on storage device
Please free up space

MsgJp: 訪問を許可しない
MsgEn: Visit Denied

MsgJp: 訪問を許可する
MsgEn: Visit Allowed

MsgJp: 設定を保存します
MsgEn: Save settings

MsgJp: 話しかける
MsgEn: Talk

MsgJp:
話せば――わかるさ
ああ――きっとわかる
MsgEn:
Talk to him--you'll understand.
Yeah--you'll understand.

MsgJp: 詳細を聞く
MsgEn: Let's hear the details

MsgJp: 詳細を聞く
MsgEn: Let's hear the details

MsgJp: 詳細～広域マップの使い方
MsgEn: Using the Area Map

MsgJp: 誇り高き孤独な魂――
MsgEn: Proud, lonely souls--

MsgJp: 誘う眼 限界域
MsgEn: The Inviting Eye: Restricted Stage

MsgJp: 語らいのベルメニュー
MsgEn: Chatting bell menu

MsgJp: 語り継ぐにふさわしいご活躍です
MsgEn: Your work is worthy of being passed down to the next generation.

MsgJp:
語るべき何か――伝えるべき何か――
大切な言葉はいつも白竜様が教えてくれます
そう――わたし自身の言葉ではないのです
MsgEn: Something to tell—something to convey... The important words are always taught by The White Dragon. Yes—it is not my own words.

MsgJp: 語るべき言葉――今はない
MsgEn: The words to speak—Now there are none.

MsgJp: 誰か、手ぇ貸してくれ！
MsgEn: Somebody give me a hand here!

MsgJp: 誰かが襲われている！　助けなければ――
MsgEn: Someone is being attacked!　We have to help--

MsgJp: 誰かの話し声が聞こえる――
MsgEn: Someone's voice can be heard――

MsgJp:
誰が与えたか――与えなかったのか――
考えるべきなのは背後にいたのは
誰かって話だよね
MsgEn: Who gave -- or didn't give -- What we should be thinking about is who was behind it

MsgJp: 誰もがその様子に固唾を呑んだ
MsgEn:
while the people awaited the
outcome with bated breath.

MsgJp: 調査団の救助
MsgEn: Rescue of the survey team

MsgJp: 調理器具セット
MsgEn: Cookware Set

MsgJp: 調理場左の棚/食材
MsgEn: Left Kitchen Shelf/Foodstuffs

MsgJp: 諜報任務が進行した――
MsgEn: The espionage mission progressed――

MsgJp: 諜報活動領域外へ移動したため、クエストを終了しました
MsgEn: Quest ended due to moving out of the espionage activity area

MsgJp: 謎の娘
MsgEn: Daughter of Mystery

MsgJp: 謎の襲撃者
MsgEn: Mystery Assailant

MsgJp:
謎の騎士の話題で持ちきりだね
正体はどうあれ、強敵に違いないから
万事準備怠りなく、だよ？
MsgEn: The topic of the mysterious knight is all the buzz, right? Regardless of their identity, they are definitely a formidable opponent. So, let's prepare ourselves for anything, okay?

MsgJp: 警備が厳重な場所
MsgEn: Heavily guarded area

MsgJp: 負傷はあるが、問題なし
MsgEn: Injured, but no problems.

MsgJp: 負傷部位、拡大――！
MsgEn: Injury site, expanding――!

MsgJp: 財宝を奪いし者
MsgEn: The robber of treasures

MsgJp: 貴方様のお戻りで、やっと人心地着くというもの
MsgEn: Your return will finally make me feel at home.

MsgJp: 貴重な宝がある気がするわ、探してみない？
MsgEn: I have a feeling there's some precious treasure in there, why don't we look for it?

MsgJp:
賛成しかねるが――
無為なことと断じるつもりもない
MsgEn: I cannot agree, but I have no intention of calling it meaningless.

MsgJp: 赤竜の印
MsgEn: Red Dragon Mark

MsgJp: 走り去るレオ
MsgEn: Leo takes flight

MsgJp: 足を引っ張らないように――今日も、がんばります！
MsgEn: Don't let me drag you down. Today, too, I will do my best!

MsgJp: 跪くレオ
MsgEn: Leo kneeling

MsgJp: 踊りなさい！
MsgEn: Dance!

MsgJp: 蹴散らしましょう！
MsgEn: Let's kick ass!

MsgJp: 身を伏せて移動する
MsgEn: Going prone? Sneaking Mission?

MsgJp: 転生
MsgEn: Reincarnation

MsgJp:
転生をキャンセルします
よろしいですか？
MsgEn:
Canceling reincarnation
Do you wish to proceed??

MsgJp: 転職／戦技の付替え
MsgEn: Vocation / Arts Support

MsgJp: 軽くあしらってやりましょう
MsgEn: Let's make light of it.

MsgJp: 辺境の礎
MsgEn: Sub Portcrystals

MsgJp:
近々、ある調査団を派遣することになってな
その人選で、いささか多忙だ
MsgEn: I'm sending a survey team soon and I'm somewhat busy with the selection process.

MsgJp: 近くに何かありそうですよ、よく確認を！
MsgEn: There seems to be something nearby; be sure to check it carefully!

MsgJp:
近くに希少な宝があるかもしれませんよ、
マスター
MsgEn: There may be a rare treasure nearby, Master.

MsgJp: 迫る魔軍戦車
MsgEn: The approaching demon army tanks

MsgJp:
迷った時は、耳をすませてください
白竜様の教えがあなたを導くでしょう
MsgEn: When in doubt, listen, and let the teachings of The White Dragon guide you!

MsgJp: 追いし者たち
MsgEn: The Pursuers

MsgJp: 追い詰められたキースヒルト
MsgEn: Keith Hilt cornered

MsgJp: 追い詰められるレオ
MsgEn: Leo is cornered

MsgJp: 追い込まれた魔物
MsgEn: Cornered Monster

MsgJp: 逃げるか、立ち向かうか。実に悩ましい――
MsgEn: To run or to stand? It's a real toss-up.

MsgJp: 逃さない！
MsgEn: I won't let go!

MsgJp:
逐次攻略というか各個撃破というか
物事はひとつずつ解決するのが良策だと
主張する人もいるけどね――
MsgEn: Rather than calling it a step-by-step strategy, it's more like defeating each individual. Some people argue that it's best to solve things one by one, but I'm not sure that it's a good idea.

MsgJp: 通常枠
MsgEn: Normal

MsgJp: 通常枠
MsgEn: Normal

MsgJp: 通常育成
MsgEn: Normal raising

MsgJp: 連係アクション
MsgEn: Coordinated Actions

MsgJp: 進行する
MsgEn: Proceed

MsgJp: 進行する
MsgEn: Proceed

MsgJp: 進行する
MsgEn: Proceed

MsgJp: 進行のリセット
MsgEn: Reset Progress

MsgJp: 進行マーカーの使い方
MsgEn: Using the Progress Marker

MsgJp: 進行状況
MsgEn: Status

MsgJp: 運を味方にできました
MsgEn: I was able to get lucky.

MsgJp:
過去に類無き空の火球――
理の盤石が揺らいでいるというのか――
MsgEn: A fireball in the sky like never before... The very foundation of order is being shaken...

MsgJp:
過日、異なる覚者からの要請により、
旅に同行し、感謝を賜った
MsgEn: In the past, at the request of different Arisen, I accompanied them on their journey and received thanks.

MsgJp:
道のりはまだまだありそうだから
じっくり行かないとね
MsgEn: The journey seems to still have a long way to go, so we must proceed carefully.

MsgJp: 道具の補充とか、休憩とかしましょう！
MsgEn: Let's replenish the supplies and take a break!

MsgJp: 道具や装備の点検をしておきましょう！
MsgEn: Check your tools and equipment!

MsgJp: 道具を確認するってことは、そろそろ出発かしら？
MsgEn: If we're checking our gear, does that mean we're about to leave?

MsgJp:
道理を外れた世界も、これで理の中に
戻るだろう
MsgEn: Worlds that stray from order, will return to order with this.

MsgJp: 道筋
MsgEn: route

MsgJp: 遠くから悲鳴が聞こえた――
MsgEn: I heard a scream in the distance--

MsgJp: 遠征成果取り忘れには、ご注意を
MsgEn: Be careful not to forget to take the expedition results!

MsgJp: 遠征結果の確認
MsgEn: Confirm Expedition Results

MsgJp:
適材適所って言うだろ？
そう、僕は武ではなく、知で攻めるのさ
MsgEn: You know what they say about the right person for the right job? Yes, I attack with wisdom, not military prowess.

MsgJp:
選択した声は未購入のポーンボイスです
ポーンボイスはオンラインショップで購入できます
MsgEn:
The voice you selected is an unpurchased pawn voice
Pawn voices are available for purchase in the online store

MsgJp: 選択中なので他を選んでください
MsgEn: Please select another as it is currently selected.

MsgJp: 避けます！
MsgEn: Avoid!

MsgJp:
邪悪な気の流れ――
おまえたちも感ずることが
できればいいのだが――
MsgEn: The flow of evil energy—If you could feel it... If only you could sense it, too.

MsgJp:
邪気が少しばかり薄らいだようだ
おかしい――
いや、息を潜めているつもりだろうか――
MsgEn: It seems that the evil aura has slightly subsided. Strange... No, perhaps it's just hiding its presence...

MsgJp: 部屋に戻ると何だか力が抜けちゃうわね
MsgEn: It's kind of relaxing to be back in your room.

MsgJp: 部屋の模様替え、気分転換になりますね
MsgEn: It's a nice change of pace, a room makeover.

MsgJp: 部屋の雰囲気が変わりましたね
MsgEn: The atmosphere of the room has changed.

MsgJp: 部屋着
MsgEn: Loungewear

MsgJp:
重要な話か？
違うなら後にしてくれ
MsgEn:
Is it an important conversation?
If not, please postpone it.

MsgJp: 金竜の印
MsgEn: Gold Dragon Mark

MsgJp: 釜まわり一式
MsgEn: Full Kettle Set

MsgJp: 鉢植に戻るまでまとう
MsgEn: wrap it up until it returns to its potted plant

MsgJp: 鉢植を持っていない
MsgEn: I don't have a flowerpot.

MsgJp: 銀竜の印
MsgEn: Silver Dragon Mark

MsgJp: 錬金術師ディアマンテス絵巻
MsgEn: Alchemist Diamantes Picture Scroll

MsgJp: 鍛練の小部屋
MsgEn: Small room of training

MsgJp:
鍛錬せよ
おまえたちは抜き身の刃――研がねば、朽ちる
MsgEn: Train yourself. You are the unsheathed blade—Sharpen or decay.

鍵がかかっている――
解放には<COL ffdc78>《宝飾の鍵》</COL>が必要だ
MsgEn:
It's locked--
You need<COL ffdc78>《Key of Jewelry》</COL>to open it.

MsgJp: 鑑定ジュエリー
MsgEn: Appraising Jewelry

MsgJp: 鑑定交換
MsgEn: Appraisal Exchange

MsgJp: 鑑定交換
MsgEn: Appraisal Exchange

MsgJp: 長いことお戻りにならねぇんで、心配してたんですよ
MsgEn: I was worried because you didn't come back for a long time

MsgJp: 長い間お戻りにならなかったから、ずっと心配でした――
MsgEn: I was worried because you didn't come back for a long time.

MsgJp: 長くお戻りにならず、心配いたしました――
MsgEn: I was worried when you didn't return for a long time.

MsgJp: 長旅となったものの無事、帰宅
MsgEn: Returned home safely after a long trip.

MsgJp:
門のような意匠がある
わずかに不思議な気配を感じる――
MsgEn:
It seems to have a design similar to a gate.
It makes you feel slightly strange...

MsgJp: 門の攻略
MsgEn: Gate attack

MsgJp: 閃きました――新しい特技を――！
MsgEn: I had a flash of inspiration - a new special skill...!

MsgJp: 閉ざされた門
MsgEn: Closed gate

MsgJp: 閉じる
MsgEn: Close

MsgJp: 開く
MsgEn: Open

MsgJp: 開門
MsgEn: Open the door

MsgJp: 間に合わない竜
MsgEn: Dragon that cannot be saved in time

MsgJp: 闇
MsgEn: Dark

MsgJp: 闇からの帰還
MsgEn: Return from the darkness

MsgJp: 闇がお嫌いなようで
MsgEn: You don't seem to like darkness.

MsgJp: 闇が効きそうですよ！
MsgEn: The darkness is going to work!

MsgJp: 闇が効きそうです！
MsgEn: Darkness seems to work!

MsgJp: 闇が弱点です！
MsgEn: Darkness is a weakness!

MsgJp: 闇で攻めましょう！
MsgEn: Let's attack with darkness!

MsgJp: 闇の世界
MsgEn: Underworld

MsgJp: 闇の中で
MsgEn: In the dark

MsgJp: 闇の再動
MsgEn: Recurrence of Darkness

MsgJp: 闇の力によって封じられている
MsgEn: Sealed by the power of darkness

MsgJp: 闇を照らすランタン
MsgEn: Casting Light into Darkness

MsgJp:
闇炎の状態異常にかかった際に回復までの時間を短縮する
回復までの時間は、付与される毎にやや増減する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復までの時間がさらに短縮</COL>
MsgEn: Shorten the recovery time of Dark Flame debilitation. The time needed slightly increases or decreases each time this is triggered. <COL ffdc78>LV UP Further shortens the recovery time.</COL>

MsgJp: 降臨せし闇
MsgEn: Onset of Darkness

MsgJp: 隊長の右腕は誰か？
MsgEn: Who is the captain's right hand man?

MsgJp: 階層ごとの報酬が入手可能
MsgEn: Level Reward Available

MsgJp: 階層ごとの報酬が入手可能<COL ffdc78>（報酬UP）</COL>
MsgEn: Rewards are available for each tier.<COL ffdc78>(Rewards UP)</COL>

MsgJp: 隙あり！　この好機、逃す手はありません！
MsgEn: There is an opening! There is no way to pass up this opportunity!

MsgJp: 隙ができました！ チャンスです！
MsgEn: An opportunity has arisen! It's a chance!

MsgJp: 隠れていた魔物が姿を現した――！
MsgEn: The hidden monster has appeared!

MsgJp: 雇われし仲間の特技、私も身に付けましたよ
MsgEn: The special skills of a fellow hired hand, I've learned them too.

MsgJp: 雇われたポーンから、特技を学びました！
MsgEn: I learned the Special Skill from the hired Pawn!

MsgJp: 雇用された仲間の特技を習得
MsgEn: Learn the special skills of hired allies

MsgJp:
雇用されれば伴をする――
他の覚者であろうと、それは変わらない
MsgEn: If you're employed, you'll be accompanied— It doesn't matter if you're another Arisen, it's still the same.

MsgJp: 難しい顔しちゃって――悩みでもあるの？
MsgEn: You look so concerned - what's troubling you?

MsgJp: 雷
MsgEn: Thunder

MsgJp: 雷がお嫌いなようで
MsgEn: You don't seem to like thunder.

MsgJp: 雷が効きそうですよ！
MsgEn: Lightning is going to work!

MsgJp: 雷が効きそうです！
MsgEn: Lightning seems to work!

MsgJp: 雷が弱点です！
MsgEn: Lightning is a weakness!

MsgJp: 雷で攻めましょう！
MsgEn: Attack with lightning!

MsgJp: 震撼
MsgEn: Shock

MsgJp: 霧の森の死闘
MsgEn: The Deathly Battle of the Forest of Mist

MsgJp: 面目ありません！
MsgEn: I am ashamed!

MsgJp: 頑張って下さい！
MsgEn: Good luck!

MsgJp: 頭を上げ、再び天空に昇ろうとしたが
MsgEn:
The White Dragon raised its head and
tried to climb and soar back into the skies;

MsgJp:
頼むぞ
レオとおまえの間にどんな絆が――
あるいは確執があるのかは知らんが
今はセシリーを助けることを最優先してくれ
MsgEn: If we defeat the leader of the Corruption demons, the power of the Corruption should dissipate.

MsgJp:
頼むよ――
黒騎士の剣を取り戻して
MsgEn: Please, I beg you—Retrieve the sword of The Black Knight.

MsgJp:
顔色が、すぐれぬようですね
どうかご自愛を
MsgEn: You don't look well. Please take care of yourself.

MsgJp: 飛行している敵
MsgEn: Flying

MsgJp: 飛行している敵を優先して狙う
MsgEn: Prioritize flying enemy targets

MsgJp: 食らいやがれッ！！
MsgEn: Take it!

MsgJp: 食らわしてやる――
MsgEn: I'm gonna make you pay for this...

MsgJp: 食事
MsgEn: Meal

MsgJp: 食卓
MsgEn: Dining Table

MsgJp:
首尾はどうだ？
朗報を待っているぞ
MsgEn: How'd it go? I'm waiting for good news.

MsgJp: 駐留軍動く
MsgEn: Garrison forces are moving

MsgJp:
騎士団が時々掃討作戦を展開しているから
まあ、気長にね――
ああ気長！　僕たちの苦手なやつだよね
くう――
MsgEn: Because the Knights sometimes conduct sweeps Well, be patient— Oh, patience! We're not very good at that. (sigh)

MsgJp: 騎士団と侵食魔
MsgEn: The Order and the Corruption Demon

MsgJp:
騎士団と覚者が力を合わせて戦えば
勝てぬ相手などおらん――
MsgEn: When the knight order and the Arisen join forces and fight together, There is no opponent we cannot defeat.

MsgJp:
騎士団と覚者の揉め事に
巻き込まれてしまったと聞きました
大丈夫でしたか？
MsgEn: I heard that you got involved in a dispute between the Knights order and the Arisen. Are you okay?

MsgJp:
騎士団の犠牲は竜の力となることで
報われる――ああ、そうとも
MsgEn: The sacrifice of the knights will be rewarded with the power of the dragon - oh, indeed.

MsgJp: 騎士団の迎え
MsgEn: Welcoming the Knights

MsgJp: 骸の将を倒す
MsgEn: Defeat the Skeleton General

MsgJp: 骸の将登場
MsgEn: Advent of the Skeleton General

MsgJp: 高く飛ばして差し上げましょう！
MsgEn: Let's let them fly high!

MsgJp: 魂を捧げる
MsgEn: Give Spirits

MsgJp: 魔物
MsgEn: Enemy

MsgJp:
魔物たちの標的になっても不思議では
ありません
どうか、気にしてあげてくださいね
MsgEn: No wonder they were the target of demons. Please, please, please take care of them!

MsgJp: 魔物のるつぼ
MsgEn: The Crucible of Demons

MsgJp: 魔物警戒スポットの強敵
MsgEn: Monster Warning Message

MsgJp: 魔物集結スポット
MsgEn: Monster gathering spot

MsgEn: Bloodbane Isle

MsgJp: 魔赤島での異変
MsgEn: Anomalies on Bloodbane Isle

MsgJp: 魔赤島の狂宴
MsgEn: Bloodbane Isle's Feast of Madness

MsgJp: 魔軍への奇襲
MsgEn: Surprise Attack on the Demon Army

MsgJp: 鳥の報せ
MsgEn: bird's call

MsgJp: 鳩時計
MsgEn: Cuckoo Clock

MsgJp: 麗しき我が主よ、本日はいずこへ探索に？
MsgEn: My beautiful Lord, where are you going to explore today?

MsgJp: 黄金宮でゴルゴラン三度登場
MsgEn: Gorgoron makes his third appearance at the Golden Palace

MsgJp: 黄金宮でゴルゴラン再び敗れる
MsgEn: Golgorran is defeated again at the Golden Palace.

MsgEn: Golden Gemstone

黄金石が不足しています
(所持数：<VAL>)

We are running out of golden stones
(Number of golden stones in our possession：<VAL>)

黄金石が不足しています

We are running out of gold stones
(number in possession：<VAL>)

MsgJp: 黄金石で即時育成
MsgEn: Instant raising with GG

MsgJp: 黄金石で即時育成
MsgEn: Instant raising with GG

MsgJp: 黄金竜
MsgEn: Golden Dragon

MsgJp: 黄金竜の一撃
MsgEn: Blow of the Golden Dragon

MsgJp:
黄金竜の攻撃により、敵の特定の攻撃を中断する
攻撃を中断すると＜破滅の力＞の蓄積量が減少する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に破滅の力の減少量がより増加</COL>
MsgEn: The Golden Dragon attacks, trying to interrupt a specific attack of the enemy. If the interruption succeeds, the "Power of Destruction" is lowered. <COL ffdc78>LV UP Further decreases the Destruction power.</COL>

MsgJp: 黄金郷の住人
MsgEn: Residents of the Golden Hills

MsgJp:
黒い鎧の騎士――
正体の見極めを急いでくれ
MsgEn: The knight in black armor—I need you to hurry up and find out who he is.

MsgJp: 黒き鎧の災いは――厄介だぞ
MsgEn: The curse of the black armor is troublesome, indeed.

MsgJp: 黒呪の迷宮
MsgEn: Bitterblack Maze

MsgJp: 黒呪の迷宮　深淵
MsgEn: Bitterblack Maze Abyss

MsgJp: 黒呪の迷宮での装備
MsgEn: Bitterblack Maze Equipment

MsgJp: 黒呪の迷宮とは
MsgEn: What Is the Bitterblack Maze?

MsgJp: 黒呪の迷宮を再び遊ぶ
MsgEn: Play Bitterblack Maze Again

MsgJp: 黒呪の迷宮リセット券
MsgEn: Bitterblack Maze Reset Ticket

MsgJp: 黒呪アイテムの持ち帰り
MsgEn: Bitterblack Item Takeaway

MsgJp: 黒呪アイテムの持ち帰り
MsgEn: Bitterblack Item Takeaway

MsgJp: 黒呪ショップ
MsgEn: Bitterblack Shop

MsgJp: 黒呪島導入デモ
MsgEn: Bitterblack Isle Introduction Demo

MsgJp: 黒呪装具の効果封印
MsgEn: Bitterblack Equipment Effect Seal

MsgJp: 黒呪装具の効果封印
MsgEn: Bitterblack Equipment Effect Seal

MsgJp: 黒竜との決戦に向けて
MsgEn: Toward the final battle against the Black Dragon

MsgJp:
黒竜の弱点部位、または黒竜により召喚された竜晶に
一定量のダメージを与えると、大ダメージを与える追撃が発生する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に追撃のダメージがより増加</COL>
MsgEn: Deal a great amount damage to Black Dragon and the summoned Dragon Crystal after you inflict a certain amount of damage to them. <COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases bonus damage.</COL>

MsgJp: 黒竜の最期
MsgEn: The Last Days of the Black Dragon

MsgJp: 黒竜の登場
MsgEn: Appearance of the Black Dragon

MsgJp: 黒騎士との決戦
MsgEn: Decisive battle with the Black Knight

MsgJp: 黒騎士との遭遇
MsgEn: Encounter with the Black Knight

MsgJp: 黒騎士とレオ
MsgEn: Black Knight and Leo

MsgJp:
黒騎士と魔物の関係という観点から見ると
新手の方が、より黒騎士に近い存在という
ことかなあ
MsgEn: From the perspective of the relationship between the Black Knight and monsters, it could be said that the newcomer is a presence closer to the Black Knight.

MsgJp: 黒騎士のポーン
MsgEn: Black Knight Pawn

MsgJp:
黒騎士の弱点部位に一定量のダメージを与えると
大ダメージを与える追撃が発生する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に追撃のダメージがより増加</COL>
MsgEn: Deal a great amount damage to Black Knight after you inflict a certain amount of damage to its weak point. <COL ffdc78>LV UP Further increases bonus damage.</COL>

MsgEn: The Black Knight's Machinations

MsgEn: The Last Days of the Black Knight

MsgEn: Defeating the Black Knight

MsgEn: Follow the black knight into the darkness.

MsgJp: 黒騎士現れる
MsgEn: The Black Knight appears.

MsgJp: 黒騎士討伐その後・前半
MsgEn: After Defeating the Dark Knight: Part 1

MsgJp: 黒騎士討伐その後・後半
MsgEn: Defeat of the Black Knight, then the second half

MsgEn: (With their eyes closed, they seem to be deep in thought).

MsgJp: （高優先）
１ｓｔシーズンスタッフロール
MsgEn: 1st Season Staff Roll

MsgJp: １ｓｔシーズン振り返り
MsgEn: 1st Season Review

MsgJp: ２ｎｄシーズンスタッフロール
MsgEn: 2nd Season Staff Roll

MsgJp: ２ｎｄシーズン振り返り
MsgEn: 2nd season review
323 years ago,

MsgJp: ３ｒｄシーズンスタッフロール
MsgEn: 3rd Season Staff Roll

MsgJp:
グリッテンの守備隊を増強している
覚者は基本的に遊軍として参加可能だ
MsgEn:
We are augmenting the garrison of Gritten.
Arisen can join guerrilla force.

MsgJp: 砦周辺の敵がいつでも貴殿を待っているぞ
MsgEn: The enemies around the fortress are always waiting for you.

MsgJp:
白竜様の言葉――
ひと言も聴き逃すわけにはいかんな
MsgEn: The world you see and the world I see might be different.

MsgJp:
貴殿はイリスと親しかったようだが――
覚悟しておいた方が良さそうだ
MsgEn: It seems that you were close with Iris, but it's better to be prepared.

MsgJp:
白竜の敵とあれば厳しい結論が
下るだろうからな
MsgEn: Because if you're an enemy of The White Dragon, you're going to come to some harsh conclusions.

MsgJp:
イリスは騎士団の中でも人気のある覚者だ
もし討伐ということになれば――
MsgEn: Iris is a popular Arisen among the Order of Knights. If it comes to a subjugation...

MsgJp: いや、考えたくもない
MsgEn: No, I don't even want to think about it.

MsgJp:
――面目ない
巫女殿を連れ去られるとは――
MsgEn: Unthinkable — to have the Priestess taken away...

MsgJp:
くそっ――レオめ――
手加減するとは無礼な――
MsgEn:
Damn it ―― Leo ――
It is rude to hold back ――

MsgJp:
騎士たる者はやはり戦場に立たねばな
メルゴダで会おうではないか
MsgEn: A knight must indeed stand on the battlefield. Let us meet in Mergoda.

MsgJp: さあ、ともに戦おうではないか！
MsgEn: Well, let's fight together, shall we?

MsgJp:
ディアマンテスを退けたからといって
すべての問題が解決するわけではないだろう
しかし今は――
MsgEn:
However, just because we have defeated Diamantes, it does not mean that all problems will be resolved.
However, for now...

MsgJp: ああ、感慨無量とはこのことだな
MsgEn: Ah, this is what "overwhelmed with emotion" means.

MsgJp:
立場上不謹慎な発言かもしれんが
世のこういう状況はけして嫌いではないのだ
貴殿なら、わかるだろう？
MsgEn: It may be inappropriate for me to say this from my standpoint, but I don't dislike this kind of situation in the world. You know what I mean, don't you?

MsgJp:
戦場で貴殿の顔を見ると
ああ、負けはないな、と思うのだ
MsgEn:
When I see your face on the battlefield,
Ah, I think there is no defeat.

MsgJp:
長いこと、覚者などイケ好かない連中だと
思っていたが、この変わりよう――
自分のことながら、笑うわ
MsgEn: For a long time, I thought that people like Arisen were not good, but this change... even I have to laugh.

MsgJp:
セシリーやレオのことが気にかかるだろうが
それならなおのこと侵食魔退治に
邁進しようではないか
MsgEn:
You might be concerned about Cecily and Leo,
But if that's the case, we should strive even more to exterminate the corruption and infected.

MsgJp: 結局はそれが近道になるだろうよ
MsgEn: In the end, that will probably be the shortcut.

MsgJp:
レスタニア中のブラッドオーブを
根こそぎここに集めるぞ！
MsgEn: I will gather all the Blood Orbs in Lestania, from every corner!

MsgJp:
他に火急の任がないのであれば
貴殿も力を貸してくれ
MsgEn:
If you have no other pressing duties,
you can help.

MsgJp:
騎士団の士気は高いが、それでどうにか
なるわけでもなし――
何か他の道はないのか！
MsgEn: The morale of the knight order is high, but that alone doesn't lead to anything—Isn't there any other way?

MsgJp: ミシアルの姿が見えたらしいな
MsgEn: I hear you got a glimpse of Mysial.

MsgJp:
死してなおレスタニアを思う気持ちが
うれしいではないか
MsgEn: I'm glad you're still thinking of Lestania even in death.

MsgJp:
貴殿はまるで竜を救うために
生まれてきたようだな
いやいや、深い意味はない
MsgEn: It seems as though you were born to save dragons. No, no, there is no deeper meaning.

MsgJp:
有用な情報は――
いまのところ、無い
MsgEn: There is no useful information at the moment.

MsgJp:
誰もかれもが仲良くやれるなんて
そんな都合のいい話はない
MsgEn: No one can get along with everyone. It's not that convenient.

MsgJp:
真の平和、正しき統治――
その足掛かりはどこにある――
MsgEn: True peace, just governance-- Where is that foothold--?

MsgJp: 忙しいんだ、後にしてくれ
MsgEn: I'm busy, do it later.

MsgJp:
いつでも力は貸す
だが、慣れ合うつもりはないぞ、覚者
MsgEn: I will lend you my strength, but I have no intention of getting too familiar, Arisen.

MsgJp:
我が騎士団の力、侮るな
覚者だけが、白竜の盾ではない
MsgEn: Do not underestimate the power of our Order. Arisen are not the only shields of the White Dragon.

MsgJp: 竜に選ばれし者の活躍――見せてもらうぞ
MsgEn: Let's see what the dragon's chosen one can do.

MsgJp:
明け暮れる戦いの日々――
その先に平穏はあるのだろうか
MsgEn: Days of endless battles -- Is there tranquility beyond them?

MsgJp:
何が起ころうと動じない心
それだけは、覚者にもひけをとらん
MsgEn: An unwavering heart no matter what happens, that is something even the Arisen cannot match.

MsgJp:
身を挺し、人々と竜を守る――
その覚悟こそが白衛騎士団の矜持だ
MsgEn: Risking your life, protecting people and dragons. That determination is the pride of the White Knights.

MsgJp:
ゲルト騎士団長が留守がちだから
忙しくてかなわんよ
MsgEn: Gerd, the leader of the Knight Order, is often absent. I am too busy to keep up.

MsgJp: 本当なら、そばで学びたいことがたくさんあるのだが
MsgEn: There are many things that I need to discuss with the prince. I can't afford to rest just yet.

MsgJp: はっ！　って、なんだ、あんたか
MsgEn: Huh! What, it's you?

MsgJp:
おお――顔は覚えたぞ
俺は騎士団の副長ハインツだ
今後も色々あるだろうが――よろしくな
MsgEn: Oh—I remember your face. I am Vice Captain Heinz of the Knight Order. There will be various things happening in the future, but—please take care of me.

MsgJp:
調査団と出かけた護衛隊の中には
俺の部下もいるんだ
もしあんたも行くなら、よろしく頼む
MsgEn: Among the escort squad that went with the survey team, There are also my subordinates. If you're going too, I'll count on you.

MsgJp:
アークから戻らなかった部下がいるのだ
やりきれんな――
MsgEn: There are subordinates who did not return from the Ark. I can't stand it—

MsgJp:
あんたはなかなか見所があると
騎士団長から聞いている
あらためて、よろしくな
MsgEn: You have quite a presence, as I've heard from the Knight Commander. Once again, I look forward to working with you.

MsgJp:
どうした？
顔に余裕があるな
ひと仕事終えたという感じだ
MsgEn: What's up? You've got a look on your face like you've done your job.

MsgJp:
どうも騒がしいが――
大きな命令が下りそうな気配だな
MsgEn: Apparently there's a lot of noise-- Looks like we're about to get a big order.

MsgJp:
いや、グリッテンの戦いは盛り上がったな
ついつい思い出してしまうよ
MsgEn: No, the battle of Gritten was exciting. I can't help but reminisce about it.

MsgJp:
犠牲は大きかったが――
けして無駄にはならない
俺はそう信じている
MsgEn: Sacrifices were made, but they were not in vain. I believe that.

MsgJp:
騎士団は欠員が補充されて
ほっとひと息だ
MsgEn: The Knights have filled the vacancy. It's a relief.

MsgJp:
そういえば最近あの子を見ないな
いつも元気な女の覚者だ
MsgEn:
By the way, I haven't seen that girl recently.
She's always been an energetic Arisen.

MsgJp:
そう、イリス――
騎士団の中でも人気があるんだ
MsgEn: Yes, Iris is popular even among the knights.

MsgJp:
ここのところオークもおとなしいな
ずっとこうだといいのだが――
MsgEn: The orcs have been quiet as of late, too. I wish it could be like this all the time—

MsgJp:
なんとか街を守り切ったが――
こんなに攻め込まれるとは前代未聞だ
MsgEn: Somehow we managed to protect the town, but it's unheard of to be invaded like this.

MsgJp:
戦況は一進一退という認識は
間違いのようだな
MsgEn: The perception that the war is going back and forth seems to be wrong.

MsgJp:
厳しい顔のレオを見たが――
何を始める気だ？
MsgEn: I saw Leo with a stern look on his face-- What are you trying to start?

MsgJp: これは見逃せないと思ってね――
MsgEn: I think this is something you can't miss, you know...

MsgJp:
近頃、騎士団に参加したい――
騎士になりたいという者が増えている
MsgEn: Recently, more and more people want to join the Order—want to become knights.

MsgJp:
頼もしいことのように思えるが
皆、危機を身近に感じているということでもある
いったい、これからどうなるんだろうな
MsgEn: It seems like a reliable thing to do, but it also means that everyone is feeling the crisis close at hand. I wonder what in the world is going to happen now?

MsgJp:
ミシアル様がひさしぶりに大階段を下りたと
うわさになっているぞ
MsgEn: Rumor has it that Mysial has descended the grand staircase for the first time in a long time.

MsgJp:
第二のアークにイリスが現れたってのは
本当なのか？
いったい何をしていたんだ？
MsgEn: Is it true that Iris appeared in the second Ark? What on earth was she doing?

MsgJp:
アークの破壊部隊が編成されるはずだから
わたしは志願するつもりだ
MsgEn: Since the Ark's destruction squad is supposed to be formed, I'm going to volunteer.

MsgJp:
うわさになっている覚者の討伐には
参加したくないからな
MsgEn: I don't want to participate in the rumored subjugation of the Arisen.

MsgJp:
わたしたちを責めたければ責めるがいい
しかし、街にほとんど被害はなかった
それは騎士団の奮闘によるものだ
MsgEn:
You are free to blame us.
However, there was little damage to the city, thanks to the efforts of the Knight Order.

MsgJp:
巫女が連れ去られるのを黙って見ていた
わけではないんだ
MsgEn: I didn't just silently watch as the woman was abducted.

MsgJp:
ミシアルが自ら闇に身を投げ――
誘拐犯たるイリスはレオが討伐した
そのレオは神殿に戻っていない――
MsgEn: Mysial threw herself into darkness— Iris, the kidnapper, was defeated by Leo. But Leo has not returned to the temple—

MsgJp:
ジョゼフとクラウスの意見は対立し――
白竜は相変わらずまどろみの中――
MsgEn: Joseph and Klaus have conflicting opinions - The White Dragon remains in a deep slumber.

MsgJp:
なあ、おれたちはこのままでいいのか？
どこで何をすればいいんだ？
MsgEn: Hey, are we okay just like this? Where should we go, and what should we do?

MsgJp:
騎士団長はレオが手を抜いたと主張している
ということは――
MsgEn: The leader of the knights claims that Leo slacked off which means—

MsgJp: はて、どういうことだ？
MsgEn: Well, what is this all about?

MsgJp:
レオとは戦いたくない
たとえ手加減されても俺は逃げる
MsgEn: I don't want to fight Leo. Even if he takes it easy on me I'll run.

MsgJp:
その代わり、見かけた魔物は片っ端から
切り捨ててやる
MsgEn: Arisen, I will cut down every monster I see in my way.

MsgJp:
最前線は譲ってやる
感謝するんだな
MsgEn: I'll give you the front line. You should be thankful.

MsgJp:
これまで幾つもの戦いがあったが――
騎士団と覚者がこれほど協力し合って
事にあたったことはなかったんじゃないかな
MsgEn: There have been many battles so far, but the Knights and the Arisen cooperating like this, I don't think it has ever happened before.

MsgJp:
今この時、ここにいられることが
誇らしくてたまらないよ
MsgEn: I'm so proud to be here at this moment.

MsgJp:
ゲルト騎士団長と仲間たちを
よろしく頼んだぞ
MsgEn: I entrusted Gerd, the leader of the Knight Order, and his comrades to you.

MsgJp:
正直言って、覚者の中にあんたがいるのは
助かるよ
MsgEn: To be honest, it's reassuring that you're one of the Arisen.

MsgJp:
レオは嫌いじゃないけど、なんだか
やりにくくてさ
MsgEn: I don't dislike Leo, but somehow he's difficult to work with.

MsgJp: 最早、話すことなどない
MsgEn: There is nothing to say anymore.

MsgJp:
相互理解など凡夫の夢――
愚かなことよ
MsgEn: Mutual understanding is an ordinary man's dream— It's foolishness.

MsgJp:
悔はない
いまは決意あるのみ
MsgEn:
No regrets.
Now we just have to be determined.

MsgJp: 動き始めたものは、止められない
MsgEn: Once something starts moving, it cannot be stopped.

MsgJp: これ以上、互いに何を得るというのだ
MsgEn: What more do we have to gain from each other?

MsgJp:
覚者――
いびつな存在だ
MsgEn: Arisen - what a depressing existence.

MsgJp:
錬金の術をもってしても時は戻せない
ならば――
過去を悔やむ時間など無駄だ
MsgEn: Even with the art of alchemy, time cannot be reversed. If that is the case―― Regretting the past is a waste of time.

MsgJp:
戦うのであれば――
死を覚悟したまえ
MsgEn:
If you fight--
be prepared to die.

MsgJp:
ここを、全ての古きものの終の地としよう
そして新たに、世界を描き変えるのだ
MsgEn: Let this be the end of all that is old and let us redraw the world anew!

MsgJp:
同意など求めぬ
ただ受け入れたまえ、この浄化を
MsgEn: I don't ask for your consent. Just accept this cleansing.

MsgJp: ほう？　話したいというわけか
MsgEn: Oh? So you want to talk, is that it?

MsgJp:
おや――少々意外ではあるな
錬金を忌む世で育った君が
《アルケミスト》に興味を持つとはね
MsgEn: Well--it's somewhat surprising that you, who grew up in a world that abhors alchemy, would be interested in becoming an Alchemist.

MsgJp:
正直に言って、興味本位は困る
これからのわたしの立場もあるからね
MsgEn: To be honest, I'm troubled by curiosity for curiosity's sake. Because it also involves my future position, you know.

MsgJp:
加えて、思い違いをしてもらっては
やはり困るが――
MsgEn: In addition, if you could misunderstand, that would still be troublesome...

MsgJp:
いやいや、すまない
どうも警戒が先に立ってしまってね
MsgEn: No, no, I'm sorry. I was just being cautious, that's all.

MsgJp:
君なら問題ないだろう
課題さえ乗り越えてくれれば
喜んで指導させてもらうよ
MsgEn: If it's you, there should be no problem. As long as you can overcome the challenges, I would be happy to guide you.

MsgJp:
ほほう――課題を乗り越えたのか
君は白竜がかつて封じた錬金術を
覚者でありながら、学ぼうというんだね
MsgEn: Oh, I see—have you overcome the challenge? You, as an Arisen, wish to learn the alchemy that the White Dragon once sealed away.

MsgJp:
嬉しくもあり、危うくもあり――
だが君が選んだのなら
私はその選択を尊重するよ
MsgEn: With the same purpose, traveling with fellow comrades and walking together. Well, isn't it wonderful?

MsgJp: では、《アルケミスト》として共に歩もう
MsgEn: Well then, let's walk together as 'Alchemists.'

MsgJp:
錬金術とはそもそも、人の論理を用い
人の為に導く学問
理との共存も、君ならできるかもしれないね
MsgEn: Alchemy is, in the first place, the study of using human logic to guide people. You might be able to coexist with reason, too.

MsgJp:
なかなかどうして、覚えが早いな、君は
もう中等レベルの錬金術は十分に
使いこなせているようだね
MsgEn: You're quite remarkable, your ability to learn quickly. It seems like you're already proficient in intermediate level alchemy.

MsgJp:
ならば、もう少し上級の技に手を出して
みてもいいかもしれない
こういう技だが、どうだい、やれそうかな？
MsgEn: In that case, you might consider delving into more advanced techniques. How about this technique? Do you think you can handle it?

MsgJp:
ううむ、末恐ろしいな、君は
この短期間でこれほどまでに成長するとは
わたし、ディアマンテスでさえ――
――いや、やめておこう
MsgEn:
Hmm, it's quite frightening how much you've grown in such a short period of time. Even I, Diamantes-
No, let's not go there.

MsgJp:
いいかね、錬金術は論理の結晶
自然なるものに、人為的に別の特性を
組み合わせ変化させる術だ
MsgEn: Listen, alchemy is the crystallization of logic. It is the art of combining and transforming the natural with artificial characteristics.

MsgJp:
君の意思、君が紡いだ論理こそが
技の要となる、それを常に思い出し
これからの技に向きあいなさい
MsgEn:
Your will, the logic you weave is the key to technique.
Always remember that and face the future of your art.

MsgJp:
錬金術の中には、術の論理を戦いの技
として応用したものがある
自身の生命力を媒介に、物質を生成・変換し
組み変える技だ
MsgEn: Wow, you stink. You certainly smell the part, Arisen, but it couldn't hurt to take a bath every now and then.

MsgJp:
《アルケミスト》として君が錬金術を学ぶ
なら、そちらの分野がいいだろう
MsgEn: As an "alchemist", you should study alchemy.

MsgJp:
溶命炉の力を見たのなら知っているとおり
命のエネルギーは人も魔も惹きつける
――あれに比べればもちろん、規模こそ小さいがね
MsgEn:
If you have seen the power of the Furnace, as you know,
the energy of life attracts both humans and demons.
Of course, compared to that, it is small in scale, but you know.

MsgJp:
力の流れと理論を知り、意思によって自在に
操ることができれば、君が生成するエネルギーは
エリクシルと交わることで
敵を蝕む毒にも、友を守る薬にも変わるだろう
MsgEn: If you know the flow and theory of power, and can manipulate it at will, the energy you generate will intersect with the elixir and turn into a poison that will weaken your enemies or a medicine that will protect your friends.

MsgJp:
錬金術を扱う上で、もっとも大切なことは
やはり、錬成物質とエリクシルの変換だろう
MsgEn: When dealing with alchemy, the most important thing remains the transformation of alchemized substances and elixirs.

MsgJp:
エリクシルとは属性の性質そのもの
錬成物質はエリクシルと結合し発動
することで、様々な効果を帯びる
MsgEn: Elixirs are substances that combine with the attributes themselves and activate, giving various effects.

MsgJp:
どの戦いでどのエリクシルを用いるかが
戦いの結果にも大きく影響するのだ
MsgEn: The choice of which Elixirs to use in each battle greatly affects the outcome of the fight.

MsgJp:
君は《アルケミスト》として学んでいるのだね
調子はどうだい？
術の仕組みが解ってくれば
おのずと慣れてくるだろう
MsgEn:
You are studying as an Alchemist, right?
How are you doing?
Once you understand the mechanism of magic, You will naturally get used to it.

MsgJp:
――そうだね、ジョブレベル１８と
いったところだろうか
MsgEn: --I'd say job level 18.

MsgJp:
それくらい基礎を修めたなら
次の段階に進んでもいいだろう
MsgEn:
If you have mastered the basics to that extent,
you can proceed to the next stage.

MsgJp:
もっとも、その前に神殿で君の戦いぶりを
日頃見ているであろう者から
本当にアルケミストを続けるべきか
同意はもらっておいた方がいい
MsgEn: However, it would be wise to obtain the approval of those who have been observing your battle prowess at the temple before continuing as an Alchemist.

MsgJp:
君がアルケミストとしてさらなるものを求め
君の戦いぶりを見ている者も許すのであれば――
その時はわたしが直接手ほどきをしよう
MsgEn:
If you, as an Alchemist, seek something even greater.
And if those who witness your battles are willing to forgive—
Then, I shall personally guide you.

MsgJp:
ほほう――
君は白竜がかつて封じた錬金術を
覚者でありながら、究めようというんだね
MsgEn: Oh, I see— You, as an Arisen, wish to learn the alchemy that the White Dragon once sealed away.

MsgJp:
嬉しくもあり、危うくもあり――
だが君が選んだのなら
私はその選択を尊重するよ
MsgEn:
With happiness and uncertainty intermingled--
But if that's what you've chosen,
I will respect your decision.

MsgJp:
錬金術とはそもそも、人の論理を用い
人の為に導く学問
理との共存も、君ならできるかもしれないね
MsgEn:
Alchemy is, in the first place, the study of using human logic to guide people.
You might be able to coexist with reason, too.

MsgJp:
さて、これまで君が学んできたものを基礎とすると
これから私が教えるのは応用編だな
さらに深く論理を知り、属性と物質の
精――エリクシルの本質に迫る
MsgEn: Well, based on what you have learned so far, what I will teach you next is the advanced edition. Delve deeper into logic, the essence of attributes and materials, the essence of Elixirs.

MsgJp:
その理解と転化、そして組み換えこそが
《アルケミスト》の理
MsgEn: And thus, understanding, transformation, and recombination are the true essence of the Alchemist's order.

MsgJp:
さぁ、さっそく課題を出そう
君がその一端に触れてくれることを願うよ
MsgEn: Now, let's promptly submit the assignment. I hope you can lend a hand in that regard.

MsgJp:
ふむ、君のアルケミストとしての研鑽には
目を見張るものがある
十分応用を学べるレベルになっているようだね
MsgEn: Hmm, your dedication to studying as an Alchemist is truly remarkable. It seems you have reached a level where you can learn and apply skills extensively.

MsgJp:
もしも、君が錬金の道の奥深くへと
歩みを進めようというならば
わたしが直接手ほどきしたいところだが――
そうするべきかどうか、判断が難しい
MsgEn:
If you are willing to take a step deeper into the path of alchemy, I would love to teach you directly--
but it's hard to decide if I should.

MsgJp:
神殿で君の訓練や戦いぶりを見てきた者
が賛成するなら、わたしは構わないが
MsgEn: If those who have witnessed your training and battles at the temple agree, I have no objections.

MsgJp: なるほど、覚者か――
MsgEn: I see, an Arisen, huh?

MsgJp: 予断を許さない状況のようだね
MsgEn: It seems like a situation that doesn't allow for any speculation.

MsgJp:
君のことは気になるが――
余計な詮索は止めにしておこう――互いにね
MsgEn:
I'm curious about you--
but let's not pry too much into each other's affairs--we're both here for each other.

MsgJp:
生きていればこんな体験ができる
ああ、やはり人生は素晴らしいね
MsgEn: If you are alive, you can have such experiences, Ah, indeed life is wonderful.

MsgJp: 過ぎたるは及ばざるがごとし、か
MsgEn: Excessive is as bad as useless.

MsgJp:
なぜ、こうなってしまったのか――
いつか明らかにしてみせよう
ああ、もちろん、楽しみで仕方がないよ
MsgEn:
How did this happen--
I'll reveal it to you one day.
Oh, and of course, I'm looking forward to it!

MsgJp:
あの日――黄金竜と白竜の戦い以来
我々が過ごしてきたこの時間を――
わたしが解き明かしてみせよう
MsgEn:
Since that day - the battle between the Golden Dragon and hours.
This time we have spent, I will unravel it for you.

MsgJp:
過ちは、誰にでもある
それを正す勇気こそ、尊いのだ
MsgEn: Everyone makes mistakes. It is the courage to correct them that is precious.

MsgJp:
すべてを知りつくしたつもりでも
まだこうして予測不能な出来事が起こる
うれしくもあり――恐ろしくもあり――だね
MsgEn: Even if you think you know everything, unexpected events can still happen. It's both exciting and terrifying, isn't it?

MsgJp: ああ、クラウスの友達か、どうしたんだい？
MsgEn: Ah, Klaus's friend, what's up?

MsgJp:
錬金術師が始めたことは
錬金術師が終わらせる
MsgEn: What the alchemist started, the alchemist will finish.

MsgJp: それが我々の覚悟だ
MsgEn: That is our Arisen's resolve.

MsgJp: ディアマンテスは錬金術師の面汚し――
MsgEn: Diamantes is a disgrace to the alchemists.

MsgJp:
奴を倒せる日が来ようとは
ああ、堪え忍んだ甲斐があったというものだ
MsgEn: I never thought I'd see the day he'd be defeated. Oh, it's been worth it.

MsgJp:
神殿の連中によろしく伝えてくれ
心の準備ができたら、わたしの方から
挨拶に行きたいと思う
MsgEn:
Please convey my regards to the temple personnel.
Once I am mentally prepared, I would like to go and greet them.

MsgJp: さあ、今は早く帰った方がいい
MsgEn: Now, it's better to go home quickly.

MsgJp:
ああ、その話だな
いいだろう
MsgEn: Ah, that story, right? That's fine.

MsgJp:
立場上、ひいきするわけにはいかないが
私が最も愛するジョブは当然《ファイター》だ
MsgEn: On principle, I cannot show favoritism, but my most beloved job is, of course, "Fighter."

MsgJp:
己が身を敵前にさらし、盾と剣を巧みに操り
それはまるで舞の如く――
MsgEn: Exposing oneself to the enemy and deftly wielding shield and sword. It's like a dance—.

MsgJp:
突破口を開いて敵陣深く入り込み
本陣をかく乱する――
ふふ、敵が驚き、呆ける顔を間近で見られるのは
《ファイター》だけだ！
MsgEn:
Opening a breakthrough and infiltrating deep into enemy territory
Disrupting their main force -
Hehe, being able to see the surprised and bewildered faces up close
Is something only a Fighter can do!

MsgJp:
おまえもなかなか腕を上げ、《ファイター》と
しての自覚を身に付けつつあるようだな
MsgEn: You have also been improving quite a bit and seem to be gaining a sense of being a Fighter.

MsgJp:
――よし、私から修練を課してやろう
そして今以上に技を磨き、一流の剣士となれ！
MsgEn: Alright, I will impose training upon you And thus, polish your skills even more, become a first-class swordsman!

MsgJp:
よし、いいだろう
《ファイター》を名乗ることを許そう
MsgEn: Okay, fine. I'll allow you to call yourself a Fighter.

MsgJp:
まぁいい
新たな剣技を教えてやる
MsgEn: Well, never mind. I will teach you a new sword technique.

MsgJp:
今以上に強くなりたければ、修練を重ね
さらに技を会得するのだな
MsgEn: If you want to become stronger than you are now, train harder and further hone your skills.

MsgJp:
ほう――、かなり腕を上げたようだな
今のおまえなら、あの技も使い
こなせるだろう
MsgEn:
Well, you've really improved your skills, haven't you?
With your current ability, you should be able to use that technique and master it.

MsgJp:
剣の役割とは相手を斬ること
だが、それは道具としての役目であって
剣の本質ではない
MsgEn:
The role of a sword is to slash the opponent.
However, that is only its function as a tool.
It is not the essence of a sword.

MsgJp:
敵を削ぎ己を活かす
それこそが本質だ
勝敗、生死は全て、その結果
付いてくるものにすぎない
それを心に留め、この技を修得するがいい
MsgEn: Remember that in your heart, you should strive to master this technique.

MsgJp:
知っての通り《ファイター》の武器は剣と盾
そして己自身の肉体だ
MsgEn: As you know, the weapon of a Fighter is a sword and a shield and their own body.

MsgJp:
敵を討つ、それがファイターに課された最大の
役割だが、ただ攻撃をすればよいというわけではない
自身を守り、先陣に居続けることが仲間を救い
ひいては勝利につながるのだ
MsgEn: The greatest role imposed on a Fighter is to defeat enemies, but it's not simply about attacking. Protecting oneself and staying at the forefront can save comrades and ultimately lead to victory.

MsgJp:
攻守どちらをおろそかにしても、一流のファイター
とは言えないというわけだ
MsgEn: Regardless of whether you neglect offense or defense, it means that you cannot be called a first-class Fighter.

MsgJp:
敵と斬り結ぶ中、技術は後からでも付いてくる
ファイターとなるなら、まずは剣と盾が身体の一部と
思えるようになるまで振るい、感覚をなじませろ
MsgEn:
With cutting with the enemy, the skill comes later.
If you want to be a fighter, first swing your sword and shield until you feel like they are part of your body
and familiarize yourself with them.

MsgJp:
それ以上のことは、おまえが一人前のファイターに
なった頃に教えてやる
MsgEn: I will teach you more when you become a full-fledged Fighter.

MsgJp:
盾は、身を守るだけのものではないぞ
使いようによっては敵の攻撃をいなし
反撃の足掛かりとすることもできる
MsgEn: The shield is not just for self-defense. Depending on how it is used, it can block the enemy's attacks and serve as a foothold for counterattacks.

MsgJp:
攻撃を受ける直前、敵の体重がかかる
わずかな瞬間を見定めろ
MsgEn: Just before receiving an attack, determine the moment when the enemy's weight is applied.

MsgJp:
そこを捉えれば反動はそっくり相手に
返り、態勢を崩すことができるだろう
MsgEn:
If you seize that moment, the recoil will be completely returned to the opponent
, and you will be able to disrupt their stance.

MsgJp:
《クリティカルタイミング》――
ちまたではそんな呼び方をしているらしい
覚えておくことだ
MsgEn:
《Critical Timing》――
It seems that is what they call it.
Remember that.

MsgJp:
ほう――
私に稽古をつけてもらいたいのか？
MsgEn: Oh... Do you want me to teach you a lesson?

MsgJp:
なら少なくとも《ファイター》となり
ジョブレベル１８以上の経験を
積むことだな
MsgEn: Then, let us send you to the past. Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon, may fortune favor you.

MsgJp:
その後、訓練官レンテンの許可が
出たなら考えてやろう
話はそれからだ
MsgEn: After that, I'll think about it if the Training Officer Renton gives the green light. Then we'll talk about it.

MsgJp:
あぁ――
私に稽古をつけてもらいたいのか？
なるほど確かに相応の腕になったようだ
MsgEn: Oh—you want me to train you? Well, you certainly look like you're up to snuff.

MsgJp:
だが何事にも順序がある
まずは神殿の訓練官レンテンに
ジョブの基本を修めた報告くらいはしてこい
MsgEn:
But there's an order to everything.
First, you should at least report to Lenten, the temple trainer,
that you've mastered the basics of the job.

MsgJp:
正式に教えを請いにきたならば
稽古に付き合ってやろう
MsgEn:
If you have come to formally seek knowledge,
I shall accompany you in your training.

MsgJp:
戦術を指南してほしいのか？
ならば実戦に勝る教えはないぞ
MsgEn: You want me to teach you tactics? Then there's no better way to learn than through combat.

MsgJp:
戦いは勝つためにするのだ
そのための努力、怠るな
MsgEn: We fight in order to win. Do not neglect the effort required for that.

MsgJp:
すまないな
世間話というものが苦手なんだ
MsgEn:
I'm sorry,
but I'm not good at small talk

MsgJp:
集中だ！
戦闘態勢は寝所でも解くな！
MsgEn: Concentration! Don't let your guard down even in your sleeping quarters!

MsgJp:
覚者とは何か――
いろいろな考えがあるだろうが
自分は、戦人（いくさびと）だと信じている
MsgEn: What is an Arisen? There may be various thoughts, but I believe I am a warrior.

MsgJp:
こう戦闘続きでは疲れもたまるな――
キノザでゆっくりしたいものだ
MsgEn: I'm getting tired after all these battles-- I'd like to relax in Kinoza.

MsgJp:
魔物より恐ろしい敵の名を教えてやろう
それは――油断、慢心、怠慢だ
MsgEn: I will teach you the name of an enemy more frightening than monsters. It is--carelessness, complacency, and negligence.

MsgJp:
どれほどの敵を倒せば
この地に平穏が訪れるのか――
こんなことを思うとは――老いたか
MsgEn: How many enemies must I defeat for peace to come to this land? To think such a thing... have I grown old?

MsgJp:
勝利の秘策？
そんなものがあるなら、そもそも戦争など起こらない
MsgEn: The secret strategy for victory? If such a thing exists, wars wouldn't happen in the first place.

MsgJp:
価値を問う前に、黙って守れ
失って後悔したくなければな
MsgEn: Before you question the value, shut up and protect unless you want to lose it and regret it.

MsgJp: 何？　拠点防衛に関する提案？
MsgEn: What? A proposal regarding base defense?

MsgJp:
オークどもをぶっ倒し、追いだしても
臭いはしばらく残るんだ
たまらん――くそっ！
MsgEn: Even if you knock the orcs off and drive them out the smell lingers for a while. I can't stand it -- damn it!

MsgJp: 魔物掃除に来たのか？
MsgEn: Did you come to exterminate the enemy?

MsgJp:
だったら遠慮はいらない
砦の外でひと暴れしてきてくれ
MsgEn: Then you should at least become a 《Fighter》 and have at least 18 job levels of experience.

MsgJp:
アルヴァーと会ったらしいな
だったら、こんなところにいないで
さっさと契約をすませたらどうだ？
MsgEn: I heard you met Alvar. If that's the case, why don't you finish the contract quickly? You shouldn't be here instead.

MsgJp:
どうした？
レオの話し相手は退屈か？
MsgEn: What's the matter? Bored of talking to Leo?

MsgJp:
だったら遠慮することはない
思う存分魔物と戦ってくれ
MsgEn: In that case, there's no need to hold back. Fight monsters to your heart's content.

MsgJp: おや――また来たのか
MsgEn: Oh, you've come back again.

MsgJp:
ひまだと言うなら、遠慮はいらない
このあたりの魔物を片っ端から倒してくれ
まったくどこからわいてくるのやら――だな
MsgEn:
If you say you have free time, there's no need to hold back.
Please defeat all the enemies around here one by one.
I wonder where they're coming from.

MsgJp:
オークどもの行動様式が明らかに変化している
そちらも警戒を怠るなとレオとゲルト団長に
伝えてくれ
MsgEn: The behavior patterns of the Orcs have clearly changed. Please also inform Captain Leo and Gerd to stay alert.

MsgJp:
アークとやらが出現してから
オークの様子がおかしい――
MsgEn: Since The Ark appeared, the Orcs seem strange.

MsgJp: そう感じたのは自分の勘違いか――
MsgEn: Did I misunderstand it -

MsgJp: 神殿の様子はどうだ？
MsgEn: How is the temple?

MsgJp:
ひまそうな覚者がいたら
訓練がてら顔を出すように伝えてくれ
MsgEn: If there are any idle Arisen, please tell them to come and train with me as a practice session.

MsgJp:
そう焦るな
まずはレオ統率と話してからだ
MsgEn: Don't rush like that. First, talk to Leo for guidance.

MsgJp:
モゴックの様子を覚えているか？
あいつが持っていたものは――なんだ？
MsgEn: Do you remember what Mogok looked like? What that guy had--what was it?

MsgJp:
オークはズールとかいう魔物と手を組んだ
このところ感じていた違和感の正体は
それだったようだ
MsgEn: The Orc has formed an alliance with a creature called Zuhl. The true identity of the discomfort I had been feeling lately seems to be that.

MsgJp:
わたしはバカなオークと毎日戦っているのが
嫌いじゃなかった
正直、生きている実感があった
MsgEn: I didn't mind fighting against stupid orcs every day. Honestly, it made me feel alive.

MsgJp:
ところがあのズールがオークを変えてしまった
小賢しい――薄汚い魔物め――
もう憎しみしかない
MsgEn: However, that Zuhl changed the orcs into a cunning, filthy enemy... There is only hatred left.

MsgJp:
憎しみを抱えながら戦うのは――
きっと悲しいぞ？
だが、これからはそういう時代なのかもな
MsgEn: Fighting with hate-- sure is sad, isn't it? But maybe that's the way it's going to be from now on.

MsgJp:
イリスに会ったらたまには顔を出すように
伝えてくれ
MsgEn: If you meet Iris, please tell her to show her face once in a while.

MsgJp: もしやおまえはわたしと同類ではないのか？
MsgEn: Are you not like me?

MsgJp:
小ぎれいな神殿よりも最前線の砦が好き――
着飾った街の住人よりも
薄汚れた鎧カブトの戦士を愛おしく思う――
MsgEn:
I prefer the frontline fortress over the tidy temple――
I cherish the dirty armored soldier more than the well-dressed residents of the city――

MsgJp: ならば遠慮せず、いつでもここに来い
MsgEn: Then you don't need to hold back. Please go wild outside the fortress.

MsgJp: 不覚だ――面目ない――
MsgEn: I am not Arisen - I am ashamed -

MsgJp:
しかし、案ずるな
わたしはもう未来を見ている
もうオークの好きにはさせないさ
MsgEn:
But don't fret.
I've already seen the future.
I won't let the orcs have their way anymore.

MsgJp:
神殿はどうだ？
ここの体制の立て直しが一段落ついたら
顔を出そうと思っているんだ
MsgEn: How's the temple going? I'm thinking of showing up when I'm done rebuilding this place.

MsgJp: うわさでは神殿の雰囲気が変わったのだとか
MsgEn: Rumor has it that the atmosphere of the temple has changed.

MsgJp:
悲壮感に満ちているらしいな
正直、行く気が失せる
MsgEn:
It seems filled with a sense of tragedy.
Honestly, I lose my motivation to go.

MsgJp:
ここにいても白竜の目覚めは感じられるんだ
だから、わたしもおまえと同じ時に
竜力を受け取っている
MsgEn:
I can feel the awakening of the White Dragon even here.
So I also receive Dragon Force at the same time as you.

MsgJp:
そして、その恩に報いることを考える
ああ――いつも考えている
MsgEn:
And think about repaying the favor.
Oh--I think about it all the time!

MsgJp:
ミシアルが謁見の間から出たらしいな
もっと引っ張り出してやるといい
MsgEn: Mysial seems to have come out of the Audience Chamber. It would be good to get them out even more.

MsgJp:
――いや、誘っても無理か
――うん、無理だな
MsgEn:
――No, it would be impossible to invite her.
――Yeah, it's impossible.

MsgJp:
最前線だったこの砦も
今では時折小競り合いが起こる程度だ
MsgEn:
This fort, which used to be the front line,
now sees only occasional skirmishes.

MsgJp:
殺気で肌がヒリヒリ傷むような戦場――
そんな場所を探して旅に出ようか
――最近、そんなことを思うんだ
MsgEn: A battlefield where the skin stings with a killing intent - Should I search for such a place and embark on a journey? Lately, I've been thinking about such things.

MsgJp:
イリスの行方を知っているか？
身を隠すように言ってやった方が
いいかもしれないぞ？
MsgEn: Do you know where Iris is? It might be better to tell her to hide.

MsgJp:
ふん――そうか
さすがレオだ
MsgEn: Hmph――so that's it. As expected of Leo.

MsgJp:
神殿が大変だと聞いているが――
おまえは戻った方が良くはないか？
MsgEn: I heard that the temple is in trouble— Wouldn't it be better for you to come back?

MsgJp: ここの指揮は部下に任せようと思う
MsgEn: I think I'll leave the command here to my subordinates.

MsgJp:
引き継ぎが終わり次第わたしも神殿へ行く
向こうで会おうではないか
MsgEn:
Once the handover is complete, I will also go to the temple.
Let's meet there, shall we?

MsgJp:
レオのことは心配するな
すべて良かれと思ってしていることだろう
MsgEn: Don't worry about Leo. I'm sure he's doing everything for the best.

MsgJp: 行動が愚かだが――昔からだ
MsgEn: My actions may be foolish, but it has always been this way.

MsgJp:
くそっ――
このあたりの魔物が騒がしくなってな
なかなか離れることができないのだ
MsgEn: Damn it―― The enemies around here are getting noisy. I can't seem to get away easily.

MsgJp:
ここにはわたしがいる
――わかるか？
MsgEn: Here I am --you know what I mean?

MsgJp:
ここの守りは堅い――そういうことだ
思う存分、戦ってこい
MsgEn: The defense here is strong—That's what I'm talking about. Go ahead and fight to your heart's content.

MsgJp:
報せを聞いて駆けつけたぞ
おまえは最前線にいたのだろう？
ご苦労だったな
MsgEn: I rushed over upon hearing the report. Were you at the front line? You've worked hard.

MsgJp:
今度手柄話を聞かせてくれ
盛大にうらやましがってやろう
MsgEn: Tell me your achievements next time. I'll celebrate them with great envy.

MsgJp:
ん？
俺と仲良くなりたいっての？
MsgEn: Hmm? You want to be friends with me?

MsgJp:
世間話ねえ
そんな気分じゃないんだよな――
MsgEn: Chatting is not on my mind right now—

MsgJp:
なああんた、ひまなら俺と――
あ、ひまじゃない？　そりゃ失礼
MsgEn: Hey, if you're free, how about spending some time with me... Oh, you're not? Well, that was rude.

MsgJp:
自由に生きるってのは
思ったほど楽じゃないんだな、これが
MsgEn: Living free is not as easy as I thought it would be.

MsgJp:
あんた、この世界がどうなるのが理想？
なーんて、俺も考えたことないけどな
MsgEn:
What would you like the world to be like?
I've never really thought about it.

MsgJp:
苦難の時代だなんて言うやつもいるけど
俺は結構楽しんでるよ
MsgEn: Some say it's a hard time. I'm having a pretty good time.

MsgJp:
まいったまいった――
次から次へと魔物がよぉ
MsgEn:
I'm in trouble, I'm in trouble--
Enemies keep coming one after another.

MsgJp:
覚者のことを便利屋みたいに
思ってる奴、いるよな――
MsgEn: There are people who think of Arisen as a handyman, right?

MsgJp:
俺、聞き流すの得意でさ――
それでもいいなら、どうぞ
――さあ、話せ！
MsgEn: I'm good at just listening, you know-- If that's really okay, then go ahead. Now, speak up!

MsgJp:
昨日と違う今日、今日と違う明日――
世界はその繰り返しでできてるんだ
――てな
MsgEn: Today is different from yesterday, and tomorrow will be different from today―― The world is made up of such repetitions ―― That's what it means.

MsgJp:
一期一会――いい言葉だね
俺、商品、客――
すべての出会いが、そうなんだな
MsgEn:
Once-in-a-lifetime encounter――That's a nice phrase
Me, the product, the client――
Every encounter is like that

MsgJp:
あんたもいっぱしの覚者を気取るなら
身につけるモノは厳選しなよ
どうだい、ひとつ見繕ってやろうか？
MsgEn: If you're going to pretend to be an Arisen, be selective about what you wear. How about I pick something for you?

MsgJp:
こんな時代なのに商品が行き来しているのは
凄いことだ――
俺たち、誇っていいと思うぞ
MsgEn: It's amazing how much product is coming and going in these times-- I think we should all be proud!

MsgJp:
金なら、余ってるんじゃないのか？
安くするぜ、取引していきなよ
MsgEn: I'm sure you've got plenty of money. I'll give you a discount. Make a deal with me.

MsgJp: よぉ、調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp:
その臭い――戦う覚者という感じで
悪くはないが、日常も大切にな
MsgEn: Wow, you stink. You certainly smell the part, Arisen, but it couldn't hurt to take a bath every now and then.

MsgJp:
時間があるなら世のため人のために
駆け回るのも悪くないぞ
金にもなるしな
MsgEn: If you have time, it's not a bad idea to run around for the sake of the world and for others. It can even bring you money as well.

MsgJp:
いろんな覚者がいる
いろんな生き方がある
とても自然なことだと思うね
MsgEn:
There are various Arisen.
There are various ways of living.
I think it's a very natural thing.

MsgJp:
へえ――なんだか見違えたな
一皮むけたってやつだ
MsgEn: Oh, wow—something about you has really changed. It's like you've shed a whole new skin.

MsgJp:
珍しいものを見つけたら声をかけてくれよな
場合によっては高値で引き取って
やれるかもしれないぜ？
MsgEn: If you find something rare, please let me know. Depending on the situation, I might be able to take it off your hands for a high price, you know?

MsgJp:
アークでは、いや、参った――
でも、探せば珍品があったかもな
MsgEn: The Ark, no, I give up—But if you look, there might be rare items.

MsgJp:
遠出したのか？
このあたりにはない花とか素材とか――
MsgEn: Did you go far? Maybe you found flowers or materials that aren't found around here.

MsgJp:
損をすることはないから
目についたら持ち帰るといい
MsgEn: You've got nothing to lose, so take it home if you see it.

MsgJp:
戦っても空しい――金を儲けても空しい――
だが、どんな時でも続く覚者人生――
楽しまなくちゃ損だぜ？
MsgEn: Even if you fight, it's in vain―― even if you make money, it's in vain―― But the life of the Arisen continues no matter what―― You have to enjoy it, or else it's a loss, you know?

MsgJp:
心配してくれる友達がいるなんて幸せ者だ
――イリスがそれを忘れていなければ
何も問題は起こらないさ
MsgEn: I am a lucky person to have friends who worry about me. - As long as Iris doesn't forget that, nothing will go wrong.

MsgJp:
謁見の間の様子はどうだ？
俺はしばらく距離を置くことにするよ
MsgEn: How is the situation in the Audience Chamber? I'm going to keep my distance for a while.

MsgJp:
凄いことが始まるらしいな
ひさしぶりに大階段を登ろうか――
MsgEn: I hear great things are about to begin. Let's climb the grand staircase for the first time in a while—

MsgJp:
戦うだけが覚者じゃない――
とはいえ、かつてないほど戦いの機運が
盛りあがっている――
MsgEn: Being an Arisen is not just about fighting-- However, the momentum for battle has never been higher--

MsgJp: どんな立ち位置をとるべきか――悩むね
MsgEn: I'm not sure what position I should take.

MsgJp: イリスの顔を見ないけど何か知ってるか？
MsgEn: I don't see Iris around, do you know anything?

MsgJp:
イリスのことは聞いた
友達ではあるが――
MsgEn: I heard about Iris. She is a friend, but - -

MsgJp:
彼女との付き合いが長い
レオに任せるのが一番だな
MsgEn: It'd be best to leave it to Leo, who has a long history with her.

MsgJp:
これまでになかったことが立て続けに起こると
何に対しても集中できなくなる
我ながら修行が足りないぜ
MsgEn:
When unprecedented events continue to occur, I cannot concentrate on anything.
I am lacking in self-discipline!

MsgJp: 長命のエルフが持つ知識は値千金――
MsgEn: The knowledge that long-lived Elves possess is invaluable.

MsgJp:
なんてな
損得抜きで、仲良くしたかった
MsgEn:
What a pity.
I wanted to get along with you, no gain or loss.

MsgJp:
白竜が元気だったら、俺は覚者じゃなかった
たとえエルフが死のうが――
なんとも思わなかっただろう
MsgEn: If the white dragon had been healthy, I wouldn't have been an Arisen. Even if the elf had died— I wouldn't have cared.

MsgJp: ――人生の巡り合わせは不思議だよな
MsgEn: Life's encounters are strange, aren't they?

MsgJp:
新たなアーク――
ほとぼりがさめたら個人的に調査もいいな
MsgEn: A new Ark... It would be nice to personally investigate once the heat dies down.

MsgJp:
見たぞ――
巫女と歩くなんてどんな気分だ？
MsgEn: I saw it-- How does it feel to walk with a priestess?

MsgJp: 覚者のことは覚者が始末をつける――
MsgEn: The Arisen has to take care of the Arisen's business.

MsgJp:
昔からの習慣だ
覚悟だけはしておこう
MsgEn: It's an old habit. Let's just be prepared.

MsgJp:
しばらくここにいる
同志に向ける武器は持っていないからな
MsgEn: I'll be here for a while, as I don't have any weapons to aim at comrades.

MsgJp: 同志に向ける武器はない――
MsgEn: There are no weapons for comrades-in-arms -

MsgJp:
甘いことを言っている場合じゃないのか
くそっ！
MsgEn: You can't be so naive. Damn!

MsgJp: 《謁見の間》はどんな様子だ？
MsgEn: What's going on in the audience chamber?

MsgJp:
さぞ――いや、やめておこう
想像が当たったところでうれしくもなんともない
MsgEn: Surely - No, let's leave it. Even if my imagination was correct, it wouldn't make me happy.

MsgJp:
みんな遠征に夢中になっているようだが
ここの安全が保証されたわけではあるまい？
MsgEn: Everyone seems to be preoccupied with the expedition. How can we be assured of the safety of this place?

MsgJp:
というわけで、こんな言い方はらしくないが――
俺に任せてくれ
MsgEn: So, although it may not be the most appropriate way to say it—Leave it to me.

MsgJp:
メルゴダの様子はどうなんだ？
戦いで忙しいかもしれないが
逸品珍品を見逃すなよ？
MsgEn: How's it going in Mergoda? You may be busy fighting the battle, but don't miss the gems and curiosities, okay?

MsgJp:
結局これは過去との戦いだったというわけか――
いや、ずっと続いていたわけだから
まだ過去にはなっていない――
MsgEn: In the end, this was a battle with the past, so to speak―― No, because it has been continuing for a long time, it has not become the past yet――

MsgJp:
面倒だな――おまえの手で
過去にしてやるといい
MsgEn: It's troublesome... It would be good for you to make a thing of the past with your own hands.

MsgJp:
あちこちで言われて聞き飽きただろうが
俺からも言わせてくれ
MsgEn: You must have heard it said everywhere by now. But let me say it too.

MsgJp:
逞しくなったな――貫禄すら漂うよ
さあ、報告があるんだろう？
早くすませて土産話を聞かせてくれ
MsgEn: You've grown strong—even dignified. Now, you have a report to give, don't you? Get it over with and tell me about your souvenirs.

MsgJp: 呑ませてくれ――
MsgEn: Let me drink—

MsgJp:
今は呑んで――呑んで――
明日からちゃんとするからさ
MsgEn: Right now, I'm drinking - drinking - I'll properly do it starting from tomorrow.

MsgJp: ブ、ブラッドオーブ――探さなくちゃ――
MsgEn: B-Blood Orb... I have to find it...

MsgJp:
俺はここで白竜様と倒れた覚者のために
やれることをやるよ
MsgEn: I will do what I can here for the Arisen who fell with the White Dragon.

MsgJp: あんたたち、黒騎士を頼むぞ
MsgEn: I entrust you with the Black Knight.

MsgJp:
一時はどうなることかと思ったよ
もしあのまま――
MsgEn: For a moment, I thought I was done for. If things had stayed that way -

MsgJp:
――やーめた！　楽しいことだけ
考えるわ
MsgEn: - Never mind! Just think about the fun parts.

MsgJp:
ふう――覚者でいることは大変だけど
お互い、がんばりましょう
MsgEn:
Phew - being an Arisen is tough, but
we both just have to do our best.

MsgJp:
遠くへ行きたいのよ
誰も行ったことがない地へね
MsgEn: I want to go far away. To a place no one has ever been before.

MsgJp:
覚者っぽくないって言われるけど――
やっぱり、わかっちゃうよね
MsgEn: I'm told that I don't seem like an Arisen, but... I still understand, you know.

MsgJp:
覚者だからって戦いばかりの人は
正直、どうかと思うな
MsgEn: A person who only seeks constant battles just because they are an Arisen, honestly, I think that's questionable.

MsgJp:
レスタニア中のきれいな風景を見たいけど
そういう場所は魔物が集まりがちだよね
MsgEn: I want to see the beautiful scenery throughout Lestania, but those kinds of places tend to attract enemies.

MsgJp:
魔物を倒したら
白竜様が毎回ほめてくれる――
そんなのだったら、やりがいあると思わない？
MsgEn:
If you defeat the enemy,
the White Dragon will praise you every time--
If that's the case, don't you think it's rewarding?

MsgJp:
ごきげんよう
さあ、今日はどこへ行こうかな
MsgEn: Hello. Well, where shall we go today?

MsgJp:
覚者って――孤独よね
普通の人だった頃が懐かしい
――なんてね
MsgEn: Being Arisen -- it's lonely, isn't it? I miss the time when I was just a normal person. -- Just kidding!

MsgJp:
覚者の気持ちは覚者にしかわからない
そう思っていたけど――
覚者同士でもわからないこと多いよね
MsgEn: The feelings of an Arisen can only be understood by another Arisen, or so I thought... But even among Arisen, there are many things we don't understand.

MsgJp:
本当なら覚者は世界にひとりしか存在しない
そんな話を聞いたことがあるの
だったら――これからどうなるんだろうな
MsgEn: In reality, there should only be one Arisen in the world Have you ever heard such a story? If so... what will happen from now on?

MsgJp:
隊長、見てこの腕と足の筋肉！
シュッとして、かっこいいと思わない？
MsgEn: Captain, look at these arm and leg muscles! Don't you think they look so cool and shapely?

MsgJp:
最近、やたらと声をかけられるんだけど――
わたしも結構名の売れた覚者になったってこと！？
MsgEn: Lately, I've been getting a lot of attention and being approached a lot. Does that mean I've become quite a renowned Arisen?!

MsgJp:
例えば、ヴァネッサなんて
覚者としても女性としてもひとつの理想型でしょ？
MsgEn: For example, someone like Vanessa, isn't she an ideal type both as an Arisen and as a woman?

MsgJp: だからわたしは、あえてそこは目指さないの
MsgEn: So, I intentionally won't aim for that.

MsgJp: 覚者になったことを嘆く気持ちが前はあったけど――
MsgEn: I used to feel regret about becoming an Arisen, but...

MsgJp:
今は天職って感じ
ま、仕事じゃないけどね
MsgEn: It feels like my calling from heaven now. Well, it's not really a job though.

MsgJp: あら、ごきげんよう
MsgEn: Oh, good day.

MsgJp:
こうして一気に神殿の中枢に食い込めるなんて
ジョゼフ様々！
MsgEn: I can't believe that we can be in the heart of the temple all at once like this. Thank you Joseph!

MsgJp: 精一杯頑張るから、隊長、ひいきしてよね？
MsgEn: I'll do my best, captain, and you'll patronize me, right?

MsgJp:
みんなセシリーセシリーって
どうかしちゃったみたい
MsgEn: Everyone seems to be obsessed with Cecily, Cecily.

MsgJp:
まあ、気持ちはわかるけどね
わたしだって、なんとかしてあげたいもの
MsgEn: Well, I can understand their feelings. I also want to do something to help.

MsgJp:
時には強く言わないとね
もうお客さんじゃなくて、仲間なんだから
ダメなものはダメ
MsgEn: Sometimes you have to say it strongly. You're not a customer anymore, you're a friend. What doesn't work doesn't work.

MsgJp: あ、セシリーの話ね
MsgEn: Ah, it's about Cecily.

MsgJp:
エリオットの奴、張り切っちゃって
わたしだって負けないから
侵食魔討伐数勝負はわたしのもの！
MsgEn: Elliot is all fired up, but I won't lose either. The number of victories in defeating the corrupt is mine!

MsgJp:
なんだかみんな落ち着いちゃってさ
いいのかな
MsgEn: It seems like everyone has calmed down. Is it okay?

MsgJp:
黒騎士は難敵だよね――
闇雲に戦っても勝てないだろうなぁ
MsgEn: The Black Knight is a formidable opponent, huh? I don't think you can win by fighting blindly.

MsgJp:
ロイグは、わたしたちが看病したり
治療のために奔走するのが不思議で
たまらないみたい
MsgEn: Loeg seems to find it fascinating and irresistible that we take care of him and go all out for his treatment.

MsgJp: 人の善意に馴れていないんだね
MsgEn: He's not accustomed to people's goodwill.

MsgJp:
もうさ、わたしは戦うの専門でいいかも
腕を磨いて、口出ししないで
ひたすら戦うよ
MsgEn:
Maybe I'll just specialize in fighting
and keep my skills sharp and stay out of the way
I'll just fight.

MsgJp:
黒騎士が来た時、ロイグは勇敢だったよね
見直しちゃったな
MsgEn: Loeg was brave when the Black Knight came. It made me reassess him.

MsgJp:
レオを信じる――
うん、わたしはあの人を信じる！
――って、自分に言い聞かせているところ
MsgEn: I believe in Leo-- Yeah, I believe in that guy! --I'm just saying to myself.

MsgJp: 隊長、なんだかさ、もう、やるしかないよね！
MsgEn: Captain, I don't know, I'm just going to have to do it!

MsgJp:
レオはやっぱりわたしたちのことを考えていて
くれたんだよね
MsgEn: Leo is still thinking about us. He protected us.

MsgJp:
ううん、やっぱり違う
レオが守ったのは
レスタニア全体の未来だよね？
MsgEn: No, it's different after all. Leo protected the future of Lestania, right?

MsgJp:
隊長、ほら、遠征？　調査？　散歩？
なんでもいいから、行こうよ
MsgEn: Captain, hey, expedition? Survey? Walk? Anything is fine, let's go.

MsgJp:
隊長、レスタニアはどうだった？
問題がないなら、こっちでの任務に専念しない？
MsgEn: Captain, how was Lestania? If everything is okay, why don't we just focus on the mission over here?

MsgJp:
このフィンダムって、単純――
ううん、原始的っていうか
洗練されてないっていうか――
MsgEn:
This Phindym, it's simple--
No, it's more like primitive, Not refined--

MsgJp:
ちがうな――ああ、素朴！
この素朴さ、わたしは嫌いじゃないな
MsgEn:
No, it's not - ah, rustic!
I don't mind the simplicity.

MsgJp:
わたしたち、後手後手というか――
遅れちゃってるよね
MsgEn: We're kind of behind the curve...

MsgJp:
ねえ、隊長
急いで、事態の先頭に立とうよ
MsgEn: Hey captain, hurry up and take the lead in the situation!

MsgJp:
《原始の雫》を持ち去った犯人は
フィンダムがどうなっても構わない――
やっぱり、幾ら考えても気持がわからないな
