MsgEn: The culprit who took away《Primeval Drops》doesn't care what happens to Phindym after all— I still can't understand their feelings no matter how much I think.

MsgJp: ロイグのしたことは許せないけど――
MsgEn: Loeg's actions are unforgivable, but—

MsgJp:
わたしは憎めないな
フィンダムの人たちはどう裁くつもりなんだろう
MsgEn: I don't hate. I just wonder how the people of Phindym are going to judge me.

MsgJp:
なんかさ――
セシリーが、すごく遠い人になっちゃった気がする
MsgEn: I feel like— Cecily has become a very distant person.

MsgJp:
でもまあ、仕方ないか
ここはあの子の世界だからね
MsgEn: But well, I guess there's no helping it. Because this is her world, you know.

MsgJp:
連戦連戦だからね――
さすがに疲れちゃったかな
MsgEn: Because it's battle after battle-- I guess I'm really tired now.

MsgJp:
侵食魔退治でも行く？
あー、こんな気持で戦っちゃ
絶対怪我するよね
MsgEn: Do you want to go fight the corrupted monsters? Oh, you shouldn't fight like this, you'll get injured.

MsgJp:
セシリー、普段と変わらないね
どんな気持ちなのかな――
MsgEn: Cecily, you're still the same as usual. I wonder how you feel--

MsgJp:
洞が時々、ふわっと輝くの
まるで何かが始まる予兆みたい
MsgEn: Sometimes the cave's shining softly, as if it's a prelude to something starting.

MsgJp:
さあ隊長
どこへでも一緒に行くからね
MsgEn: Alright Captain, I'll go with you wherever you go.

MsgJp:
絶望的な状況に呑み込まれてしまう人と
前を向いて進む人の違いって
なんだろうね？
MsgEn: What's the difference between someone who gets swallowed up in a hopeless situation and someone who moves forward?

MsgJp:
解放軍が明るくなったね
メイロワ将軍効果だね
MsgEn: The Liberation Army has brightened up. It's the General Meirova effect.

MsgJp:
王子は身も心も盗賊に染まってしまった――
なんてことはないよね？
MsgEn: The prince became a bandit in body and soul... It's not true, right?

MsgJp:
王子は無事なのかな
居場所よりも安否の確認が先だよね
MsgEn: I wonder if the prince is safe. I'd rather know if he's safe than where he is.

MsgJp:
王子の目的は恩人の盗賊ベルタを救うこと
その気持ちは大切にしないとね
MsgEn: The prince's goal is to save his benefactor, the bandit Bertha. We must cherish that sentiment.

MsgJp:
ネド王子、守ってあげたくなっちゃう
小さな弟がいるのってこんな気分？
MsgEn: Prince Nedo, I feel like I want to protect you. Is this what it's like to have a little brother?

MsgJp:
ネド王子は前線に立って兵たちを
鼓舞するのが自分の責務だと
考えているみたい
MsgEn: Prince Nedo seems to think that it is his duty to encourage the soldiers on the front line.

MsgJp:
空気が汚れた感じがするよね
オークの攻撃臭が漂ってくるからかな
MsgEn: The air feels polluted, doesn't it? Maybe it's because the stench of Orc attacks is lingering in the air.

MsgJp:
ネド王子、顔がいきいきしてるよ
無理してなければいいけど
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo, your face looks so chipper;
I hope you're not forcing yourself.

MsgJp: 待機はつらいなぁ
MsgEn: Waiting is tough.

MsgJp: 待機はつらいなぁ
MsgEn: Waiting is tough.

MsgJp:
ガルドリンやエリオットと一緒だと
なんだか焦っちゃうんだよね
MsgEn: When I'm with Gurdolin and Elliot, I somehow get anxious.

MsgJp:
あの人たち戦闘中はガツガツするから
調子を乱されちゃうんだ
MsgEn: Those people are too aggressive during combat, so it throws off my rhythm.

MsgJp:
ネド王子にお礼を言われると
うん、お姉ちゃんもっと頑張るよって
気になるんだよね
MsgEn: Now that Prince Nedo's thanked me personally, I feel like I need to redouble my efforts just for him.

MsgJp: すっかりお姉ちゃん気分
MsgEn: I feel like a big sister now.

MsgJp:
気になることはいろいろあるけれど
先に解放軍の目的を果たさなくちゃね
MsgEn: There are various things that I am concerned about, but first, I have to accomplish the objective of the Liberation Army.

MsgJp:
エリオットとも話したんだ
今は王都の敵に集中しようってね
MsgEn: I also talked to Elliot. Now let's focus on the enemies in the Royal Capital.

MsgJp: 隊長――わたし――ううん、なんでもない
MsgEn: Captain - I - no, it's nothing.

MsgJp: だいじょうぶ――だいじょうぶだよ
MsgEn: It's okay... It's okay.

MsgJp: 隊長――わたし、あいつのこと許さないから
MsgEn: Captain - I won't forgive him.

MsgJp:
迷惑かけちゃったよね
この埋め合わせはするから！
MsgEn: I caused you trouble, didn't I? I will make it up to you!

MsgJp:
はぁ――もっとわたしたちを
信じてほしいよねえ
MsgEn: Haa ―― I wish they would believe in us more, you know

MsgJp:
ネド王子と再会したら
わたし、ちょっとお説教しちゃうかも？
MsgEn:
If I were to meet Prince Nedo again,
I might give him a little sermon.

MsgJp:
王子のことは心配だけど
メイロワ将軍たちに任せておけば
大丈夫だよね
MsgEn: I'm worried about the prince, but if we leave it to General Meirova and the others, it should be fine, right?

MsgJp:
エリオットさあ、大丈夫大丈夫って言い過ぎ！
その方が気になっちゃうじゃない
MsgEn: Elliot, come on, you say it's okay too much! You're making me nervous.

MsgJp: ネド王子はいつか竜になるんだよね
MsgEn: Prince Nedo will become a dragon someday.

MsgJp:
どんな感じなのかな
セシリーとは違うのかな
MsgEn: I wonder what it feels like. How is it different from Cecily?

MsgJp: なにかお話ししてくださいな
MsgEn: Please tell me something.

MsgJp: うふふ――ご機嫌いかがですか？
MsgEn: How are you feeling?

MsgJp: 内緒話は、ジョゼフおじさまに叱られます
MsgEn: Uncle Joseph will scold you for talking in private.

MsgJp:
覚者様は考えたことがありますか？
この世界がどうやって出来たのか――
MsgEn: Have the Arisen ever thought about it? How was this world made?

MsgJp:
白竜だけがこの世界の
すべてを知っている――
早くお話しを聞きたいですね
MsgEn:
Only the White Dragon knows everything in this world--
I want to hear the story quickly.

MsgJp: 覚者になるって、どんな気分ですか？
MsgEn: What does it feel like to become an Arisen?

MsgJp:
戦争って、どんな時代にもありますね
嫌いな人の方が多いはずなのに
MsgEn: War exists in any era, huh? Even though there should be more people who hate it.

MsgJp:
みんなでお歌をうたえば戦いがなくなる――
パメラがそう言うんだけど
きっと、そんなに簡単ではないですよね
MsgEn:
If we all sing a song together, there will be no more fighting--
Pamela says so.
I bet it's not that easy!

MsgJp:
時々、わけもなく悲しくなるの
ううん――わけはあるけど――
話しても誰も戻ってこないから
MsgEn:
Sometimes I feel sad for no reason.
No, I mean, I have my reasons, but...
I talk about it, and no one ever comes back.

MsgJp:
白竜も、人間も、覚者も――魔物だって
同じように生きているんだよね
MsgEn: Both the White Dragon and humans, as well as the Arisen, and even enemies, all live in the same way.

MsgJp:
お友達はいつかいなくなるもの――
それでも、ほしいと思ってしまうの
MsgEn:
Friends are things that eventually disappear ――
But still, you can't help but want them.

MsgJp: この風――あの森にも、吹いているのかな
MsgEn: I wonder, this wind—Is it blowing in that forest, too?

MsgJp:
真っ直ぐに進む人は
大切なことを忘れがちです
覚者さん、気をつけてね
MsgEn: Those who proceed straight ahead tend to forget important things. Arisen one, be cautious.

MsgJp: 時は――少し、意地悪です
MsgEn: Time is-- harsh.

MsgJp: あれ？　何して遊ぶ？　え？　お話し？
MsgEn: Oh? What should we play? Draw? A story?

MsgJp: こんにちは、メイリーフです
MsgEn: Hello, I'm Mayleaf

MsgJp:
あ、覚えていてくれましたか？
だとしたら、うれしいです！
MsgEn:
Oh, you remember me?
If so, I'm glad!

MsgJp:
あのね――迷惑かけちゃったけど
仲良くしてね？
MsgEn: Hey, I'm sorry for causing you trouble, but let's get along, okay?

MsgJp:
わたしはイリスとも仲良しなんだ
だから、イリスが戻ってわたしもうれしいの
MsgEn: I'm good friends with Iris, so I'm glad she's back.

MsgJp:
レオが恐い顔をしていたの――
ちょっとびっくりしちゃった
MsgEn: Leo had a scary look on his face— I was a little surprised.

MsgJp: 白竜様、元気になーれ！
MsgEn: Who, don't bully—Peco— I won't do bad things.

MsgJp:
わたしはもう絶対にひとりでは神殿から
出ないからね
MsgEn: I will never leave the Temple alone again!

MsgJp:
あなたにもパメラにもジョゼフ様にも
心配をかけちゃって――
MsgEn: To both you and Pamela and Master Joseph, I apologize for causing you worry...

MsgJp:
だからこれからは、必ず、誰かと一緒に――
もちろん、みんなが知ってる誰かと一緒に
お出かけすることにして――
MsgEn: So from now on, I'll be sure to go out with someone—of course, someone we all know—and—

MsgJp:
しかも、知らない場所へは行かないって
約束するよ！
MsgEn: And I promise that I won't go to places I don't know!

MsgJp:
キースヒルト――無事だよね？
ちゃんと逃げるよね？
MsgEn:
Kieshildt--you're safe, right?
You're going to escape, aren't you?

MsgJp: キースヒルト兄様をお願いします
MsgEn: Please take care of Kieshildt.

MsgJp:
――つらいよ
こんなにつらいなんて――
MsgEn:
――This is painful. 
How can it be this painful――

MsgJp:
わたしのせいなのかな――
わたしが悪かったのかな――
MsgEn:
Is it my fault--
Was I wrong--?

MsgJp:
わたしはこれからキースヒルトのぶんまで
生きるから――
MsgEn: I'm going to live on, for Kieshildt.

MsgJp:
ううん、死んでしまった人、全員のぶん
わたしは生きるの――そう決めたの
MsgEn: No, for all those who have died. I'm going to live - I've decided.

MsgJp:
どこにも行かないで？
誰にもいなくなってほしくないの
MsgEn: Don't go anywhere. I don't want anyone to disappear.

MsgJp:
ミシアルとこのあたりを歩いたって本当？
どうしてうちに寄ってくれなかったの！？
MsgEn: Mysial, is it true that you walked around this area? Why didn't you come visit me?

MsgJp:
何か怖いことが起こりそうな――
そんな気がするよ？
MsgEn: I feel like something scary is about to happen—

MsgJp:
空気がビリビリ震えているの――
これは良くないことのシルシなの――
MsgEn: The air is tingling - This is the sign of something bad -

MsgJp: ねえねえ、イリスはどこにいるの？
MsgEn: Hey, where is Iris?

MsgJp:
わたしを遠くに連れ出したことで
みんな怒っているから教えてくれないの？
MsgEn: Why won't you tell me? Is it because everyone is angry with you for taking me far away?

MsgJp:
どうしよう――ミシアルが――
でも、お願い――イリスを怒らないで！
MsgEn:
What should I do―― Mysial――
But, please―― Do not make Iris angry!

MsgJp:
ミシアルみたいに白竜と仲良くなるよ
応援して――ね？
MsgEn:
I'll become friends with the White Dragon like Mysial.
I hope you support me――okay?

MsgJp:
わたしじゃダメかもしれないけど
それでも応援してね
MsgEn:
I might not be good enough,
but please support me anyway.

MsgJp:
みんな行っちゃうの？
ちゃんと帰ってきてね？
MsgEn:
Are you all leaving?
You'll come back, won't you?

MsgJp: もう、誰もいなくなったら、いやだよ？
MsgEn: I don't want everyone to disappear already.

MsgJp:
力を貸してください――って
白竜様にお祈りしてるの
MsgEn: I'm praying to the White Dragon to help me--

MsgJp: でも、全然起きてくれないの
MsgEn: But they still won't wake up at all.

MsgJp:
がんばれ！
がんばれっ！
MsgEn: Do your best! Do your best!

MsgJp:
おかえりなさい！
ええと、わたしね――ええと――
MsgEn: Welcome back! Um, as for me... um...

MsgJp:
あ、ごめんなさい
わたしじゃなくて、まず、白竜様だよね？
MsgEn: Oh, I'm sorry. It's not me, but The White Dragon first, right?

MsgJp: 白竜様も、早く元気になるといいね
MsgEn: I hope The White Dragon gets well soon.

MsgJp:
黒騎士はどこへ行ったの？
行方がわからないなんてこわい！
MsgEn: Where did The Black Knight go? It's scary not knowing their whereabouts!

MsgJp: リズ、もう聞こえていないみたい――
MsgEn: Lise, I don't think he can hear me anymore—

MsgJp: 隊長さん、気をつけてね
MsgEn: Captain, be careful.

MsgJp: 全部終わったんだよね？
MsgEn: Is it all finished?

MsgJp:
こわいことや悲しいことは
もう起こらないんだよね？
MsgEn: Scary and sad things won't happen anymore, right?

MsgJp:
いまは戦いに備える時
語り合うのは、またの機会だ
MsgEn:
Now is the time to prepare for battle.
We'll talk about it another time.

MsgJp: 覚者――白竜の力を預かる者か
MsgEn: Arisen - the one who holds the power of The White Dragon.

MsgJp:
――？　ああ、失礼
考え事を少々、ね
MsgEn:
――? Ah, excuse me.
Just thinking about something for a moment, hmm.

MsgJp:
そういうえば覚者と話したことは
あまりなかったな――
今度ゆっくり話そうか
MsgEn:
Come to think of it, I didn't have many conversations with the Arisen—
Shall we talk in detail next time?

MsgJp:
聞きたいことが山ほどある
そんな顔だね
MsgEn: There are so many things I want to ask. That's the kind of expression you have.

MsgJp:
僕はどんなふうに見えるんだい？
生を楽しんでいるように見えるかい？
MsgEn:
How do I look?
Do I look like I'm enjoying life?

MsgJp:
気づかなかったが――
きみはいい目をしているな
MsgEn: I hadn't noticed— you have a good eye.

MsgJp:
覚えていてほしい
取るに足りない――なんでもない――
そういうことが実は大きな意味を持っている
それに気づくのはね、大いなる喜びだよ
MsgEn: Remember, insignificant—nothing—such things actually mean a great deal. It's a great joy to realize that, you know?

MsgJp:
つくづく思うよ
世界はね、複雑なんだ
白と黒、善と悪――
そんな単純な区分けはできないのさ
MsgEn: I really think the world is, you know, complicated black and white, good and evil-- there's no such simple division.

MsgJp:
人間は興味深いけど
時に、難解すぎる存在だよ
MsgEn: Humans are interesting but sometimes, they are too difficult to understand.

MsgJp:
信じる力はとても大切だ
僕も信じているんだ
帰るべき場所――仲間の無事をね
MsgEn: The power of belief is very important. I believe in it too. The place I should return to - the safety of my comrades.

MsgJp:
朝が好きなんだ
幼いころに感じた、あの風の匂いがするからね
MsgEn: I like mornings, because it reminds me of the scent of that wind when I was a child.

MsgJp: ああ、君か
MsgEn: Ah, it's you.

MsgJp: 死に急ぐか、若造が
MsgEn: Do you want to hurry up and die, you brat?

MsgJp: 慈悲などやらん、死ね
MsgEn: No mercy, just death.

MsgJp: 木偶どもにはもう飽きたわ
MsgEn: I'm tired of these puppets already.

MsgJp:
わからんな――
お前に勝ち目などない
MsgEn: I don't understand— you don't stand a chance.

MsgJp:
殺し合いの最中に――
笑わせてくれるわ
MsgEn: In the midst of the killing, You make me laugh.

MsgJp:
帰れ――殺すぞ？
おまえは好かん
MsgEn: Go home... or I'll kill you. I don't like you.

MsgJp: まだ盾突くか――ならば、死をくれてやる
MsgEn: If you still dare to thrust your shield――then allow me to give you death

MsgJp:
殺す、ただ殺す
それが世界だ
MsgEn: Kill, just kill. That's how the world works.

MsgJp:
気づいているだろうが――
おまえらの死は無駄にはならん
ふははは！
MsgEn:
You may have noticed, but...
Your deaths will not be in vain.
Hahaha!

MsgJp:
その命、よこせ
さあ、よこせ！
MsgEn: Give me that life. Come on, give it to me!

MsgJp: ほう――身の程知らずめ
MsgEn: You fool, know your place.

MsgJp: なんだ？　うまい話でもあるのか？
MsgEn: What's that? You got a better offer?

MsgJp:
オマイと話だと？
ガハハハ、笑わせる！
MsgEn: Talking to me? Gahahahaha, you make me laugh!

MsgJp: 遊びたいが、またな
MsgEn: I'd love to play, but see ya.

MsgJp:
俺サマとトモダチになろうってか？
悪くないな、でも、まあヤメとくよ
MsgEn: You want to become friends with me? Not bad, but well, I'll pass.

MsgJp:
オマイ、強いんだろ？
ちょいと、試してやろうか？
MsgEn: You, are you strong? Shall I test you a little?

MsgJp: オマイら、まとめてブッ壊すからな
MsgEn: I'll destroy all of you at once!

MsgJp:
あ？　目的だと？
楽しみは秘密にする主義でな
MsgEn:
What?　You said you wanted to do this?
I like to keep my pleasures a secret.

MsgJp:
暴れたいトキに暴れる
それが人生ってヤツだ
MsgEn:
When you want to go wild, just go wild.
That's what life is all about.

MsgJp:
つまんねえな
ここいらにゃ、弱いヤツらしかいねえのか
MsgEn:
Boring.
Are there only weak people around here?

MsgJp:
アレを、アレして――こうなる！
グフ、グフフフフフ！
MsgEn: Doing that, it becomes like this! Gufu, gufufufufu!

MsgJp: なんだよ――オマイ、なんだよ！
MsgEn: What is it - you, what is it!

MsgJp:
巡る竜力を感じます――
やっぱり、心地良いものですね
MsgEn: I feel the Dragon Force circulating around— After all, it's a pleasant sensation.

MsgJp: 黒騎士のことを考えていました――
MsgEn: I was thinking about The Black Knight...

MsgJp:
こう見えて、結構戦えるつもりです
必要とあればなんなりと
MsgEn: Despite my appearance, I am prepared to fight rather well. If necessary, I am willing to do whatever it takes.

MsgJp:
みなさんの戦い方はとても洗練されていますね
勉強させてもらいます
MsgEn: Everyone's way of fighting is very refined, isn't it? I will learn from it.

MsgJp: みなさんとご一緒できて光栄です
MsgEn: It's an honor to be here with you all.

MsgJp: ご恩はいつかお返しさせていただきます
MsgEn: Yes, I will return the favor someday.

MsgJp:
覚者が一目置かれるのは
みなさんの普段の行いが素晴らしいからですよね
MsgEn: Arisen are respected because of everyone's wonderful daily conduct, aren't they?

MsgJp: お疲れじゃないですか？
MsgEn: Are you tired?

MsgJp:
面倒をかけているわたしが言うのも変ですけど――
時々休んでくださいね
MsgEn: It's strange for someone like me who is causing trouble to say it, but please take occasional rests.

MsgJp: はい、なんでしょう
MsgEn: Yes, what is it?

MsgJp:
本当に何から何までお世話になってしまって
お礼の言葉もありません
MsgEn: I really can't thank you enough for everything you've done for me.

MsgJp:
わたしにできることがあれば言ってください
戦場でも少しはお役に立てると思います
MsgEn:
Let me know if there is anything I can do for you.
I'm sure I can be of some help on the battlefield.

MsgJp:
わかっています
少し――いいえ、かなり焦っています
MsgEn: I understand I'm a little bit - no, I'm quite anxious.

MsgJp:
これ以上、ご迷惑をおかけするのが
心苦しくって――
MsgEn: It pains me to cause you any more trouble.

MsgJp:
ロイグ――
あの人はわたしを知っていましたけど
わたしは――
いくら記憶を探ってもロイグが登場しません
MsgEn:
Loeg ――
That person knew me.
But I ――
No matter how much I search my memory, Loeg does not appear.

MsgJp:
それほど交わりの薄い人なのでしょうか――
もう一度会えれば――話せれば――
MsgEn: Is he such a distant person to me - If I could see him again - If I could talk to him -

MsgJp:
不思議です
不安だし、焦りもあるんですけど
MsgEn: It's strange and I feel uneasy and anxious, but.

MsgJp:
以前とは違って――
みなさんと一緒なら、なんとかなる
そんな風に思えるようになりました
MsgEn: Unlike before - I feel like I can manage with everyone.

MsgJp:
ロイグと話せればわたしの記憶は
きっと戻ると思います
MsgEn: If I can talk to Loeg, I'm sure my memories will come back.

MsgJp:
待っていてくださいね
きっと――
きっと全部思い出しますから
MsgEn: Please wait for me. I'm sure—I'll definitely remember everything.

MsgJp:
もっともっとロイグと話すべきですよね？
それはわかっているんです
でも、もどかしくて――
MsgEn: I should talk to Loeg more often, right? I know that but it's frustrating.

MsgJp:
わたしたちは勝利に向かって
確実に進んでいるはずですよね
MsgEn: We are definitely on the road to victory.

MsgJp:
もちろん勝利が全てではありませんけど
未来への道しるべになりますよね？
MsgEn: Of course, winning isn't everything. But it's a signpost for the future, right?

MsgJp:
ゲートのことはわたしに任せてください
どんなに時間がかかっても
皆さんを必ずフィンダムにご招待します
MsgEn: Let me take care of the gate. No matter how long it takes, I promise to bring you all to Phindym!

MsgJp:
早く集落を目指しましょう
何より、森の中は安全とは言えません
MsgEn: Let's get to the village as soon as possible. Above all, it is not safe in the forest!

MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょう
ガルドリンさんがいい人なのは知っていますが
誤解を招きやすい性格ですから――
胸騒ぎがします！
MsgEn: Captain, let's hurry. I know Gurdolin is a good person, but they have a personality that is easily misunderstood. I have a feeling of unease!

MsgJp:
状況に流されるだけではなく、抵抗を試みる――
フィンダムではまだ新しい考え方です
MsgEn: Don't just be swept away by the situation, try to resist-- It's still a new idea in Phindym!

MsgJp:
協力してくれる人はまだまだ少ないので
わたしが父を探してあげないと――
MsgEn: Since there are still very few people who are willing to help, I have to find my father myself...

MsgJp:
隊長――
父に――父にもしものことがあれば
わたしは――
MsgEn: Captain -- If something were to happen to my father -- I...

MsgJp:
すいません、今はこんな個人的な思いは
しまっておくべきですよね
MsgEn: Sorry, I should probably put these personal thoughts away for now.

MsgJp:
隊長、父は元気になりますよね？
父の傷は、致命傷ではありませんよね？
MsgEn: Captain, is Father going to be okay? His wounds are not fatal, right?

MsgJp:
あと少しですよ、隊長
《原始の雫》が芯なる樹を――
ひいてはこのフィンダムを浄化してくれます
MsgEn: Left: just a little more, Captain. The "Primeval Drops" will cleanse the core tree- and in turn, cleanse Phindym for us.

MsgJp:
その後の美しいフィンダムを
皆さん、ご案内しますからね
MsgEn: I will show everyone the beautiful Phindym that comes after that.

MsgJp:
《原始の雫》はわたしの命に替えても守ります
隊長たちは魔物退治に専念してください
MsgEn: I will protect the《Primeval Drops》 with my life. Captain, please focus on defeating the enemies.

MsgJp:
このあたりの侵食魔を一掃すれば
次はいよいよ浄化です
もう少し、よろしくお願いします
MsgEn: If we completely eliminate these corrupting demons in this area, then it will finally be time for the purification. A little while longer, please.

MsgJp:
明るい未来――
夢見ても大丈夫ですよね？
MsgEn: Bright future-- It's okay to dream, right?

MsgJp: 隊長――あと少しだけ、よろしくお願いしますね
MsgEn: Captain--I'll be counting on you for a few more minutes.

MsgJp:
おつかれさまです、隊長
俺のやる気、爆発しそうですよ！
MsgEn: Captain--I'll be counting on you for a few more minutes.

MsgJp:
隊長、俺を忙しくしてください
ジョゼフ様のところへは戻りたくないんです
MsgEn: Captain, please keep me busy I don't want to go back to Master Joseph.

MsgJp:
レスタニアはまた大変なことになりましたけど――
そのおかげで隊長と一緒に働けて――
MsgEn: Lestania is in trouble again, but— that allowed me to work with the captain and—

MsgJp: 不謹慎だけど――俺、うれしいです
MsgEn: I know it's inappropriate—but I'm glad I'm here.

MsgJp:
隊長がレオ統率の右腕なら――
俺は隊長の右腕になります！
MsgEn: If Captain is Leo's right-hand man, I will be Captain's right-hand man!

MsgJp:
リズと俺――ある意味、敵同士ですよね
どっちが隊長の信頼を勝ち取るか――みたいな
MsgEn: Lise and me—In a way, we are enemies, aren't we? It's like, who will earn the captain's trust?

MsgJp:
セシリーはちょっと固いというか――
真面目すぎるんですよね
MsgEn: Cecily is a bit stiff or-- too serious.

MsgJp:
オーク戦争の頃、リズはレスタニアを巡って
お宝とか探してたらしいですね
なんだか、遅れを取った気分です
MsgEn:
I heard that during the orc wars, Lise was cruising around Lestania looking for treasures and stuff.
I feel like I'm falling behind!

MsgJp:
侵食魔のせいかな――
少し空気が濁った感じ、しませんか？
MsgEn:
Maybe it's the Corruption?
The air seems a little muddy, don't you think?

MsgJp:
隊長――
やっぱり覚者というのは戦ってこそ、ですよね
つくづく、そう思いますよ
MsgEn: Captain-- Indeed, it is through battle that an Arisen truly shows their worth. I am deeply convinced of this.

MsgJp:
ガルドリンが細々と賭けを持ちかけてくるんですよね
おかげで――いえ、なんでもありません！
MsgEn: Gurdolin keeps coming up with small bets, you know. Thanks to that... Well, never mind!

MsgJp:
戦いに慣れてから、時々ですけど、もっと刺激が
ほしいなんて、考えちゃうんですよ
MsgEn: After getting used to battles, sometimes, I can't help but think that I want more excitement.

MsgJp: ダメですよね、こういうこと考えちゃ
MsgEn: It's not good, thinking about things like that.

MsgJp:
ガルドリンのこと、いろんな人から聞くんですけど
どうやら最近は丸くなったというか
落ち着いたというか――
MsgEn: I hear about Gurdolin from various people, and it seems that recently, they have become more well-rounded, or rather, calmer.

MsgJp:
最近のことしか知らない俺にしてみれば
これで！？　って感じですけどね
MsgEn: From my perspective, as someone who only knows recent things, I have to say... is this it!? But well, that's how I feel.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様から聞く話に隊長が登場するようになって
どれくらい経つか忘れましたけど――
MsgEn: It has been some time since Captain made their debut, or so it feels, as I heard from Sir Joseph. But I can't exactly remember how long ago it was.

MsgJp: 思うに、隊長って、全然変わってないですよね
MsgEn: In my opinion, the captain hasn't changed at all, right?

MsgJp:
リズって、ああ見えて、意外と世の中を
見てるんですよね
自分のことは見えていないようだけど
MsgEn:
Lise looks like that, but she sees the world
surprisingly well.
She doesn't seem to see herself, though.

MsgJp: なんでしょうか、隊長！
MsgEn: What is it, Captain!

MsgJp:
セシリーはいい子ですよねえ
力になってあげたいなあ
MsgEn: Cecily is a good girl, isn't she? I want to be supportive.

MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょう
何もかも、急ぎましょう
MsgEn: Captain, let's hurry! with everything, I mean

MsgJp:
早くセシリーを楽にしてあげないと
こっちまで息が詰まりそうです
MsgEn: We need to make Cecily feel better soon. I'm choking up too!

MsgJp:
まあ、楽にすると言っても
どうしたらいいかなんて
わからないんですけどね
MsgEn: Well, even if I say I want to make it easier, I don't know what to do, you know?

MsgJp:
騎士団には売れるだけ恩を売っておけなんていう
覚者もいますけど、俺に言わせれば
持ちつ持たれつですよ
MsgEn: Some Arisen believe in gaining favor with the knight order as much as possible, but in my opinion, it's all about mutual support.

MsgJp:
売ったとか買ったとか、借りた貸したなんて
どうでもいいことです――
って、考えられる人になりたいんです、俺
MsgEn: Selling, buying, borrowing, lending... It's all trivial stuff. I want to become someone who can think about more important things—me.

MsgJp:
時々、セシリーが思い詰めた顔をしていますよ？
なんとかしてあげられませんかねえ
もう、見ていられませんよ
MsgEn: Sometimes, Cecily has a troubled look on her face, you know? Can't we do something to help her? I can't bear to watch anymore.

MsgJp:
隊長、レスタニアは広いですね
今回ばかりは痛感しています
MsgEn: Captain, Lestania is far, isn't it? I am feeling this particularly keenly this time.

MsgJp:
走っても、戦っても、尽きない敵
ええ、やりがいがありますよ！
MsgEn: Running, fighting, and endless enemies. Yes, it's challenging!

MsgJp: 俺、連戦でちょっと疲れちゃって――
MsgEn: I'm a little tired from the consecutive battles...

MsgJp:
もちろん、何かあれば動きますから
それ以外はここでジッとさせてください
MsgEn:
Of course, if you need me to move, I'll move.
Otherwise, please let me stay put here.

MsgJp:
俺は隊長の右腕を自認してますから
誰が戻ろうと、去ろうと、そこだけは
変わりませんからね
もちろん、ものすごく期待はしていますけど――
MsgEn: Of course, I have really high expectations, but -

MsgJp:
セシリーの記憶が戻っても問題が
解決するわけじゃないんですよね
鍛錬して、腕を磨いておこうかな
MsgEn: Even if Cecily's memory returns, it doesn't mean the problem will be solved, right? Maybe I should train and sharpen my skills.

MsgJp: 黒騎士対策が急務ってところですかね
MsgEn: Is countermeasures against the Black Knight the urgent matter here?

MsgJp:
記憶が戻るとか、どうでも良くなりましたね
せめて意識が戻ってくれれば――
MsgEn: Back to memory, or whatever, it doesn't matter anymore. At least if consciousness can return—

MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょうよ
急いては事をし損じるなんて
言ってる場合じゃありません！
MsgEn: Captain, let's hurry up. There's no time to waste by rushing. We can't afford to be talking about it!

MsgJp:
白竜様以外の竜の覚者と一緒に戦うなんて
こんな機会はもうないかもしれませんよね？
MsgEn: Isn't it unlikely to ever have the opportunity to fight alongside any dragon's Arisen other than the White Dragon?

MsgJp:
隊長と一緒にいられるだけでも幸せなのに
その師匠筋のレオ統率の生き様まで
間近で見られて――俺、胸が熱いです
MsgEn: I am happy just being able to be with the captain, And now, witnessing the way of life of Leo up close... My heart is burning.

MsgJp:
耳を澄ますと、聞き慣れない音がしますね
空気が濃くて、ねっとりとまとわりつくような――
MsgEn: When you listen carefully, you can hear unfamiliar sounds. The air is thick and sticky, as if it is enveloping you.

MsgJp:
気にしすぎですかね――
やっぱり、ビビってるんですかね
MsgEn: Is it because I'm worrying too much - Am I just being scared after all?

MsgJp: ガルドリンは俺が見つけてみせますよ
MsgEn: Gurdolin will be found

MsgJp:
あの人は認めないでしょうけど
俺たち、結構、心が通じ合っているような
気がするんですよね
MsgEn: That person might not admit it, but I feel like our hearts are somewhat connected, you know?

MsgJp:
ロイグはどこでしょうね
ガルドリンも、はぐれたきりらしいですよ
MsgEn: Where can Loeg be? Gurdolin also seems to be lost.

MsgJp:
セシリーのお父さんは
それなりに強い戦士に育った娘の帰りを
待っていたのではないでしょうか？
MsgEn: I think Cecily's father was waiting for his daughter to return after she grew up to be a strong warrior in her own right.

MsgJp:
本当は娘と一緒に行きたかったけど
いつまでも待っているわけにはいかず――
MsgEn: I really wanted to go with my daughter, but I couldn't wait forever to--

MsgJp:
とすれば、セシリーを早く帰してやれなかった
俺たちの責任も、あるのかもしれません
MsgEn: If that's the case, maybe it's our fault for not getting Cecily home sooner.

MsgJp:
族長が回復したらすぐに出発できるように
身体を温めておきましょう
電光石火の、雫奪回作戦です！
MsgEn: Once the clan chief has recovered, we can depart immediately, so let's keep our bodies warm. It's time for the lightning-fast operation to reclaim the drop!

MsgJp:
あははは
なんだかセシリーが大きく見えますよね
ここで居心地悪そうにしてた時とは
別人のようです
MsgEn:
Ahahahaha!
Somehow, Cecily looks bigger, doesn't she?
She seems like a completely different person from when she was feeling uncomfortable here.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの中心部に向かうんですよね
しかも、世界を救うために――
これって、凄いことだなあ
MsgEn:
We're heading to the heart of Phindym,
And to save the world--
This is awesome!

MsgJp:
さあ、まだ魔物はいますよ！
休んでいるヒマなんてありません
MsgEn:
Well, there are still enemies here!
There is no time to rest.

MsgJp:
胸騒ぎが止まりません――
なんでしょう、これ
MsgEn: I can't stop the excitement— What is this?

MsgJp:
わははは！
隊長、もう感情を抑えられません
早く決めちゃいましょう！
MsgEn: Wahaha! Captain, I can't contain my emotions anymore. Let's decide quickly!

MsgJp:
理というのは――
見方によっちゃあ、酷なものですね
MsgEn: Depending on how you look at it, order can be a cruel thing, you know.

MsgJp:
俺たちをここに連れてきた竜の思惑なんて
わかりませんけど、アッカーシェランには
俺たちの援助が必要です
MsgEn: I don't understand the intentions of the dragon that brought us here, but Acre Selund needs our assistance.

MsgJp: 俺は、そう確信しています！
MsgEn: I am convinced of that!

MsgJp: この状況、俺たちで変えて見せましょう！
MsgEn: Let's change this situation, and show what we can do!

MsgJp: 王子はどこですかねえ
MsgEn: Where is the prince, I wonder?

MsgJp:
聞くところによると西方はなかなか
厄介な地域らしいですよ
MsgEn: According to reports, the western region is said to be quite troublesome area.

MsgJp: 王家の威光もあまり届いていないとか
MsgEn: The royal family's authority does not seem to reach very far.

MsgJp:
隊長、アッカーシェランの歴史や政治とは
距離を置いた方が得策ですよね
MsgEn: Captain, it's in your best interest to keep your distance from Acre Selund's history and politics

MsgJp:
王子救出に夢中になっていましけど
“悪しき竜”はどこにいるんでしょうね
MsgEn: I'm currently focused on rescuing the prince, but where could the "Evil Dragon" be?

MsgJp: 邪魔する気もないみたいですし
MsgEn: And they don't seem to want to interfere.

MsgJp:
王子はまだまだ子供で頼りないけど
そのおかげで解放軍は一丸となる――
MsgEn: The prince is still a child and unreliable, but thanks to that, the liberation army will unite as one.

MsgJp:
俺でさえ、守ってやりたいと
思いますからね
MsgEn: Even I, want to protect you.

MsgJp:
ネド王子、王子らしくあろうとして
無理してる気がするんですけど
隊長、どう思います？
MsgEn: Prince Nedo, I feel like he's trying to be more like a prince and forcing himself. Captain, what do you think?

MsgJp:
武器、防具――装備品、全ての手入れは
完璧です！
MsgEn: Weapons, armor--equipment, all taken care of perfectly!

MsgJp: “悪しき竜”の言葉を覚えていますか？
MsgEn: Do you remember the words of the "Evil Dragon"?

MsgJp:
絶望の大陸を楽しめって――
俺たち、挑発されてますよ？
乗ってやりましょうか！？
MsgEn: "Enjoy the Land of Despair" - we are being provoked. Shall we ride?!

MsgJp:
休める時には休む
これ、俺たちよく忘れちゃいますよね
MsgEn: Rest when you can. We often forget this!

MsgJp:
休める時には休む
これ、俺たちよく忘れちゃいますよね
MsgEn:
Rest when you can.
We often forget this!

MsgJp: やっぱり覚者は戦ってこそ、ですね
MsgEn: After all, an Arisen should fight.

MsgJp:
これも広い意味で白竜様をお守りする
覚者ならではの戦いですから
MsgEn: This is also a battle in the broad sense of protecting the White Dragon, that only the Arisen can fight.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様じゃありませんが――
事がうまく運ぶほど“悪しき竜”の
動向が気になっちゃいますね
MsgEn:
I'm not Joseph, but--
the more things go well, the more I wonder what the "evil dragon" is up to.

MsgJp:
解放軍が増員されれば俺たちの負担も
多少は減るでしょうから、黒い騎士のことは
その時に考えましょう
MsgEn: If the liberation army is increased, our burden will be reduced, so let's think about the black knight at that time!

MsgJp:
鎧の中身が誰だろうと目の前に現れたら
俺は戦うだけですよ！
MsgEn: Why, in such a state...

MsgJp:
隊長、どうしましょう
何から手をつけていいのか――
MsgEn: Captain, what should we do I don't even know where to start--

MsgJp:
早くなんとかしないと俺たちまで
動けなくなりますね
MsgEn: If we don't do something soon, even we will become unable to move.

MsgJp:
やりましょう、隊長
俺、レスタニアもアッカーシェランも
全部引き受けますよ！
MsgEn:
Let's do it, Captain.
I'll take care of Lestania, Acre Selund,
I'll take care of everything!

MsgJp:
黒騎士を倒して白竜様の力と
メガドを取り戻しましょう！
MsgEn: Let's defeat the Black Knight and restore the power of the White Dragon and Megado!

MsgJp:
いやー、なんか、鼻歌出ちゃいますよ
ついつい浮かれちゃうんです
MsgEn:
Well, somehow, a song just slips out.
I can't help but get carried away.

MsgJp: ネド王子が我々と離れたがっている――
MsgEn: Prince Nedo wants to leave us—

MsgJp:
これまでの経緯を思うと
それは考えにくいですよね
MsgEn:
Given what we've been through,
that's unlikely.

MsgJp:
この時間に何かできることが
あるかもしれませんね？
MsgEn: At this time, there may be something we can do, right?

MsgJp:
体力増強とか地勢確認とか――
考えてみましょうか
MsgEn: Maybe we should think about increasing our strength, or checking the terrain--

MsgJp:
俺はいつ、どんな時でも隊長の右腕です
頼りにしてくださいね
MsgEn:
I'm the captain's right hand man whenever and however you need me.
You can count on me.

MsgJp:
大丈夫ですってば！
みんな心配しすぎですよ
MsgEn:
I'm fine!
Everyone is worrying too much.

MsgJp:
あははは――
少し張り切り過ぎました
MsgEn:
Ahahaha――
I got a little too carried away.

MsgJp:
落ち着いたらキノザのお湯に浸かって
養生するつもりです
MsgEn: Once I get settled down, I plan to soak in the Kinoza hot spring for recuperation.

MsgJp:
まだ勝手がわからなくてね
無礼があったら教えてくれ
MsgEn: I'm still getting the hang of this. Let me know if I'm being rude.

MsgJp:
わたしがここにいる意味――
それをね、ずっと考えているんだ
MsgEn: I've been thinking about what I'm here for.

MsgJp: 君たちから学ぶべきことは本当に多いよ
MsgEn: I really have a lot to learn from you guys.

MsgJp:
幾つもの出会いが――
わたしをここまで連れてきたのだろうね
MsgEn: How many encounters have brought me here?

MsgJp:
わたしも覚者だったら――
君たちを見ているとそう思わずにはいられない
MsgEn: If I were also an Arisen―― I can't help but think that when I look at all of you.

MsgJp:
人生の分岐路なんて、通過してみないと
わからないものだね――最近、そう思うんだ
MsgEn: You don't know the crossroads of life until you pass through them; that's what I've been thinking lately.

MsgJp:
――ああ、失礼
昔のことをね――故郷のことを思い出していた
MsgEn: Ah, excuse me, I was reminiscing about the old days, thinking about my hometown.

MsgJp:
人は変わるね――ああ、良くも悪くも
変わるものさ
MsgEn:
People change――Ah, for better or worse
We change

MsgJp: なんだろう
MsgEn: I wonder what it is.

MsgJp:
レオはいい奴だ
付き合いが浅くても、それだけはわかるよ
MsgEn: Leo is a good guy. Even though we don't know each other well, that much is clear.

MsgJp:
少し休ませてくれ
いろいろ考えたいんだ
MsgEn: I need some rest. I've got a lot to think about.

MsgJp: セシリーは眠っているようにしか見えないな
MsgEn: Cecily looks like she's asleep.

MsgJp:
セシリーは助かるんだろう？
君たちが動いているんだから不安はない
そう言い聞かせてはいるんだけどね
MsgEn: Wishing you good luck!

MsgJp:
セシリーが元気になって本当に良かった
わたしの提案が彼女を危機に追いやった
わけだからね
MsgEn: I'm glad Cecily has regained her health. It was my suggestion that put her in crisis, so that's why.

MsgJp:
ああこの空気――
やっぱりたまらなくおいしいよ
MsgEn: Ah, this sky―― After all, it's irresistibly delicious.

MsgJp:
娘から色々と聞いたが――
わたしも一度はレスタニアを見たいものだ
MsgEn: My daughter has told me so much about it— I wish I could see Lestania at least once.

MsgJp:
フィンダムは変わりつつある
暮らす者たちの意識は確実に変わっている
MsgEn:
Phindym is changing.
The attitude of the people living here is definitely changing.

MsgJp:
芯なる樹が病めば、竜も、大地も
人も、魔物さえも病んでしまう
MsgEn: If the core tree falls ill, the dragons and the earth will also suffer. Even humans, and the monsters, will fall ill!

MsgJp: そう――全ては巡る竜力で繋がっているのだ
MsgEn: That's right—Everything is connected by the power of the dragons.

MsgJp:
今にして思えばとても奇妙に思えるのだ
なぜ魔物と戦うように、病魔や厄災と
戦おうとしなかったのか――
MsgEn:
Thinking about it now, it seems very strange.
Why didn't I try to fight against sickness and disaster, 
just as I would fight against enemies?

MsgJp:
フィンダムはもうずいぶん犠牲を払ったはずだが――
まだまだ足りないのだろうか
MsgEn:
Phindym must have sacrificed a lot already -
Is it still not enough?

MsgJp:
あの黒騎士が、どこから来たのか――
この凶事は黒騎士の仕業なのだろうか――
MsgEn: Where did that black knight come from—Is the black knight responsible for this evil?

MsgJp:
黒騎士が凶事に便乗したのか――
して、その目的は？　わからぬことばかりだ
MsgEn: Did the Black Knight take advantage of the calamity? And what is their goal? I can't understand anything.

MsgJp:
――セシリーは良い子だろう？
わたしの自慢の娘だ
MsgEn:
--Isn't Cecily a good girl?
I'm very proud of her.

MsgJp: それなのに、途方もない重荷を負わせてしまったな
MsgEn: And yet, I ended up burdening you with an enormous load.

MsgJp:
不思議なものだ
この、病み、淀んだ空気にも馴れてしまうものだな
MsgEn: It's strange. You become accustomed even to this sickly, stagnant atmosphere.

MsgJp:
精霊竜ウィルミアは美しく愛らしい竜だ
今でも目を閉じると、優雅に飛ぶ姿が目に浮かぶ
MsgEn: The spirit dragon Willmia is a beautiful and lovely dragon. Even now, when I close my eyes, I can see its graceful flying figure.

MsgJp: レスタニアの人よ、なんなりと
MsgEn: Lestania's people, anything you want.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者たちよ
心苦しい限りだが、このフィンダム
まだまだ安定への道半ば――
MsgEn: Arisen of Lestania, As much as it pains me, this is a Phindym Still halfway on the path to stability...

MsgJp: 最後まで、我々とともに歩んでくれ
MsgEn: Please continue to walk with us, until the end

MsgJp: 《原始の雫》とセシリーを頼んだよ
MsgEn: Rely on the "Primeval Drops" and Cecily.

MsgJp:
樹内への侵入者という意味では
我々も、魔物もそれほど違わない
もし、ウィルミアに攻撃されたら――
そうだな、全力で逃げるのが得策だろう
MsgEn: In terms of intruders into the forest, both us and the enemy are not much different. If we are attacked by Willmia-- Yeah, it would be best to escape with all our strength.

MsgJp:
浄化はすでに始まっているのだが――
想像以上に時間がかかるようだ
MsgEn: The purification has already begun - but it seems to be taking longer than anticipated.

MsgJp:
もう何もいうまい
これはさだめだ
抗うことを許されない種類のさだめもある
MsgEn:
I have nothing more to say.
This is fate.
There are types of fate that are not allowed to be resisted.

MsgJp:
今はただ待とう――
娘はまた帰ってくる
MsgEn: I will simply wait for now; my daughter will come home again.

MsgJp: 竜として生まれ変わってな
MsgEn: To be reborn as a dragon.

MsgJp: さあ、早く為すべき事を！
MsgEn: Now, quickly do what needs to be done!

MsgJp:
我々はずっとここにいるし、あなたたちの
応援をしているよ
MsgEn: We'll be here all the way, supporting you!

MsgJp: 話すことなどない
MsgEn: There is nothing to say anymore.

MsgJp: 身の程を知れ
MsgEn: Know your place.

MsgJp: 聞く耳持たぬわ
MsgEn: I refuse to listen to you.

MsgJp: 消えろ
MsgEn: Disappear.

MsgJp: 笑止――
MsgEn: Ridiculous...

MsgJp: 耳障りな声だ
MsgEn: Such an annoying voice.

MsgJp: 思い上がるな
MsgEn: Don't get conceited.

MsgJp: 自惚れるな
MsgEn: Don't be conceited.

MsgJp: 半端覚者め――失せろ
MsgEn: You half-baked Arisen—Disappear.

MsgJp: 貴様らの世界観で我が遠謀深慮ははかれぬ
MsgEn: Our cunning cannot be understood by your worldview

MsgJp: ふん、身の程知らずめ
MsgEn: Ignorant fool, know your place.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランは、本当は良いところなんです
落ち着いたら案内させてくださいね
MsgEn: Acre Selund is actually a nice place. Please let me guide you once you settle down.

MsgJp: 悪しき竜は憎き敵――国の仇です
MsgEn: The Evil Dragon is a hated enemy - the nation's foe.

MsgJp:
けれども、隊長さんたちと会わせてくれたこと――
これだけは感謝しています
MsgEn: However, I am grateful for allowing me to meet with the captains.

MsgJp:
いつもなんのおもてなしもできずに
申し訳ありません――ごめんなさい
MsgEn: I apologize for not being able to provide any hospitality. I'm sorry.

MsgJp: ジリアンは本当に頼りになります
MsgEn: Gillian is really reliable.

MsgJp:
このアッカーシェランには他にもあのような
勇気ある人がいるのでしょうか
MsgEn: Are there any other brave people like that in Acre Selund?

MsgJp:
僕は王子なのですが、王族としての教育半ばで
城にいられなくなってしまいました
MsgEn: I am a prince, but I had to leave the castle halfway through my royal education.

MsgJp: 不作法があったら――お詫びします
MsgEn: If there was any rudeness— I apologize.

MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍は王家の一番の家臣です
困ったことがあったらメイロワに言ってくださいね
MsgEn: General Meirova is the king's most loyal retainer. If you have any trouble, please let Meirova know.

MsgJp:
悪しき竜に荒らされたアッカーシェラン――
みんなで力を合わせて元に戻すんです！
MsgEn:
Acre Selund has been ravaged by The Evil Dragon--
We all have to work together to restore it!

MsgJp: 僕には病で命を落とした姉がいました
MsgEn: I had a sister who passed away from illness.

MsgJp:
姉が王座を継ぐと思っていたので――
内緒ですよ？　こんな立場に戸惑っています
MsgEn:
I thought my sister would inherit the throne, so--
It's a secret, you know? I'm confused in this position.

MsgJp: 隊長、エリオット、ガルドリン、リズ――
MsgEn: Captain, Elliot, Gurdolin, Lise—

MsgJp:
たとえこの先に、何が起ころうと
皆さんの名前はアッカーシェランの歴史に
刻まれることでしょう
MsgEn: Whatever happens next, your names will be etched in Acre Selund's history.

MsgJp:
天はその者に耐えられる苦難しか与えない
と聞きます
MsgEn: Heaven only bestows hardships that one can endure, or so I hear

MsgJp:
どう思いますか？
たとえ思いはどうあれ、その通りだと
言ってくださいね
MsgEn: What do you think? No matter what you think, please say it exactly as it is.

MsgJp: はい、僕に用でしょうか？
MsgEn: Yes, you wanted to see me?

MsgJp:
覚者として――そして戦士として
いろいろ教えてくださいね
MsgEn: As an Arisen--and a warrior, I hope you can teach me a lot!

MsgJp:
陣の奧で守られているだけなんて
僕はいやですから
MsgEn: Yes, I don't want to just be protected at the back of the battlefield.

MsgJp:
隊長さん、僕は人々の希望であらねば
なりません
MsgEn: Captain, I must be the hope of the people

MsgJp:
それには、どう振る舞えばよいのか――
なかなかの難問です
MsgEn: And how should one behave in that situation? It's quite a difficult problem.

MsgJp:
緊張しますね
いくさはいつもこうなのですか？
MsgEn: I'm nervous, aren't you? Is it always like this before a battle?

MsgJp:
僕はまだまだです
もっともっと強くならなくてはなりません
MsgEn: I am still lacking. I must become stronger, much stronger.

MsgJp:
秘密の入り口が見つかったら
あとは任せてください
MsgEn:
Once you find the secret entrance
we'll take care of the rest.

MsgJp: 扉の先は必ず展望城へと通じているはずです
MsgEn: The path beyond the door must lead to Lookout Castle.

MsgJp:
少なくとも、王家の秘密の扉は
存在したわけですから
MsgEn: At the very least, the secret door of the royal family existed.

MsgJp:
隊長さん、ありがとうございます
ここまで来られたのも隊長さんたちの
おかげです
MsgEn: Thank you, Captain. It's thanks to you all that we've made it this far.

MsgJp:
こうして再び展望城に立つことができるとは――
感慨無量です
MsgEn: To be able to stand in Lookout Castle again like this ―― it's an indescribable feeling.

MsgJp:
隠れている同志を見つけ出すと同時に
不安な日々を送ってきた人々に
僕たちが来ていることを知らせる目的もあります
MsgEn: The purpose is to find our comrades in hiding and at the same time to let those who have been living in uncertainty know that we are coming!

MsgJp: よろしくお願いします！
MsgEn: Nice to meet you!

MsgJp:
僕は各所の兵たちを回って声をかけたら
石塔のところで皆さんをお待ちします
MsgEn:
I'll go around to all the soldiers in the various locations and call them out.
I'll meet you all at the stone tower.

MsgJp:
僕は各所の兵たちを回って声をかけたら
石塔のところで皆さんをお待ちします
MsgEn:
I'll go around to all the soldiers in the various locations and call them out.
I'll meet you all at the stone tower.

MsgJp:
ああ隊長さん
いてくれると心強いです！
MsgEn:
Oh Captain, 
It's reassuring to have you here!

MsgJp:
さあ、みなさん
思いを果たして白竜様のもとへ！
MsgEn:
Now, everyone,
Let's fulfill our wishes and go to The White Dragon!

MsgJp:
ああ隊長さん
落ち着いたら将軍やジリアンと一緒に
レスタニアにお邪魔しますからね
MsgEn:
Oh Captain,
when things settle down, I'll be visiting you and the General and Gillian in Lestania!

MsgJp:
白竜様やジョゼフ様にお礼とご挨拶を
しなくてはなりません
MsgEn: I have to express my gratitude and greetings to Lord White Dragon and Master Joseph

MsgJp: エリオットは一見頼りないけど、腕は立つ
MsgEn: Elliot is seemingly unreliable, but he is skilled.

MsgJp: レスタニア者は一筋縄ではいかないね
MsgEn: Lestania citizens are not easy to deal with.

MsgJp: リズはああ見えて、かなりしっかりした子だね
MsgEn: Lise, believe it or not, is a pretty reliable girl.

MsgJp: 人は見かけによらない――そんな言葉を思い出したよ
MsgEn: Appearances are deceiving--I remember that saying.

MsgJp: ガルドリンは――見たとおりの人物のようだ
MsgEn: Gurdolin--seems to be exactly what he looks like.

MsgJp:
言葉の荒さも人の良さを隠すためのもの
まるでアッカーシェランの男のようにわかりやすい
MsgEn: The harshness of words is also a means to conceal one's goodness, just like a man from Acre Selund, it is easy to understand.

MsgJp:
隊長――あなたは不思議な人だな
あなたならなんとかしてくれる
――そう思わせてくれるよ
MsgEn: Captain ―― you are an intriguing person I believe you can do something ―― You make me think that way.

MsgJp:
そういう人のことを、このアッカーシェランでは
“竜に愛されてる”と言うのさ
MsgEn: We in Acre Selund call such a person "loved by the dragon."

MsgJp:
レスタニアも同じだろうけど
このアッカーシェランにも長い歴史があってね――
MsgEn: Lestania is probably the same but Acre Selund also has a long history—

MsgJp:
たいていは家と家、人と魔物の対立の歴史なんだ
竜との対立なんて初めてのことさ
MsgEn: Usually, it is a history of conflict between houses and houses, and people and monsters. It's the first time there's been a conflict with dragons.

MsgJp:
わたし、悪しき竜が現れるまでは野や山を見ても
何も思わなかったんだ
MsgEn: Until the evil dragon appeared, I didn't think anything of the fields and mountains.

MsgJp:
だけどね
自由に歩き回れるわけじゃなくなってからは
愛おしくてたまらない――勝手だよね
MsgEn:
But you know, ever since I can no longer freely wander around,
I cherish it so much――it's selfish, isn't it?

MsgJp: レスタニアには覚者が大勢いるんだろう？
MsgEn: Are there a lot of Arisen in Lestania?

MsgJp:
みんな強いのか？　一流の戦士なのか？
白翼覚者隊という生え抜きの部隊もあるんだよね
MsgEn:
Are they all strong?　Are they first-class warriors?
There's also a freshly minted unit called the White Wing Arisen Corps.

MsgJp: ――戦いが、いっぱいあるんだな
MsgEn: -- I'm sure there's a lot of fighting going on.

MsgJp: 白竜は長く病んでいると聞いている
MsgEn: I have heard that The White Dragon has been ill for a long time.

MsgJp:
早く良くなるといいな
竜はいつでも心身ともに健やかでいてくれないと
世が闇に覆われてしまうようだ
MsgEn:
I hope you get better soon.
The world seems to be covered in darkness if the dragon is not always healthy both mentally, and physically.

MsgJp: えーと、なに？
MsgEn: Um, what?

MsgJp:
こっちにいる間はわたしと一緒に
行動してもらうからね
MsgEn: You'll be working with me while you're here.

MsgJp:
将軍がいれば全体の士気もあがる
そういう人だよ、メイロワ将軍は
MsgEn: Having a general boosts overall morale. That's the kind of person General Meirova is.

MsgJp:
ネド王子とは、将軍に連れられて
挨拶に行って――それだけ
MsgEn: Prince Nedo and I were taken by the General to greet him—that's it.

MsgJp:
それでも、王子のためなら
戦えるし、王子を思えば希望を抱ける
MsgEn: Still, if it's for the prince, I can fight, and if I think of the prince, I can hold onto hope.

MsgJp:
――みんな同じさ
王家は、そういう一族なんだ
MsgEn: -- all the same. The Royals are that kind of family.

MsgJp:
今はネド王子が最優先
それ以外は考えたくないの
MsgEn: Right now, Prince Nedo is the top priority. I don't want to think about anything else.

MsgJp:
王子は状況に屈することなく
積極的に動いているみたいだね
MsgEn: The prince seems to be actively moving forward without succumbing to the circumstances.

MsgJp:
頼もしいと言えば頼もしいけど
本音を言うと――いや、やめておくよ
MsgEn: I'd say you're reliable, but... To tell you the truth--no, I shouldn't.

MsgJp:
ネド王子と一緒の時間を作ってよ
良き助言者になってほしい
MsgEn:
Make time to be with Prince Ned.
Be a good advisor.

MsgJp:
オークどもの動きが活発だ
ふん、“悪しき竜”の言いなりのくせに
MsgEn: The Orcs are quite active, huh? Hmph, even though they're under the control of the "Evil Dragon".

MsgJp:
アッカーシェラン全土のオークが
動き始めたら、こっちも戦力を
分散する必要があるから――マズいね
MsgEn: If all the orcs in Acre Selund start moving, we'll need to disperse our forces as well - that's not good.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”が現れたってね
今度来たら、逃がさないよ
MsgEn: I heard an "evil dragon" showed up. If he comes again, I won't let him get away.

MsgJp:
イェルハルドの近くで戦うのは
とても勉強になるよ
MsgEn: Fighting near Gerhard is very educational.

MsgJp:
イェルハルドの近くで戦うのは
とても勉強になるよ
MsgEn: Fighting near Gerhard is very educational.

MsgJp:
戦いが終わったらさ――
城で会おうね
MsgEn: When the battle is over—I'll see you at the castle.

MsgJp:
はあ――いいね、やっぱり
この城は、落ち着くよ
MsgEn: Ha--good, I knew it. This castle is so relaxing!

MsgJp: ここに来て解放軍を増強できそうなんだ
MsgEn: It seems like we can strengthen the Liberation Army by coming here.

MsgJp:
人数が増えると作戦の選択肢も増えるし
あなたたちの負担も減るからね
MsgEn: The more people we have, the more operational options we have, and the less work you guys have to do.

MsgJp:
わたしたちはとにかく城内を駆け回って
混乱を誘いつつ敵の部隊を削る――いい？
MsgEn: We will run around inside the castle, causing confusion and chipping away at the enemy's forces—sound good?

MsgJp: ここにいてもいいの？
MsgEn: Is it okay if I stay here?

MsgJp: 借りを返すときが来たようだね
MsgEn: It seems that the time has come to repay the debt.

MsgJp: そっちも、こっちも、とりあえず一段落だね
MsgEn: Both there and here, we have made some progress for now.

MsgJp:
王子はアッカーシェランのただひとりの
覚者なんだ
MsgEn: The Prince is the only Arisen of Acre Selund.

MsgJp:
王子の気持ち、わたしたちの気持ちが
どうあっても、選択肢はないよね
MsgEn: The prince's feelings, our feelings, no matter what, there is no option.

MsgJp:
焦っても仕方がないよね
――そう自分に言い聞かせてるよ
MsgEn: There's no point in rushing -- that's what I keep telling myself.

MsgJp:
ふと気づくと、あなたたちに頼っている
自分に気づいて、あれ？って思うんだよね
MsgEn: When you suddenly realize, you depend on yourself and think, huh? When I suddenly realize it, I find myself relying on you guys. I become aware of myself and think, "Huh?"

MsgJp: 王子も――そんな風に考えたのかな
MsgEn: Did the prince also think that way?

MsgJp:
悪しき竜との決戦がすぐそこにあるのに
気になることが多すぎるの
MsgEn: The battle against the Evil Dragon is right around the corner, but there are too many things that I'm worried about.

MsgJp:
死ぬかもしれないんだから、スッキリして
おきたいけど――贅沢なのかな
MsgEn: Since I might die, I want to feel refreshed, but is that being extravagant?

MsgJp: いよいよ決戦――
MsgEn: Finally, the decisive battle—.

MsgJp:
静かに、ギュッと――
覚悟を固めているのさ
MsgEn: Quietly, firmly—I'm steeling my resolve.

MsgJp:
こっちの状況が落ち着いたら
かならず訪ねていくから――
MsgEn: Once this situation here settles down, I will definitely come to visit.

MsgJp: 案内してくれる？
MsgEn: Can you show me around?

MsgJp:
こんなこと
苦しんでいる民たちにはけして言えないが
MsgEn: I can't say this to the people who are suffering, but...

MsgJp:
おぬしたちのような戦士たちとともに戦えるのは
武人の誉れ、喜びだ
MsgEn: It is an honor and joy to fight alongside warriors like us. Soldiers.

MsgJp:
アッカー家の方々は家臣を大切にする家柄
その恩に報いることが今のわしの責務
MsgEn:
The Acre family values their retainers,
And it is now my duty to repay their kindness.

MsgJp:
おぬし達は、そんなわしへの贈り物にちがいない
贈り主のことは考えないようにするよ
MsgEn: You all are undoubtedly a gift for someone like me. Let's not think about the giver.

MsgJp:
ジリアンはわしの孫だ
こんなことになるまで、ほとんど話したことも
なかったが
娘に似て良い子に育ったわ
MsgEn: Gillian is my granddaughter. We hardly talked much until it came to this, but she has grown up to be a good child, just like her mother.

MsgJp: よいか、本人には内緒だぞ
MsgEn: Listen, it's a secret from them.

MsgJp:
おぬしは良い部下に恵まれておるな
いや、仲間というべきかな
MsgEn: You are blessed with good subordinates. No, perhaps it's better to say comrades.

MsgJp: わしの人生はもう夕暮れ時だ
MsgEn: My life is already in its twilight.

MsgJp:
これまで面白おかしく生かしてくれた
このアッカーシェランに恩返しをしないうちには
立ち去るわけにはいかんのだ
MsgEn: Up until now, you have made my life interesting and enjoyable. Before I leave Acre Selund, I must express my gratitude.

MsgJp:
歳を取るのは悪くないと思ってここまで生きてきたが
こんな危機の最中にジジイでいるのは――
まったく、運命が恨めしいわ
MsgEn: I have lived thinking that getting older is not a bad thing, but to be an old man in the midst of such a crisis... Oh, how I resent my fate.

MsgJp: レスタニアでもオークは臭いらしいな
MsgEn: I hear orcs stink in Lestania too.

MsgJp:
臭いのはこの地のオークだけなら
なんと不公平なことかと
天を呪ってやるところだったぞ
MsgEn: If it were only the orcs here that smelled, I would have cursed the heavens for how unfair it was.

MsgJp:
おぬしほどの者がこの国にいたら
わしは喜んで将軍の座を譲るつもりだ
MsgEn: But if someone as capable as you were in this country, I would gladly give up my position as general.

MsgJp:
そしてわしは、大将軍を名乗るのだ！
はははは！
MsgEn: And thus, I shall proclaim myself as the Supreme General! Hahaha!

MsgJp:
人をジジイ扱いする若造に手厳しく仕返しするのが
わしの楽しみでな
MsgEn: It's my pleasure to give a harsh retaliation to the young people who treat me like an old man.

MsgJp:
だが、わしは有名になりすぎた
わしのことを誰も知らぬ土地へ行って
若造どもをからかい倒してやりたいわ
MsgEn: However, I became too famous. I want to go to a land where no one knows me and make fools of those youngsters.

MsgJp: おお、そうだな
MsgEn: Oh, I see.

MsgJp: 王子とは必ず再会できる
MsgEn: Prince's reunion is guaranteed.

MsgJp:
おぬしらもそう信じてくれ
信じればそれは実現するというではないか
MsgEn: You all too believe in that. It is said that if you believe, it will come true.

MsgJp:
気が急くのう――
いかし、急いては事をし損じるというからな
MsgEn: I'm in a hurry-- But, after all, they say haste makes waste.

MsgJp:
イェルハルドを悪く思わないでくれ
あれもまた忠義の男だ
MsgEn:
Please do not think badly of Gerhard.
He is also a loyal man.

MsgJp:
おぬしたちのことはネド王子には
良く言っておくからな
わしに任せておけ
MsgEn: I will make sure to speak well of you all to Prince Nedo. Leave it to me.

MsgJp:
ここだけの話、王子が覚者でなければ
その事実、隠し通すつもりでいたが――
MsgEn:
Confidentially speaking, if the prince isn't an Arisen,
I had intended to conceal that fact--

MsgJp: 胸を撫で下ろしたわい
MsgEn: I breathed a sigh of relief.

MsgJp:
これから先もよろしく頼むぞ
戦慣れしたおぬしらの力が
ぜひとも必要だ
MsgEn: I kindly ask for your continued support in the future. Your experience and skills in battle are indispensable.

MsgJp:
解放軍は少数精鋭
大軍の真っ向ぶつかり合いなど
考えちゃいない
MsgEn: The Liberation Army is an elite few and they don't even think about the head-to-head clashes of large armies.

MsgJp: おぬしら、期待しているぞ
MsgEn: I'm expecting great things from you.

MsgJp: 慎重に――慎重に事を進めるぞ
MsgEn: Careful--proceed with caution.

MsgJp:
わしが焦っているように見えたら
おぬしら、遠慮無く諫めてくれよ
MsgEn: If it appears that I am being impatient, please do not hesitate to admonish me.

MsgJp:
ふーむ
王家の秘密は記録に残さないのが習わし
地図すらないのだ
MsgEn: Hmmm, royal secrets are not supposed to be recorded. We don't even have a map!

MsgJp:
ふーむ
王家の秘密は記録に残さないのが習わし
地図すらないのだ
MsgEn:
Hmmm
Royal secrets are not supposed to be recorded
We don't even have a map!

MsgJp:
展望城の城主はネド・アッカー様
そのことをオークどもに思い出させてやるわ
MsgEn: The lord of Lookout Castle is Prince Nedo Acre. I will remind those Orcs of that.

MsgJp:
難攻不落と思われたこの城も
あっさりと“悪しき竜”に落とされた
その口惜しさが、わしの原動力だ
MsgEn: This fortress, which was thought to be impregnable, was easily taken down by the "Evil Dragon." The frustration of that defeat is my driving force.

MsgJp:
敗北は人を強くする
身をもって知ったぞ
MsgEn: Defeat makes us stronger. I've seen it firsthand.

MsgJp:
具体的な話はジリアンから聞いてくれ
もちろんネド王子を尊重してくれよ
MsgEn: Please listen to Gillian for the specific details. And of course, please respect Prince Nedo.

MsgJp: 頼むぞ、レスタニアの強者たちよ
MsgEn: I'm counting on you, strong warriors of Lestania.

MsgJp:
たとえ敵の手に落ちようとも、さすが王都
攻略は容易ではないわい
MsgEn: Even if it falls into the hands of the enemy, it is indeed a royal city that will not be easy to conquer!

MsgJp:
黒騎士はおぬしらに任せるぞ
それが望みであろう？
MsgEn: I'll leave the black knight to you. That's what you want, isn't it?

MsgJp:
レスタニアの白竜様はその力を
取り戻したと聞く
MsgEn: I hear that the White Dragon of Lestania has regained its power.

MsgJp: 本当に良かったなあ
MsgEn: I'm really glad.

MsgJp: 王子の行動がさっぱりわからん
MsgEn: I can't understand the prince's actions at all.

MsgJp:
――しかし、わしは王子を信じると決めた
おぬしらも王子を見捨てることなく
よろしく頼むぞ
MsgEn: -- But I have decided to trust the prince, and I hope you will not abandon him.

MsgJp:
すまんな――
わしが謝っても意味はなかろうが
今はこれしか言えん
MsgEn:
I'm sorry――
Even if I apologize, it probably won't mean much,
But right now, this is all I can say.

MsgJp:
王子は気が触れたわけでも
心を奪われたわけでもない
となれば、わしの気持ちは決まっている
MsgEn: The prince is neither crazy nor has he lost his mind. If that's the case, my feelings are already decided.

MsgJp:
たとえそれが大きな過ちだとしても不安はないぞ
おぬしらがいるからな
MsgEn: Even if it's a big mistake, I have no worries Because you are here.

MsgJp:
ああ忙しい
やることはいっぱいなのに
気が急いて何もできんわ！
MsgEn: Oh, I'm so busy, I have so much to do! I'm in such a rush I can't get anything done!

MsgJp: もう進むしかない
MsgEn: There's no choice but to move forward.

MsgJp:
理想はまずネド王子の保護だが
決戦と同時になっても良しとせねばなるまい
時は来たのだ
MsgEn: The first priority is the protection of Prince Nedo, but we must also be prepared for the decisive battle. The time has come.

MsgJp:
王子と相談して決めねばねばならんことが
多々あるのだ
まだまだ休むわけにはいかない
MsgEn:
There are many things that I need to discuss with the prince.
I can't afford to rest just yet.

MsgJp:
まあ、アッカーシェランのための多忙は
本懐だがな
MsgEn: Well, being busy for Acre Selund is my true calling.

MsgJp:
わたしの故郷、ロスギルは古来より魔物の多い土地
よってこう見えて、そこそこ戦えると自負しています
MsgEn:
My hometown, Rothgill, has been a land of demons since ancient times.
So, although I look like this, I am proud to say that I can fight well!

MsgJp: いつか、手合わせ願いたいものですね
MsgEn: I hope to have a chance to spar with you someday.

MsgJp:
若い頃はメイロワ将軍の思いつきのような言動に
振り回されましたが
おかげで身も心も鍛えられましたよ
MsgEn: When I was younger, I was swept away by General Meyrowa's thoughtful words and actions, his impetuous words and deeds. But it has strengthened me both physically and mentally.

MsgJp:
戦略、戦術――
そんなものが役に立つのは相手が人間の時だけです
MsgEn:
Strategies, tactics--
such things are only useful when the opponent is human!

MsgJp:
いや、オークならば、かろうじて通用するでしょう
しかし、悪しき竜相手では、果たして――
MsgEn: No, if it's an Orc, it will barely work. However, when facing the Evil Dragon, I wonder if it will be effective...

MsgJp:
解放軍とは言っても、寄せ集めです
勝利に欠かせない執念や忠義心の強さは人それぞれ
MsgEn: Even though they're called the Liberation Army, they're just a ragtag group. Everyone has their own determination and loyalty that they can't do without for victory.

MsgJp:
訓練による意思統一も難しい状況の中で
人々を鼓舞するのは勝利そのものが持つ力に他ならず
MsgEn: In the midst of a difficult situation where it is also challenging to achieve unity through training, the ability to inspire people lies solely in the power that victory itself holds.

MsgJp: 親鳥が先か卵が先か――みたいな話ですけどね
MsgEn: It's like the chicken and the egg problem, you know.

MsgJp:
ほんの一握りの勇気など、悪しき竜のひと啼きで
吹き飛ばされてしまいます
MsgEn: A simple handful of courage can be blown away by a single roar from the Evil Dragon.

MsgJp: 多くの民は――強くはありません
MsgEn: Many of the people... They are not strong.

MsgJp: わたしはかつてメイロワ将軍の腹心の部下でした
MsgEn: I used to be General Meirova's trusted subordinate.

MsgJp:
これだけは覚えておいてください
将軍は、悪い人ではありません
MsgEn: Please remember this: The general is not a bad person.

MsgJp: ジリアンはどうですか？
MsgEn: What about Gillian?

MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍に振り回されているのであれば
何か助言ができるかもしれない
わたしのところに来るように伝えてください
MsgEn:
If you are being pushed around by General Meirova,
there may be some advice I can give you.
Please let them know to come to me.

MsgJp:
わたしの希望はね――
次の火竜を見たいということです
MsgEn: My hope is— to see the next fire dragon!

MsgJp: アッカーシェランとともに生きる、真っ当な火竜を
MsgEn: Acre Selund, a dignified Fire Dragon, living alongside.

MsgJp: 戦乱の世は嫌というほど見てきました
MsgEn: I've seen enough of warfare.

MsgJp:
流される血、消えない苦鳴――そうして手に入れた
安定、平和、繁栄を、よそから来た竜に乱され
黙っているわけにはいきません
MsgEn: The blood that is spilled, the bitter cry that will not go away - that's how we got stability, peace, and prosperity, and we can't just sit back and let a dragon from another land disrupt it!

MsgJp:
わたしが何かに反対したら、そこには何か
理由があると思っていただきたい
MsgEn: If I oppose something, I would like you to think that there is a reason behind it.

MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍は、反発心だのなんだの
感情のせいにしがちですからね
MsgEn: General Meirova tends to attribute things to resentment and emotions, you know.

MsgJp: ふーむ、何用でしょうか？
MsgEn: Hmm, what can I help you with?

MsgJp: おやおや、王子探しは中断ですか？
MsgEn: Oh my, is the search for the prince on hold?

MsgJp: そちらの首尾はいかがです？
MsgEn: How about the progress over there?

MsgJp:
王子は心身ともにご無事であったと
聞いています
MsgEn: I hear that the Prince is safe, both physically and mentally.

MsgJp: 良かった――本当に良かった
MsgEn: Good--really good.

MsgJp:
ネド王子はご無事――
しかも覚者であると聞いていますが
なにぶん、疑い深い性格でしてね
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo is safe—
and moreover, I hear he is an Arisen.
However, he has a suspicious personality.

MsgJp:
この地の守備固めの算段を終えたら
わたしも王子の下へ馳せ参じましょう
MsgEn: After finishing the defense of this area, I will also hurry to the prince's side.

MsgJp:
敵の攻勢に対処しつつ“悪しき竜”を
倒す方法も模索しなくてはなりません
MsgEn: While the focus tends to be only on the infected monsters, the condition of plants and soil is also dire.

MsgJp:
こう見えてわたしも武闘派
弱腰になる心配など無用ですよ
MsgEn: Even though it may not look like it, I am also a martial artist. There is no need to worry about me being wishy-washy.

MsgJp:
こちらは問題ありませんよ
ネド王子のお側に仕えてください
MsgEn: There is no problem here. Please serve Prince Nedo.

MsgJp:
こちらは問題ありませんよ
ネド王子のお側に仕えてください
MsgEn: There is no problem here, please serve Prince Nedo.

MsgJp:
敵は我々が目一杯引きつけますから
ええ、派手にやりますとも
MsgEn: The enemy will be completely occupied with us. Yes, we will be very flashy!

MsgJp:
今は兵達を労い、休ませる時です
今少し、時間をください
MsgEn: Now is the time to commend and give rest to the soldiers. Please wait a little while.

MsgJp:
漆黒の鎧をまとった騎士のうわさは
聞きましたかな？
MsgEn: Have you heard the rumors about the knight wearing jet-black armor?

MsgJp:
その者が現れたことで王都は陥落したとか
いや、それ以上のことは知らないのですが
MsgEn: The Royal Capital fell because of the appearance of that person, or so I've heard. Well, I don't know anything beyond that.

MsgJp:
出撃の準備は整っています
しかし、まだ命令が届きませんのでね
MsgEn: Preparations for deployment are complete. However, we have yet to receive orders.

MsgJp:
大戦にも関わらず声が掛からなかったのは
我々は第二の矢として待機せよということ
MsgEn: Despite the war, the reason why our voices were not heard is because we were told to wait as the second arrow.

MsgJp: その時までここで矢尻を研いでおきましょう
MsgEn: Until then, let's sharpen our arrowheads here.

MsgJp: 王都の攻略は失敗に終わったそうですね
MsgEn: It seems that the capture of the royal capital ended in failure.

MsgJp:
わたしたちはここで散った者たちの
安息を祈っています
MsgEn: We pray for the repose of those who perished here.

MsgJp:
立ち寄ってくれたことはうれしいのですが
ネド王子とメイロワ将軍のそばに
いてあげてくれると安心なのですがね
MsgEn: I am glad that you stopped by, but it would be reassuring if you could stay by the side of Prince Nedo and General Meirova.

MsgJp:
あなたたちがここにいるということは
向こうは一件落着でしょうか？
MsgEn: If you guys are here, does that mean it's all settled on the other side?

MsgJp: いいえ、そうは見えませんね――
MsgEn: No, it doesn't look like—

MsgJp:
そろそろ我々も出陣しましょうかな
たとえ命令がなくても行くつもりですよ
MsgEn:
I think it's time for us to head out.
We're going even if we don't get the orders to go.

MsgJp:
王子の失踪は、ただの家出騒動では
ありません
MsgEn: The disappearance of the prince is not a simple case of running away from home.

MsgJp:
王子はアッカーシェランの未来そのもの
なのですからね
MsgEn: The prince is the future of Acre Selund, after all.

MsgJp:
王子がお立場を棄てることは考えられない
わたしはただただ王子を信じるのみです
MsgEn: It is inconceivable that the prince would abandon his position. I only believe in him!

MsgJp:
ジッとしてなどいられませんね
わたしも最前線に立たせてもらいますよ
MsgEn:
I can't just stand still,
I'll stand on the front line too.

MsgJp:
準備が整い次第、王子のところへ
馳せ参じるつもりです
MsgEn: As soon as preparations are complete, I plan to hasten to the prince's side.

MsgJp:
皆さんお疲れさまでした
残りの人生を平穏に送れるように
わたしは日々祈るつもりです
MsgEn: Thank you all for your hard work. I will pray every day that you have peace for the rest of your lives.

MsgJp:
皆さんのぶんも――いやいや、それは
余計なお世話ですかな
MsgEn: Everyone's share―― No, no, is that really any of your business?

MsgJp:
声がでかくてうるさかったり、反対に、小さくて
聞こえない時はそう言っておくれ
MsgEn: When my voice is loud and annoying, or on the contrary, when it's so quiet that you can't hear, let me know.

MsgJp:
こればっかりは習い性でね
盗賊は、ほら、いろんな状況で仕事をするからさ
MsgEn:
It's all a habit.
Thieves, you see, work in all kinds of situations.

MsgJp:
あたしの名前は誰でも知ってるけど、顔を知っている
人間はそういないよ
MsgEn: Everyone knows my name, but not everyone knows my face.

MsgJp:
できればずっとそのままが良かったけど
まあ、そうも言ってられないね
MsgEn: If possible, I would have preferred to stay as it was, but well, I can't just keep saying that.

MsgJp:
あたしが投獄されたのは息子の意見を
無視したからなんだ
牢屋の中で、ずいぶん反省したよ
MsgEn:
I was imprisoned because I ignored my son's opinion.
I felt so much remorse while I was in jail.

MsgJp: それで今の、聞き分けのいいあたしがいるのさ
MsgEn: That's why I'm such a good listener now.

MsgJp: 婆さんだと思ってなめるんじゃないよ？
MsgEn: Don't think I'm just an old lady.

MsgJp:
そのへんの爺さんなら５人でかかってきても
目じゃないさ
MsgEn: Any old man out there, five of them could come at you and you wouldn't bat an eye.

MsgJp: あたしは権威ってのが大キライでね
MsgEn: I hate authority

MsgJp:
でも、気づいたら
あたしが盗賊界の権威みたいなものさ
ああ、たまらないよ
MsgEn:
But then I realized, I'm like the authority in the bandit world.
Oh, I can't wait!

MsgJp:
だから、竜と王族には強くあってもらわないと
困るんだ
MsgEn: So, we need the dragons and royalty to stay strong.

MsgJp:
これを聞いたからってどうするわけでもないけど
レスタニアにもお宝はあるんだろう？
MsgEn: Not that I'm going to do anything about this, but you do have treasures in Lestania, don't you?

MsgJp:
大方、ゴブリンあたりが
ため込んでいるんじゃないかい？
MsgEn: Most likely, the goblins are hoarding them.

MsgJp: 長く生きると、想像もしなかったことが起こるよ
MsgEn: If you live long enough, unexpected things happen.

MsgJp:
悪しき竜のことはそりゃあ一大事だけど
あたしがメイロワと手を組むなんてねえ
MsgEn: The whole Evil Dragon thing is a big deal, but I can't believe I'm working with Meirova.

MsgJp:
あんたたちの装備には見たことのない材料が
使われているね――
落ち着いたら、ぜひ、レスタニアへ行ってみたいね
MsgEn:
I've never seen these materials used in your equipment--
I'd love to visit Lestania when you get settled!

MsgJp:
言っておくけどね
あたしが盗むのは王家のお宝だけさ
MsgEn: Just so you know I only steal royal treasures.

MsgJp:
でも義賊というわけじゃない
施しは好きじゃないからね
MsgEn:
But that doesn't mean I'm a righteous bandit.
I don't like charity.

MsgJp: あたしの息子たちもどこかで戦っているんだろうね
MsgEn: I'm sure my sons are fighting somewhere too.

MsgJp:
まあ、無事でいてくれればそれでいいんだ
生きていれば、また盗賊稼業を楽しめるさ
MsgEn:
Well, just stay safe and that's all that matters.
As long as you're alive, you can enjoy being a bandit again.

MsgJp: うん、あたしかい？
MsgEn: Yeah, what about me?

MsgJp:
別にあたしを助けに来たわけじゃ
ないだろう？
MsgEn: You didn't come here to help me, did you?

MsgJp:
ああ、構いやしないよ
で、メイロワ将軍はなんだって？
MsgEn: Ah, I don't mind. So, what about General Meirova?

MsgJp:
あの爺さんが頭を下げれば
解放軍に協力しないことはない
伝えといてくれ
MsgEn: If that old man bows his head, there's nothing he won't do to help the Liberation Army. Please relay this.

MsgJp:
ネド王子、気張りすぎじゃないのかい？
ありゃ、大丈夫かね
MsgEn: Prince Nedo, aren't you trying too hard? Oh dear, are you okay?

MsgJp:
とにかくね、敵にここまで来られたら
どうしようもないよ
MsgEn: Anyway, if the enemy manages to come this far, there's nothing we can do.

MsgJp: それを忘れずに戦っておくれ
MsgEn: Remember that and keep fighting.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”と対峙したことで王子はどうやら
気持ちが大きくなっているようだ
MsgEn: It seems that the prince is feeling better after confronting the "evil dragon."

MsgJp: これは危険な兆候だよ
MsgEn: This is a dangerous sign.

MsgJp: 入り口だ通路だと王家は隠し事が多いね
MsgEn: Entrances, corridors, the royal family has a lot to hide.

MsgJp:
それを暴くのがわたしたちの
楽しみなんだけどさ
MsgEn: That's what we're looking forward to uncovering.

MsgJp: 入り口だ通路だと王家は隠し事が多いね
MsgEn: Entrances, corridors, the royal family has a lot to hide.

MsgJp:
それを暴くのがわたしたちの
楽しみなんだけどさ
MsgEn:
That's what we're looking forward to
uncovering.

MsgJp:
城に忍び込むなんてのは何度もしたけど
斬り込んで行くなんて初めてだ
MsgEn: I've snuck into the castle many times before, but this is my first time sneaking in and attacking.

MsgJp: 正直に言って――胸がおどるよ
MsgEn: To be honest... my heart is pounding.

MsgJp:
奪われたものは、ひとつひとつ
取り戻せばいいのさ
MsgEn: What was taken from us, one by one, we'll get back.

MsgJp: 盗賊のあたしが言うことじゃないがね
MsgEn: As a bandit, it's not my place to say, but you know.

MsgJp:
メガドは王都だからね
それはそれは豊かな町だったよ
盗賊の修行の場さ
MsgEn: Because Megado is the Royal Capital, it was a very prosperous city. This is the training ground for thieves.

MsgJp: 厄介なことになりそうだねえ
MsgEn: Sounds like it's going to be tricky.

MsgJp: 北の盗賊たちと一緒にあたしも行くよ
MsgEn: I'll go with the thieves from the north.

MsgJp:
どうしたんだい
顔色が冴えないね
MsgEn: What's wrong? You look pale.

MsgJp:
ああ戻ったんだね
やっぱりあんたたちがいてくれないと
背中が不安だよ
MsgEn: Oh you're back. I still need you guys. I'm worried about my back.

MsgJp:
解放軍は再編成中さ
でもね、どんなに頑張ったって
あんたたちのいない穴は埋まらない
MsgEn: The Liberation Army is regrouping but you know, no matter how hard we try we can't fill the hole without you guys.

MsgJp:
そっちにも事情はあるだろうけど
最後まで付き合ってもらうよ
MsgEn: You may have your own circumstances, but please stay with me until the end.

MsgJp:
あとは“悪しき竜”だね
ちょっと遠回りしちまったけど
一歩一歩、追い詰めているはずだよ
MsgEn: The Evil Dragon is the only thing remaining. Although we took a little detour; Step by step, we should be cornering it.

MsgJp:
初めて会った頃に比べたら王子は
成長した――そう思った矢先のこれだよ
MsgEn: Compared to when we first met, the prince has grown— that's what I thought, and just as I did, this happened.

MsgJp:
こんな行動をするなんて
まだまだ子供だってことなんだろうね
MsgEn: Don't act like this. It shows that you're still a child.

MsgJp:
初めて会った頃に比べたら王子は
成長した――そう思った矢先のこれだよ
MsgEn: Compared to when we first met, the prince has grown— that's what I thought, and just as I did, this happened.

MsgJp:
こんな行動をするなんて
まだまだ子供だってことなんだろうね
MsgEn: Don't act like this. It shows that you're still a child.

MsgJp: 孫たちが世話になったね
MsgEn: Thanks for taking care of the grandchildren.

MsgJp:
おっと――
こんな月並みな礼をしちまうとは
あたしも歳を取ったねえ
MsgEn: Oops-- I can't believe I'm resorting to such a clichéd gesture. I guess I'm getting old.

MsgJp:
王子の不在が噂になり始めたよ
あんたらの耳にも入ると思うけど
放っておきな
MsgEn: The absence of the prince has started to become a rumor, you know. But just leave it alone.

MsgJp: あたしがなんとかするからさ
MsgEn: I'll take care of it.

MsgJp:
人生ってのはほんと気紛れだね
何が起こるかわからない
MsgEn:
Life is really unpredictable.
You never know what will happen.

MsgJp:
ああ、この歳になっても
驚くようなことはまだまだいっぱい起こるよ
MsgEn: Oh, even at this age, there are still many surprising things happening.

MsgJp:
城内は静かなものさ
みんな自分を見つめ直しているんだろうね
MsgEn:
The inside of the castle is quiet.
Everyone is reflecting on themselves.

MsgJp:
王子は重要人物には違いないけど
主人公は解放軍のひとりひとりだ
王子のことばかり思っちゃいられないさ
MsgEn: The prince must be an important person, but the hero is one of the liberation army too. You can't think only about the prince.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの竜に起こったことを
小耳に挟んだよ
MsgEn: I heard a rumor about what happened to Phindym's dragon.

MsgJp:
フィンダムへ行って、話を聞いた方が
良さそうだね
MsgEn: Sounds like it would be better to go to Phindym and talk to them.

MsgJp:
雑談は苦手でな
――悪いな
MsgEn: I'm not good at chit chat. -- sorry.

MsgJp:
言わなかったかな――
わたしは楽しい雑談相手ではない
MsgEn: Did I not say it? - I'm not a fun person to chat with.

MsgJp: 人からは見下されるくらいが丁度良い――
MsgEn: Being looked down upon by others is just about right.

MsgJp:
わたしなりの哲学だが、理解者は少ない
おまえはどうだ？
MsgEn: My own philosophy, but few people understand it. What about you?

MsgJp:
わたしの両親は性格が昼と夜――空と海ほどに
性格が違う人たちだった
MsgEn: My parents were people whose personalities were as different as night and day— as different as the sky and the sea.

MsgJp:
わたしは母とうまが合ったが
はて昼だろうか夜だろうかと時々思うのだ
MsgEn: I get along with my mother but sometimes I wonder if we're just day and night.

MsgJp:
苦難が我々を結びつけたことは否定しない
苦難が我々を強くしたことも否定はできない
MsgEn: I do not deny that suffering has brought us together. I cannot deny that suffering has made us stronger.

MsgJp:
しかし――この状況に意味があるとすれば
それくらいだと思わないか？
MsgEn: However, if there is any meaning to this situation, wouldn't it be something like that?

MsgJp: ああ、用件を聞こうか
MsgEn: Let's hear what you have to say.

MsgJp:
用がすんだら国へ帰れ
今の我々には監視すら負担になる
MsgEn: When you finish your task, you can go back to your country. It's too much work for us now to even keep an eye on you.

MsgJp:
風が吹いてきた――
これは追い風だ――ああ、感じるぞ
MsgEn: The words of Master White Dragon—I cannot let even a single word pass me by.

MsgJp:
将軍が戻ってから流れが変わったな
そういう人なんだよ、あの人は
MsgEn: The flow has changed since the general returned. That's the kind of person he is.

MsgJp:
ジリアンはうまく立ち回っているだろうか
交渉上手というわけではないからな――
MsgEn:
I wonder if Gillian is standing up to it well.
She's not exactly a great negotiator.

MsgJp:
王子が盗賊の世話になるとはね
将軍も心中穏やかではないだろうな
MsgEn: I can't believe the prince is in the care of bandits. I'm sure the general is not at peace with that.

MsgJp:
盗賊たちの受け入れ準備をした方が
よいのだろうか――
MsgEn: Should we prepare to receive the bandits?

MsgJp: どうだ？　少しは陣が明るくなったか？
MsgEn: Well? Has the situation in the camp improved a bit?

MsgJp:
ネド王子は、自分の身は自分で守ると
頑なだがそうはいかない
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo said he would protect himself.
He's stubborn, but it doesn't work that way.

MsgJp: あんたたちも力を貸してくれ
MsgEn: Please lend me your strength as well

MsgJp:
このティネスの守りを固めるべきか
それとも強固な砦を求めて
遠征すべきか――
MsgEn: Should we fortify the defenses of Fort Thines, or should we go on an expedition searching for a stronger fortress-?

MsgJp: ふむ、将軍と相談してみようか
MsgEn: Hmm, let's consult with the general.

MsgJp: しばらく兵の増強は難しいだろう
MsgEn: It will be difficult to reinforce the troops for a while.

MsgJp:
となれば、今いる兵たちの配備を
工夫して難局を乗り切らなければな
MsgEn: Then, we'll have to get through the harsh situation by devising a way to deploy the troops we have now.

MsgJp: １人、３人と兵が増えていく
MsgEn: The number of soldiers is increasing, one by one, and three by three.

MsgJp:
日々、少しずつではあるがネド王子を慕って
民たちが集まってくるんだ
MsgEn: Every day, little by little, the people gather around Prince Nedo.

MsgJp:
イェルハルドがいるから抜かりはないと
思うが陽動部隊の連中はちゃんと食事を
とっているだろうか
MsgEn: I'm sure Gerhard is there to make sure that everything is taken care of, but I wonder if those guys in the diversionary unit are getting a proper meal.

MsgJp:
イェルハルドがいるから抜かりはないと
思うが陽動部隊の連中はちゃんと食事を
とっているだろうか
MsgEn: I'm sure Gerhard is there to make sure that everything is taken care of, but I wonder if those guys in the diversionary unit are getting a proper meal.

MsgJp:
展望城は王家だけではなく
我々解放軍の面々にとっても思い入れのある
場所だ
MsgEn: The Lookout Castle is not only a place that is dear to the royal family, but also to all of us in the Liberation Army.

MsgJp: わたしは参加できないが――頼むぞ
MsgEn: I can't participate, but I'm counting on you.

MsgJp:
わたしも城へ行きたいが
砦の差配も重要な任務だからな
MsgEn:
I'd like to go to the castle, too, but
it's an important mission to man the fort.

MsgJp:
王都メガドの奪回は簡単ではないだろう
でも、今の解放軍ならやれる気がする
MsgEn: It won't be easy to reclaim the Royal Capital of Megado, but I feel like the Liberation Army can do it now.

MsgJp:
そっちの様子はどうだい？
ここの留守はまかせてくれよ
MsgEn:
How's it going over there?
I'll take care of things here myself.

MsgJp:
最前線へ飛んで行きたいが
砦を空にするわけにはいかないのだ
王子と解放軍を頼んだぞ
MsgEn:
I'd love to rush to the front lines, but we can't leave the fort empty.
Take care of the prince and the liberation army.

MsgJp: 第一次王都奪回作戦は失敗したと聞く
MsgEn: I heard that the first attempt to retake the Royal Capital has failed.

MsgJp:
次の作戦には参加したいが持ち場を
離れるわけにはいかないからな
MsgEn: I want to participate in the next mission, but I can't leave my post.

MsgJp: 顔を見に来てくれたのか？
MsgEn: Did you come to see me?

MsgJp:
うれしいね
みんなにも声をかけてやってくれ
MsgEn: That's great. Please speak to everyone and let them know.

MsgJp:
今はメガド奪回作戦の重要な局面のはず
さあ早く戻ってくれ
MsgEn: Now is an important moment in the plan to regain Megado. Please come back quickly.

MsgJp:
展望城に移らなくても良いのだろうか
わたしが必要ではないのだろうか
MsgEn: Is it okay not to move to Lookout Castle? Am I not needed?

MsgJp:
わたしの知る限り、ここには
ネド王子は来ていない
MsgEn: As far as I know, Prince Nedo is not here.

MsgJp: ここだけの話――
MsgEn: Just between you and me...

MsgJp:
周囲のおとなたちがネド王子を
甘やかしすぎたということはないだろうか
いや、ここだけの話だ
MsgEn: Could it be that the adults around have spoiled Prince Nedo too much? No, this is just between us.

MsgJp:
いろいろな噂が聞こえてくるが
なに、心配はしていないさ
MsgEn: I hear a lot of rumors, but I'm not worried.

MsgJp: 皆、やる時はやる人たちだからな
MsgEn: Everyone, because they are the people who do it when they need to, right.

MsgJp:
君たちと出会った頃、わたしたちの心は
暗い海のようだったが――今はどうだ
MsgEn: When we met you, our hearts were like dark seas--but now?

MsgJp:
たとえ危機的な状況でも
明日を信じることができるよ
MsgEn: Even in times of crisis, you can have faith in tomorrow!

MsgJp:
この砦の強化案を考えているんだ
悪しき竜はいなくなってもオークどもは
相変わらずだからね
MsgEn: I am considering a plan to strengthen this fortress. Even though the evil dragon is gone, the orcs are still here.

MsgJp: やあ
MsgEn: Hey

MsgJp: 良い天気だね
MsgEn: Good weather, isn't it?

MsgJp: 調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: How's it going?

MsgJp:
腕が立つようだから
また何か依頼するかもしれない
MsgEn: You seem to have a good arm, so I may request something else from you.

MsgJp:
私はリズ様のポーン
あの方は、私がお守りしなければ――
MsgEn: I am Lady Lise's Pawn. If I don't protect her-

MsgJp:
リズ様、もう少し
そそっかしさをあらためて下されば――
MsgEn: Lady Lise, if you could please be a little more attentive—

MsgJp:
覚者さま、恐れながら
リズ様のお手伝いをお頼みします
MsgEn: Lord Arisen, I'm afraid I need Lady Lise's help...

MsgJp: おう、そっちはどうだ？　その後
MsgEn: Hey, how's it going over there? What's been happening since then?

MsgJp:
魔物を倒すだけが覚者の仕事じゃあねぇ
あぁ、お前もそのうち分かるぜ
MsgEn: Being able to defeat demons is not the only job of an Arisen, you know. Oh, you'll understand that soon.

MsgJp:
言い訳はなしだ、そんなもん考える前に
手と足を動かせよ
MsgEn: No excuses, move your hands and feet before thinking about that.

MsgJp:
よう、ちょっとした賭けを――
いや、やめとくわ
MsgEn:
Hey, want to make a little bet?
Nah, forget it.

MsgJp:
金をためてキノザの原泉近くに屋敷を建てるのよ
それが俺の目下の夢だ
MsgEn: I'll save my money and build a mansion near Kinoza's spring. That's my current dream.

MsgJp: ばかっ強い魔物と真っ向勝負して連戦連勝
MsgEn: A series of head-to-head battles with the strongest demons and a series of victories.

MsgJp:
覚者になった頃はそれでおもしろおかしく
暮らしていけたが、もう、飽きちまった
――これから、どうするよ
MsgEn: When I became an Arisen, I could live with that and have fun. But, I've grown tired now. What do I do from now on?

MsgJp:
刺激だぜ、刺激
俺が欲しいのはそれだ――やっとわかった
MsgEn: It's exciting, so exciting. That's what I want―― I finally understand.

MsgJp:
俺はずっとはぐれ覚者のつもりでいたけどよ――
やっぱ、どっかで繋がってんだよな――ケッ！
MsgEn: I've always thought of myself as a lost Arisen, but in the end, I guess there's some connection somewhere. Damn it!

MsgJp: 柄にもねえこと言っちまったぜ
MsgEn: I said something I shouldn't have.

MsgJp:
まあ、ボチボチやろうぜ
急ぐことはねえさ
MsgEn: Well, let's take it easy. There's no rush.

MsgJp:
あんたの言うことにはなんだって従うつもりで
いるから賭け事禁止だけは言ってくれるなよ
MsgEn: I intend to obey whatever you say, but don't tell me to stop gambling.

MsgJp: 俺をウソつきにしたくなかったらよ
MsgEn: If you don't want to make a liar out of me

MsgJp: 神殿にいる時くらい、いろんな奴と話しておけよ
MsgEn: You should at least talk to a lot of people when you're in the temple.

MsgJp:
俺の見たところ、あんたに話しかけられると
どいつもこいつもうれしそうな顔になる
さぞ名誉なことに違いねえ
MsgEn: From what I've seen, when you talk to them, everyone gets happy and they all have a delighted expression on their faces.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフのジジイは世の中がざわついている時の方が
いきいきして見えねえか？
MsgEn: Doesn't Joseph's old man look more alive when the world is in turmoil?

MsgJp: 魔物の一種かもしれねえぞ
MsgEn: It might be a type of monster.

MsgJp:
はぁ――金がねえ――
負けた――
MsgEn:
Huh... no money...
I'm screwed.

MsgJp: あ？　なんだよ
MsgEn: Huh? What's up?

MsgJp:
しかし――
なんだって俺が――
MsgEn:
But--
what the hell am I--

MsgJp:
俺も覚者の端くれだが
この場所は息が詰まるぜ
MsgEn: I'm a bit of an Arisen man myself, but this place is suffocating.

MsgJp:
言うまでもねえが、俺は単純にガシガシと
戦うのが好きだ
MsgEn: There's no need to say it, but I simply love a grueling fight.

MsgJp:
勝敗に金がかかってるのなんて最高だぜ
そんなわけだから、おまえ――
そういう場に、さっさと俺を行かせろよ
MsgEn:
There's nothing like winning and losing with money on the line.
That's why you--
You better get me to that kind of place, and get on with it.

MsgJp:
侵食魔退治は俺に任せろ
ガシガシやっつけておくぜ
MsgEn: Leave the eradication of the Corruption to me. I'll take care of it, no problem.

MsgJp: 俺はやっぱり戦場の男――
MsgEn: I am a man of the battlefield.

MsgJp:
そう思ってきたが、こう無尽蔵にわくような
侵食魔と戦っていると心の奥底が
凍りつきそうになるぜ
永遠に続くのかよってな
MsgEn: I have come to think so, but deep down in my heart, when I fight against the seemingly endless invading corruption, it feels as if my soul is about to freeze. Is this going to last forever?

MsgJp:
黒騎士を倒せば何もかも終わりじゃねえのかよ
あとはオマケみたいなものだろ？
MsgEn: I thought defeating the Black Knight was the end of everything. The rest is kind of a bonus, right?

MsgJp:
島に出たみたいな奴がこれからの相手だとしたら
こっちもよっぽどの精鋭を揃えないと
やられちまうぜ
MsgEn: If the guy who showed up on the island is our opponent from now on, we have to gather quite an elite team or we'll be done for.

MsgJp: レオの野郎――放って置いていいのか？
MsgEn: That bastard Leo, can we afford to leave him alone?

MsgJp:
口ではなんと言おうと
奴はここでの立場――責任を捨てた男だ
このままじゃあ、スカッとしねえぞ
MsgEn: No matter what he says, he's a man who has abandoned his position and responsibility here. If things continue like this, it won't be satisfying in the least.

MsgJp:
さあどうするよ
ここでジッとしてるのが仕事か？
MsgEn: What are we going to do? Is our job just to sit here and do nothing?

MsgJp:
セシリーが神殿に匿われていること――
黒騎士は知ってると思うか？
MsgEn: Do you think the Black Knight knows that Cecily is being hidden in the temple?

MsgJp:
俺と話したって状況は何も変わらない
んなことは、わかってんだろう？
MsgEn: Talking to me won't change anything about the situation. You understand that, right?

MsgJp:
侵食魔なんてのはいい加減おさらばしてえよな？
もちろん、黒騎士野郎もな
MsgEn: Don't you think it's about time to say goodbye to the infected monsters? And the black knight too, of course.

MsgJp:
レオはよ――バカだよな
冷めた顔して、熱くなりすぎるんだ
あいつは昔からそうだったぜ
MsgEn: Leo is such an idiot, isn't he? He always looks calm, but he gets too heated. He has been like that since forever.

MsgJp: 俺はもっと賑やかなところが好きだぜ
MsgEn: I like it when it's more lively.

MsgJp:
人でも魔物でも構わねえ
その気になりゃいつでも大騒ぎできる程度に
相手がいるのがいいんだ
MsgEn: It doesn't matter if they're human or monsters. It's good to have someone to make a big fuss with, whenever we feel like it.

MsgJp:
ここの連中の頭の固さはジョゼフ以上だが
悪い気はしねえな
連中なりに筋が通っている
MsgEn: The stubbornness of these people here is greater than Joseph's, but I don't feel bad about it. They have their own way of doing things.

MsgJp:
――いや、ジョゼフのことをどうこう言ってる
わけじゃねえぞ
MsgEn: -- No, I'm not talking about Joseph.

MsgJp:
聞いたところによると《原始の雫》は
そう簡単に手に入るシロモノじゃねえようだ
MsgEn: According to what I heard, it seems that 《Primeval Drops》is not something that can easily be obtained.

MsgJp:
となると、相当な手練れじゃないと
無事の帰還は難しいと思うぜ
MsgEn:
Then you'd have to be a pretty good hand to
make a safe return, I'd think.

MsgJp:
俺たちがもう少し早くこのフィンダムに
来ていればな――
そりゃいいっこ無しってか？
MsgEn:
If only we'd come to Phindym a little earlier--
No more of that, huh?

MsgJp:
やっぱり俺はレスタニアの男だ
空気が鼻をスースー通ってくぜ
MsgEn:
I'm a Lestanian man after all.
The air feels sooooooo good coming through my nose!

MsgJp:
寝ても覚めても侵食魔退治よ
身体はキツいが気が楽っちゃあ楽だな
MsgEn: Arisen, whether sleeping or awake, it's all about fighting the Infected. My body is tired, but my mind is at ease.

MsgJp:
しっかし、魔物ってのは尽きないよな
こいつらいったい何のためにいるんだとか
テツガク的なことも考えたくなるぜ
MsgEn: Nevertheless, enemies never seem to run out, you know? I wonder what they're actually here for. It makes me want to think about it from a philosophical perspective.

MsgJp:
これで何もかも、トントン拍子に上手くいけば
いいんだがな
MsgEn: If everything goes smoothly as planned, it would be good.

MsgJp:
敵ってのは、敵らしくあって欲しいぜ
憎らしくて、悪くてよ
MsgEn: Enemies should be like enemies. Hateful and evil.

MsgJp:
もう少しここにいるぜ
行く末を見届けたくてよ
MsgEn: I'll be here a little longer just to see where it all goes.

MsgJp:
また留守がちになると思って
部屋を引き払ったぜ
しばらくは宿暮らしだ
MsgEn: I thought I would be gone frequently, so I left my room. I will be living in temporary accommodations for a while.

MsgJp:
絶望の大陸アッカーシェランか
でもよ、あのジリアンの目には
光があったよな
MsgEn: Is it the Land of Despair, Acre Selund? But you know, in Gillian's eyes, there was light, wasn't there?

MsgJp:
王子は１２歳とか言ってたな
自分の頭で考えて行動できる年頃だ
MsgEn: The prince said he was 12 years old; he should be old enough to think and act for himself.

MsgJp:
つまりジッとしてるわけじゃねえ
厄介っちゃあ厄介だな
MsgEn: So, it's not like I'm just sitting still. It's troublesome, that's for sure.

MsgJp:
王子と一緒にいる盗賊ってのは
どんな連中だろうな
MsgEn: I wonder what kind of bandits are with the prince.

MsgJp:
義賊みたいなやつらかそれとも
ただの山賊集団か――
MsgEn: Those guys are like noble thieves, or maybe just a group of bandits—

MsgJp:
敵は“悪しき竜”だろ？
盗賊と王家の家臣が揉めている場合じゃねえ
――って言ってこいよ
MsgEn:
The enemy is an "Evil Dragon", right?
This is not the time for a fight between a bandit and a royal vassal.

MsgJp:
俺はオークだのなんだのを引き受けるから
王子は頼むぜ
MsgEn:
I'll take care of the orcs and whatnot.
You take care of the prince.

MsgJp:
緩んでる場合じゃねえと思うけどよ
まあ、それは将軍たちが決めることだな
MsgEn: I don't think it's the time to slack off, but well, that's something the generals decide.

MsgJp:
覚者になってからこっちずっとオークと
戦って鼻がバカになっちまったが
MsgEn: Since I became an Arisen, I've been fighting Orcs all this time and now I'm getting all sniffly.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランのオークの匂いは
また独特――新鮮な気分で戦えるぜ
MsgEn: The scent of Acre Selund's Orcs is unique; it makes you feel refreshed and ready to fight.

MsgJp:
面倒な駆け引きはともかく
真っ向ぶつかり合いなら俺に任せろ
MsgEn: Ignoring the troublesome negotiations, Leave it to me if it comes down to a direct confrontation.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の目的が自分の力を
誇示するためとは――
MsgEn: The purpose of the "Evil Dragon" is to demonstrate their own power.

MsgJp: そりゃガキ大将の理屈じゃねえか
MsgEn: That's a kid's theory, isn't it?

MsgJp:
展望城のオークの数も見えてきたな
しかも少しずつだが、減っていやがる
MsgEn:
I'm seeing the number of orcs in Lookout Castle
And they're getting fewer, little by little.

MsgJp: ジリアンたち、いい仕事してるぜ
MsgEn: Gillian and the others are doing a great job, you know.

MsgJp:
展望城のオークの数も見えてきたな
しかも少しずつだが、減っていやがる
MsgEn:
I'm seeing the number of orcs in Lookout Castle
And they're getting fewer, little by little.

MsgJp: ジリアンたち、いい仕事してるぜ
MsgEn: Gillian and the others are doing a great job, you know.

MsgJp: 血がよ、ザワザワと沸くようだぜ
MsgEn: My blood is boiling, man.

MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍のことだから次から次へと
作戦をぶち上げそうだな
MsgEn: I'm sure General Meirova will be blasting out one operation after another.

MsgJp: 少し休ませろって話だ
MsgEn: Time for a rest.

MsgJp:
チッ――何をしていても
真っ黒野郎のことを考えちまうぜ
MsgEn: Damn--no matter what I do, I'm always thinking about that pitch black bastard.

MsgJp:
くそ――あれこれ雑念が多いな
このままじゃ目の前の敵に
集中できねえぞ
MsgEn:
Damn--there's a lot of distractions.
I can't focus on the enemy in front of me if I keep going like this.

MsgJp: 身体の調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: How's your body feeling?

MsgJp:
俺らにも影響が出ないとは限らねえ
今のうちにやれることやっておかねえと
MsgEn:
We can't be sure it won't affect us too.
We should do what we can while we can.

MsgJp:
気い抜くと――力も抜けるんだ
気張って行くぜ
MsgEn: When you let your mind wander... your strength will wander, too. I'm going in strong.

MsgJp:
足手まといにならねえように
せいぜい気ぃ張るぜ
MsgEn: I'll do my best not to be a liability.

MsgJp:
話しかけないでくれ
今の俺は憎悪の塊だぜ
MsgEn:
Please don't talk to me.
I'm a bundle of hatred right now.

MsgJp:
あれやこれや、賭けときゃ良かったぜ
大儲けできたろうによ
MsgEn:
You should have bet on this, that, and the other thing.
You could have made a fortune.

MsgJp:
そんなにひとりが良いなら
ひとりにしてやれよ――ってわけには
いかねえかぁ
MsgEn:
If you like to be alone so much, leave him alone.
I don't know.

MsgJp:
これはなんとも歯がゆい状況だな
え？
MsgEn: This is a very frustrating situation, isn't it?

MsgJp:
心配事は性に合わねえ
俺は戦闘のあるところへ行かせて
もらうぜ
MsgEn: Yeah, I'll listen if you want to talk.

MsgJp:
まあ、こうなったら深いこと考えずに
ガスガスと前に進むしかねえよな
毎度のことだ
MsgEn: Well, in this situation, there's nothing else to do but keep moving forward, with gusto. It's always the same thing.

MsgJp:
寝るぞ――俺は――ああ、なんなら
十日くらいぶっ通しで眠ってやる
MsgEn: I'm going to sleep ―― Oh, what the heck, I'll sleep for about ten days straight.

MsgJp: まだまだ、研究すべきことは多いな――
MsgEn: There is still much to research,

MsgJp:
各地では異変が今日も起こっている
その原因は必ずあるはずなのだ
MsgEn: Strange occurrences are happening everywhere today. There must be a definite cause for it.

MsgJp:
魔物の増加は白竜の衰えと
確実に関係している
竜とは、いったい世界にとって何者のか――
MsgEn: The increase of enemies is definitely related to the decline of the White Dragon. What exactly is a dragon to the world—?

MsgJp:
なんだ
覚者と無駄話をする気は無い
用件を言ってくれ
MsgEn: What is it? I have no intention of talking to an Arisen and wasting time on idle chatter. Just tell me your business.

MsgJp:
騎士団は団結を尊ぶ――
では、“騎士団の団結”とは具体的には何だと思う
MsgEn: The Order of the Knights values unity—So, what exactly do you think "the unity of the Order of the Knights" means?

MsgJp:
自分は“ゲルト団長への忠誠心”が
それにあたると思っている
――覚者にこんな話をすべきではないな
MsgEn: I think "loyalty to Commander Gerd" is the equivalent. --If so, then I shouldn't be speaking to an Arisen.

MsgJp:
無駄話をするつもりは無いと言っただろう
気持ちがたるんでいるんじゃないか
MsgEn: I said I didn't intend to chat. You don't think your feelings have slackened, do you?

MsgJp: 無駄話はいい、さっそく本題に入るぞ
MsgEn: No time for idle chatter, let's get to the point.

MsgJp:
――貴君は他のミッションの元に
パーティを組んでいるな
MsgEn: You are part of a party for another mission.

MsgJp:
先にそちらのミッションの参加予定を
取り消し、あらためてここに来てくれ
MsgEn: Please cancel your participation in the mission over there first, and then come here again.

MsgJp: 覚者、気を抜くなよ
MsgEn: Arisen, don't let your guard down.

MsgJp: 悪いが今は任務の途中だ
MsgEn: Sorry, but I'm in the middle of a mission.

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えてはたまらない
MsgEn: We can't afford for the monsters to increase like this.

MsgJp: いつこの戦いは終わるのだ
MsgEn: When will this battle end?

MsgJp: 魔物退治ばかりだな、まったく
MsgEn: Enemy extermination is all there is, really.

MsgJp: 神殿からの補給もあまりあてにできないぞ
MsgEn: We can't rely too much on supplies from the temple.

MsgJp: 今は話しかけないでくれ
MsgEn: Please don't talk to me right now

MsgJp: 白竜様のご加護を！
