MsgEn: The White Dragon's blessing!

MsgJp: 任務に集中させてくれ
MsgEn: Let me concentrate on the mission.

MsgJp: ――くく、くくく――
MsgEn: -- Mmm-hmm. - Mmm-hmm.

MsgJp: ひ――なんだ、話掛けるな
MsgEn: Oh... What? Don't talk to me.

MsgJp:
ああ、そうだ、そうしよう――
それがいい――
MsgEn: Ah, yes, let's do that―― That's good――
What?

MsgJp: ――うぅ、今はやめて
MsgEn: -- Uh-uh, not now.

MsgJp: あっちへ、いっていて――
MsgEn: Go over there――

MsgJp: やあ、何かご用かな？
MsgEn: Hello, do you need anything?

MsgJp:
さぁて、そろそろ次の仕入れ支度を
考えないと
MsgEn: Well, I've got to start thinking about my next stocking.

MsgJp:
おっと、商品をみたいかい？
申し訳ない、今は準備しきれて
いないものも多くてね
MsgEn: Oh, do you want to see the goods? I'm sorry, there are many things that haven't been fully prepared yet.

MsgJp: 覚者さま、ご機嫌いかがですか
MsgEn: Master Arisen, how are you feeling today?

MsgJp:
ああ、ちょっと待ってください
――はい、何か？
MsgEn: Ah, please wait a little ―― Yes, what is it?

MsgJp:
武器でも作れたら商売になるかもと
思うこともあるんですがね
MsgEn: I sometimes think that it might be good for business if we could make some weapons.

MsgJp: やあ、調子はどうだい
MsgEn: Hey, how are you feeling?

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげだよ
MsgEn: Today's existence is also thanks to The White Dragon

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn: These enemies are multiplying, it's really overwhelming.

MsgJp: ご機嫌いかが？
MsgEn: How are you?

MsgJp: 暮らしは厳しくなる一方だね
MsgEn: Yes, life is becoming increasingly difficult.

MsgJp: お仕事、頑張ってくださいな
MsgEn: Please, do your best with your work.

MsgJp:
おや、覚者さんかな
研究に付き合って貰って感謝しているよ
MsgEn: Oh, are you an Arisen? I'm grateful for your assistance in my research.

MsgJp:
異変はそこかしこで起こっている
私はそれを探求していてね
レスタニア中を巡っている
MsgEn: There are strange occurrences happening everywhere I am investigating them, you know. Traveling throughout Lestania.

MsgJp: この辺りをもう少し調べていくか――
MsgEn: Should I investigate this area a little further?

MsgJp: やあ、調子はどうだい
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげだよ
MsgEn: Today's existence is also thanks to The White Dragon

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn: These enemies are multiplying, it's really overwhelming.

MsgJp:
ああ、素晴らしきかな食事！
料理とはあらゆる素材と料理人の手が
織りなす究極のハーモニーなのだ！
MsgEn:
Ah, a wonderful meal!
Cooking is the ultimate harmony of all ingredients and the cook's hands!

MsgJp:
珍しい食材について知っていたら
教えてくれたまえ
MsgEn: If you know anything about rare ingredients, please tell me.

MsgJp:
ふむ――意外とあの魔物の肉は
焼いたらいけるかもしれんな
MsgEn: Hmm... I wonder if that monster's meat could be cooked.

MsgJp: ヒヒヒヒ――ご機嫌いかが？
MsgEn: Hehehe――How are you feeling today?

MsgJp:
わたしはね、あれを探しているのさ
アレをね――
MsgEn: I am looking for it, you know. That thing, you know.

MsgJp: なんだい、何か用でもあるのかい？
MsgEn: What's up? Do you need something?

MsgJp: やあ、調子はどうだい
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげだよ
MsgEn: Today's existence is also thanks to The White Dragon

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn: These enemies are multiplying, it's really overwhelming.

MsgJp:
やあ、君も探索かね？
この辺りはなかなか興味深いと思わないか
MsgEn: Hey, are you also exploring? Don't you find this area quite interesting?

MsgJp:
私は人を試すのが趣味でね――
いやいや、悪くとらないでくれたまえ
MsgEn: I enjoy testing people— No, no, no, don't take this the wrong way.

MsgJp:
単に人に興味があるだけだよ
ある者が何を目指し、何を思い、何を成すかね
MsgEn:
I'm simply interested in people.
What some aspire to, what some think, what some accomplish.

MsgJp:
君は、なかなか腕に自信がありそうだ
――時に思うことはないかな？
MsgEn: You seem to have confidence in your skills. Do you ever wonder about it?

MsgJp: 己の力量は、真にどれほどのものか――とね
MsgEn: How much are your abilities really worth?

MsgJp: おお、私に何か用かね？
MsgEn: Oh, do you need something from me?

MsgJp: はぁい、何か用？
MsgEn: Yes, can I help you?

MsgJp:
わたしは各地を旅して回ってんの
まぁ、一応これでも
トレジャーハンターのはしくれよ
MsgEn: I am traveling around different places, Well, for now, I guess you could say I'm a bit of a treasure hunter.

MsgJp: お宝情報があったら交換しましょ
MsgEn: If you have information on a treasure, let's exchange it!

MsgJp:
まだまだ行った事のない洞窟や遺跡は
たくさんあるのよね
MsgEn: There are still plenty of caves and ruins that I have never been to, you know.

MsgJp: 獲物になりそうなのは、あまりいないな
MsgEn: Not a lot of potential prey out there.

MsgJp: なんだ？　お前は何狙いだ？
MsgEn: What? What are you aiming for?

MsgJp: 厄介な魔物は遠くから狙うに限る
MsgEn: Troublesome enemies are best attacked from a distance.

MsgJp: フン、話しかけるな
MsgEn: Hmph, don't talk to me.

MsgJp: よそへ行け
MsgEn: Go away

MsgJp: 話すことなどない
MsgEn: There is nothing to say anymore.

MsgJp: あぁ、なんだてめぇ
MsgEn: Ah, what the hell.

MsgJp: やめろよ、今は話しかけるんじゃねぇよ
MsgEn: Stop it, don't talk to me right now.

MsgJp: ちっ、懐が厳しいぜ
MsgEn: Well, my wallet is light.

MsgJp: アァ――
MsgEn: Ah――

MsgJp: ウゥ――
MsgEn: Ugh--

MsgJp: カラダ――ガ――アァ――
MsgEn: Body...ga...aah.

MsgJp: ――ギギ
MsgEn: -- Gigi.

MsgJp: ウウウ――
MsgEn: Uuu...

MsgJp: 我々は、いつまで――
MsgEn: How much longer will we...

MsgJp: 帰りたい――
MsgEn: I want to go home--

MsgJp: どうして、こんな姿に――
MsgEn: Will Cecily be saved? There is no need to worry because you guys are taking action. I keep telling myself that, but...

MsgJp:
ん――？
ああ、攻撃しないでくださいね
たたかう気はありませんので
MsgEn:
Hm-?
Oh, please don't attack me.
I don't have any intention to fight.

MsgJp:
――あら
魔物のわたしが話すのが珍しいですか？
MsgEn: Oh, do you find it unusual for a monster like me to speak?

MsgJp:
ハーピーは歌が命ですから声は出せるのですが
人間の言葉を覚えるかどうかは、それぞれですね
わたしはジンゲンに近い所で育ちましたから
MsgEn:
I grew up near Jingen, so I know Harpies can sing, so they can have a voice.
I'm not sure if they can learn human language or not.

MsgJp:
お腹――減ってきちゃった
あとで狩りにいかないと
MsgEn: I'm getting hungry. I have to go hunting later.

MsgJp: やあ、調子はどうだい
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげだよ
MsgEn: Today's existence is also thanks to The White Dragon

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn: These enemies are multiplying, it's really overwhelming.

MsgJp: やあ、調子はどうだい
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげだよ
MsgEn: Today's existence is also thanks to The White Dragon

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn: These enemies are multiplying, it's really overwhelming.

MsgJp: おお、調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: Oh, how are you doing?

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜様あってこそだ
MsgEn: Today exists because of The White Dragon exists.

MsgJp: 任務ではよろしく頼む
MsgEn: I kindly ask for your assistance with the task.

MsgJp: お互い気が抜けんな
MsgEn: Don't let your guard down.

MsgJp: 気合を入れろよ
MsgEn: Get pumped up!

MsgJp: 魔物は増える一方だ
MsgEn: The monsters keep increasing.

MsgJp: やあ、そっちはどうだい
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp: 白竜さまのために、だな――
MsgEn: For the sake of the White Dragon.

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn: I can't stand it when these monsters increase like this.

MsgJp: まぁ、体には気をつけろよ
MsgEn: Well, be careful with your body.

MsgJp: いいな、気は抜くなよ
MsgEn: That's nice, don't let your guard down.

MsgJp: お前はポーン持ちなのか？　羨ましいよ
MsgEn: Are you a pawn bearer? I'm envious.

MsgJp: ふう、なかなか気が休まらないよ
MsgEn: Phew, it's hard to relax.

MsgJp: 任務は任務だからな
MsgEn: It's a mission, after all.

MsgJp: もっと鍛えないとな――
MsgEn: I need to train more...

MsgJp: ん、調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: Hmm, how are you feeling?

MsgJp: 白竜さまの加護を！
MsgEn: Under the protection of The White Dragon!

MsgJp: 物資補給も魔物討伐も終わりがみえんよ
MsgEn: Supplies replenishment and enemy extermination have no end in sight.

MsgJp: ご機嫌いかがかしら？
MsgEn: How are you feeling?

MsgJp: お互い、油断せずいきましょう
MsgEn: Let's both be careful and not let our guard down.

MsgJp:
覚者も騎士も、苦労は同じだと
思うのよね
MsgEn: Both the Arisen and the Knights face the same hardships, I believe.

MsgJp: あぁ、調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: Yeah, how's it going?

MsgJp: 魔物どもは増える一方だな
MsgEn: The number of monsters is increasing.

MsgJp: ん、何か用か？
MsgEn: Hmm, what can I do for you?

MsgJp: ――装備の点検はこまめにな
MsgEn: - The inspection of the equipment should be done regularly.

MsgJp: 準備はいつも整えておけよ
MsgEn: Always be prepared.

MsgJp: 道具類はまさかの時に必要だぞ
MsgEn: Tools are necessary in case of emergencies.

MsgJp: ふう、まったくお互い大変そうね
MsgEn: Phew, both of us seem to be going through a tough time, don't we?

MsgJp:
魔物に食われるくらいなら
逃げるよ、わたしは
MsgEn: I'd rather run away than be eaten by demons.

MsgJp: さぁ、次はどうしようか
MsgEn: So, what should we do next?

MsgJp: 調子はどうだ？
MsgEn: How's it going?

MsgJp:
装備はできるだけ軽くしておけよ
足の差はでかいぞ
MsgEn: Try to keep your equipment as light as possible. The difference in mobility is significant.

MsgJp:
大型魔物に登るときは、奴らの動きを
よく観察しろよ
MsgEn: When climbing on large monsters, observe their movements well.

MsgJp: うん、何？
MsgEn: Yeah, what?

MsgJp: ごめんね、今ちょっと話しかけないで
MsgEn: I'm sorry, please don't talk to me right now

MsgJp: 特に用はないんでしょ？
MsgEn: You don't have any special purpose, right?

MsgJp: ――ああ、なんだ？
MsgEn: Oh, what is it?

MsgJp: どうした、何か聞きたいのか？
MsgEn: What's wrong, do you want to ask something?

MsgJp: 敵はいつくるかわからんぞ
MsgEn: You never know when the enemy will strike.

MsgJp: ご機嫌いかが？
MsgEn: How are you feeling?

MsgJp: ここには何しにきたの？
MsgEn: What did you come here for?

MsgJp: さ、そろそろ別のところへいこうかな
MsgEn: Well, it's time to go somewhere else.

MsgJp: ふむ――なにかね？
MsgEn: Hmm, what is it?

MsgJp: 近頃はなかなか厄介な事件が増えてきたな
MsgEn: Lately, there have been quite a few troublesome incidents.

MsgJp: 魔物の活性を抑える術があればいいのだが
MsgEn: If there is a way to suppress the enemy's activity, that would be great.

MsgJp: あら、ご機嫌いかがですか？
MsgEn: Oh, how are you feeling?

MsgJp: 癒し手の需要は増える一方です
MsgEn: The demand for healers continues to increase.

MsgJp: あなたの旅によき導きがありますように
MsgEn: May you have a good guidance on your journey

MsgJp: あなたの旅によき導きがありますように
MsgEn: May you have a good guidance on your journey

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげでございます
MsgEn: Today's existence is also thanks to The White Dragon

MsgJp: 任務、ご苦労様です覚者様
MsgEn: Thank you for your hard work, Arisen.

MsgJp: あなたの旅によき導きがありますように
MsgEn: May you have a good guidance on your journey

MsgJp: 今日があるのも、白竜さまのおかげですね
MsgEn: Today's existence is also thanks to The White Dragon, isn't it

MsgJp: お仕事頑張ってくださいませ、覚者さま
MsgEn: Good luck with your work, Arisen

MsgJp: よし、その調子で修練を重ねろよ！
MsgEn: Okay, keep up the practice!

MsgJp:
技は一日にしてならず！
ひとつひとつ身に付けていくんだ
MsgEn: Skill does not come in a day! You have to learn each one step by step.

MsgJp:
訓練にやりすぎはないぞ
じっくり実戦前に稽古していけ！
MsgEn: There's no such thing as too much training. Take your time and practice before the actual battle!

MsgJp: おう、訓練について質問か？
MsgEn: Oh, do you have any questions about the training?

MsgJp:
白竜に選ばれし覚者様――
古の武器についてであれば、お力になれるかと
MsgEn: Master Arisen, chosen by the White Dragon - If it's about ancient weapons, I can be of assistance.

MsgJp:
人が武器を選ぶばかりではなく――
時として、武器が人を選ぶこともありましょう
MsgEn: It's not only humans who choose weapons - Sometimes, weapons also choose their wielders.

MsgJp: どうか貴方様も、それをお忘れなく
MsgEn: Please do not forget that

MsgJp:
武器とは、討つべきものの数だけ
それに相応しき“かたち”があるもの――
MsgEn: A weapon has as many forms as there are things to kill.

MsgJp:
竜の敵となりうるおそろしき魔を退けるには
手に持つ刃もまた、特別でなければなりません
MsgEn: To repel the fearsome demons that can become enemies of the dragon, the blades we wield must also be special.

MsgJp:
遠き古より流れ伝わる智――
覚者の、そしてポーンの民の――
MsgEn: From ancient times, the wisdom that has been passed down continues to flow— Of the Arisen, and the people known as Pawns—

MsgJp:
戦徒が、自ら主の剣となり鎧となるために
より良き剣や鎧を生まんとするは
必然ではないでしょうか――
MsgEn: Is it not necessary for a Myrmidion to seek better weapons and armor, to become their own Masters sword and shield?

MsgJp: おう、調査の進捗はどうだ？
MsgEn: Oh, how's the investigation going?

MsgJp:
辺りをぐるっと歩いてみたが
この島の生態系はレスタニアとは
えらく違うようだな
MsgEn: I walked around the area and the ecosystem of this island seems to be very different from Lestania.

MsgJp:
いつ、どんな魔物が飛び出してくるかわからんぞ
とっさの状況にも対処できるよう
装備や持ち物は常に見直しておけよ
調査探索の基本だ！
MsgEn: You never know when and what kind of creatures will come at you. Always review your equipment and items so you can handle any situation that arises. It's the fundamentals of exploration and investigation!

MsgJp:
この魔赤島調査隊は精鋭揃いだ
難しい任務ではあるが、士気も高い
――俺か？　俺も久しぶりに勇み立ってるな！
MsgEn: This Bloodbane Isle expedition team is comprised of elite members. Although it is a difficult mission, their morale is high. ――As for me? I'm also feeling a surge of courage after a long time!

MsgJp:
前はグリッテン砦の防衛戦に参加していたんだが
モゴックの奴が墜ちてからは
いまいち張り合いが無くてな――
MsgEn: I used to be involved in the defense of Fort Gritten, but since that Mogok guy went down, I haven't had the same level of excitement--the competition has really been lacking.

MsgJp:
ここのエリアマスター就任の打診を受けた時は
これぞ、と思ったものだ！
MsgEn: When I received the offer to become an Area Master here, I thought, "This is it!"

MsgJp:
見ての通り、この駐屯地は臨時のものだ
だが、調査のために必要なものについては
それなりの質のものを集めている
MsgEn: As you can see, this base is temporary but we have gathered the necessary equipment for the investigation.

MsgJp:
質だけじゃなく、数もきっちり揃えてあるぞ！
お前の部下たちにも遠慮なく使うよう
言っておいてくれ
MsgEn: Not only the quantity, but also the quality is meticulous! Please tell your subordinates to use it without hesitation.

MsgJp:
おう、来たな！
あらためて自己紹介しておこうか
魔赤島調査隊、隊長のベルトランだ
この島のエリアマスターも兼任している
MsgEn: Oh, you've arrived! Let me introduce myself again. I'm Bertrand, the captain of the Bloodbane Isle research team. I'm also the Area Master of this island.

MsgJp:
エリアマスターとは言っても
こんな状況だ
まだ何一つわからんがな！
まずは拠点を一通り設営したところだ
MsgEn: Even though I say I'm an Area Master, the situation is like this. I still don't understand anything! First, I have to set up the base.

MsgJp:
――そう不安そうな顔をするな！
島の全体像を早期に探るべく
身軽な人員を俺直属の斥候隊として
連れてきたから安心してくれ！
MsgEn: Don't look so worried! I've brought a team of agile individuals as my direct reconnaissance unit to swiftly explore the entire island. So, rest assured!

MsgJp:
彼らにはなるべく戦闘を避けさせ
島の地形や魔物の生息状況を
重点的に探らせていく予定だ
MsgEn:
We'll have them avoid combat as much as possible,
and focus on exploring the island's terrain and demonic inhabitants.

MsgJp:
そして、斥候隊を始めとする
各部隊からの情報を統括したり
調査の方向性を監督するのが俺の仕事ってわけだ
MsgEn: And so, my job involves overseeing information from various units, including the scout team, and supervising the direction of the investigation.

MsgJp:
監督といっても
お前たちはそれぞれの判断で
調査を進めてくれて構わん！
ジョゼフ様直々のお達しだ
MsgEn: Speaking of the overseer, each of you can proceed with the investigation based on your own judgment! This is a direct order from Joseph himself.

MsgJp:
俺もこの拠点で大人しくしているつもりは無いぞ！
この未知の状況、己の実力を計るには
絶好のチャンスだ！　腕が鳴るな！
MsgEn: I don't intend to sit still at this base either! In this unknown situation, it's the perfect opportunity to test my abilities. I'm itching to go!

MsgJp:
調査の進捗はどうだ？
支援品を割り当てておいたから
持っていくといい
今後の働きに期待してるぞ！
MsgEn: How is the progress of the investigation? I have allocated support items, so it would be good to bring them along. I am expecting great work from you in the future!

MsgJp:
調査の成果が出始めているな
厳しい状況に変わりはないが
この調子で進めていこう
MsgEn: The results of the investigation are beginning to show, but the situation remains severe. Let's continue in this way.

MsgJp:
お前の隊もいつも頑張ってくれている
支援品を少し大目に持っていくといい
今後も期待してるぞ！
MsgEn:
Your squad always does a great job, too.
You can take a little extra support supplies with you!
I'm looking forward to seeing more of you in the future!

MsgJp:
ふむ、この調査隊の中でも
ずば抜けた動きをしているのが
お前の隊だろう！
さすがはジョゼフ様のお墨付きだ！
MsgEn:
Hmmm, of all these survey teams, the one that stands out from the rest is yours!
That's what I'm talking about, Masters Joseph's endorsement!

MsgJp:
走り回ればそれだけ消耗もしているだろう
支援品の割り当てを増やしておくから
遠慮せずに持っていってくれ
MsgEn:
If you keep running around, you'll exhaust yourself even more. 
I'll increase the allocation of support items, so please don't hesitate to take them.

MsgJp:
それにしても、拠点にできるような
状態の良い洞窟を早々に発見できたのは
本当に幸運だったな！
MsgEn: Regardless, being able to quickly discover a cave in such a good condition, that could serve as a base was truly fortunate!

MsgJp:
島の南の方にある洞窟を知っているか？
調査隊内では《不浄の掃き溜め》と
呼んでいる洞窟だ
MsgEn: Do you know about the cave located in the southern part of the island? Within our expedition team, we refer to it as the "Cesspool of Filth".

MsgJp:
実はあそこも、この洞窟と同時期に
発見していたんだが
ここと違って、内部が凄まじい状態でな
MsgEn:
Actually, we also discovered that place around the same time as this cave.
But unlike here, the interior is in a terrible state.

MsgJp:
何らかの肉食獣が棲みついていたのか
そこら辺に腐った死肉が散乱して――
臭いもそれはひどいもんだった！
MsgEn:
Some kind of predator was living in the area.
There was rotting dead meat scattered around--
and the smell was terrible!

MsgJp:
奥に肉食獣が潜伏しているのを予感して
早期に封鎖しておいたんだが、
お前の実力があれば探索できそうだ
MsgEn:
I had a hunch there was a predator lurking in the back,
so I sealed it off early.
I'm sure you could explore it if you're up to it.

MsgJp:
もし臭いが気にならない性質なら
内部を探索しに行ってみてくれ
MsgEn: If it's in your nature to not mind the smell, go and explore the interior.

MsgJp:
そういえば、ここから西に行ったところに
開けた土地があるんだが知っているか？
調査隊では《滝を臨む蝕地》と呼んでいるが――
MsgEn: By the way, do you know that there is an open piece of land if you go west from here? The survey team calls it "Corrupted Ground Facing the Waterfall".

MsgJp:
あそこには以前から
侵食ゴブリンどもがうろついていたんだが
最近、数が増えて大きな群れになっているようだ
MsgEn: There have been corruptions, infected goblins wandering around over there for a while, but recently, their number has increased and they seem to have formed a large herd.

MsgJp:
元がゴブリンとはいえ
侵食の作用で凶暴化している上に
数がいると中々厄介だぞ
侮って痛い目を見ないよう気を付けてくれ
MsgEn: Even though they are goblins, they become even more aggressive due to the corrupting effect, and it can be troublesome when there are many of them. Be careful not to underestimate them and suffer the consequences.

MsgJp:
ちょうどいいタイミングで来てくれた！
お前に頼みたいことがあってな
MsgEn:
You came just in time!
I have a favor to ask you.

MsgJp:
この拠点から南西の方角の海岸沿いに
古い地下聖堂のような場所が見つかってな
封鎖されていたが、先日ようやく開けることができた
MsgEn: From this base, a place resembling an old underground cathedral was discovered along the southwestern coast. It had been sealed off, but was finally able to be opened the other day.

MsgJp:
中は水が流れていて静かな雰囲気だ――
俺たちは《せせらぎの地下聖堂》と呼んでいる
まぁ、実際に聖堂として使われていたのかは
定かではないが――
MsgEn:
Inside, water is flowing, creating a serene atmosphere—
We call it the "Crypt of Murmurs."
Well, it's unclear whether it was actually used as a sanctuary—
but it has a holy land-like ambiance.

MsgJp:
この島には珍しく、文化的な造形物が
数多く残されているようだ
あそこを探ることで、何か得るものが
あるんじゃないかと思ってな
MsgEn: Unusually for this island, there seems to be a great number of cultural structures that have been preserved. I believe there may be something to gain by exploring there.

MsgJp:
だが、内部には危険度の高い
魔物が徘徊していて、
相応の戦力を持った者でないと
とても調査は任せられん
MsgEn: However, within, there are highly dangerous enemies wandering around, and unless one possesses sufficient fighting power, I cannot entrust the investigation to them.

MsgJp:
そこで、お前に頼みたいというわけだ
調査に向かうタイミングは任せよう
準備ができたら、また声をかけてくれ！
MsgEn: That's why I'm asking for your help. I'll leave it to you to decide when to head out to investigate. When you're ready, give me a call again!

MsgJp:
各隊員の尽力によって
この島の調査も進みつつあるな！
中でもお前の隊の働きは格別だ！
MsgEn:
Thanks to the efforts of each team member,
the investigation of this island is progressing!
Your team's work, in particular, is exceptional!

MsgJp:
この状況では中々報いてやることもできないが
せめて支援品の割り当てだけでも
増やせるように手配しておこう！
MsgEn: In this situation, it may not be possible to retaliate right away, but let's at least make arrangements to increase the allocation of aid supplies!

MsgJp:
この島に一つ、塔があるだろう
《聖遺の塔》と呼ばれているあそこだ
あの近くに古い井戸があってな
MsgEn: There should be one tower on this island, it's called the "Sage Tower Ruins". There is an old well near there.

MsgJp:
井戸蓋の部分が錆び付いていて
開けられなかったんだが
この間、ようやくこじ開けることができた
MsgEn: The part of the well cover was rusted and couldn't be opened, but recently, I was finally able to pry it open.

MsgJp:
中の探索までは中々手が回っていないが
もしお前の手が空いていたら
覗いてみても損は無いだろう
MsgEn: I haven't gotten around to exploring inside, but if you're available, it wouldn't hurt to take a peek.

MsgJp:
北の方の沿岸に、肉食の魔物が集まりやすい
開けた土地があるのを知っているか？
獲物の死肉が溜め込まれている広場だ
MsgEn:
Did you know that there is an open area of land on the northern coast where carnivorous creatures tend to congregate?
It's a square where the carcasses of their prey are stored.

MsgJp:
先日、あの広場に
新手のナイトメアが舞い降りたんだが
隊士を討伐に向かわせてみても、飛び回る上に
歌ったり叫んだりで手に負えんらしい
MsgEn:
The other day, a new nightmare landed in that plaza.
I sent a squad to take it down, but they were flying around, singing and screaming and it was too much for them to handle.

MsgJp:
ナイトメアの声には
特殊な魔力が込められているからな
あの辺りに近づく時は注意してくれ
MsgEn: The voice of the Nightmare contains a special kind of magic, so be cautious when getting close to that area.

MsgJp:
そうだ、お前にも話しておこう
この島に来て最初に調査することになった
《侵食魔の巣窟》の奥に
更なる空間が広がっていたのを覚えているか？
MsgEn: That's right, I should tell you too. When I first came to this island, I was assigned to investigate the depths of the "Infected Den". Do you remember that there was a further expanse beyond it?

MsgJp:
予想以上に侵食が進んでいたことから
一旦は俺の判断で封鎖していたんだが
島全体の調査も進んできたことを考えて
そろそろ封鎖を解こうと思ってな
MsgEn: The Corruption had progressed more than anticipated, so I temporarily sealed it off based on my judgment. However, considering that the investigation of the entire island has also progressed, I think it's about time to lift the blockade.

MsgJp:
奥は侵食が進み
特に強力な侵食魔が巣食っていることは
まず間違いないだろう
MsgEn: The depths have been corrupted, and there is no doubt that a powerful infected demon is nesting there.

MsgJp:
調査に入る時は
くれぐれも警戒を怠らないように
抗侵薬の予備も豊富に用意して向かってくれ
MsgEn: When entering the investigation, please be extremely cautious and do not neglect your vigilance. Please also bring ample supplies of Anti-Corruption Medicine with you.

MsgJp:
ちょっとばかりマズい状況になってきてな
“侵食”の進行スピードがこちらの予想を
上回っているようだ――
MsgEn: The situation is becoming a bit troublesome. The speed of Corruption seems to be surpassing our expectations.

MsgJp:
《翼風高原》に
侵食ゴアサイクロプスが現れたんだが
こいつがまた派手に侵食が進んだ個体だ
MsgEn: An "Infected Goreclops" has appeared in the Wing Wind Plateau, and this individual's infection has advanced quite dramatically.

MsgJp:
“侵食核”って呼び名らしいが、とにかく頭に
イバラみたいなものを２本も生やしてやがる
あれは体に回りきった毒が
行き場を失って噴きだしたような状態だ
MsgEn: It's called the "Corruption Core," it's got two thorny appendages sticking out of it. It's like the poison in the body has run out of places to go and started to burst out.

MsgJp:
侵食が進んだ魔物は凶暴性が増すのは
前に説明した通りだが
あそこまで侵食が進んでしまうと
もう別種の魔物と考えた方がいいだろうな――
MsgEn: As I explained before, when a monster's corruption advances, its aggressiveness increases. However, when the corruption has progressed to that extent, it might be better to consider it as a different species of creature altogether.

MsgJp:
ともかく、あれは並の隊士に任せるわけにはいかない
かと言って、調査の妨げになる恐れから
放置するのも気がかりだ
MsgEn: Anyway, leaving it to ordinary squad members isn't an option, but at the same time, I'm concerned that it might hinder the investigation.

MsgJp:
頼めるのであれば、お前に討伐を
任せたいんだが――
引き受けてくれるのであれば
あらためて詳細を説明しよう
MsgEn: If it's possible to rely on you, I would like to entrust the subjugation to you... If you are willing to accept, let me explain the details again.

MsgJp:
お前の隊の目覚ましい働きには
まったく舌を巻くばかりだ！
さすがはレオの後任と期待されるだけあるな！
MsgEn:
The remarkable work of your squad is absolutely mind-blowing!
You are indeed the expected successor to Leo!

MsgJp:
本当はもっときちんと報いてやりたいものだが
この島では手に入るものに限りがあるからな――
その中でも一際良い物が
お前の隊に回るよう手配しよう
MsgEn: I actually want to reward you more properly, but there are limitations to what can be obtained on this island. Among those, I will arrange for something particularly good to be allocated to your squad.

MsgJp:
これからもその調子で調査を進めてくれ
頼りにしているぞ！
MsgEn: Keep up the good work and keep up the research. I'm counting on you!

MsgJp:
橋を渡ったところに大きな坑道跡があるのは
もう知っているか？
MsgEn: There is a large mine site across the bridge. Do you already know about it?

MsgJp:
古い坑道は崩落が怖いからな
安全確保のために今まで封鎖していたが
地盤もそう脆くはないようだから
封鎖を解くことにした
MsgEn: Because there is fear of collapse in the old tunnels, We have been sealing them off for safety measures. However, since the ground doesn't seem to be too weak, We have decided to lift the seal.

MsgJp:
お前には一足先に教えておこう
前人未踏の場所を探索してみたければ
今が絶好の機会だぞ！
MsgEn: Let me tell you in advance; If you want to explore uncharted territory, now is a great opportunity!

MsgJp:
西の方に水量の多い洞窟があってな
恐らくあそこが辺り一帯の
水源になってるんだろう
MsgEn: There is a cave with a lot of water to the west. It is likely that it is the source of water in this area.

MsgJp:
中に入ると四方八方から滝の音が聞こえて
方向感覚を失いそうになるくらいだ
調査隊では《滝鳴洞穴》と呼んでいる
MsgEn: Once inside, you can hear the sound of the waterfall from all directions and almost lose your sense of direction. The survey team calls it "Waterfall Echo Cavern."

MsgJp:
この島は全体的に水が豊富な印象だが
《滝鳴洞穴》は別格だぞ
MsgEn: I get the impression that water is plentiful on this island as a whole, but Waterfall Echo Cavern is something else!

MsgJp:
暗い洞窟内で流される危険性や
滝の存在を考慮して封鎖していたが、
お前にはそんな心配は要らんな
MsgEn: We had it sealed off due to the danger of being swept away in the dark cave and the presence of waterfalls, but you don't need to worry about that.

MsgJp:
封鎖を解いておこう
一度行ってみてくれ
MsgEn: Let's lift the blockade; Please go and see for yourself.

MsgJp:
ふむ――
最近は侵食のペースが以前にも増して
早まっているように思わないか？
MsgEn: Hmm... Don't you think that the rate of corruption has been increasing recently?

MsgJp:
この間、《菌糸の襲窟》と呼んでいる洞窟の
初期調査が終わったんだが
内部もかなり侵食が進んでいて
そこらへん菌胞だらけになってやがってな
MsgEn: Recently, we finished the initial investigation of a cave known as the "Fungal Colony Caves," but the interior is heavily corrupted. The place is filled with fungal spores.

MsgJp:
斥候に行った隊士も
あらかじめ抗侵薬を飲んでから向かったそうだ
MsgEn: Even the troopers who went scouting took Anti-Corruption Medicine before they went.

MsgJp:
実際はそこまでするほどではないんだが
気持ちはわからんでもない有様だ――
MsgEn: In reality, it might not be as bad as it seems, but I can understand the concern about it.

MsgJp:
当然、侵食魔もウヨウヨしている
お前も《菌糸の襲窟》に向かう時は
抗侵薬を忘れずに持っていくようにな
MsgEn: Of course, the infected creatures are also crawling about. When you head towards the Fungal Colony Caves, make sure to bring the Anti-Corruption Medicine with you.

MsgJp:
ううむ――
いや、少しばかり悩ましい事態になってな
MsgEn: Hmm... Well, it seems that things have become somewhat troubling.

MsgJp:
《菌糸の襲窟》の奥に、侵食ベヘモットが
潜んでいることがわかったんだが
こいつが厄介で――
すでに３人の隊士が負傷して帰ったほどだ
MsgEn: We discovered that a Corrupted Behemoth lurks in the depths of the "Fungal Colony Caves", and it's a troublesome one. Three squad members have already returned injured because of it.

MsgJp:
本来であれば俺が向かいたいところだが
ストックしてある医療物資が
底を尽きかけていることもあって、
物資の確保が何よりの急務になってしまった
MsgEn: Normally, I would have headed there myself, but our stock of medical supplies is running out, and securing supplies has become a matter of the utmost urgency.

MsgJp:
医療物資の確保も無しに
隊士を討伐に送り出したり、
まして一人討伐に飛び出したとなっては
間違いなくクラリッサに文句を言われるからな――
MsgEn: Sending squad members to face this threat without securing medical supplies, let alone heading out to face it alone, will definitely earn me a scolding from Clarissa.

MsgJp:
そうだ
お前、クラリッサに内緒で
あの侵食ベヘモットを
討伐してきてくれないか？
MsgEn: Yeah. Can you, without letting Clarissa know, go and defeat that Corrupted Behemoth for us?

MsgJp:
今までも大型の侵食魔を何体も
相手にしてきたお前なら、きっと倒せるはずだ！
こんな大物とやり合う機会もそう無いぞ！
どうだ？　気になったらあらためて声をかけてくれ
MsgEn: You've faced numerous large Corrupted Beasts in the past, and I believe you can defeat it! Opportunities to challenge such a formidable foe are rare. So, what do you say? If you're interested, let me know, and we can discuss it further.

MsgJp:
良いニュースがあるぞ！
調査が進んだことで
レスタニアからの物資を運ぶルートの整備も
ずいぶんと捗ってな！
MsgEn: I have good news! With the progress of the investigation, the maintenance of the route for transporting supplies from Lestania is coming along quite well!

MsgJp:
今後はより良い支援物資が安定して
送られてくるそうだ
これで、お前の隊も少しは楽になるだろう
MsgEn:
They're going to be sending a steady stream of better relief supplies from now on.
This should make things a little easier on your squad.

MsgJp:
それにしても、お前がいなければ
今頃この島の調査もここまでは進んで
いなかっただろう！
MsgEn: Still, without you, we wouldn't have made this much progress in our survey of the island by now!

MsgJp:
魔赤島調査にかける熱意、そして実力――
どれをとっても抜きんでた働きだ！
今後も期待しているぞ！
MsgEn: The passion and skills dedicated to the investigation of Bloodbane Isle are exceptional! We are expecting great things in the future!

MsgJp:
俺のところに来るとはな――
話を聞こうじゃないか
MsgEn: You've come to see me. Well, let's hear what you have to say.

MsgJp:
自分が無知であることを知るのは難しいことだ
「己の無知を知っている」と思うこと自体が
そうでないことの証明かも知れないだろう
MsgEn: It is difficult to know that one is ignorant. Thinking "I know my own ignorance" might be evidence that it is not so.

MsgJp:
世界は一つではない――
こう聞いた時、お前は何を思う？
MsgEn: There is more than one world. What do you think when you hear this?

MsgJp:
自分の知らない国があるかも知れないと思うか？
それとも人々の相互理解の難しさを考えるか？
あるいは自分には見えない何かの存在を信じるか？
MsgEn: Do you think that there might be countries you don't know? Or do you think about the difficulty of mutual understanding among people? Or do you believe in the existence of something that you can't see?

MsgJp:
お前の見ている世界と
俺の見ている世界は違うかもしれないぜ
MsgEn: Then don't hesitate, come here anytime.

MsgJp:
それを見ている人間が違うんだから
目に映る世界自体が違うと言えなくもないだろう
MsgEn: Since the person looking at it is different, it could be said that the world itself that is reflected in the eyes is different.

MsgJp:
お前はもっとたくさんのことを
知るようになるだろう――
MsgEn: You will come to know more things.

MsgJp:
知識が増える、といったことじゃない
お前の目はたくさんの世界を見ることになる――
そう、何かを追い求める限りな
MsgEn: It's not about gaining knowledge, Your eyes will see many worlds— Yes, as long as you pursue something.

MsgJp:
お前の身体はひとつだ――
いかな勇者とてそれは変わらない
MsgEn: Your body is one, and no amount of bravery will change that.

MsgJp:
まずは、挑むべき試練に集中するべきだ
慌てる事はない
MsgEn: First, we should focus on the trials we need to take on. No need to panic.

MsgJp: これはこれは、レスタニアの覚者様
MsgEn: Well met, Arisen of Lestania.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの方の目には
フィンダムはどのように映るのですか？
MsgEn: How does Phindym appear to the people of Lestania?

MsgJp:
私はフィンダムが気に入っていますよ
いえ、他の地に赴いたことはありませんが――
MsgEn: I like Phindym. No, I have never been to another country—

MsgJp:
ここを離れることはおろか
フィンダム以外の地があることすら知りませんでした
私にとっての唯一の場所なのです
MsgEn: Not only leaving this place, but I didn't even know that there were other places besides Phindym. It is the only place for me.

MsgJp:
視線が気になりますか？
何せ我々はレスタニアの人々を初めて見るもので――
MsgEn: Are you concerned about the stares? After all, we are seeing the people of Lestania for the first time.

MsgJp: ん？　何か用かな？
MsgEn: Hmm? Do you need something?

MsgJp:
レスタニア――
不思議な響きだな
新鮮な感じがするよ
MsgEn: Lestania— It has a mysterious sound, It feels fresh.

MsgJp:
僕は旅好きでね
親には良い顔をされなかったけど
しばらくダナを離れて色んなところを回ったんだ
MsgEn: I love traveling, you know. Even though my parents didn't approve of it, I traveled to various places for a while, leaving Dana behind.

MsgJp:
いつかレスタニアにも行ってみたいものだな
自分の知らない場所があると思うと
それだけでワクワクしてくるよ
MsgEn: I would like to visit Lestania someday. It excites me just thinking about unknown places.

MsgJp:
いつか、レスタニアの話を
ゆっくり聞かせてくれ
君らの手が空いた時でいい
MsgEn: One day, when you have a moment, please take your time to tell me about Lestania.

MsgJp: あっ、レスタニアの覚者さん！
MsgEn: Ah, Lestania's Lord Arisen!

MsgJp:
ボク、鳥を飼ってたんだ
でも連れてこられなくて――
元気にしてるかなぁ――
MsgEn: I used to have a bird, but I couldn't bring it with me... I wonder if it's doing well...

MsgJp:
ボクもおばあちゃんも、別の村に住んでたんだ
侵食のせいで住めなくなっちゃって――
それでここに逃げてきたんだよ
MsgEn: Both me and my grandmother were living in a different village. We couldn't live there anymore, because of the corruption. That's why we came here to escape.

MsgJp:
おばあちゃんはいつか帰れるっていうけど
ホントかな――
MsgEn: They say grandma will come home someday. I wonder if that's true—

MsgJp:
角が珍しい？
触ってもいいよ
MsgEn: Is it unusual to have horns? You can touch if you want.

MsgJp:
――レスタニアの人って
角が無くて困らないの？
何かスカスカした感じ、しない？
MsgEn:
ーーDon't people from Lestania have horns?
Don't they feel strange without them?
Do they feel empty or something?

MsgJp:
最近は変なことばかり――
これから一体どうなるんだろうね――
MsgEn: Lately, there have been nothing but strange things happening - I wonder what will happen from now on.

MsgJp:
おぞましい魔物が現れたり、
異世界の覚者が来たり――
一体どうなっているのやら
MsgEn:
Hideous monsters appear,
Arisen ones from another world come--
What on is happening?

MsgJp:
いえ、あなた方を悪く言うつもりはなくてね
ただ、心配なだけで――
MsgEn: No, I don't intend to speak ill of you all. I'm just worried, that's all...

MsgJp:
私はね、私の家族を守りたいんだよ
孫を守るためならなんだってするし
孫を連れてどこまでも逃げるよ
MsgEn: I, you know, I want to protect my family. I'll do anything to protect my grandchildren. I'll run away with my grandchildren anywhere.

MsgJp:
心配性かも知れないけど、
何よりも孫が大切なんだ――
誰にだってそういうもの、あるだろ？
MsgEn: I may be anxious, but above all, my grandchildren are important— Everyone has something like that, don't they?

MsgJp:
大切なものを守りたいっていう気持ちは
誰にだってあるものさ
失ってしまったら自分がどうなるかわからない
そんな大切なものが――
MsgEn: The feeling of wanting to protect something important is something that everyone has. If we were to lose it, we wouldn't know what would become of ourselves. That's how precious it is -

MsgJp:
あら、レスタニアの方
河を渡りたいのかしら？
MsgEn: Oh, you're the one from Lestania. Want to cross the river?

MsgJp:
トレアサにはもうお会いになった？
彼女、少し人見知りなんだけど
本当はとっても良い人なのよ
真面目で、温厚で、仕事熱心で――
MsgEn: Have you met Toreasa already? She's a bit shy, but she's actually a very nice person. She's diligent, gentle, and dedicated to her work.

MsgJp:
ここ、エラン水林は
綺麗なところでしょう？
空気も清浄で――
MsgEn: Here; Elan Water Grove is a beautiful place, right? The air is also clean――

MsgJp:
やっぱり水が多いからなのかしら？
ね、船の上で深呼吸してみて
きっと気持ちがいいわ
MsgEn: Is it because there is a lot of water after all? Well, try taking a deep breath on the boat. It will surely feel good.

MsgJp:
はぁ、何だかお腹減ってきちゃった――
結構力仕事なのよねぇ
MsgEn: Ugh, I'm starting to get hungry... It's quite a physically demanding job, you know.

MsgJp: 何か御用？
MsgEn: Do you need something?

MsgJp:
ミューセルお姉様は、その、ちょっと――
考え事や調べ物に熱中されがちだから
わたしができることはお手伝いしてるの
MsgEn: Sister Musel tends to be a bit—absorbed in her thoughts and research, so I try to help where I can.

MsgJp:
あまりミューセルお姉様の手を
煩わせることはしないでね
MsgEn: Please don't bother Suster Muselle too much

MsgJp:
わたしがミューセルお姉様の弟子なのかって？
違うわ
――そうなれたらいいんだけど
MsgEn: Am I Sister Musel's disciple?  No, that's not it.  ――I wish I could be though.

MsgJp:
狭いところだけど、旅人さん用の寝床もあるの
お代として<VAL PRICE_INN>もらうけど
いいかしら？
MsgEn: It's a small place, but there is a sleeping space for travelers as well. I will take <VAL PRICE_INN> as payment, is that okay with you?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
旅人さん用の寝床も
毎日ちゃんと整えてるのよ
泊まっていくの？
MsgEn:
We also have a sleeping area for travelers and we set it up properly every day.
Are you staying the night?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》、ね！
ミューセルお姉様に教えてもらったから
ちゃんとできるはず――！
お代は<VAL PRICE_WEAK>よ、どうする？
MsgEn: "Treat Weakness," right? I learned it from Miss Musel, so I should be able to do it properly! It'll cost you <VAL PRICE_WEAK>. What do you say?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
うーん？
弱化してないみたいだけど――
気分が優れないなら
少し休んでいくのはどうかしら
MsgEn: Huh? It seems you're not weakened, but if you're not feeling well, maybe taking a little rest would be a good idea.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者か
どうかしたか？
MsgEn: Is it the Arisen of Lestania? Is there something wrong?

MsgJp:
レスタニアには覚者がたくさんいるって？
――レスタニアの竜は、覚者を一人に
選びきれなかったのか？
MsgEn: Are there many Arisen in Lestania? - The dragon of Lestania couldn't choose just one Arisen?

MsgJp:
俺は覚者ではないが、
精霊竜とフィンダムを守るための
鍛練は欠かしたことがない
MsgEn: I may not be an Arisen, but I've never neglected my training to protect the Spirit Dragon and Phindym.

MsgJp:
覚者こそは竜に選ばれし者だが、
選ばれなくたって竜を敬う気持ちに
変わりはないからな
MsgEn: Arisen are the ones chosen by the dragons, But even if you're not chosen, the feeling of respecting the dragons does not change, you know.

MsgJp:
何だ？　俺が珍しいのか？
ここではお前たちの方がよっぽど珍しいが――
MsgEn: What is it? I'm unusual? You're much rarer here than I am, but...

MsgJp: よぉ！　何か用かね？
MsgEn: Yo!　What can I do for you?

MsgJp:
フィンダムの飯はどうだ？
口に合うといいんだがな
MsgEn: How's the food in Phindym? I hope it suits your taste.

MsgJp: 腹減ったな――
MsgEn: I'm hungry――

MsgJp:
ダナ村ってところがあってな、
そこらへんで採れる野菜は味が濃くてウマイ！
なんというか、力強い味だ
MsgEn: There is a place called Dana Village. The vegetables that grow around there have a rich and delicious taste! It's kind of like a strong and powerful flavor.

MsgJp:
腹いっぱい食ってこそ、
この筋肉も仕事する気になってくれるってもんよ
MsgEn: Only if you eat a full meal will these muscles be willing to work!

MsgJp: レスタニアの覚者か――
MsgEn: Lord Arisen of Lestania—

MsgJp:
何か用か？
手合せしたいというなら、手加減はしない
MsgEn: Do you have any business? If you want to play, I won't go easy.

MsgJp:
魔物にできた腫れ物のような、
寄生植物のような――
あの気持ちが悪いものを見たか？
MsgEn: Did you see that grotesque, tumor-like thing? It looks like a parasitic plant, resembling an enemy?

MsgJp:
どうやら、ああなると正気を失ってしまうようだ
気を付けたいものだな
MsgEn: Apparently, you lose your mind when you get like that. I'd watch out for that.

MsgJp:
魔物を異形化させるアレ――
実は、我々もアレを発症する可能性があるらしい
あんな惨い姿にはなりたくないな――
MsgEn: That thing that deforms demons—Actually, I heard that we can develop it too. I don't want to look that miserable—

MsgJp: あら、レスタニアの方ね？
MsgEn: Oh, you're from Lestania, aren't you?

MsgJp:
実は、侵食魔のあの腫れ物のようなアレ――
プリーストの祈りによって治らないか
試してみたことがあるのよ
MsgEn: Actually, I have tried to see if the swelling, like a tumor caused by corruption, can be healed by the prayers of a Priest. No luck there though.

MsgJp: まぁ、治らなかったわね
MsgEn: Well, it just didn't heal.

MsgJp:
侵食魔にばかり目をとられがちだけど
植物や土の状態もひどいものよ
MsgEn: White Dragon, please get well!

MsgJp:
侵食魔が噴き出しているあの“胞子”――
あまり吸い込まないようにした方がいいわ
MsgEn: Those "spores" of the corrupting demon are erupting— It's better not to inhale them too much.

MsgJp:
――レスタニアの覚者ですね
船に乗りたいのですか？
MsgEn: You're an Arisen of Lestania. Do you want to board the ship?

MsgJp:
モルは少し変わったところがあるでしょう？
人の話をあまり聞いていないように見えたり
なぜかいつもお腹を空かせていたり――
MsgEn: Moles are a little different, aren't they? It seems like they don't listen to people's stories much and they're always hungry for some reason—

MsgJp:
良い子なんですけどね
あれで中々しっかりしているんですよ
MsgEn: They're a good kid, though. They're quite reliable with that.

MsgJp:
――なんですか
あまりジロジロ見ても
いいことはないですよ
MsgEn: — What is it? Staring too much won't do any good.

MsgJp:
川のそばだから、この辺りはひんやりするでしょう
涼むにはぴったりなんです
MsgEn: Because it's by the river, this area will be cool, won't it? It's perfect for cooling off.

MsgJp:
あっ、覚者さま！？
自分にご用でしょうか？
MsgEn: Ah, Lord Arisen! Do you have any business with me?

MsgJp:
本日はお日柄もよく――
って、何を言っているんだ、俺は
MsgEn: The sun is shining today—What am I saying, I'm not...

MsgJp:
い、いえいえ！
ちょっと緊張してしまいまして！
MsgEn: No, no, no! I was a little nervous!

MsgJp: すみません、何をお話すれば良いのやら――
MsgEn: I'm sorry, I don't know what to tell you--

MsgJp: ん？　ああ、覚者さまじゃないですか
MsgEn: Hm? Oh, it's the Arisen.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランに力を貸してくださり
ありがとうございます
MsgEn: Thank you for lending your strength to Acre Selund.

MsgJp:
この先平和になったらでいいんです
いつか、レスタニアのことを教えてください
MsgEn: Just when there's peace down the road. Someday, please tell us about Lestania.

MsgJp: ――そろそろ動く頃でしょうか
MsgEn: I wonder if it's time to start moving soon.

MsgJp: やあ、元気かい？
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp:
堅苦しいことは嫌いでね
なんでこの任務に呼ばれたんだろう
MsgEn: I don't like to do anything too formal. I don't know why I was called for this assignment.

MsgJp: そろそろ一息つきたいもんだ
MsgEn: I'd like to take a break soon.

MsgJp:
覚者さんも疲れたら
ちょっと休みなよ
MsgEn: When you're tired, Master Arisen; Take a little break.

MsgJp: よう、どうした？
MsgEn: Hey, what's up?

MsgJp:
自分から盗賊に話しかけて
アンタにマズいことは無いのか？
MsgEn: Talk to the bandit yourself. Is there anything wrong with you?

MsgJp:
覚者サマってのは
意外と気取らないもんなんだな
MsgEn: Master Arisen is surprisingly unpretentious

MsgJp:
さすがにこの状況だ
アッカーシェランが無くなっちゃ
困るからな
MsgEn:
This is indeed the situation.
If we lose Acre Selund, we're in trouble.

MsgJp: 悪くいいたくはないが――
MsgEn: I don't mean to be rude, but...

MsgJp:
王子は結局のところ
甘やかされて育ったお坊ちゃま――
そんなところかね
MsgEn: In the end, the prince was raised as a spoiled brat-- I suppose that's how it goes.

MsgJp:
今まで多くの者たちがその行方を追っていたが
――サマラの指輪はおまえを選んだ
MsgEn: Many have pursued its whereabouts, but the Ring of Samara has chosen you.

MsgJp:
俺たちがおまえに協力することになったのも
何かの力が働いてのことかもしれんな
MsgEn: The fact that we are cooperating with you may also be the result of some higher power at work.

MsgJp: ああ、何かあったのか？
MsgEn: Ah, something happened?

MsgJp: 盗賊ってのはどこにでもいるからな
MsgEn: Thieves are everywhere.

MsgJp:
俺はさ――別に何でもよかったんだよな
生きるために畑耕すのも
盗みに入るのもおんなじだったんだ
MsgEn: I was--I didn't really care about anything else. I was just as likely to plow a field to survive as I was to steal from it.

MsgJp:
アンタも覚者が嫌ンなって
行き場が無くなったら盗賊団に来なよ
MsgEn: If you don't like being an Arisen and have nowhere else to go, come join the bandits.

MsgJp: ふん――
MsgEn: Hmph――

MsgJp:
あまり気安く話しかけるな
俺たちは盗賊だ、あんたらとは違う
MsgEn: Don't talk to me so casually. We are bandits, different from you all.

MsgJp: どうしてこんなことになったんだかな
MsgEn: I wonder how things ended up like this.

MsgJp: ――楽しくお喋りしてやる気はない
MsgEn: I'm not in the mood to chat happily.

MsgJp:
うん？
あ、俺？　俺に話しかけてんのか？
MsgEn:
Huh?
Oh, me? Are you talking to me?

MsgJp:
話してやれることなんか
特に無いんだよな――
MsgEn: There is nothing in particular that I can do -

MsgJp:
やめろ、何かを期待して
何度も話しかけるのは
MsgEn: Stop it. Repeatedly talking to me with expectations...

MsgJp:
む――
頭領に、よそものと
あんまり馴れ合うなって言われてるからよ
MsgEn:
I'm not--
my chieftain told me not to get too friendly with strangers.

MsgJp:
いやぁ――勘弁してくれ
俺、ユーモアってやつが無くてよ
あんたを笑かしてやれたらよかったんだがなぁ
MsgEn:
No... Please spare me.
I lack a sense of humor, you know.
I wish I could have made you laugh.

MsgJp:
あっ、いらっしゃい！
何か食べていってよ！
MsgEn: Oh, come on in! Please have something to eat!

MsgJp:
みんなのために食料――
なんとかしないと――
MsgEn: For the sake of everyone, we need to do something about the food situation ――

MsgJp: なんだかおなか空いてきちゃった
MsgEn: I'm kind of hungry.

MsgJp:
あ――
でも勢いだけの拾い食いは危険だからね～
MsgEn: Ah-- But it's dangerous to just pick up and eat with such alacrity~!

MsgJp:
瓦礫だらけでホコリっぽいし
できたら空気、入れ替えたいけど――
MsgEn: There's rubble everywhere and it's dusty. I'd like to change the air if I could, but--

MsgJp:
よく考えたらこの部屋――
窓ないよね？
MsgEn: When I think about it, this room—doesn't have a window, does it?

MsgJp:
ここで一人火を眺めてると
色々と思い出しちゃうな――
MsgEn: Here, as I gaze at the fire alone, Various memories come rushing back...

MsgJp:
なんかさ――
火ってすごいよね
MsgEn: You know... fire is amazing, isn't it?

MsgJp:
おいしいごはん作ってくれることもあれば――
大事なもの何もかも奪ってくことだってあるし
MsgEn: They can cook you a delicious meal, or they can-- take away everything that's important to you.

MsgJp: ははは！
MsgEn: Hahaha!

MsgJp: ちょっと！
MsgEn: Hey!

MsgJp: えぇ！？
MsgEn: Eh!?

MsgJp: うーん
MsgEn: Hmm...

MsgJp: うーん
MsgEn: Hmm...

MsgJp: ダメ、もうホントに無理
MsgEn: No, it's really impossible now.

MsgJp: よし！
MsgEn: Alright!

MsgJp: ねぇ！
MsgEn: Hey!

MsgJp: ねぇ！
MsgEn: Hey!

MsgJp: ハァイ
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: そっか――
MsgEn: I see...

MsgJp: 何か無いかなぁ？
MsgEn: Is there anything?

MsgJp: こうなったら――！
MsgEn: If it becomes like this—!

MsgJp: これは食べられそうだね！
MsgEn: This looks edible!

MsgJp: ふぅー
MsgEn: Phew

MsgJp: 待ってよー！
MsgEn: Wait a minute!

MsgJp: 待ってよー！
MsgEn: Wait a minute!

MsgJp: こっち来ないでってば！
MsgEn: Don't come over here!

MsgJp: あっち行きなさいよ！
MsgEn: Go away!

MsgJp: アタシ、おいしくないって！
MsgEn: I'm not delicious!

MsgJp: 今日は何する？
MsgEn: What are you doing today?

MsgJp: 今日は何する？
MsgEn: What are you doing today?

MsgJp: どうしようか
MsgEn: What should I do?

MsgJp: どうしようか
MsgEn: What should I do?

MsgJp: お願い――
MsgEn: Please...

MsgJp:
今日できることは全部やれたみたい
また明日も来てくれると嬉しいな！
MsgEn: I was able to do everything I could do today. I would be happy if you could come again tomorrow!

MsgJp:
ローナやブラッド――
それに砦の兵隊さんまで
大食堂の修復手伝ってくれてるんだよ！
MsgEn: Lorna and Brad, and even the soldiers in the fort, are helping with the restoration work!

MsgJp: なんか“チーム”って感じだよね？
MsgEn: It feels like a 'team,' you know?

MsgJp: もちろん、あなたも！
MsgEn: And you, of course!

MsgJp:
あ！
なんか名前付けたいなー
MsgEn: Ah! I want to name it.

MsgJp:
ね！
何がいい？
MsgEn: Hey! What would you like?

MsgJp:
瓦礫はまだ残ってるけどさ
食料庫が復活しただけで
力が湧いてくるんだぁ
MsgEn: The debris is still there, but the pantry is back up and running. It gives me strength!

MsgJp:
ローナにね
最初にどこを直すか聞かれたから
でっかい声で――
MsgEn:
Lorna, huh.
When asked where to fix it first,
I shouted loudly――

MsgJp:
「食料庫！　食料庫がいい！！」
――って叫んじゃった
MsgEn: "Food storage! Food storage is good!" - I shouted.

MsgJp:
大食堂って壁に囲まれてるから
食料守るのには向いてるんだけど――
MsgEn: The big dining hall is surrounded by walls, so it is suitable for protecting food, but...

MsgJp:
お料理焦がしちゃったときとか
部屋中煙だらけになって
鼻の奥までコゲ臭くなるんだよね
MsgEn:
When the cooking gets burned,
and the room becomes filled with smoke,
it even smells burnt inside the nose.

MsgJp:
バレないように
壁にこっそり穴あけちゃおうかな？
MsgEn: Shall we discreetly make a hole in the wall so that we won't get caught?

MsgJp:
ペコ、ずっとここにいることにしたみたい
まぁ――初めて食堂に来た人は
ちょっとびっくりしてるけどね
MsgEn:
Peco seems to have decided to stay here forever.
Well, people who come to the cafeteria for the first time might be a little surprised, though.

MsgJp:
あの子ってばゴブリンなのに
妙に気が弱かったりするからさ
アタシとしても、ここで元気にしてるの
見られる方が気が楽だよ
MsgEn: She's a goblin, but she's strangely timid. As for me, it's easier for me to see her here doing well.

MsgJp:
復旧してから色んな人が来てくれるんだ
おかげで忙しくって、賑やかで
毎日やることだらけだよ
MsgEn: Since we've been back up and running, we've had all kinds of people coming in. It's kept us busy and buzzing. There's so much to do every day!

MsgJp:
ヘザーとアイダンも盛り上げてくれるし――
ペコも居ついちゃって、何だか自分なりに
仕事みたいなことしてるしね
MsgEn: Heather and Aidan are also uplifting―― Peco has settled in too, and in a way, is doing something like work

MsgJp:
――さぁ、もっともっと頑張って
戦士のみんなに力付けてもらわないと！
ここからラスニテを――
ううん、アッカーシェランを元気にしていきたいんだ
MsgEn: Alright, we need to push ourselves even harder, We have to get support from all the soldiers! From here on, let's restore Rath-- No, I want to bring back the vitality of all of Acre Selund!

MsgJp:
大食堂、もうすっかり元通りだよ！　
――ううん、元の大食堂よりも良い感じかも
何ていったって皆で作り上げた食堂だからね！
MsgEn: The cafeteria is back to normal now! No, it might even be better than before. After all, we all built this cafeteria together!

MsgJp:
あなたにもいっぱい協力してもらったよね
お陰で、ここまでやってこれたこと
とっても感謝してる！　本当にありがとう！
MsgEn:
You've helped me a lot.
Thanks to you, I've made it this far.
I'm very grateful!　Thank you so much!

MsgJp:
あなたは何が好き？
思い出の味とか、あるでしょ？
MsgEn:
What do you like?
Do you have a taste for memories?

MsgJp: ウ、ウガ？
MsgEn: U, uga?

MsgJp:
食ベモノ、集めタ！
キャリーうれしい？
MsgEn: Food and collectibles! Carrie, are you happy?

MsgJp: ココにいる、楽しイ！
MsgEn: It's fun being here!

MsgJp:
誰モ、イジメナイ――
ペコ――悪いコト、シナイ
MsgEn: Whoever is in the armor, if they show up in front of me, I'm just going to fight!

MsgJp:
次の作戦は――こっちでいくか
いやいや、逆にあっちの方が――
MsgEn: The next strategy is...shall we go this way... No, the other way around is better...

MsgJp:
ボクは、よく独り言を言ってるらしいんだけど
みんなが言うほどの実感がなくってね
MsgEn: I often seem to be talking to myself, but I don't really feel it as much as everyone says.

MsgJp:
普段から、まわりに誰かいるかとかは
特に気にしてはいないけど
ボクにとっては自然なことさ
MsgEn: I usually don't pay much attention to whether someone is around me or not. It's just natural for me.

MsgJp: ――これは、独り言じゃないよね？
MsgEn: This isn't just talking to myself, right?

MsgJp:
展望城に自分の部屋はないのかって？
ああ、それなら以前
一度作ってもらったことがあってね
MsgEn: Lookout Castle, isn't there a room for me there? Ah, well, it's because I had one made before.

MsgJp:
でも、城内って広くて複雑でさ
部屋に戻るたびに迷うのに飽きてしまって
気が付いたら場所を忘れてたんだよ
MsgEn: But the castle is so big and complicated. I got tired of getting lost every time I went back to my room and realized I'd forgotten where I was.

MsgJp:
今覚えてる場所は――
城の入り口と、王宮層と
あとはシチューのある食堂だけさ！
MsgEn: The only places I remember now are—the castle entrance, the royal layer, and the cafeteria with the stew!

MsgJp: ボクは、作戦というものは“生き物”だと思ってる
MsgEn: I think that a strategy is like a living creature.

MsgJp:
いくら事前に完璧に計画したつもりでも
その場の状況でいくらだって変わるし
思い通りに行く方が珍しいくらいさ
MsgEn: No matter how perfectly you plan it in advance, it can change at any moment, and it's rare that things go the way you want them to.

MsgJp:
まぁ、そこが面白いところなんだけどね
何でも思った通りになるなんて
つまんないだろ？
MsgEn: Well, that's the interesting part about it, you know? It's boring for everything to just go as you think.

MsgJp: 準備はいいかい？それじゃ行こう
MsgEn: Are you ready? Let's go.

MsgJp: 準備はいいかい？　それじゃ行こう
MsgEn: Are you ready? Let's go.

MsgJp: きっと、何かあるはずさ
MsgEn: There's got to be something.

MsgJp: きっと、何かあるはずさ
MsgEn: There's got to be something.

MsgJp: ふんふん、なるほどね
MsgEn: Hmmm... I see.

MsgJp: いや、待てよ？
MsgEn: No, wait, could you?

MsgJp: いや、待てよ？
MsgEn: No, wait, could you?

MsgJp:
そうか！　そういうことか！
やはり僕は、天才だね！
MsgEn: Ah, I see! So that's how it is! As I thought, I am a genius!

MsgJp:
おかしいなぁ――
今日はちょっと調子が悪いらしい！
MsgEn: Hmm, that's strange... It seems like I'm feeling a little unwell today!

MsgJp:
おかしいなぁ――
今日はちょっと調子が悪いらしい！
MsgEn:
Hmm, that's strange...
It seems like I'm feeling a little unwell today!

MsgJp: ほら、僕の思った通りだろう？
MsgEn: See, it's just as I thought, isn't it?

MsgJp:
はっはっは！
たまにはこんなこともあるさ！
MsgEn: Hahaha! Sometimes things like this happen!

MsgJp:
はっはっは！
たまにはこんなこともあるさ！
MsgEn:
Hahaha!
Sometimes things like this happen!

MsgJp: あー、キミキミ
MsgEn: Oh, you, you.

MsgJp: あー、キミキミ
MsgEn: Oh, you, you

MsgJp: ちょっといいかな？　隊長
MsgEn: Can I have a word with you?　Captain.

MsgJp: ちょっといいかな？　隊長
MsgEn: Can I have a word with you?　Captain.

MsgJp: おかしいなぁ――
MsgEn: Hmm, something is strange.

MsgJp: やはり僕は、天才だね！
MsgEn: I am a genius, after all!

MsgJp: それじゃあ行こう！
MsgEn: Let's go then!

MsgJp: ここにはもう何もなさそうだ
MsgEn: There doesn't seem to be anything here anymore.

MsgJp: さて、帰るとしよう！
MsgEn: Now, let's go home!

MsgJp: ああ、もう――だめだ――
MsgEn: Oh, no—it's no use—

MsgJp: アハハハ！
MsgEn: Ahahaha!

MsgJp: アハハハ！
MsgEn: Ahahaha!

MsgJp: んんっ！？
MsgEn: Huh?!

MsgJp: んんっ！？
MsgEn: Huh?!

MsgJp: えぇっと――
MsgEn: Um...

MsgJp: はぁ～
MsgEn: Ha~

MsgJp: はぁ～
MsgEn: Ha~

MsgJp: あれ――
MsgEn: That—

MsgJp:
ここにはもう何もなさそうだ
僕の勘がそう囁いているのでね
さて、帰るとしよう！
MsgEn: There doesn't seem to be anything else here. That's what my instincts are whispering to me, you know. Well, let's go home!

MsgJp:
やったね！
僕らがいれば敵無しなんじゃないか！？
MsgEn: Great job! If we're together, we have no enemies, don't we?!

MsgJp:
あー、ごめん
今ちょっと考えなきゃいけないことが
あってね、忙しいんだ
MsgEn: Oh, sorry. There's something I need to think about right now. I'm busy.

MsgJp:
ありがとう！　助かったよ！
よしよしこれで――
MsgEn: Thank you! I'm saved! Good job—

MsgJp:
もう終わったの？
さすが、頼りになるね！
MsgEn: Is it already over? As expected, you're dependable!

MsgJp: さて、何をする？
MsgEn: Now, what to do?

MsgJp: さて、何をする？
MsgEn: Now, what to do?

MsgJp: やあ
MsgEn: Hey

MsgJp: やあ
MsgEn: Hey

MsgJp: よく来たね
MsgEn: Nice to see you

MsgJp: よく来たね
MsgEn: Nice to see you

MsgJp: はあはあ、久しぶりの戦は体に応えるなぁ
MsgEn: Ha ha! It's been a while since the last battle, it's taking a toll on my body

MsgJp: ちょっと待った、少し休憩させてくれ
MsgEn: Wait a moment, please let me take a short break.

MsgJp: あれ、体が重いぞ、こんなはずじゃあ
MsgEn: Oh, my body feels heavy. This is not how it should be.

MsgJp: や、やっぱり僕は室内で策を練ってる方が――
MsgEn: I think I'd rather be indoors, planning...

MsgJp: 少しは、動けるようになってきたぞ――
MsgEn: I've become a little more mobile.

MsgJp: ああ、でもまだ苦しい、ちょっと休憩
MsgEn: Ah, but I'm still hurting, I need a little break.

MsgJp: キミから見て、今の僕ってどうかな？
MsgEn: How do I look now from your point of view?

MsgJp: もうちょっと頑張れそうな気も――ううん
MsgEn: I think I can do a little more -- no.

MsgJp: あははは、どうだい僕の動き、軽やかだろう？
MsgEn: Ha-ha-ha, how's my movement, light, isn't it?

MsgJp: 風のように走り、雷のように刺す！
MsgEn: Running like the wind, piercing like thunder!

MsgJp: なに、前はちょっと腕が鈍ってただけさ！
MsgEn: No, I was just a little rusty before!

MsgJp: ふふ、戦える参謀官っていいよね
MsgEn: Hehe, having a capable staff officer who can fight is nice, isn't it?

MsgJp: え、見つかった！？
MsgEn: Wait, it was found!?

MsgJp: さすが隊長だ！
MsgEn: As expected, Captain!

MsgJp:
ハッ――
驚いた、何か用？
MsgEn: Ha-- You scared the hell out of me. What can I do for you?

MsgJp: 悪いけど、楽しく世間話する気分じゃないんだ
MsgEn: Sorry, I'm just not in the mood for pleasant small talk.

MsgJp:
こんな状況だから――
子供だからって何もわからないわけじゃないよ
MsgEn: Because of this situation ―― Just because I'm a child doesn't mean I don't understand anything.

MsgJp:
もっと悪いことになったら
生きていくのが難しくなるかもしれない
そんな時に、走り回って遊べる？
MsgEn: If things get worse... It might be difficult to survive. Can you run around and play at such times?

MsgJp: ああ、どうも
MsgEn: Oh, thank you.

MsgJp:
家の中に閉じこもったり
洞窟に隠れたりできればいいんですが
そういうわけにもいかないでしょう
MsgEn: I wish I could lock myself in my house or hide in a cave, but that's not going to happen.

MsgJp:
ちょっとした用がありましてね
ある程度、覚悟して家を出てきたんです
――いや、甘かったです
MsgEn: I had some business to attend to, and I left home with some degree of determination, but I underestimated it.

MsgJp:
今も商人が来てくれる村もありますが
そうじゃない小さな村もたくさんありますから
危険を承知で外に出ざるを得ないんです
MsgEn: There are some villages that still have merchants coming to them, but there are many small villages that don't, so we have to go out there and take the risk.

MsgJp:
え、なんだって？
すまないね、最近耳が遠くて――
MsgEn:
What? What did you say?
I'm sorry, I've been a little hard of hearing lately.

MsgJp:
竜が倒された――
言ってしまえば、ただ一つの事件が
起こっただけで、この有様だ
MsgEn: The dragon has been defeated—To put it simply, only one event has occurred, resulting in this state.

MsgJp:
竜と――それに連なる王家を
もっと守っておけば
こうはならなかったのかね――
MsgEn: If only we had protected the dragons and the royal family that follows them more, would it not have come to this?

MsgJp:
王家に仕えてた人たちは
一体何をしてるんだか
まったく情けない話だよ
MsgEn: I don't know what the hell the people who served the royal family are doing. It's utterly pathetic.

MsgJp: ふぅん、君が覚者ですか
MsgEn: Oh, are you an Arisen?

MsgJp:
――何でもチャンスとして見ないと
我が家の家訓でしてね
MsgEn: -- I have to look at everything as an opportunity. It's a family tradition.

MsgJp:
自分の暮らしは自分で守らないと、ですよ
そういった努力ができない者は
まぁ、痛い目を見ても――仕方ないのでは？
MsgEn: If you don't protect your own life, well, it can't be helped if you suffer the consequences.

MsgJp:
我々の一族は、万が一の時のために
人脈を広げ、貯蓄してきましたから
そういったことをしていない人は
まぁ、今大変なんじゃないですか
MsgEn: Our family has been networking and saving in case of an emergency, so if you haven't done those things, well, you're in a tough spot right now.

MsgJp:
こんにちは
あのぅ、えっと――
MsgEn: Hello, umm, well...

MsgJp: わたし、これからどうすればいいんでしょう
MsgEn: What am I going to do now?

MsgJp:
母に逃げてって言われたんです
それでここまで来たんです――
MsgEn: My mother told me to run away, so I came here...

MsgJp: ちょっと疲れちゃった――
MsgEn: I'm a little tired...

MsgJp:
ん？　何？
言いたいことがあるなら言いなよ
MsgEn:
Huh? What is it?
If you have something to say, go ahead

MsgJp:
今までも辛いことはたくさんあったんだ
今回だって、絶対に乗り越えられる――
MsgEn: I've been through a lot of hard times in the past. I'll get through this one, too--I promise.

MsgJp:
眠る場所と、食べる物――
あとは、守りたいもの
それだけあればしばらく大丈夫、私はね
MsgEn: A place to sleep, something to eat-- and something to protect That's all you need for a while, for me.

MsgJp:
この通り、剣持って戦えはしないけど
逃げ足はまぁまぁ速い方だと思ってるからさ
MsgEn: As you can see, I can't fight with a sword, but I think I'm a reasonably fast runner.

MsgJp: ああ、どうも――
MsgEn: Ah, thank you.

MsgJp:
あの、旅をしていらっしゃるなら――
若い夫婦を見ませんでしたか？
MsgEn:
Um, if you are traveling--
have you seen a young couple?

MsgJp:
息子夫婦と一緒に暮らしてたんですが
オークの襲撃から逃れる時に
はぐれてしまったんです
MsgEn: I was living with my son and his wife when we got separated while fleeing an orc raid.

MsgJp:
命は助かっても、独りで暮らすのは
堪えるものです――
MsgEn: Even if your life is spared, living alone can be unbearable--

MsgJp: あら、どうかして？
MsgEn: Oh, what's wrong?

MsgJp:
みんなで力を合わせて立ち上がれば――
でも、上手くいかないものね
なかなか協力してくれる方がいなくて
MsgEn: If everyone were to come together and work as a team, but it's not going so well. It's hard to find people willing to cooperate.

MsgJp: ふぅ、私だってやればできるわ
MsgEn: Phew, I can do it too if I try

MsgJp:
少し休もうかしら
誰も手を貸してくれないんだもの
MsgEn: Maybe I should take a short rest. Since no one is lending a hand.

MsgJp: な、なんでしょう？
MsgEn: Yes, what is it?

MsgJp:
もう、命からがら逃げてきたんです
な、何も持ってませんよ
勘弁してください
MsgEn: Hey, I don't have anything. I've already escaped with my life. Give me a break!

MsgJp:
この体以外、何も手元に残りませんでした
せめて親父の形見くらいは
持ってきたかったんですけど――
MsgEn:
I was left with nothing but this body.
I wanted to bring at least a memento of my dad's, but--

MsgJp:
腹も減ったし、喉も乾いてますよ
どこか落ち着ける場所を探さないと
MsgEn: I'm hungry and thirsty. I need to find a place to settle down.

MsgJp:
はぁ、少し休みたいわ
ここまで逃げてくるのに精一杯で――
MsgEn: Sigh, I want to rest a little. I'm exhausted from running away this far.

MsgJp:
どこか、わたしを
受け入れてくれる村は無いかしら
ねぇ、ご存じない――？
MsgEn:
I wonder if there is a village somewhere that would accept me.
Hey, do you know of any--?

MsgJp:
とにかく少しだけ休みたいの
そうすれば、次に何をすればいいか
考えられそうだから
MsgEn: I just want to rest for a while. That way, I can think about what to do next.

MsgJp:
村のみんな
無事かしら――
MsgEn: I hope everyone in the village is safe—

MsgJp:
あ、はい――
何かご用、ですか？
MsgEn: Ah, yes―― Do you need anything?

MsgJp:
ぐすっ――
ここがどこか、わからないんです
MsgEn: I don't know where this is.

MsgJp:
前を向いて走るのに必死で―ー
後ろにいたお母さんがいつの間にか
いなくなってたのに気付かなかったんです
MsgEn: I was running desperately, facing forward, and I didn't even realize when my mother, who was behind me, disappeared.

MsgJp:
どこに、行けばいいんでしょう
しくしく――
MsgEn: Where should I go, sob sob...

MsgJp: むぅ、なんだなんだ！？
MsgEn: What is it, what is it!?

MsgJp:
この剣は王家へ捧げたもの！
今に名を残す英雄のように
それは勇ましく振るってみせよう
MsgEn: This sword is dedicated to the royal family! Just like the renowned hero who will be remembered, let's swing it valiantly.

MsgJp:
いつかは王都メガドの護衛に
選ばれるツワモノにと夢見てきたが
今は手の届く範囲で戦うのに必死！
――だが、それも悪くない
MsgEn: I once dreamt of being one of the elite chosen to guard the capital, Megado. But now, I'm just struggling to fight within my reach. But even that isn't so bad.

MsgJp:
ん？　この盾が気になるのですかな？
素晴らしいデザインでしょう
MsgEn:
Hm? Are you interested in this shield?
It has a splendid design.

MsgJp: うん、話なら聞くよ
MsgEn: Yeah, I'll listen if you want to talk.

MsgJp:
魔物は私たちよりも鼻が利くし
もちろん耳だっていい
――まぁ、だから人間を
甘くみてるところもあるんだろうね
MsgEn: Enemies have a better sense of smell than us, and of course, their hearing is also good. Well, that's why they might underestimate humans sometimes.

MsgJp:
臨機応変に対処できるってのが
人間の一番の強みなんじゃないかな
MsgEn: The ability to adapt to different situations is probably the greatest strength of a human, don't you think?

MsgJp:
魔物を追う時は
マズい場所に誘いこまれてないか
気を付けた方がいいよ
MsgEn: When pursuing enemies, it's better to be careful and make sure you're not being led into dangerous places.

MsgJp: ああ、少し話すか？
MsgEn: Ah, would you like to talk for a bit?

MsgJp:
もう少しいい装備が欲しいところだが
贅沢は言ってられないか
MsgEn: I would like to have better equipment, but I can't afford to be extravagant.

MsgJp:
――なんだって？
すまない、大砲の音のせいか
ここのところ耳が遠くなったみたいだ
MsgEn: — What did you say? I'm sorry, it might be because of the sound of the cannons. I think I'm going deaf these days.

MsgJp:
ここのところ戦いに出る日が続いて
なかなか武具の手入れができないのが、な――
戦場で壊れでもしたら、終わりだ
MsgEn: Lately, I have been going out to battle for consecutive days and it's been difficult to maintain my equipment, ah— If it were to break on the battlefield, it would be the end.

MsgJp: はい、どうかしました？
MsgEn: Um, what's wrong?

MsgJp:
あなたも、きっとお強いんでしょうね
私はまだまだで――
MsgEn: I'm sure you must be very strong, too. I'm not ready to--

MsgJp:
もっとがんばらないといけませんね
今度こそ、人を支えられるように
なりたいんです
MsgEn: I have to work harder. This time, I want to become someone who can support others.

MsgJp:
解放軍には入ったばかりなんです
――元から剣を持っていた人たちとは
やっぱり実力の差を感じますね
MsgEn: I have just joined the Liberation Army. Compared to those who already had swords, I can definitely feel the difference in skill.

MsgJp: はっ、任務中ですので手短にお願いします！
MsgEn: Uh, please keep it brief as I am on a mission!

MsgJp:
オークとの戦いに散った者も数知れず――
遺された家族のことを想うと
胸が潰れそうになります
MsgEn:
Countless others have scattered in the battle against the orcs--
My heart breaks for the families left behind.

MsgJp:
オークは、仲間が死んでも
何とも思わないのでしょうか？
――それとも――
MsgEn:
Do orcs think nothing of when their friends die?
Or--or--don't they?

MsgJp:
はっ、気弱になってはいけないと
自分に言い聞かせております
MsgEn: H-hold on, I mustn't lose heart—- I keep reminding myself

MsgJp: よう、元気か？
MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?

MsgJp:
まぁ、お互い身構えずに行こうぜ
俺も盗賊になったばっかりだけど
君が腕の立つ人だってことは、見りゃわかるよ
MsgEn: Well, let's go without being too cautious—- I've only just become a bandit. But I can tell that you're skilled, just by looking at you.

MsgJp:
人生何が起こるかわからないものだよな
起こっちまってから「まさか」と思うんだよ
MsgEn: You never know what can happen in life—You think "it couldn't possibly happen," but then it does.

MsgJp:
家族はいるのか？
はぁ、ポーンがいる――
なんか哲学的な答えだな
MsgEn: Do you have a family? Huh, there's a Pawn―― That's quite a philosophical answer.

MsgJp:
ん、なになに？
呼んだ？
MsgEn: Hmm, what is it? Did you call me?

MsgJp: さーて、どうしよっかな
MsgEn: Well, what should I do?

MsgJp:
ねぇねぇ～
何かおいしい話、知らない？
MsgEn: Hey, hey~ Do you know any interesting stories?

MsgJp:
あーあ
どっかにすんごいお宝、転がってないかなぁ
そしたらセルマの姐さんに見直してもらえるのに
MsgEn: Oh dear. I wonder if there might be an amazing treasure hidden somewhere. If so, Sister Selma could take another look at it for me.

MsgJp: おお、どうかしたかい？
MsgEn: Oh, is something wrong?

MsgJp:
いやぁ、久しぶりに持つ剣は重いな
前はもうちょっと、こう――
MsgEn: Oh, it's been a while since I held a sword. It feels heavy now. It used to be a little lighter, like...

MsgJp:
こう見えても俺、前に
剣士を目指したこともあるんだぜ！
まぁ、子供の頃の話だけど
MsgEn:
You see, I once tried to become a swordsman!
Well, that was when I was a kid.

MsgJp:
盾もずっと持ってると重いんだよな
もうちょっと軽い盾を買えばよかったかなぁ
MsgEn: Shields are also heavy when you hold them all the time. I guess I should have bought a lighter one.

MsgJp: ぬっ！？　何かご用でも――
MsgEn: Huh!? Is there something you need—

MsgJp:
己自身を見つめ直すため
戦に乱れた各地を行脚しておるのです
MsgEn: To reflect on oneself, I am wandering around various places that have been disturbed by war.

MsgJp:
荒廃した景色、それを見て己が心に
湧きあがるもの――
私はそれを見極めたい
MsgEn: The devastated landscape, what wells up in my heart when I see it—I want to find out what it is.

MsgJp:
一時は世を捨て、隠遁生活を送ったことも
ありますがね――そうしたところで
私には何も見えてこなかったのです
MsgEn:
I even left the world for a time and went into seclusion
- and I didn't see anything!

MsgJp: 何？　じろじろ見ちゃって
MsgEn: What? You're staring at me.

MsgJp:
面倒事はごめんよ
――そりゃ、義理や礼儀は通すけどさ
それ以外でってこと
MsgEn: I don't want to be a bother— that is, I'll be polite and respectful, but other than that, I mean.

MsgJp:
どうしたの、誰か探してるの？
いえ、そんな風に見えたってだけなんだけど
MsgEn: What's wrong, are you looking for someone? No, it only seemed that way.

MsgJp:
――あたし、どうも面倒事に
まきこまれやすい気がするのよね
どうしてだろう
MsgEn:
--I feel like I get into trouble a lot.
I don't know why.

MsgJp: まあ、どうなさいました？
MsgEn: Well, what happened?

MsgJp:
私でお力になれることなら
よろこんで手をお貸ししますわ
MsgEn: If there is anything I can assist you with, I would be delighted to lend a hand.

MsgJp:
私の故郷は離れていますし
小さいながらも守りの固い城に
住んでおりますから、家族も無事ですよ
MsgEn: My hometown is far away. And even though it is small, it is a securely fortified castle, So my family is safe.

MsgJp:
このような時こそ
周りの方に手を差し伸べるべきだと――
そう思って、はるばるこちらへ参りましたの
MsgEn:
It is at times like this that we should reach out to those around us--
That's why I came all the way here!

MsgJp:
《英霊眠りし道》についての伝承は多いのです
子供もおとぎ話を通して知っていますよ
MsgEn: There are many legends about the "Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path," and even children are familiar with it through fairy tales.

MsgJp:
中は土砂で埋まっているので
いわゆる“墓場荒らし”もここにはやってきません
MsgEn: The inside is filled with earth and sand, so the so-called "grave robbers" won't come here either!

MsgJp:
王家ゆかりの地であるのに、番人が
自分一人なのはそのせいですね――
MsgEn: It's a place associated with the royal family, but that's why there's only one guardian.

MsgJp:
自分も中には何度か足を踏み入れています
管理のこともありますから――
まぁ、土砂が無いところまで覗く程度ですが
MsgEn: I've stepped inside a few times myself because of the management-- Well, I've only peeked in to where there's no sediment.

MsgJp:
はっ、覚者様！
ようこそおいでくださいました
MsgEn: Hah, Lord Arisen! Welcome, please come in

MsgJp:
英霊眠りし道は普通のダンジョンとは異なります
ある程度の武具を揃えて挑まなければ
踏破は難しいのではと――
MsgEn: The Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path is different from a normal dungeon. It may be difficult to conquer without equipping a certain level of weapons and armor.

MsgJp:
また、内部は土砂で埋まっている通路もあります
もう土砂が流れ込むことはありませんから
一度でも撤去できればいいのですが
MsgEn: Furthermore, there are also passageways that are filled with sediment internally. There will no longer be any inflow of sediment, so it would be good to remove it just once.

MsgJp:
覚者様、お気をつけて――
危険を感じられたら
すぐに戻ってきてくださいね
MsgEn: Arisen, please be careful-- If you feel any danger, Please come back immediately.

MsgJp:
開拓後の場所から
再突入できるようになりましたよ！
これで内部の調査がより捗るかと
MsgEn: You can now re-enter from your pioneering location! I thought this would help us make more progress in our investigation of the interior.

MsgJp: 開拓後の場所から再突入しますか？
MsgEn: Do you want to re-enter the place after development?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
パーティーリーダーが行き先を
選ぶまで、少々お待ちください
MsgEn: Please wait a moment while the party leader selects the destination.

MsgJp:
パーティーリーダーが待っていらっしゃいますよ
《英霊眠りし道》へ突入しますか？
MsgEn:
The party leader is waiting.
Will you enter the Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
内部へ向かわれる際は十分に注意してください
まずは状況確認など、いかがでしょう？
MsgEn:
Please be careful when heading inside.
How about a status check first?

MsgJp: ダンジョンに入る
MsgEn: Enter Dungeon

MsgJp: 開拓状況確認
MsgEn: Check Reclamation Status

MsgJp: 報酬取得状況確認
MsgEn: Check Acquired Rewards Status

MsgJp: まさか、全ての道を拓かれるとは――！
MsgEn: I can't believe all the roads have been opened up—!

MsgJp:
実は――伝承では
全ての道を拓くことで
最後の試練が受けられると言われているんです
MsgEn: Actually, in the legend, it is said that by opening up all paths, one can receive the final trial.

MsgJp:
覚者様が全ての道を拓いたと同時刻に、
開かずの扉に変化が起きました
まるで、共鳴するみたいにです
MsgEn: At the same time that the Arisen paved the way for everything, a change occurred in the unopened door, as if it were resonating!

MsgJp:
最後の試練が待ち受けるのは
きっと開かずの扉の先なのでしょうね
――最後の試練に向かわれる時は
ぜひ声をかけてください
MsgEn: The final trial is surely waiting beyond the sealed door. When you're ready to face the last trial, please don't hesitate to contact me.

MsgJp:
内部へ向かわれる際は十分に注意してください
まずは状況確認など、いかがでしょう？
MsgEn:
Please be careful when heading inside.
How about a status check first?

MsgJp: ダンジョンに入る
MsgEn: Enter Dungeon

MsgJp: 開拓状況確認
MsgEn: Check Reclamation Status

MsgJp: 報酬取得状況確認
MsgEn: Check Acquired Rewards Status

MsgJp: 最後の試練に挑む
MsgEn: Challenge Final Ordeal

MsgJp:
最後の試練に向かわれるのですね
それでは、扉の封印を解除しておきます
MsgEn:
I see that you are heading for the final ordeal.
I will now unseal the door.

MsgJp:
あの先には、今までより困難な試練が
待ち受けているかもしれません
MsgEn: Beyond that point, more difficult challenges than ever before may await you!

MsgJp:
心して向かってください
ご武運をお祈りします
――覚者様のお戻りを信じておりますので！
MsgEn: Please proceed with caution. We pray for your success. We believe in the return of the Arisen!

MsgJp:
覚者様、申し訳ありませんが
そのような武具で内部に進まれるのは
かなり危険かと――
MsgEn: Lord Arisen, I'm sorry but it is quite dangerous to proceed inside with such weaponry.

MsgJp:
番人として、覚者様をみすみす危険に
晒すわけにはいきません
武具を整えてから、もう一度いらしてください
MsgEn: As a guardian, I cannot simply expose the esteemed Arisen to danger. Please come again after preparing your equipment.

MsgJp: やあ、あんたが白き竜の覚者さんか
MsgEn: Hey, are you the Arisen of the White Dragon?

MsgJp:
このほこらに分散している
私の力を集めて
ここまで持ってきてくれないかい？
MsgEn: Can you gather the power scattered at this shrine and bring it here?

MsgJp:
そうすれば、あんたに力を貸してやれる――
何せ今は何の力も無くってね
MsgEn: If you do that, then I can lend you my strength—after all, I don't have any power right now.

MsgJp:
ありがとう、よく集めてきたね
おかげで何かといい感じだよ
MsgEn:
Thanks, you've done a great job collecting them.
It's made me feel like I'm on to something.

MsgJp:
見たところ、あんたなら
もっと深くまで潜ることもできそうだし――
MsgEn: From what I can see, you could probably delve even deeper -

MsgJp:
さぁ、見てな
土砂ごとき、力さえ戻ればこんなもんさ
MsgEn:
Now, look here.
Just some earth and sand.
If only I regain my strength, it's nothing.

MsgJp:
どうだい？
土砂をどけて、道を作っておいたよ
これで先に進めるだろう
MsgEn: How about it? I cleared away the debris and made a path. You should be able to proceed now.

MsgJp:
あんたほどの実力があるなら
この先に眠る宝物にもたどり着けるんじゃない？
MsgEn:
If you're as good as you say you are,
you'll get to the treasures that lie ahead, won't you?

MsgJp:
期待してるよ――
ああ、久しぶりに楽しかった
MsgEn: I'm counting on you— Ah, I haven't had this much fun in a while.

MsgJp:
すまないけど、思ったより
土砂が詰まっててね
さすがに時間がかかってしまってるんだ
MsgEn: Sorry, it's more packed with sediment than I thought. It's taking longer than expected.

MsgJp:
もう少しだけ時間をくれない？
なに、目途は立ってるからさ
MsgEn: Can you give me a little more time? No, I've got a plan.

MsgJp:
ふふふ、そう怪訝な顔をしないで
あんたの力になりたいだけさ
MsgEn: Hahaha, don't make such a bewildered face. I just want to support you.

MsgJp:
まだ王子は幼いんだろ？
そうそう、ネド王子――
MsgEn: The prince is still young, right? Yes, Prince Nedo—

MsgJp:
そう気を遣わなくていいさ
私だってそんな大層な人間じゃないからさ
昔ね、腕っぷしが強かっただけだよ――ハハハ
MsgEn: You don't have to worry about it because I'm not that extraordinary either. In the past, it was just that I was strong physically - Hahaha.

MsgJp:
あれ、あんたの仲間は
すでに道を拓いてるんじゃない？
MsgEn: Oh, your companions, aren't they already carving their own path?

MsgJp:
これなら仲間の力をたどって
一時的に道を開くことができそうだよ
MsgEn:
If you follow the power of your companions
you may be able to temporarily open the path

MsgJp: 通常開拓する
MsgEn: Explore normally.

MsgJp: 仲間の力をたどる
MsgEn: Follow the power of your companion

MsgJp:
ふふ、ごきげんよう
遠いところからやってきた覚者さん
MsgEn: Ah, good day. You, the Arisen who has come from a distant place.

MsgJp:
ねぇ、もうわかってるんでしょう？
この辺りに散らばった力を集めて
わたしにくれないかしら
MsgEn:
Hey, you already know the answer to that, don't you?
You're going to gather all the power scattered around here and give it to me.

MsgJp:
今のわたしたちは
こうして姿を現すだけで精一杯――
だけど、あなたに協力したいのよ
MsgEn:
Right now we're doing our best just showing up like this--
but we want to help you!

MsgJp:
ありがとう、少しの間動くなら
これで十分よ
MsgEn: Thanks, if it works for a little while, this should be enough.

MsgJp:
さて、あなたにはもっと深くまで
行ってもらわないとね――
MsgEn: Now, I need you to go deeper—

MsgJp:
あなたに協力することが
王家のためになるはずですもの
さぁ、邪魔な土砂は吹っ飛ばしてしまいましょう
MsgEn: It should be beneficial for the royal family for me to assist you. Now, let's blow away that obstruction.

MsgJp:
土砂を片付けたわよ
これなら通れるでしょう？
MsgEn: I've cleared away the debris. This should be passable, right?

MsgJp:
あなたの力を見込んで言うわ
もっと深くまで、諦めずに進んでね
MsgEn: I'll say this, counting on your strength, go deeper without giving up.

MsgJp:
エゴといわれても仕方ないけど――
まだ、この国の終わりをみたくは無いの
MsgEn: Call me egotistical, but-- I don't want to see the end of this country just yet.

MsgJp:
ごめんね、急いではいるんだけど
もう少しかかりそう――
MsgEn: I'm sorry, but I'm in a hurry, so it might take a little longer...

MsgJp:
だけど、きっとやり遂げるわ
あなたに協力することが
王家のためになるはずですもの
MsgEn:
But I'm sure we'll get it done.
Helping you will be for the good of the royal family.

MsgJp:
わたしたちがこうしていられるのも
ようするに、この地に充満した
竜力みたいなモノのお陰――
そういう力が溜まりやすいのよね、ここって
MsgEn: The reason we can exist like this is essentially because of the Dragon Force that pervades this place. It's easy for that kind of power to accumulate here.

MsgJp:
出られるものなら、わたしたちだって
ここを飛び出して行くわ――
でも、ここでしか姿を保てないんですもの
MsgEn: If we could go, we would also venture out of here— but we can only maintain our presence here.

MsgJp:
わたしはイゼル――
あなたはきっと、私の名をご存じないだろうけど
MsgEn: I am Isel-- You probably don't know my name.

MsgJp:
この弓で何度、王家を狙う不届き者を射抜いたことか
でも、今はそうすることもできないのよね
歯がゆいわ
MsgEn: Worrying is not in my nature. Let me go where the fighting is.

MsgJp:
あら、あなたのお仲間さんは
もう道を拓いているようね
MsgEn: Oh, looks like your fellow is already blazing a trail.

MsgJp:
お仲間さんの力をたどって
一時的に道を開くこともできるわよ
どうする？
MsgEn: We can temporarily open a path by following the power of your comrades. What do you want to do?

MsgJp: 通常開拓する
MsgEn: Explore normally

MsgJp: 仲間の力をたどる
MsgEn: Follow the power of your companion

MsgJp:
私はアッカー王家に仕えてきた
ダーマードという――
貴殿をこの先へ導こう
MsgEn:
I have served the Acre royal family.
My name is Damad.
I will guide you from now on.

MsgJp:
ほこらの中にただよう力を
私の元まで集めてきてくれないか
さすれば、ここを埋める土砂を一掃してみせよう
MsgEn: Gather the power that lies within the dust and come to me, and I will sweep away the sediment that fills this place!

MsgJp:
――よくやってくれた
これだけの力が戻れば
この道を拓く程度のことはできるだろう
MsgEn: You did well. If only this much strength can return, we should be able to clear this path.

MsgJp:
土砂を一掃し、二度とこの道が
埋まらぬよう力を尽くそう
かつて王の剣であったこの魂にかけても
MsgEn: Let's clear away the debris and do our best to ensure this path won't be blocked again. I swear it on the soul of the sword that once belonged to the king.

MsgJp:
先へ進むといい、白き竜の覚者よ
アッカーシェランにかかる霧を払ってくれ
MsgEn: Go ahead, White Dragon's Arisen, and dispel the fog that hangs over Acre Selund.

MsgJp:
道を通すまでの間
しばし待つことだ、白き竜の覚者よ
MsgEn: Until the road is cleared, it is necessary to wait for a while, O Arisen of the White Dragon.

MsgJp:
この道は必ず拓いてみせる
かつて王の剣であったこの魂にかけても
MsgEn:
I will definitely open up this path.
I swear on the soul that once belonged to the king's sword.

MsgJp:
貴殿が力を求め、《英霊眠りし道》を
訪れたこと――我らにとって僥倖であった
MsgEn: Your visit to the Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path, in search of power, was fortunate for us.

MsgJp:
ご存命の王族は
ネド王子ただお一人、か――
MsgEn: The only surviving member of the royal family is Prince Nedo.

MsgJp:
この道をさらに進むことで
貴殿は力を得よう
私にできるのは、その道を拓くことのみ
MsgEn: By advancing further down this path, you will gain power. All I can do is pave the way for you.

MsgJp: 貴殿の仲間はすでに道を拓いている
MsgEn: Your comrades have already opened up the path.

MsgJp:
仲間の力をたどり、一時的に
この場を通ることも可能だろう
――貴殿の考えを聞こう
MsgEn:
It would be possible to trace the power of our friends and temporarily pass through this place.
--Let's hear your thoughts!

MsgJp: 通常開拓する
MsgEn: Explore normally

MsgJp: 仲間の力をたどる
MsgEn: Follow the power of your companion

MsgJp:
覚者さま、こちらはフェルヤナ地方の
《英霊眠りし道》です
MsgEn: Master Arisen, this is the Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path in the Feryana region.

MsgJp:
あの――
すでにご存じかとは思いますが
《英霊眠りし道》は特別な場所です
武具の準備が万端でないと、厳しいかと――
MsgEn:
Um--
I'm sure you already know this, but "Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path" is a special place.
If you don't have your armaments all ready, it's going to be tough--

MsgJp:
並の武具では、そう簡単に奥へは進めません
――そもそも土砂で埋まってもいます
どうにかして土砂を撤去できるなら、あるいは――
MsgEn: With ordinary equipment, it's not easy to advance deeper. Besides, it's buried in rubble. If there's any way to remove the debris, or perhaps...

MsgJp:
進まれるんですね、覚者さま
お気をつけて――
無事のお戻りを祈っております
MsgEn: You are making progress, Lord Arisen. Please take care. I pray for your safe return.

MsgJp:
開拓した場所から再突入できるようになりました！
きっと英霊のご加護のおかげですね
MsgEn: We can now re-enter the area from where we explored! I'm sure it's thanks to the blessings of the Heroic Spirit.

MsgJp: 開拓した場所から再突入されますか？
MsgEn: Do you want to re-enter the place after development?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
パーティーリーダーが行き先を
選ぶまでお待ちください――
MsgEn: Please wait for the party leader to choose the destination.

MsgJp:
パーティーリーダーがお待ちのようです
《英霊眠りし道》へ突入されますか？
MsgEn:
The party leader is waiting for you.
Would you like to enter "Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path"?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
覚者さま、まずは開拓状況や
装備品をご確認の上で進まれてはいかがでしょう？
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, first, would you like to check the development situation and equipment before proceeding?

MsgJp: 《英霊眠りし道》に入る
MsgEn: Enter 《Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path》

MsgJp: 開拓状況確認
MsgEn: Check Reclamation Status

MsgJp: 報酬取得状況確認
MsgEn: Check Acquired Rewards Status

MsgJp:
あれだけの土砂を
全て撤去されたのですね！
覚者の力というのは、我々には
想像も及ばないものです――
MsgEn: All that rubble has been completely cleared! The power of an Arisen is something beyond our imagination.

MsgJp:
全ての道を踏破した者には
最後の試練が待ち受けているそうです
MsgEn: According to those who have conquered all paths, there awaits the ultimate trial.

MsgJp:
ええ、信じがたいことですが――
開かずの扉が開いています
ここにまつわる伝承は、真実だったのですね
MsgEn: Yes, it's hard to believe, but the sealed door is open. The legends surrounding this place were indeed true!

MsgJp:
最後の試練に向かわれる時は
ぜひ、私に声をおかけください
出発の手筈を整えさせていただきますから
MsgEn: When you're ready to face the final trial, please don't hesitate to call on me. I'll make the necessary preparations for your departure.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、まずは開拓状況や
装備品をご確認の上で進まれてはいかがでしょう？
MsgEn:
Dear Arisen, first, would you like to check the development situation and equipment
before proceeding?

MsgJp: 《英霊眠りし道》に入る
MsgEn: Enter "Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path"

MsgJp: 開拓状況確認
MsgEn: Check Reclamation Status

MsgJp: 報酬取得状況確認
MsgEn: Check Acquired Rewards Status

MsgJp: 最後の試練に挑む
MsgEn: Challenge Final Ordeal

MsgJp:
――“最後の試練”がどのようなものか
知っている者はおりません
この地に伝わる伝承でも
“最後の試練”については語られていないのです
MsgEn: Nobody knows what the 'Final Ordeal' is like. Even the legends passed down in this place do not speak of the 'Final Ordeal.'

MsgJp:
しかし、私は――多分、他のみんなも――
覚者さまであれば、その“試練”も
乗り越えられることと信じております
MsgEn: However, I, and perhaps everyone else, believe that with the Arisen, even this "trial" can be overcome.

MsgJp:
それでは、お進みください
覚者さまのご武運をお祈りしています
MsgEn: With this bow, I've pierced many insolent people who aimed at the royal family. But now I can't do that anymore. It's frustrating.

MsgJp:
覚者さま！？
装備品をお間違えではないでしょうか――
MsgEn: Lord Arisen!? Your equipment, could it be a mistake—

MsgJp:
その、今お召しになっている武具で
この先に進むのは大変危険です
相応の装備でないと、ここを
お通しすることはできません
MsgEn: With the equipment you are currently wearing, it's very dangerous to proceed further. Without the appropriate gear, you won't be able to pass through here.

MsgJp:
伝承が本当なら――
私のような新兵一人が
ここの警備を任されるべきでは
ないと思うのですが――
MsgEn: If the legends are true, I don't think a rookie like me should be entrusted with guarding this place alone.

MsgJp:
《英霊眠りし道》はアッカーシェラン大陸の
各地にあるそうです――
いくつあるのか、ですか？
私はその、不勉強なんですが――
MsgEn: I've heard that there are "Heroic Spirit Sleeping Paths" scattered throughout the Acre Selund continent. How many are there, though? I'm not very knowledgeable about it...

MsgJp: なぜだか、ここは少し冷えます――
MsgEn: For some reason, it gets a little cold here--

MsgJp:
やあ、白き竜の覚者さん
アッカーシェランはどうだい
MsgEn: Hello, Arisen of the White Dragon. How is Acre Selund?

MsgJp:
さて、この土砂をどうにかしなきゃいけないな
近くに散らばった力を集めてきてくれないか？
MsgEn: Now, we need to figure out what to do with this earth and sand. Could you gather the scattered power nearby for me, please?

MsgJp:
俺たちの精神力――いや、魂というのかな
そういったものは、辺りを流れる竜力と
混じって曖昧なものになってるんだ
MsgEn: Our spiritual power - or soul, I guess you'd call it - is mixed up with the Dragon Force that flows around us, and it's all a blur.

MsgJp:
だから、一度俺自身が使える力として
集めてきてもらわないと動けなくてね
MsgEn: So, I can't move without first gathering power as something I can use myself.

MsgJp: よしよし、これで何とかなるはずだ
MsgEn: Good, good. This should work somehow.

MsgJp:
なに、君をこの先へ導くことが
王家のためになるというならば
土砂をどける程度のこと――
MsgEn: Well, if it's in the best interest of the royal family to lead you beyond the dirt and sand--

MsgJp:
ここにあった土砂か？
――恐らく、衝撃で吹き飛んでいったようだ
この先で土埃になって舞い散ってるんじゃないか？
MsgEn: Is this the sand and soil that was here? It seems like it was blown away by the impact. Could it be turning into dust and scattering ahead?

MsgJp:
ああ、俺のことは気にしなくていい
用が無くなれば、また眠りにつくことになる
早いとこ寝かせてくれよ、ハハハ
――この国を頼んだぜ
MsgEn: Oh, don't worry about me. When I have no more use for you, I'll go back to sleep. Let me sleep early, hahaha—I'm asking for this country, man!

MsgJp:
すまない、今は都合が悪いんだ
少し時間をおいてから
また来てくれないか
MsgEn:
I'm sorry, it's inconvenient for me right now.
Could you come back later, after some time?

MsgJp: 悪いね――
MsgEn: Sorry---

MsgJp:
おっと、君の仲間は
すでにこの先に行ったことがあるようだな
MsgEn:
Oops, it seems like your companions
have already gone ahead.

MsgJp:
仲間の力をたどって
一時的にここを通ることもできるが――
どうしたい？
MsgEn: You can temporarily pass through here by following the power of your comrades, but what do you want to do?

MsgJp: 通常開拓する
MsgEn: Explore normally

MsgJp: 仲間の力をたどる
MsgEn: Follow the power of your companion

MsgJp:
確かに生きてる頃は王の一番傍にいたし
それなりに国に尽くしたつもりだけど――
俺はいわゆる“王の乳兄弟”ってやつでさ
MsgEn: I was the closest thing to the king when he was alive, and I've served the country in my own way, but-- I'm what you might call the "king's baby brother."

MsgJp:
歴史に名を残すような、ものすごいことを
成し遂げたわけじゃないと思うんだよな
まさか、こんなに丁寧に葬られることになるとはね
MsgEn: I don't think I've accomplished anything incredible that will be remembered in history. I never expected that I would be buried so carefully like this.

MsgJp:
ところで、君は死んだ人間と話すことに
慣れてるみたいに見えるな
MsgEn: By the way, you seem accustomed to talking to the deceased.

MsgJp: 君を巻き込んですまないと思ってるんだ、俺は
MsgEn: I'm sorry for involving you, I am

MsgJp:
おお――
異大陸の覚者様
ようこそここまでいらっしゃいました
MsgEn:
Oh--
Dear Arisen of Another Continent.
Welcome to this place!

MsgJp:
申し上げにくいことですが、覚者様に
ご協力するための“力”を
集めてきていただかねばなりません
MsgEn: I am sorry to say this, but we need you to go and gather the "power" to help us!

MsgJp:
我々の存在は今や希薄なものです
どうぞよろしくお願いします
あなた様の道を拓くためなのです――
MsgEn:
Our existence is now rare. 
Nice to meet you!
We are here to pave the way for you--

MsgJp:
確かに――
さぁ、先へお進みください
MsgEn:
Certainly--
Now, please proceed!

MsgJp:
この道が通れるようになったことも、ひいては
あなた様ご自身のお力によるものです
そのお力で――幼き王子をよろしくお願いします
MsgEn:
The fact that this road is passable is, in turn, due to your own strength.
With that strength - please take care of the little prince!

MsgJp:
どうぞ、先へお進みください
この道は二度と土砂に埋まることはないでしょう
MsgEn:
Please, continue ahead.
This path will never be buried in sand and earth again.

MsgJp:
申し訳ございません、今は――
少し時間をおいてから
おいでください
MsgEn: I apologize, please come back after a few hours.

MsgJp:
異大陸の覚者様
お仲間はすでにこの先を
通っていらっしゃるようです
MsgEn: Arisen from a different land. It seems that your companions have already passed through this point.

MsgJp:
お仲間の跡を辿り、この場でのみ
先へ行くことも可能です
いかがいたしましょう？
MsgEn: You can also follow your comrades' trail and proceed further from this place alone. What would you like to do?

MsgJp: 通常開拓する
MsgEn: Explore normally

MsgJp: 仲間の力をたどる
MsgEn: Follow the power of your companion

MsgJp:
ネド王子――
御年12歳の王子に
なんと過酷な運命でしょう――
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo--
What a harsh fate for a prince of 12 years of age--

MsgJp:
ネド王子に寄り添い、お支えする者すら
いないままとは――
なんという――
MsgEn: To think there is no one to be by Prince Ned's side and support him... What a situation...

MsgJp:
ネド王子は――
まだ、覚者となるには
あまりにも早すぎました
MsgEn:
Prince Nedo――
it was still too early for him to become an Arisen.

MsgJp:
来たわね、白き翼の加護を得し覚者さん
さ、どうする？
MsgEn: You're finally here; the Arisen who received the protection of the white wings. So, what will you do?

MsgJp:
ここまでお疲れ様！
だけど、あなたたちはもっともっと先に
進まないといけない――
MsgEn:
Good job so far!
But you guys need to go on much, much further--

MsgJp:
もうわかってるわよね？
私がここの土砂を片付けてあげるから
そのための力を集めてきてちょうだい
MsgEn:
You already know that, don't you?
I'll clean up the sediment here for you.
Go gather the strength to do so.

MsgJp:
うん、ありがとう
おかげで私も、もう一働きできたわ
MsgEn: Yes, thank you. Thanks to you, I was able to work one more shift.

MsgJp:
――こういうの、本当は
よその国の人に任せるべきじゃないと
思うんだけどさ
MsgEn: I really don't think that this kind of thing should be left to people from other countries.

MsgJp:
だけど、今戦うことができる覚者は
あなたしかいない――
だから、頼んだわね
MsgEn: But, the only one who can fight now is the Arisen―― So, I'm counting on you.

MsgJp:
さぁ、行ってちょうだい
あなたが力を得ることが
この国の未来に繋がるんだから
MsgEn: Go ahead, go ahead. Your empowerment is the future of this country.

MsgJp: ごめんね、今手一杯なんだ――
MsgEn: Sorry, I've got my hands full right now—

MsgJp: また時間置いてから来てよ！
MsgEn: Come back after some time!

MsgJp:
ふぅん、あなたのお友達は
もうこの先に行ってるみたいよ
MsgEn: Hmm, it seems like your friends have already moved on ahead.

MsgJp:
お友達の力をたどって、一時的に
あなたもこの先へ行けるけど
