MsgEn: Recently, there has been a sudden influx of adventurers and bandits gathering around the ruins, making it lively around here!

MsgJp:
ささ、酒場で景気よく飲み食いし
金を落としてゾマを活気づけて下され！！
MsgEn: So, eat and drink at the bars, drop some money, and keep Zoma alive!

MsgJp: 少しだけ語らせてもらいますぞ
MsgEn: Let me tell you a little about it.

MsgJp:
今は禁じられた術、錬金術とよばれる技が
メルゴダでは盛んに研究されてましてな
MsgEn: A technique now forbidden, called alchemy, is being actively studied in Mergoda.

MsgJp:
変な金属が埋め込まれた魔物達は
その時に兵隊として使われていた、
いわばメルゴダ民の使い魔なのだとか
MsgEn:
The monsters embedded with strange metal were reportedly used as soldiers at that time. 
So to speak, they were the Mergoda people's familiars.

MsgJp:
それも、元の生き物より格段に強く
改造されていたと言います
MsgEn: And they say that it was significantly stronger than the original creature after being modified.

MsgJp:
いやぁ、魔物を意のままに操りそれを
使役するなど、恐ろしくもあり素晴らしくもある！
驚きですな！
MsgEn: Oh, controlling monsters at will and using them as your own... It's both terrifying and amazing! Truly astonishing!

MsgJp:
おおお、結構結構！！
じっくり飲んで休んで英気を養って下され！
宿代はあなたの活躍で十分ですぞ
MsgEn:
Oh, oh, quite good, quite good!!
Take your time to drink and rest, and regain your heroic spirit!
The lodging fee is more than enough with your outstanding performance.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp: なに？　あたしに用？
MsgEn: What's up?　You wanted to see me?

MsgJp: 一攫千金狙いの馬鹿が多いんだよね
MsgEn: There are many idiots aiming for a quick fortune, you see.

MsgJp:
そういうヤツは大体大事なとこでポカを
するから、あたしは相手にしないことに
してるんだ
MsgEn: People like that tend to make big mistakes at important moments, so I choose not to deal with them.

MsgJp:
遺跡荒らしがスケルトンに、
なんて諺があるけどさ
あんたも気を付けなよ？
MsgEn: There is a proverb that says "From a grave robber to a skeleton," but hey, you should be careful too, right?

MsgJp:
あんた、そこそこ腕が立ちそうだね
もしかして、丘の上にある教会下の
墓地遺跡狙いかい？
MsgEn:
You seem to have some skills, huh?
Are you aiming for the cemetery ruins beneath the church on top of the hill, by any chance?

MsgJp:
あそこは馬鹿が何人も戻らなくなって
今は入れないんじゃなかったかね
MsgEn:
Over there, there were several foolish people who have stopped coming back.
I suppose it's now off-limits, isn't it?

MsgJp:
そうそう、ひとつ教えてあげる
東の谷――《奇岩谷》ってとこは
行かない方がいいよ
MsgEn: Oh, I have something to tell you. It's better not to go to the Eastern Valley, called the Odd Rock Valley.

MsgJp:
あそこ、気持ち悪いのがうようよ溜まってんの！
デロデロして、斬ったらびちゃびちゃ飛んでくるしで
ホント最悪！
MsgEn:
There, it's filled with disgusting things! 
It's all slimy and when you slash it, it splashes everywhere. It's truly the worst!

MsgJp: おう、へへっ、覚者か？
MsgEn: Oh, heheh, you're an Arisen, huh?

MsgJp:
白騎団をやってたんだが、退屈でこっちへ
ふらふら流れてきちまってな
俺ぁ本部じゃ行方不明のままかもしれねぇや
MsgEn:
I used to be part of the White Knights, but it got boring, so I ended up wandering over here. 
I've been drifting aimlessly, and I might still be considered missing at headquarters.

MsgJp: ゾマを守る騎士様ってのぁ俺のことよ！
MsgEn: The knight who protects Zoma is me!

MsgJp:
ハハッ、冗談冗談！
その役割はオリバーだな、間違いなく
MsgEn:
Haha, joking joking!
That role is Oliver, no doubt about it.

MsgJp:
酒を飲んで死なねぇ程度に遺跡荒らし
騎士より俺にゃそっちのが向いてるぜ
MsgEn:
I'm an archaeologist who drinks enough alcohol to not die.
I'm more suited for that than being a knight.

MsgJp: あぁ、なんだよなんだよ
MsgEn: Ah, what is it, what is it

MsgJp:
うぅ、いやだいやだ
古い遺物がざくざく手に入るって聞いたのに
とんでもないじゃないか！
MsgEn:
Ugh, I don't want this, I don't want this at all.
I heard that I could easily obtain ancient artifacts, but this is absolutely ridiculous!

MsgJp: 危なすぎるよここは！
MsgEn: This place is too dangerous!

MsgJp:
もう少し南で牧畜をやってたんだけど
良い儲け話があるなんてここへついてきたのが
間違いだったよ
MsgEn: I was doing livestock farming a little further south, but coming here thinking there was a good money-making opportunity was a mistake.

MsgJp: いいなぁ、あんた達は強そうで
MsgEn: You guys seem really strong, don't you?

MsgJp:
嫌な話ついでにだが、野盗の一派が
魔獣に何やら餌をやってるとこを見たんだよ
MsgEn:
By the way, I have some unpleasant news. 
I saw a group of bandits feeding something to a magical beast.

MsgJp:
黒くてけたたましい、羽根が生えたヤツだ
名前とかは分からんけど
MsgEn:
It's black and raucous and feathered.
I don't know what it's called or anything.

MsgJp:
そいつらは《ザンドラ灯台》の方に戻ってったよ
もしやあの魔獣でここを襲うつもりじゃ
ないだろうなぁ
MsgEn:
They returned towards Zandora Lighthouse.
Could it be that they intend to attack this place with that magical beast?
I hope not.

MsgJp:
よぉ、いらっしゃい！
遺跡でなんか手に入れたら引き取るぜ！
MsgEn: Hey there, welcome! If you find something in the ruins, I'll take care of it for you!

MsgJp:
ザンドラは面白いモノが多いだろー？
特に、俺は錬金術関係の
ヘンテコな遺物が気に入っててさ
MsgEn:
Zandora has many interesting things, right?
Especially, I really like the quirky alchemy-related relics.

MsgJp:
金になるのはモチロンだけど
なんかちょっとホラ、芸術？
って感じしないか
MsgEn: It's a money-maker, of course, but something a little hokey, art? It's a bit like art, isn't it?

MsgJp:
俺は行商をやっててさ、リンウッドやローテス
ほかにもいくつかの村に行ったけど
ここが一番だね！
MsgEn:
I'm working as a wandering merchant, you know. 
I've been to several villages like Lynwood and Rotes, but this one is the best!

MsgJp:
なんか良くわからない活気があって
居心地いいんだよな
MsgEn:
There's a vibrancy to it that I don't really understand.
It's very cozy.

MsgJp:
やっぱ遺跡はロマンだよな！
ドリード城や禊の神殿もいいけどさ
より未知であるほど燃えるよな！
MsgEn:
Indeed, ruins are full of romance, aren't they? 
Dreed Castle and the Temple of Purification are great, but the more unknown they are, the more thrilling they become!

MsgJp:
《東ザンドラ廃墟群》は知ってるかい？
昔の住居が遺跡んなって残ってるんだ
ちょうど、ゾマから坂を上っていったとこだよ
MsgEn:
Do you know about the East Zandora Ruins? 
It's where the old residences have become ancient relics. 
It's right up the hill from Zoma.

MsgJp:
そこの遺跡は今でも結構、旧時代の遺物やら
何やらが見つかるらしいんだよね
まだまだスゴイのが眠ってんじゃないかなぁ
MsgEn:
I hear you can still find relics and things from the old days at the ruins there.
I wonder if there are still some amazing things lying around.

MsgJp: うむ、何か言ったか？
MsgEn: Mm, what did you say?

MsgJp:
うむ――どうすればオリバー殿は
私の弟子入りを認めて下さるのか
MsgEn: Hmm... How can I make Lord Oliver accept me as his disciple?

MsgJp:
例えばそうだな、恐ろしい噂のある
《呪詛の庭》に現れるという闇の使いを
倒すことができれば――あるいは――
MsgEn: For example, if you manage to defeat the darkness envoy that appears in the "Garden of Curses," a place with terrifying rumors, then - perhaps - you will be able to...

MsgJp:
いやしかし、それだけの腕がすでにあるなら
そもそも弟子入りの必要はないような――
うむ――悩ましいな
MsgEn:
However, if you already have such skills, there might be no need to become a disciple---
Hmm, it's quite a dilemma.

MsgJp:
ふぅ
どうも私はここの雰囲気が苦手だ
MsgEn: Phew. I really don't like the atmosphere here.

MsgJp:
ひっきりなしに声を掛けられて
落ち着いて食事もできない
MsgEn: Being constantly approached and unable to have a peaceful meal.

MsgJp:
私はこれでも一介の剣士
墓荒らしではない
剣の技を求めてここへ来た
MsgEn:
I am just a swordsman, not a grave robber.
I came here in search of swordsmanship.

MsgJp: オリバー殿の太刀筋を見るためにな
MsgEn: To witness the swordsmanship of Lord Oliver.

MsgJp: オリバー殿は類稀なる剛剣の使い手
MsgEn: Lord Oliver is a skillful wielder of a rare fortified sword.

MsgJp:
私はあの方に認められるまで
ここに滞在し己の技を磨こうと思う
MsgEn: I'm going to stay here and hone my craft until he approves.

MsgJp:
――ほう、ほうほう！
良いッ！　良いぞおぬしッ！！
MsgEn: Oh, I see, I see! Well done! Excellent, my good sir!

MsgJp:
あの偏屈ながら確かな目を持つ
ナディアが認めたということは
この東ザンドラで相当の死合いを
くぐり抜けてきたと見える！
MsgEn: The fact that even Nadia, with her eccentric yet keen eyes, has acknowledged it means they must have endured some serious battles here in East Zandora!

MsgJp: おぬし、《ウォリアー》を志してはみんか？
MsgEn: Are ye aspiring to be a Warrior?

MsgJp:
両手に握りしめたエモノに
渾身の力を込め、溜め、振り下ろすッ！！
それは世界の中心は我が両腕と思えるほどの
恍惚の時ッ！！
MsgEn:
With a firm grasp on it in both hands, I gather all my strength, concentrate and swing down!!
It is a moment of ecstasy so intense that I feel the world revolves around my arms.

MsgJp:
――おおおおッ！
今、鼻の穴が開いたな！？
そうだ！！　そうこなくてはッ！
MsgEn:
――Ohhh! My nostrils are flaring! 
Is it true?! Yes! 
It has to be like this!

MsgJp:
遠慮することはない！
我が課題に挑戦するが良い！
MsgEn:
There is no need to hold back!
You should challenge yourself to tackle my task!

MsgJp:
さすればこのオリバー
おぬしを《ウォリアー》として、さらなる
強者の高みに推し上げてくれるッ！！！
MsgEn: Then this Oliver will take you as a "Warrior" and propel you to even greater heights of strength!

MsgJp:
フハハハハッ！！
どうした、声が小さいぞ！！
MsgEn:
Hahahahaha!
What's the matter, your voice is so quiet!

MsgJp:
より強く、より熱く、そしてより激しくッ！！
剣を振れば振るうほど、その頂きが
いかに遠いか思い知る日々よッ！
MsgEn:
Stronger, hotter, and fiercer!
The more I swing my sword, the more I realize how far away the top is!

MsgJp: そうは思わないか！？　ん？
MsgEn: Don't you think so?! Hm?

MsgJp:
うむ！　おぬしはなかなかの猛者と見たッ！！
どうだこのゾマは！！
MsgEn:
Indeed! I see you are quite the formidable warrior!! 
How about this Zoma!!

MsgJp: 腕を磨くには持って来いだろう！？
MsgEn: It would be perfect to enhance your skills, wouldn't it!?

MsgJp:
むううううんッ！！
コロッサスもキメラももはや物足りん！！
MsgEn:
Muuuuunnnn!
Colossus and Chimera are no longer enough!

MsgJp:
我が死合いの相手が務まるは
古のカラクリ人形くらいのものか！
MsgEn:
Is there anyone capable of facing me in battle?
Someone as skilled as an ancient clockwork doll!

MsgJp:
おぬし、受けた傷の痛みは忘れんと
いう気概はあるか！？
MsgEn: Do you have the determination not to forget the pain of the wounds you've received!?

MsgJp:
《ウォリアー》たるもの、わが身に受けし
痛みは倍返しが要！
MsgEn: As a Warrior, I have to take it in my body and double the pain!

MsgJp:
フハハハハハッ！！
うむ、おぬしの覚悟、しかと認めたりッ！
MsgEn: Hahaha! Arisen, I have duly recognized your resolve!

MsgJp:
《ウォリアー》として剛の剣を振るうに
相応しい気概、気に入ったぞ！
MsgEn: As a Warrior, wielding a mighty sword with the appropriate determination, I am pleased with your spirit!

MsgJp:
敵を倒す！　食らいついてでも倒す！
受けた痛みは倍返しで叩き潰すッ！！
MsgEn:
Defeat the enemy! 
Even if it means sinking your teeth into them, bring them down! 
The pain endured will be returned twofold as you crush them!!

MsgJp:
《ウォリアー》なれば、最強の強者を
目指し死合う事こそ、本望であり本分
MsgEn:
To become a Warrior and strive for battle
Is my true wish and duty
To become the strongest of the strong

MsgJp:
ファイターとは根本的に違う生き物だという
ことを、心にしかと叩き込めッ！！
MsgEn: Impress upon your heart that a Fighter is fundamentally a different being!!

MsgJp:
おおおおッ！！
良い面構えになってきたなッ！
おぬしの筋肉も気合で震えておるわ！
MsgEn:
Ohhhhhh!!
You're starting to look good!
Your muscles are trembling with fighting spirit!

MsgJp:
よぉーしッ！　おぬしに我が剛剣の業を
一つ伝授してやる
薙ぎ払い、敵を打ち砕くのだッ！！
MsgEn:
Alright!! I shall bestow upon you the skill of my mighty sword. 
Learn to strike down your enemies and crush them!

MsgJp:
ファイターとは異なる剛の剣、それが
《ウォリアー》よッ！！
MsgEn:
A sword of Strength, distinct from a Fighter;
that is the Warrior!!

MsgJp:
盾など不要！　敵にぶつかり叩き潰すッ！
そして受けた痛みは闘志に変えて叩き返すッ！！
MsgEn:
No need for a shield! Crush the enemy by crashing into them!
And turn the pain you receive into fighting spirit to strike back!

MsgJp:
その生きざまをよしとするなら
共に振りかぶろうではないか！
ぶ厚き刃を、力の限り！！
MsgEn:
If you approve of that way of life, let's wield it together!
Let's swing our thick blades with all our might!

MsgJp:
ううううむッ、おぬし！
全身に漲るその闘気、ただならぬ気迫！
大したものよッ！
MsgEn:
My goodness, it's you! 
The fighting spirit that fills your whole body, such extraordinary determination! 
You're quite something!

MsgJp:
――良い、良いぞォッ！！
フッフフフ、我が剛剣の奥義、おぬしになら
伝授してくれよう
MsgEn:
Good, good job!
Hah, I shall teach you the secret technique of my formidable sword!

MsgJp:
そしてさらに腕を磨き、我が最高の好敵手
として育つが良いッ！
さぁッ、体得せよッ！！
MsgEn:
Then hone your skills further and grow up to be my best opponent!
Now, learn it!

MsgJp:
おおお！！
鋭き眼光、鈍く光りしおぬしのエモノ――！
おぬし、《ウォリアー》を極めんと志すのだな！
MsgEn:
Ohhh!! 
The sharp gaze, the dull glimmer of your eyes, you are a Warrior, aspiring to master it!

MsgJp:
よくぞ踏み出した！！
これからおぬしが歩みしは
真なる強者への覇道ッ！！
MsgEn:
Congratulations on taking the first step!!
From now on, the path you tread leads to becoming a true conqueror!!

MsgJp:
向かう所の敵全て薙ぎ、倒し、砕くっ！！
鉄と血の道よ！！
MsgEn:
Cleave, defeat, and crush all enemies in your path!!
The way of iron and blood!!

MsgJp:
――おおおおッ！
今、鼻の穴が開いたな！？
そうだ！！　そうこなくてはッ！
MsgEn:
――Ohhh! My nostrils are flaring! 
Is it true?! Yes! 
It has to be like this!

MsgJp:
遠慮することはない！
我が課題に挑戦するが良い！
MsgEn:
There is no need to hold back!
You should challenge yourself to tackle my task!

MsgJp:
さすればこのオリバー
おぬしを《ウォリアー》として、さらなる
強者の高みに推し上げてくれるッ！！！
MsgEn: Then this Oliver will take you as a "Warrior" and propel you to even greater heights of strength!

MsgJp:
さぁッ、遠慮することはない！
共に試練を越え歩もうではないか！
強者の頂きへッ！！
MsgEn:
Now, there's no need to hold back!
Let's overcome trials together and move forward!
To the peak of the mighty!!

MsgJp:
おお、あの偏屈ながら確かな目を持つ
ナディアに認められし戦士というのは
おぬしか！
MsgEn: Oh, that eccentric yet perceptive warrior recognized by Nadia, could it be you?!

MsgJp:
ほうほう、ふむふむ！
なかなかどうして気張っているようだな！
MsgEn:
Hmmm... hmmm... hmmm... hmmm... hmmm... hmmm!
You seem to be quite determined!

MsgJp:
――が、まだまだだ！
おぬしが《ウォリアー》として真の強者を
目指すなら、まずは自力で
ジョブレベル１８に至るのだッ！！
MsgEn:
- However, you still have a long way to go!!
If you aspire to be a true strong warrior, first of all, strive to reach Level 18 in your job by your own effort!!

MsgJp:
しかる後、おぬしの戦いぶりを見てきた
訓練官から新たな修練への太鼓判を
もらうがいい！
MsgEn: Afterwards, you should receive the trainer's endorsement for further training, having witnessed your fighting style!

MsgJp:
おぬしが我が前に現れるのを
楽しみに待っているぞッ！
MsgEn: I eagerly await your appearance before me!

MsgJp:
ほほう！　その力コブに強き眼光――
すでに基本の心得は掴んだと見た
レベルとしては十分よッ！
MsgEn:
Oh ho! That strong gaze of yours, focused on your goal.
I can see that you have already grasped the basics.
As far as levels go, you are more than sufficient!

MsgJp:
《ウォリアー》としての道を究めんとするならば
おぬしの戦いぶりを見てきた
訓練官から新たな修練への太鼓判を
もらうがいい！
MsgEn: If you seek to master the path of the 'Warrior,' then you should receive the trainer's endorsement for further training, having witnessed your fighting style!

MsgJp:
しかる後、我が前に戻れ！
その時こそ真のウォリアーとしての
一歩が始まるのだッ！！
MsgEn:
Afterwards, return before me!
That is when the true Warrior's first step begins!!

MsgJp: ウフ！　お飲み物はいかが？
MsgEn: Ah! Would you like something to drink?

MsgJp:
美味しい食事にお飲み物！
今日は休んで騒いで
また明日、冒険を頑張ってねぇ！
MsgEn:
A delicious meal with a beverage! 
Take a break today and have some fun. And tomorrow, have an adventure and give it your best!

MsgJp:
リキュールのブレンド、絶賛研究中よ！
意外な物がお酒の隠し味になるんだから
MsgEn:
I'm currently conducting research on blending liqueurs!
Unexpected ingredients can become a hidden flavor in alcohol, you know.

MsgJp:
あらステキ！　逞しい身体ね
惚れ惚れしちゃうなぁ～
MsgEn:
Wonderful! 
You have a strong body. 
It's mesmerizing.

MsgJp:
あら――
死と名誉、欲とロマンのザンドラ東部へようこそ
神殿付の真面目さん
MsgEn:
Oh, the serious person from the temple-
Welcome to Eastern Zandora, a place of death and honor, desire and romance.

MsgJp:
私はナディア
このゾマ周辺のエリアマスターをしているの
MsgEn:
My name is Nadia.
I am the Area Master of this area of Zoma.

MsgJp:
見てのとおり、ここは危険に満ちた土地
だからこそ強い人を惹きつけ
そして相応しい者をより輝かせる――
MsgEn: As you can see, this is a land filled with danger. And thus, it attracts strong individuals and makes those who are worthy shine even brighter-

MsgJp: もしくは、朽ちて彷徨う死者の１人にする――
MsgEn: Or make them one of the wandering dead -

MsgJp:
貴方はどうかしらね？
さぁ、精一杯駆けまわって見せて
MsgEn:
How about you?
Come on, let's see you run around as much as you can.

MsgJp: 諸々のご協力感謝するわ
MsgEn: I appreciate all of your assistance.

MsgJp:
貴方は面白い人だから
次からの支援品に色をつけてあげるわね
だから、もっといろいろして見せて頂戴――
MsgEn:
You are an interesting person, so I will add some color to the next support goods for you.
Therefore, please show me more of your various talents.

MsgJp:
ねぇ。ザンドラ禁域へ続く《奇岩谷》の
ガレキが除去されて、通行可能になったわよ
それは良かったんだけど、道中に
気味の悪い魔物がはびこっているの
MsgEn:
Hey. 
The debris in the "Odd Rock Valley" that leads to the forbidden zone of Zandora has been removed, making it passable. 
That's good news, but there are creepy enemies lurking along the way.

MsgJp:
どうしてかしら
あの辺りは、そういった魔物が湧きやすい
らしくてね
MsgEn: I wonder why that area is said to be prone to the emergence of such enemies.

MsgJp:
不快だし、ロマンの地には似つかわしくない
魔物だし――
見かけたら掃除しておいてくれないかしら
MsgEn:
It's unpleasant and not suitable for a romantic place.
Because it's an enemy —
Could you please clean it up if you see it?

MsgJp: ザンドラでの冒険、慣れてきたようね
MsgEn: Adventure in Zandora, you seem to be getting used to it, don't you?

MsgJp:
貴方にもっと輝いてもらうために
紹介したい人がいるの
MsgEn: To make you shine even more, There's someone I want to introduce to you.

MsgJp:
《オズワルドの店》に滞在している大剣豪
《ウォリアー》のジョブマスター、オリバーよ
MsgEn: To the esteemed Job Master of the Warrior, Oliver, staying at Oswald's Shop.

MsgJp:
あらゆるものを薙ぎ払い
打ち砕く剛き一撃――
MsgEn: Striking down and crushing everything with a mighty blow—

MsgJp:
きっと貴方なら、その戦い方も
使いこなせると思うわ
MsgEn: I'm sure you'll be able to use that fighting style too!

MsgJp:
――ふふ、弟子入りの順番待ちをしてる
ソーニャには悪いけどね
MsgEn: Hehe, I feel sorry for Sonia, who's waiting her turn to become an apprentice.

MsgJp:
《ウォリアー》として
さらなる輝きを得たければ、会ってみて
MsgEn: If you want to achieve even more brilliance as a Warrior, meet me and see for yourself.

MsgJp:
そうだわ
セラー湖の岸辺にある《禊の神殿　離殿》は
通ったことがあるかしら？
MsgEn:
I see. 
Have you ever been to the Temple of Purification: South Chamber on the shores of Lake Cera?

MsgJp:
あの建物には地下があってね――
《湖底連絡路》という、セラー湖の底を
巡るように繋がれた水路よ
MsgEn: In that building, there is an underground passage, called the "Lakebottom Connecting Passage," which connects the bottom of Lake Cera like a canal.

MsgJp:
あまりに広く、探索にいって迷う人が
多いから封鎖していたのだけれど
もしかしたら変わった魔物や財宝が
眠ってる――かもしれないわね
MsgEn:
Because so many people get lost when they go exploring, we've had it blocked off.
But there might be unique enemies and treasures that are sleeping there— maybe.

MsgJp:
入り口、入れるようにしておくわ
興味があったらご自由にどうぞ――ふふ
MsgEn:
I will make sure to leave the entrance open for you.
Feel free to come in if you're interested―― hehe

MsgJp:
すごい活躍ね
酒場でも貴方の噂をよく耳にするわ
MsgEn:
You're doing great!
I often hear rumors about you at the Tavern.

MsgJp:
ここが活気づいてきたのも
貴方のお陰かしら
MsgEn: Is it thanks to you that this place has become lively?

MsgJp:
支援品に色をつけてあげるわ
これからも頼むわね
MsgEn:
I'll add some color to your support items.
Keep up the good work.

MsgJp:
そうだわ、ちょっと気になることがあってね
貴方の力をあてにさせてもらいたいの
MsgEn: Yes, I'm a little concerned about something and I'd like to count on your help.

MsgJp:
《東ザンドラ廃墟群》――
丘を少し登った遺跡街に
炎を纏ったゴーレムが現れたの
MsgEn: "East Zandora Ruins" - As I approached the ancient city on top of the hill, a Golem clad in flames appeared.

MsgJp:
突然どうして現れたのかしら
誰かが遺跡にあった起動装置を
動かしでもしたのかしら
MsgEn:
I wonder why it suddenly appeared. 
Did someone activate the power device that was in the ruins, perhaps?

MsgJp:
で、そのゴーレムがどうもゾマの方へ
向かうそぶりを見せているらしいのよ
怖いわね――ふふ
MsgEn:
And so, it seems that the Golem is showing signs of heading towards Zoma. 
How scary... hehe

MsgJp:
というわけで、何とかしてくれないかしら
正式なお願いよ
MsgEn:
So please do something about it.
It's a formal request.

MsgJp:
ねぇ、そういえば
この地の北にある《ザンドラ灯台》のことは
知ってる？
MsgEn: Hey, speaking of which, do you know about the Zandora Lighthouse located to the north of this area?

MsgJp:
灯台で、バルバロイの一派が魔獣を
飼いはじめたようなの
MsgEn: It seems like the faction of Barbarians has started keeping magical beasts at the lighthouse.

MsgJp:
噂によれば、トサカと大きな黒い翼を
持つ魔物らしいわ
MsgEn: According to rumors, it seems to be an enemy with a crest and large black wings.

MsgJp:
灯台や廃墟群にいる間はいいけれど
野蛮なバルバロイ達がゾマにきたら厄介だわ
MsgEn: While I'm at the lighthouse or in the ruins, it's fine, but it would be troublesome if those barbarians come to Zoma.

MsgJp:
誰か強い人が――
何とかしてくれないかしら
ねぇ――？
MsgEn:
Is there anyone strong-
Who could do something, I wonder?
Hey-?

MsgJp:
本当に大したものだわ
荒くれ者ばかりのゾマで
貴方ほど探索と戦いの両方に長けた人は
見たことがない
MsgEn:
You're really something, aren't you?
In the rough Zoma where there are only thugs, I have never seen anyone as skilled as you in both exploration and battle.

MsgJp:
貴方と知り合えて、嬉しく思うわ
報酬というのもおこがましいけれど
これからは他の人とは違う、特別な支援を
してあげる――
MsgEn:
I am happy to have met you, although it feels presumptuous to talk about rewards.
From now on, I will provide you with special support that is different from anyone else's.

MsgJp:
私自身も惹かれてしまいそうね
ふふ――
MsgEn:
I myself am also drawn to it, it seems.
Hehe...

MsgJp:
ねぇ――
死者の丘、ゾマの裏手に広がる
高台に《呪詛の庭》と呼ばれる場所があるの
MsgEn:
Hey—
At the back of Zoma, on a hill called the Hill of the Dead, There is a place called the "Garden of Curses."

MsgJp:
人の恨みと死者の魂を吸い
得体の知れぬ“実”をぶらさげた木々が
茂る、《虚ろの祠》に接した庭よ
MsgEn:
In the garden that adjoins the "Shrine of Emptiness",
Trees hung with mysterious "seeds" that absorb the grudges of people and the souls of the deceased flourish.

MsgJp:
そこでね、先日祠に盗掘にいった人達が
皆殺しにされたの
MsgEn: So you know, the people who went to desecrate the shrine the other day were all killed.

MsgJp:
何が彼らの命を奪ったのかしらね――
気になると思わない？
MsgEn:
I wonder what took their lives--
Don't you think it's curious?

MsgJp:
そろそろあなたに
きちんと依頼を出してみようかしら
MsgEn: Perhaps it's about time I properly request something from you.

MsgJp:
私が頼みたいのは
死者の丘、最大の謎――
“亡霊騎士と呪いの秘宝”の解明なの
MsgEn:
I'm asking you to help me solve the greatest mystery of the Hill of the Dead--
"The Ghost Knight and the Cursed Treasure".

MsgJp:
その秘宝があると言われているのは
ザンドラ礼拝堂の地下に広がる
《死王の迷宮》よ
MsgEn: It is said that the secret treasure is located in the underground of Zandora Chapel, spread out in the Dead Lord's Labyrinth.

MsgJp:
――私はその奥に何があるのか
知りたいの
MsgEn: --I want to know what's behind it

MsgJp:
そのためだけに
ここで貴方のような人を待ちながら
エリアマスターをしてきたのかも――
MsgEn: Perhaps, it was for the sake of waiting for someone like you here that I became an Area Master.

MsgJp:
でも、あそこは冗談抜きで危険な場所
挑むかどうかは貴方に委ねるわ
MsgEn:
But that's a dangerous place, no joke.
I'll leave it up to you to decide if you want to take on the challenge.

MsgJp:
本当に大したものだわ
荒くれ者ばかりのゾマで、貴方ほど
探索と戦いの両方に長けた人は見たことがない
MsgEn:
You're really something, aren't you?
In the rough Zoma where there are only thugs, I have never seen anyone as skilled as you in both exploration and battle.

MsgJp:
貴方と知り合えて、嬉しく思うわ
報酬というのもおこがましいけれど
これを持って行って
MsgEn:
I am happy to have met you, although it feels presumptuous to talk about rewards. 
From now on, I will provide you with special support that is different from anyone else's.

MsgJp:
――ん、私自身も惹かれてしまいそう
ふふ――
MsgEn:
I myself am also drawn to it, it seems.
Hehe...

MsgJp:
すごい活躍だそうね
酒場でも貴方の噂をよく耳にするわ
MsgEn: I often hear rumors about your great achievements. Your fame reaches even the Tavern.

MsgJp:
ここが活気づいてきたのも貴方のお陰かしら
はい、このところの働きへの贈り物よ
また頼むわね
MsgEn:
Is it thanks to you that this place has become lively, I wonder? 
Yes, this is a gift for your recent work. 
I will rely on you again.

MsgJp:
諸々のご協力感謝するわ
はい、これを受け取って
ゾマを代表して私から、あなたへの贈り物よ
MsgEn:
Thanks for all your help.
Yes, take this.
My gift to you on behalf of Zoma.

MsgJp:
――逞しい人って、素敵
いつも良くしてくれるあなたには
これを進呈するわ
MsgEn:
A reliable person is wonderful, isn't it? 
For always treating me well, I offer this to you.

MsgJp:
あなたにだけ特別よ――
他の連中には内緒ね
MsgEn: This is just for you— It's a secret from the others.

MsgJp: いつでも待っているわ、ふふ――
MsgEn: Any time, I'll be waiting, hehe...

MsgJp:
はい、今回の支援品よ
貴方には粗品じゃ物足りないだろうと思って
少しグレードを上げてみたわ
MsgEn:
Yes, this time's support goods.
I thought regular goods wouldn't be enough for you, so I upgraded them a bit.

MsgJp: 役に立てて頂戴
MsgEn: Please make use of it.

MsgJp:
ちょうど今日は、探索者の支援日なの
これ、差し入れよ、使ってちょうだい
MsgEn: Today is the day of support for adventurers. Here, please take this as a treat and use it.

MsgJp:
ゾマにようこそ
何か相談事かしら
MsgEn:
Welcome to Zoma.
Is there something you wish to discuss?

MsgJp:
ふふ――
私はここに集う人達を見るのが好き
MsgEn:
Hehe...
I like seeing the people gathered here.

MsgJp:
野望とか夢とか、ロマンとか力試しとか
そんな漠然としたモノに酔ってる人達って
可愛いと思わない？
MsgEn: Don't you think people who are intoxicated by such vague things like ambition, dreams, romance, and tests of strength are adorable?

MsgJp:
チャンスの一欠片を、少しでも多くの人に
伝えてあげたいの
ここには、そういう話が集まるから
MsgEn:
I want to convey a fragment of a chance to as many people as possible.
Because stories like that gather here.

MsgJp:
ゾマにはもっと華やかに、より危険に
なってもらいたいわ
そして、ぎらぎらした人を呼び込むの
MsgEn:
I want Zoma to become more glamorous and dangerous.
And thus, attract dazzling people.

MsgJp:
そういう人の中から、失われた黄金郷へ
真に辿りつける人が出るかもしれないから
MsgEn: Because among such people, there might be someone who can truly reach the lost golden paradise.

MsgJp: そして、深い迷宮の奥にもね――
MsgEn: And thus, even in the depths of a profound labyrinth...

MsgJp:
《辺境の礎》ってあるわよね
この辺りにあるソレが全て使えるようになったそうよ
ついさっき、神殿からの使いがそう言っていたわ
MsgEn:
There's a "Sub Portcrystal".
 It seems like everything around here can be used now. 
Just a moment ago, a messenger from the temple said so.

MsgJp:
不便だったところへも一瞬で移動できる
優れものだと聞いたけど――
何だか無粋だわ
MsgEn:
I've heard it's great to get to places that were inconvenient in an instant, but--
it's kind of tacky.

MsgJp:
私はね、ザンドラ東部に来たのなら自分の足で
移動してほしいと思ってるのよ
この荒れ地に転がる数々のロマンの欠片を
見落としてほしくないもの――
MsgEn:
You know, if you've come to Eastern Zandora, I'd like you to move on your own. 
I don't want you to miss the scattered fragments of romance that lie in this wild land—

MsgJp:
ねぇ――最近、ここから東の方で
大きな鎧が暴れているらしいのよ――
MsgEn: Hey... Lately, it seems like there's a big armor causing trouble somewhere east from here...

MsgJp:
きっと何らかの魔力で操られた鎧が
あの場所に染みついた死臭に導かれて
やって来たのね
MsgEn: The armor, likely manipulated by some kind of magic, has come to that place guided by the stench of death that permeates it.

MsgJp:
ふふ、この辺りでは珍しいことじゃないわ――
特にあそこは人獣問わず死体が多くて
《屍のすすり泣く地》なんて呼ばれているんですもの
MsgEn:
Hehe, it's not unusual around here, you know-- especially that place, where there are many corpses, regardless of whether they are human or animals. 
It's called the "Weeping Corpse Ground," after all.

MsgJp:
だけど、鎧のうろつく範囲が
段々拡がってきているらしいのが気がかりなの
このゾマにまでやってきたら――
MsgEn:
But I'm concerned that the range of armor wandering around seems to be getting wider and wider.
If it gets to this Zoma...

MsgJp:
探求者たちを支える町が潰えては、大変
頼もしい誰かが討伐に行ってくれないかしら――
ねぇ？
MsgEn:
If the town that supports the adventurers collapses, it will be a disaster.
I wonder if someone reliable could go and subdue it, I wonder...
Hey?

MsgJp:
そうね、《幽玄の霊堂》のことはもう知っていて？
どんな場所かって？
カタコンベ――そう、地下墓地よ
MsgEn:
So then, do you already know about the Mysterious Mausoleum?
What kind of place is it?
Catacombs――yes, an underground graveyard.

MsgJp:
元は歴史ある霊堂だったそうよ
けど、今は眠りにつくことができない死者たちが
彷徨い続けているんだとか――
MsgEn:
Originally, it was a historic mausoleum, they say.
But now, it seems that the deceased who cannot find rest continue to wander.

MsgJp:
死者たちは本当に眠りにつくことが
できなかったのかしら？
それとも故郷であるザンドラがこんなことになって
無念さのあまり眠りから覚めてしまったのかしら――
MsgEn: I wonder if the deceased were truly unable to rest in peace, or if their homeland, Zandora, becoming like this caused them to awaken from their slumber out of overwhelming regret.

MsgJp:
そういえば
あの人たちまだ帰ってこないのよね――
MsgEn: Speaking of which, that guy hasn't come back yet--

MsgJp:
ふふ、この前《幽玄の霊堂》に
意気揚々と盗掘に行った若者のことよ
MsgEn: Hmmm, I'm talking about the young man who went to the other day to steal from the Mysterious Mausoleum.

MsgJp:
まだ若い子たちだったんだけど
若さ故の無謀さで
死者の仲間入りをしちゃったのかしら
MsgEn: They were still young, but in their youthful recklessness, I wonder if they joined the dead.

MsgJp:
あら、貴方――
気になるって顔してるわね
よっぽど人が良いのかしら？
MsgEn:
Oh, you... 
You have such an interested look on your face. 
I wonder if you're a really kind person?

MsgJp:
いいわ、もし様子を見に行きたいなら
私に相談して
MsgEn: If you wish to go and see for yourself, please consult with me.

MsgJp:
今や貴方はこのゾマで
一番の探索者、そして戦士よ
貴方のような存在そのものがロマンと言っても
いいんじゃないかしら
MsgEn:
Now, you are the greatest explorer and warrior in this Zoma. 
It might even be right to call an existence like you 'romance'.

MsgJp:
貴方と知り合えて、嬉しく思うわ
支援品をうんと格上のものにするから
また話を聞かせてちょうだい
MsgEn:
I am glad to have met you.
I will upgrade the support goods even more, So please let me hear your story again.

MsgJp:
――ん、私ったら貴方に惹かれてるのかしら
ふふ――
MsgEn: Hmm, I wonder if I'm attracted to you. Hehe...

MsgJp: 何だァ？　用があるならさっさと言いな
MsgEn: What is it?　If you have something to say, just say it.

MsgJp:
俺はな、ダイアンの野郎とは違うんだよ！
レッキとした正規の騎士様なんだぞ、おう！
MsgEn: I'm different from that guy Dion, you know! I'm a proper knight, yeah!

MsgJp:
まーったく、こんな辺境に派遣されるとは
ついてねェぜ
MsgEn: I can't believe I was dispatched to such a remote place. This is just my luck.

MsgJp:
どんなとこでも行ってやらァ、任せとけ
とは言ったがよ
酒の席のセリフを真に受けるかよフツウ！
あァッ！？
MsgEn:
I'll go anywhere and do it, leave it to me! 
That's what I said, but seriously, who takes lines from a drinking party seriously? Seriously!?

MsgJp:
別に騎士団が守んなくてもよォ
ここの連中はそれなりにどいつも
やってってるよ！
そう思わねぇか？
MsgEn:
It's not like the knight order needs to protect anyone. 
These guys, in their own way, are all doing their best! Don't you think so?

MsgJp: 旅の同伴者をお求めですか？　覚者様
MsgEn: Are you looking for a travel companion, Lord Arisen?

MsgJp: 白竜様のご加護があらんことを
MsgEn: May the blessings of The White Dragon, Lady Arisen, be with you.

MsgJp: リムの輝きは常に貴方と共に
MsgEn: The radiance of Rift Crystal is always with you.

MsgJp:
メンバーの再編をお考えでしたら
なんなりと
MsgEn: If you are thinking of reorganizing your party members, please do not hesitate to ask.

MsgJp:
ゾマは、いつも死と隣合わせ
村の上一帯は“死者の丘”と呼ばれているの
MsgEn:
Zoma always flirts with death. 
The entire upper area of the village is called the "Hill of the Dead."

MsgJp:
瘴気っていうの？　よく解らないけれど
それが強いらしくって、昼だろうが雨だろうが
おかまいなしに、不死者が外をうろついてるわ
MsgEn:
Is it called miasma? 
I don't really understand, but It seems to be strong, whether it's daytime or raining.
Regardless, the undead roam outside, uncaring.

MsgJp:
彼らのようになりたくなければ
十分休養して英気を養ってゆくことね
MsgEn: If you don't want to end up like them, you'd better get plenty of rest and get your strength back!

MsgJp:
この辺りの事について詳しく知りたければ
ナディアに相談してみればいいわ
MsgEn: If you want to know more about this area, you should consult Nadia.

MsgJp:
でも彼女、あれでなかなか苦労も多いのよ
力になってあげてね、お強い覚者様
MsgEn:
But she has faced many hardships with that, you know. 
Please support her, you strong Arisen.

MsgJp:
ここでアタシの歌を聴いてくれたお客さん
遺跡や墓地を荒らしに行って
そのまま戻らない人も多いわ
MsgEn: Many of the guests who have heard me sing here go to vandalize ruins and cemeteries and never come back.

MsgJp:
野盗をしてるか、別の村へ行ったのか
それとも不死者になったのか――
MsgEn:
Did he become a bandit, or did he go to another village?
Or maybe he became an undead--

MsgJp: アナタはまた戻っていらしてね？
MsgEn: Will you come back again?

MsgJp: 一曲いかがかしら？
MsgEn: How about a song?

MsgJp:
おお、必要な品があれば
分けてやるぞ
MsgEn: Oh, if there is anything you need, I will gladly share it with you.

MsgJp:
砦の資材集めもなかなか馬鹿にならん
討伐任務もすぐに新しいのが来るしなぁ
MsgEn:
Gathering materials for the fortress is no easy task, I tell you. 
And the subjugation missions keep coming one after another.

MsgJp:
お前もできればグリッテン砦の
《クエストボード》案件、手伝ってくれよ
MsgEn: If you can, please help me with the quest on the Quest Board of Fort Gritten.

MsgJp:
バートランド平原に行けるように
なってたらな
MsgEn: If I were able to go to the Betland Plains, that would be great.

MsgJp:
オークどもめ、こないだの砦攻めで
盛大にあちこち壊しやがって
MsgEn: Those orcs, during the fortress assault the other day, made a mess breaking things everywhere.

MsgJp:
ここが破られたらいよいよ奴らの思い通りだ
ま、俺たちがそうはさせないがな
MsgEn: If this place is destroyed, they'll finally have their way. Well, we won't let that happen, though.

MsgJp: なんだ、用があるなら手短にな
MsgEn: If you have any business, please make it brief.

MsgJp:
休んでいくか？　ま、体調管理も任務のうちだ
<VAL PRICE_INN>は利用代として徴収するがな
MsgEn: Are you going to take a break? Well, managing your health is part of your duties. <VAL PRICE_INN> will be collected as a fee.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
休むなら、そこのベッドを自由に使え
お前は期待の新人だ
体は大事にしてもらわんとな
MsgEn:
If you want to rest, feel free to use that bed there.
You're the new guy we're counting on.
You've got to take care of yourself.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
ああ、《弱化の治療》だな？
悪いが<VAL PRICE_WEAK>、徴収するぞ
MsgEn:
Ah, is it "Treat Weakness"?
I'm sorry, but it's <VAL PRICE_WEAK>. 
I have to collect it.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
うん？　お前は《弱化》に掛ってはいないぞ
しっかりしろよ
MsgEn:
Huh? You aren't weakened, are you?
Pull yourself together.

MsgJp:
覚者にも、ポーンの民と契約を
結べる者と結べない者がいる
MsgEn: Even among the Arisen, there are those who can form contracts with Pawns, and those who cannot.

MsgJp:
俺は後者だったが――
いったい何が違うというんだ、くそ！
MsgEn:
I was the latter, but--
What exactly is the difference, damn it!

MsgJp:
剣の技を学びたければ
ヴァネッサ副隊長に認めてもらう他ない
せいぜい修練することだ
MsgEn:
If you want to learn sword techniques, there is no choice but to gain recognition from Captain Vanessa, the vice captain. 
All you can do is train diligently.

MsgJp:
「この砦を持たせることが、俺達の任務」
そんな事を言うやつがいるが
お前もそのクチか？
MsgEn:
There are those who say, 'Our mission is to hold this fortress.' 
Are you also one of them?

MsgJp: 守ってるだけで勝てはしないだろうに
MsgEn: Just protecting won't lead to victory, will it?

MsgJp: よぉ！　御同輩
MsgEn: Hello! My comrade.

MsgJp:
ハイデル平原の北、
砦裏の《バートランド平原》は
まだオーク共の影響下だ
MsgEn:
To the north of the Heidell Plains, past the fortress, lies the Betland Plains. 
It is still under the influence of the Orcs.

MsgJp:
危険が大きいからなぁ
かなりの武功、もしくは任務でもなけりゃ
裏へ抜けることはできねぇぜ
MsgEn:
Because the danger is significant, you see.
Unless it's an impressive achievement or a vital mission, you can't make your way to the back.

MsgJp:
まぁ、《ダウ渓谷》のエリアマスター
ヘイデンに認められりゃ、
ダウ渓谷側の関所からあっちの方へ
抜けられるらしいがな
MsgEn: Well, if you're recognized by Hayden, the Area Master of Dowe Valley, it seems you can pass through the checkpoint on the Dowe Valley side and head over to the other side.

MsgJp:
オーク野郎どもは、今日も休みらしいぜ
来たらぶった斬ってやるのによ
MsgEn:
Those orc bastards seem to be taking a day off today. 
If they come, I'll cut them down.

MsgJp: ヴァネッサ副隊長に挨拶くらいしてけよな
MsgEn: Make sure to greet Vice Captain Vanessa, okay?

MsgJp:
ハハハ！
騎士団の腰ぬけにゃ、まぁこの砦は
守れんだろうさ
MsgEn: Hahaha! With those spineless knights, I doubt this fortress can be defended.

MsgJp: なんだ？　連絡事項でもあるのか？
MsgEn: What is it?　You have a message for me?

MsgJp:
《バートランド平原》側への
通行が許可されたんだな
任務、頑張れよ！
MsgEn:
So, I see you've been granted permission to travel to the Betland Plains. 
Good luck with your mission!

MsgJp:
前の戦闘を皮切りに、奴らもこちらへ
攻撃をしかけることが増えてきた
つどつど追い返すしかないのが辛いところだな
MsgEn:
Starting with the previous fight, they have been increasing their attacks towards us. 
It's tough having to constantly push them back.

MsgJp: 元を断てればいいんだが――
MsgEn: If only we could cut off the source--

MsgJp:
この正面門の通行には、統率の許可が必要だ
砦の向こう、《バートランド平原》は
完全な危険地帯だからな
MsgEn:
Permission from your superiors is required to pass through this main gate. 
Beyond the fortress lies the Betland Plains, a highly dangerous area.

MsgJp:
よほどの任務か理由でもなければ
おいそれとは通れないさ
MsgEn:
Unless it's a significant mission or reason,
You can't just pass through casually.

MsgJp:
北部のバートランド平原は
オーク共の根城に近い
このグリッテン砦が、奴らの侵攻を塞ぐ要なのさ
MsgEn:
The Betland Plains in the north is close to the stronghold of the orcs.
Fort Gritten is vital in fending off their invasion.

MsgJp:
北部の魔物どもは手強い上に数も多い
ハイデルに奴らを通すわけにはいかないのだ
MsgEn:
The northern enemies are not only formidable, but their numbers are also high.
We cannot let them through to Heidell.

MsgJp: やぁ、お疲れさん
MsgEn: Hey, you must be tired.

MsgJp:
バートランド平原には
いくつか要注意ポイントがあるんだ
MsgEn: There are several points of interest in the Bertrand Plain:

MsgJp:
まずはセラー湖近くの《湖岸の廃墟》
大型の魔物がなぜか現れやすいんだ
MsgEn:
First, the "Lakeside Ruins" near Lake Cera.
Large enemies tend to appear for some reason.

MsgJp:
あとは、平原西はずれの《バートランド大橋》だね
こっちはよほどの偵察でもなけりゃ
行かないだろうけど
オークの部隊が巡回していることがあるんだ
MsgEn:
Next, there's the Betland Bridge on the western edge of the plain, right?
Unless you're on a serious reconnaissance mission, you probably won't go there, but there are times when Orc units patrol the area.

MsgJp:
湖の浜辺あたりも
水棲竜の目撃情報があったりして物騒だよね
まぁ、結局どこもわりと危険なんだけど
MsgEn:
Even the beach around the lake has reports of sightings of aquatic dragons, making it dangerous.
Well, in the end, everywhere is relatively dangerous.

MsgJp:
とほほ、ブーツの紐が切れちゃったよ
縁起悪いよなぁ
MsgEn:
And ohoho, my boot laces broke.
That's not a good omen, is it?

MsgJp: オークの臭いがもうちょっとマシだったらなぁ
MsgEn: If only the smell of the Orc was a little less repugnant...

MsgJp:
まぁでも、そんな愚痴を言ってられるのも
生きてるからだよなぁ
MsgEn: Well, but I'm only able to complain about that because I'm alive.

MsgJp:
知ってるか？　ヴァネッサ副隊長も
前は色々大変だったそうだ
MsgEn: Did you know? Vice Captain Vanessa also went through a lot before.

MsgJp:
女で覚者で、騎士団からの風当たりも
強かったりでな
MsgEn: As a woman and an Arisen, the criticism from the Knight's Order can be strong.

MsgJp:
ま、だからこそあんな凛々しくカッコよく
へへへ――
なれたんだろうなぁ
MsgEn:
Well, that's why she was able to become so noble and cool.
Hehehe--

MsgJp:
いやー、参った参った
まさかお前がここまで凄いとはなぁ――
副隊長がベタ褒めするのもしょうがないか
MsgEn:
Well, I'm impressed, I'm impressed. 
I didn't expect you to be this amazing. 
I guess even the vice-captain's over-the-top praise is understandable.

MsgJp:
正直、お前がいなかったらこの砦は
オークに落とされてたかもしれん
俺も他のヤツも、それは解ってるツモリさ
MsgEn:
Honestly, if you weren't here, this fortress might have been taken down by Orcs. 
Both me and the others know that.

MsgJp:
さ、今度の特別報償だ
胸を張って受け取れよ！
MsgEn: Well, this time it's a special reward, so accept it with pride!

MsgJp:
よぉよぉ！！　ブイブイ言わせてる
みたいじゃないか
新入りだと思ってたらあっという間だな
MsgEn:
Hey, hey! 
You're really making waves, aren't you? 
I thought you were a newcomer, but time flies.

MsgJp:
お前の働きに対して、報償が出たぞ
ま、それだけ戦果をあげたってわけだ
誇っていいぞ、うん
MsgEn:
You've been rewarded for your work.
Well, that's what you get for fighting the good fight.
You should be proud, yeah.

MsgJp:
おおそうだ！
お前の働きぶり、ちょくちょく聞いてるぞ
これからも頑張れよ！
MsgEn:
Oh yeah!
I've heard a lot about your work, Keep it up!

MsgJp:
お前、すごい活躍なんだってな！
ちくしょー、さっき副隊長が
わざわざこれをお前にってよ
MsgEn:
I heard you've been doing amazing work! 
Hell, just now the vice-captain specifically gave this to you.

MsgJp:
ほら、持ってけ！
あーちくしょ～！　羨ましい！！
MsgEn:
Here, take it!
Ah, damn it~!　I'm so jealous!

MsgJp:
おうおう、頑張ってるみたいじゃないか！
お前には他のヤツよりちょっといい
支給品を回してやるよ
MsgEn:
Oh, well, it looks like you're doing a great job!
I'm going to give you a little better allowance than the rest of them.

MsgJp:
お疲れさん、忘れず顔を出したな
ほれ、今回の支給品だ
MsgEn:
Good job, you didn't forget to show up.
Here, here's the latest supply.

MsgJp:
よぉ！
よく来たな、噂の大型新人！
MsgEn:
Hey there!
You've come at a good time, the rumored big shot rookie!

MsgJp:
俺は砦北部のエリア、バートランド平原の
エリアマスターをしてるスケルツォ
――お前と同じ覚者だ
MsgEn: I am Scherzo, the Area Master of the northern area, Betland Plains. I am an Arisen, just like you.

MsgJp:
しかし困ったぞ――
憧れのヴァネッサ副隊長が信頼するレオ統率に
目をかけられてるお前――！
MsgEn:
However, I'm in trouble--
You, who are being noticed by Leo, the commanding officer whom Lieutenant Vanessa admires and trusts!

MsgJp: 俺にとっちゃあ、最大のライバル出現だ！
MsgEn: For me, this is the biggest rivalry I've ever had!

MsgJp: ――とまぁ、冗談はさておきよろしくな！
MsgEn: -- and well, joking aside, nice to meet you!

MsgJp:
ここのクエストボードは正門の中だ
バートランド平原の任務――
資源確保とオーク軍の勢力調査だ
MsgEn:
The quest board here is inside the main gate.
Quests in the Betland Plains - securing resources and investigating the Orc army's strength.

MsgJp:
そのうちお前にも頼むことになるだろうが
今すぐにってわけじゃない
なにせ危険地帯だからな
MsgEn:
I'll have to ask you to do it eventually.
Not right now, though.
It's a dangerous zone, after all.

MsgJp:
まずは、レオ統率や他のエリアマスター
から一目置かれる覚者になってくれよ
――あ、でも副隊長の前では控えめにな！
MsgEn:
First, become an Arisen who is respected by Leo and other Area Masters. 
But, be modest in front of the Vice Captain!

MsgJp:
お前の働きぶり、ちょくちょく聞いてるぞ
これからも頑張れよ！
MsgEn:
I've heard a lot about your work,
keep up the good work!

MsgJp:
ま、俺がお前のために直接してやれることは
支給くらいだけど
成果に応じていいもん手配してやるからさ！
MsgEn: Well, the only direct thing I can do for you is to provide support, but I'll arrange something nice for you based on your results, so...!

MsgJp: 一つ、不穏な情報が入ってるんだ
MsgEn: There is one piece of unsettling information.

MsgJp:
バートランド高地の監視塔近く、湖のほとり
《湖岸の廃墟》でコロッサスが出現するように
なったようでな
それもかなりの剛腕ぶりらしい
MsgEn:
Near the observation tower in Betland Highlands, by the lake. 
A Colossus seems to have appeared at the Lakeside Ruins. 
And it seems to possess quite an impressive level of strength.

MsgJp:
あそこはバートランド連絡路にも近いから
周囲を通る時は気をつけろ
もちろん、討伐してくれりゃ大助かりだ
MsgEn:
Because there is a connecting channel to Betland nearby, be careful when passing through there. 
Of course, it would be a great help if you could subdue it.

MsgJp:
おっ！　そうだ
お前に頼みたい任務があるんだ
MsgEn:
Oh! That's right.
I have a mission that I want to ask of you.

MsgJp:
《バートランド墓地》は知ってるか？
まぁ簡単に言えば、任務はその内部調査だ
MsgEn: Do you know about Betland Cemetery? Well, to put it simply, the mission is to investigate its interior.

MsgJp:
中の様子を見てみて
もし魔物がいたらその討伐！
――うんまぁ、あれだ、シンプルだろ？
MsgEn:
Take a look inside and if there are demons, then defeat them!
--Yeah well, that's it, simple, right?

MsgJp:
任務を受ける準備ができたら
あらためて声を掛けてくれ
MsgEn: When you're ready to take on the assignment, give me a call again.

MsgJp:
よぉよぉ！！　ブイブイ言わせてる
みたいじゃないか
新入りだと思ってたらあっという間だな
MsgEn:
Hey, hey! 
You're really making waves, aren't you? 
I thought you were a newcomer, but time flies.

MsgJp:
お前の働きに対して、報償が出たぞ
支給品の格上げだ
MsgEn:
I have received compensation for your labor.
It is an upgrade of the supplies provided.

MsgJp:
ま、それだけ戦果をあげたってわけだ
誇っていいぞ、うん
MsgEn:
Well, that's how much you've accomplished in the war.
You can be proud of yourself, yeah.

MsgJp:
要警戒情報が入ったぞ！
オークの本拠地に近い、平原北部――
《バートランド大橋》のたもとで、精鋭部隊らしき
オークの一団が目撃されたんだ
MsgEn:
Alert! We have received important information.
In the northern part of the plain, near the Orc stronghold, underneath Betland Bridge, a group of elite Orcs has been sighted.

MsgJp:
部隊が準備をしている間に
何とかしないと、また砦が攻め込まれない
とも限らない
MsgEn:
While the unit is preparing, we must do something, or the fortress may be breached again.
There is no guarantee otherwise.

MsgJp:
ヴァネッサ副隊長には報告済みだが
もし対処できそうなら、お前の方でも
よろしく頼む
MsgEn: I have already reported it to Vice Captain Vanessa, but if you think you can address it, I also ask for your assistance.

MsgJp:
バートランドのどこかには
モゴックの腹心《戦鬼ゲソム》が指揮する
部隊のアジトがあるって情報も入ってる
MsgEn: Somewhere in Betland, there is information that Gesomu the War Demon, Mogok's right-hand man, commands a base for his unit.

MsgJp: 引き続き調べる必要があるな
MsgEn: I'll have to keep looking into this.

MsgJp:
おお！　お前に連絡だ！
ついに奴らの本拠地、《バートランド平原北部》に
攻め込む手はずが整ったぞ
MsgEn:
Oh! I've got news for you!
We have finally made arrangements to invade their stronghold, the Northern Betland Plains.

MsgJp:
バートランド北部へと繋がる
山道を塞いでいた落石を、ようやく除去できたんだ
MsgEn: We were finally able to remove the rocks that were blocking the mountain road that leads to northern Betland.

MsgJp:
ま、そこが通れるようになったのはお互い様で
これでオークどもも、魔獣を使って山側から
侵入する必要なく、そのままこっちへ来れる
ようになったわけだが――
MsgEn:
Well, we both made it possible to pass through there. 
Now those orcs can come over here without needing to invade from the mountain side using magic beasts.

MsgJp:
ともあれ、隊を組んで奴らの居城
《ガルドノック砦》に乗り込む日も近いだろうな！
MsgEn: Regardless, the day is approaching when we will go together and infiltrate their stronghold, Gardnox Fortress!

MsgJp: よう、砦の任務は順調かい？
MsgEn: Hey, how's the mission at the fortress going?

MsgJp:
そ、そうだ！！　
良い所にきたな、お前にも言っておこう！
《禊の神殿》について新しい情報が入ってな
MsgEn:
Oh, right!! 
You've come to a good place, so I'll tell you too! 
There's new information about the Temple of Purification.

MsgJp:
神殿内部に、ずっと入れなかった
《不浄の地下水路》って区画があるんだ
もとは神殿に引いた湖の水を浄化する
区画だったんだが――
MsgEn:
Inside the temple, there is a section called the "Foul Water Channel" that I have never been able to enter. 
It used to be a section for purifying the water from the lake that was drawn into the temple.

MsgJp:
昔のエリアマスター、禊の神官長が
封鎖して立入禁止にしたんだよ
何があったか知らないけどな
MsgEn:
The former area master, the priest in charge of purification, blocked off the area and prohibited entry. 
I don't know what happened though.

MsgJp:
それがごく最近、その封鎖が
解けているのが発見されたんだ
MsgEn: Very recently, that blockade was found to have been broken.

MsgJp:
それに気づいた定期討伐の隊士は
妙な威圧感と寒気に襲われて
結局中まで入れなかったらしい
MsgEn: The squad members who noticed it were ultimately unable to enter due to a strange sense of intimidation and coldness.

MsgJp:
もしついでがあったら、確認しといてくれよ
オークはともかく、俺はこの手の話
苦手なんだよな――
MsgEn:
If you happen to have some time, please check it for me.
As for orcs, I'm not really good with that kind of thing you know.

MsgJp:
厳重警戒情報だ！
セラー湖の浜辺、《船墓場》で妙に強力な
ブルーニュートが現れたらしい
MsgEn:
This is a serious warning!
It seems that a strangely powerful Blue Newt has appeared on the shore of Lake Cera, known as the "Ship Graveyard".

MsgJp:
普通のヤツと区別して《レイクニュート》
と呼ぶことにしたんだが、どうやら
脅威はそれだけじゃないようでな
MsgEn: I decided to call it "Lake Newt" to distinguish it from a regular one, but it seems that the threat is not just that.

MsgJp:
ヤツらのいる付近で、巨大な影と水面を
横切るヒレを見たって隊士もいるんだ
MsgEn: Near where they are, there are some members of the squad who have seen a giant shadow and a fin cutting through the water's surface.

MsgJp:
セラー湖の怪物――
ヒレ以外の情報はなく、その報告をうけ
確認に行った奴も正体を掴んでいない
MsgEn:
The Monster of Lake Cera-- 

Aside from its fins, there is no other information, and even those who went to confirm it have not grasped its true nature.

MsgJp:
お前も十分注意しろよ
相当強力な魔物がいるに違いない
MsgEn:
You be very careful too.
There must be some pretty powerful demons in there.

MsgJp:
いやー、参った参った
まさかお前がここまですごいとはなぁ――
副隊長がベタ褒めするのもしょうがないか
MsgEn:
Well, I'm impressed, I'm impressed. I didn't expect you to be this amazing. 
I guess even the Vice-Captain's over-the-top praise is understandable.

MsgJp:
正直、お前がいなかったらこの砦は
オークに落とされてたかもしれん
俺も他のヤツも、それは解ってるツモリさ
MsgEn:
Honestly, if you weren't here, this fortress might have been taken down by Orcs. 
Both me and the others know that.

MsgJp:
さ、今度の特別報償だ
特級の支給を受けられるようしておいたぞ
胸を張って受け取れよ！
MsgEn:
Well, this time it's a special reward.
I made sure you can receive a first-class payment.
Receive it with pride!

MsgJp: これからもよろしくな！
MsgEn: Thank you for your continued support!

MsgJp:
お前に頼みたい任務があるんだ
今回は、特に重要な任務だ
MsgEn:
I have a mission I need you to do for me.
It's a particularly important mission this time.

MsgJp:
もしかしたら、ついに奴らオークの拠点
モゴックの腹心が潜んでいるらしい
《戦鬼の影穴》を潰せるかもしれん
MsgEn: Maybe we can finally destroy the Orc stronghold where they say Mogok's henchmen lurk, "War Demons' Hideout".

MsgJp:
すでに別の隊士が怪しい場所を
調べにいってるんだが、まだ戻らない
もしかしたら感づかれて
すでに殺されている可能性もある
MsgEn:
Another soldier has already gone to investigate a suspicious location, but they haven't returned yet. 
However, they might have been noticed and possibly killed already.

MsgJp:
そこで、お前にも危険を覚悟で
二次調査をしてもらいたいんだ
MsgEn: Therefore, I would like you to conduct a secondary investigation, being prepared for danger.

MsgJp:
この調査、なるはやで頼めないか？
準備ができたらまた声を掛けてくれ
MsgEn:
Can you ask for this survey as soon as possible?
Call me again when you're ready.

MsgJp:
俺は砦の庶務全般を担当してる
ま、要するに副隊長の小間使いだよ
MsgEn:
I'm in charge of all the general affairs of the fort.
Well, in short, I'm the deputy commander's lackey.

MsgJp:
体を鍛えて鍛えて、鍛えまくって！！
そのうち副隊長を振り向かせてやるのさ！
MsgEn:
I'm going to work out, work out, work out!
One of these days I'm going to turn the vice captain around!

MsgJp: あ、とるなよ！　それ俺のだから！
MsgEn: Ah, don't take that! It's mine!

MsgJp:
砦内の《クエストボード》にはな
調査や討伐以外に、ちょいちょい
副隊長じきじきの依頼があってな――
MsgEn: On the "Quest Board" inside the fortress, there are not only investigations and subjugations, but also occasional requests directly from the vice captain.

MsgJp:
そういえば、《辺境の礎》ってあるだろ？
アレ、基本的には覚者本人が触れないと
使えるようにならないんだがな
MsgEn:
By the way, aren't there Sub Portcrystals? 
In general, they can't be used unless the Arisen themselves touch them.

MsgJp:
ここら辺一帯でのお前の働きを評価して
バートランド平原にある《辺境の礎》全部が
使えるようにされたそうだ
MsgEn: I heard that your efforts in this area have been evaluated, and now all of the Sub Portcrystals in the Betland Plains have been made available.

MsgJp:
いや～、最近のお前の活躍っぷりは
すごかったからな！
MsgEn:
No~, your recent successes have been
amazing!

MsgJp:
ま、今回の《辺境の礎》の解放は
俺じゃなくて神殿のハカライってことになるんだが
俺もお前の実力はちゃーんと認めてるからな！
MsgEn:
Well, the release of the "Sub Portcrystals" this time will be done by the Temple's official, not me.
But I also acknowledge your abilities properly, you know!

MsgJp:
これからもブイブイ言わせてるお前を
楽しみにしてるぞ！
MsgEn: I'm looking forward to seeing you continue to thrive!

MsgJp:
よぉ、元気か？
ちょうどお前に頼みたいことがあったんだ
MsgEn:
Hey, how you doing?
I just had a favor to ask you.

MsgJp:
バートランド大橋の近くに
《薄煙の荒れ地》って呼ばれてる場所があるんだがな
MsgEn: There is a place near Betland Bridge called the "Wispy Wasteland".

MsgJp:
あそこは元からオークが
出没しやすいところだったんだが
最近、血の臭いに引き寄せられたのか
ガーゴイルまで飛び回り始めたんだ
MsgEn:
That place has always been an easy spot for Orcs to appear.
Lately, they must have been attracted by the smell of blood, as Gargoyles have started flying around too.

MsgJp:
知っての通り、やつら飛び回りながら
石化の呪いを吐きつけてくるだろ？
あれが思ったより厄介でなぁ
MsgEn:
As you know, those guys are flying around and spitting out a curse of petrification, right?
That curse is more troublesome than I thought.

MsgJp:
というわけで駆除を頼みたい
準備ができたら、また声をかけてくれ
MsgEn:
So, I would like to request extermination services.
When you are ready, please let me know.

MsgJp:
よ、よぉ――
え？　顔色が悪いって？
MsgEn:
Yo, yo--
Huh? My complexion looks bad?

MsgJp:
ちょっと気味の悪い話を聞いてな――
本当は聞きたくなかったんだが
エリアマスターとしてこの地域の情報は
全て把握しておかないといけないし――
MsgEn:
Let me tell you a slightly eerie story――
I really didn't want to hear it, but as an Area Master, I must know all the information about this area.

MsgJp:
ええい、道連れだ！
お前も聞いていけ！
MsgEn:
Very well, come along!
You too, listen and go!

MsgJp:
《罪人の修獄》って知ってるか？
あそこは獄死した罪人ばかりが
埋葬されていた地下墓場でな
MsgEn: Do you know about the Penitentiary for Sinners? It's an underground cemetery where only sinners who died in prison are buried.

MsgJp:
かなり前に使われなくなって閉鎖されたんだが
最近、いつの間にか鍵が――
開いてたそうだ――
MsgEn:
It had been quite a while since it was last used and closed down, but recently, seemingly out of nowhere, the lock had been――
open――

MsgJp:
いやぁ、俺はこの手の話は苦手なんだよ
獣やオークなら、俺の鍛えた筋肉と技で
何とかなるが
幽霊はそういう問題じゃないからな――
MsgEn:
Well, I'm not good with this kind of talk. 
If it's about animals or orcs, I can handle it with my trained muscles and skills. 
But ghosts are a different problem, you know.

MsgJp:
いいところに来てくれた！
人並み外れた度胸のある覚者
そう、正にお前を待ってたんだ！
MsgEn:
You've come to a good place!
An Arisen with extraordinary courage!
Yes, I've been waiting just for you!

MsgJp:
この前話しただろう
《罪人の修獄》の鍵が
いつの間にか開いてたって件でな
MsgEn:
We talked about it before, right?
Regarding the lock to "Penitentiary," it seems it was somehow opened.

MsgJp:
ほっとくわけにはいかないから
調査のために何人か人をやってみたんだ
MsgEn: Because I can't just let it be, I tried assigning some people for the investigation.

MsgJp:
そうしたら、案の定というか何というか
――出たんだとさ――
女の笑う声があちこちから聞こえてきたらしい
MsgEn:
Well, as expected, or rather, just as I thought—
―― There it is ――
The sound of a woman's laughter seemed to be coming from various directions.

MsgJp:
おれはそういうのはどうも苦手でな
こうなると、頼れるのはお前しかいない！
確かああいう類もイケるんだったよな？
MsgEn:
I'm not very good at that kind of thing.
In this situation, the only one I can rely on is you!
I'm pretty sure that kind of thing is possible too, right?

MsgJp:
今すぐに行ってくれとは言わない！
いや、言えない――
覚悟ができたら、あらためて声をかけてくれ
MsgEn:
I'm not asking you to go now!
No, I can't tell you--
When you're ready, call on me again.

MsgJp:
よぉよぉ！
お前の最近の活躍っぷりときたら
寝てても噂が耳飛び込んでくるくらいだぞ！
MsgEn:
Hey hey!
Your recent achievements, I've been hearing about them even when I'm sleeping!
You're making quite a buzz, aren't you!

MsgJp:
今までのお前の働きが評価されて
報酬が更に良い物になったから
楽しみにしておいてくれ！
MsgEn:
Your previous efforts have been recognized, and as a result, your rewards have become even better. 
Please look forward to it!

MsgJp:
共にこのグリッテン砦を、そして神殿を支えていこう
これからもよろしくな！
MsgEn:
Let us support Fort Gritten and the Temple together. 
So, let us continue to work together from now on.

MsgJp: 私に用か？
MsgEn: You wanted to see me?

MsgJp:
覚者隊としてここを守るのは神殿のため
だが、私個人の一番の理由は家族のためだ
お前はどうだ？
MsgEn:
As the Arisen Corps, we protect this place for the sake of the Temple. 
However, my personal main reason is for the sake of my family. 
What about you?

MsgJp:
白竜様がかつてのお力を取り戻せば
オーク共などすぐに退けられよう
そんな日が早く来るといいのだがな
MsgEn:
If Lord White Dragon were to regain his former power, He would easily be able to repel the likes of the Orcs.
It would be great if that day comes soon.

MsgJp:
まだ、この間のオークの臭いが残っているな
はぁ、鎧や髪にも染みつくようだ
MsgEn:
I can still smell the orc smell from the other day.
Huh, it seems to seep into my armor and hair.

MsgJp: フン――！　人――何用ダ？
MsgEn: Hm--!　Man-- what do you want?

MsgJp:
何の用で来たんダ？
貢ぎ物か？　それなら――あぁ――うム
話、聞いてやらんでもない
MsgEn:
What brings you here?
A tribute, perhaps? Well then, ah... I suppose I wouldn't mind hearing your story.

MsgJp:
あぁ――まったく――！
人、特に覚者ってヤツはいつもいつも――
ゴブリンと見るや剣を振りおって、あぁ忌々しイ！
MsgEn:
Ah―― Good grief――!
People, especially the Arisen, are always――
Swinging their swords at Goblins, yes, how annoying!

MsgJp:
だが、取り引きなら――悪くなイ
剣を向けるなら、外の魔物にするんだナ
で、とっとと出てってくれ
MsgEn:
But if you're looking for a deal - not a bad one.
If you're going to point a sword at me, do it at the demon outside.
And get the hell out of here.

MsgJp:
ここは我ガ城、収集の園
外の愚かなゴブリン、魔物にこの価値は
わからない――ダろ
MsgEn:
This is our castle, the garden of collection.
The foolish goblins outside do not understand the value of this place, to the enemies of magic.

MsgJp:
だけど――なぁ――人、覚者
お前、アレの価値はわかるナ？
なら交換、交換ダ
価値ある物とナ
MsgEn:
However... hey... people, Arisen.
Do you understand the value of that thing?
If so, let's exchange, exchange.
With something of value.

MsgJp:
おまえ、覚えてるぞ！　
魔物やっつけにきたか？
ゴブリンやっつけにきたか？
MsgEn:
I remember, you know!
Did you come to defeat the monsters?
Did you come to defeat the goblins?

MsgJp:
面倒だから仲良くしような
あれこれ、良くしてやるヨ
MsgEn:
It's a hassle, so let's be friends.
This and that, I'll make it better.

MsgJp: ウガ？
MsgEn: Uga?

MsgJp:
ググ――
王、欲しイ物集マラナイ
機嫌悪クナル
MsgEn:
Gugu - - 
The king doesn't want anything.
He is in a bad mood.

MsgJp:
ワレワレ、ニンゲン戦ワナイ
取り引きアル、キノザのニンゲン
MsgEn:
We, the Ningen, do not engage in battles.
We trade with Kinoza, the humans.

MsgJp:
ヤルこと、イッパイ
ヤルこと、そこの板二貼ってアル
手伝う、ニンゲン褒美ヤル
MsgEn:
I have a lot to do.
There is a job to do, please hand me that plank.
I'll help you, in return for a reward.

MsgJp: ギャギャ！？
MsgEn: Gya gya!?

MsgJp:
ぎゃぎゃぎゃーー！！　ニンゲン！？
何し二キタ！
MsgEn:
Gyagyagyaa!! Human!?
What's happening?

MsgJp:
ぎゃぎゃっ！！　
王の物、無くす怒らレル！！
MsgEn:
Geez!
The king's things are lost!

MsgJp:
オデ怒られるイヤ！！
アレどこ行っタ――アレ、アレ
MsgEn:
Orc is angry.
Where did that go―― That, that

MsgJp:
ばばばば！！　タイヘン！
アブナイデカイ魔物　来ル夢　ミタ！！
食われル怖イ！
MsgEn:
Ba-ba-ba-ba!　Oh, no!
I had a dream that a huge monster was coming!
I'm afraid of being eaten!

MsgJp: グワッ！！
MsgEn: Gwah!

MsgJp:
ボルドこうざん、ゴブリンのモノ！
分かっタカ！　グワ！！
MsgEn: Volden's mine, Goblin's treasure! Do you understand?! Gwaah!!

MsgJp:
ボルドこうざん、ゴブリンのモノ！
あのニンゲン――
キノザえりあますたーも言っタ！
MsgEn:
Volden Mining, the Goblin's treasure!
That human--
Kinoza Eri-master also said it!

MsgJp: 分かっタカ！　グワ！！
MsgEn: I understand! Gwoahh!!

MsgJp:
オレ、ゴキゲンナナメ！！
齧るゾ、オマエ！！　あっち行ケ！
MsgEn: I'm feeling down!! I'm gonna nibble ya, you!! Go over there!

MsgJp:
ギギギギ――！　イライラ！！
ゼッタイ仕返シ！　アイツら許さナイ！
アイツラ、板にさらし上ゲ！
MsgEn:
Gigi-gigi! Irritation!!
I will definitely get revenge! I will not forgive them!
Expose them to the world, they deserve it!

MsgJp: グワ！！　話シかけるナ！！
MsgEn: Gua!! I will speak your outcome!

MsgJp: ム？　何しにキタ
MsgEn: What are you doing here?　What are you doing here?

MsgJp:
珍しイ、人間ここ来ルとハ
王にアイサツ忘れルな
MsgEn:
It is rare for a human to come here,
Do not forget to greet the king.

MsgJp:
この城、王、ギルスタンのモノ
王は宝ヲ集めテおいでダ
人間、オマエ貢ぎ物アルカ？
MsgEn:
This castle belongs to Gilstan, the king.
The king has come to gather treasures.
Are you humans offering tribute?

MsgJp:
ワレワレ、城のハンエイと守り大事
人間と争わナイ
オマエ役に立つ、ワレワレ取引応じル
MsgEn:
We value your protection of the castle.
We don't fight with humans.
We are willing to make a deal with you if you are useful to us.

MsgJp:
ダガ、王怒ル
王、ギルスタン、人間、生かシテ出さナイ
MsgEn:
Daga, the angry.
King, Gilstan, humans, don't let them live.

MsgJp: グググ――
MsgEn: Gugugu--

MsgJp: ニンゲン！！　キライ！！
MsgEn: Humans! I hate them!

MsgJp: 話シカケルナ！！
MsgEn: Start talking!!

MsgJp:
ニンゲン、臭いスル！
オークよりヤな臭いスル！　ギギ――！
MsgEn:
Humans, smell bad!
Smell worse than Orcs! Gigi!

MsgJp: ――ウゥゥ？
MsgEn: --Uh-uh?

MsgJp:
剣怖イ、切らレル、イタイ
ニンゲン、ぶき、しまっテおいテクレ――
MsgEn:
Sword scary, cut, hurt.
Human, weapon, put away!

MsgJp:
ここ、安全
ゴブリン王　ギルスタン強イ！
デモここあたり、怖イ魔物多イ
城取らレル、しんぱい――
MsgEn:
It's safe here,
Goblin King Gilstan is strong!
There are a lot of scary demons around here,
I'm worried they'll take the castle...

MsgJp:
しんぱい、タクサン
ジブン弱イ、怖イ、タクサンあル
MsgEn: Worried, lots of things are scary, there are many things.

MsgJp: ダァァッハ！
MsgEn: Daaah!

MsgJp:
オデ、王の次、強イ！！
ソンケイシロ！！
MsgEn:
Ode, King's successor, strong!!
Recommendation letter!!

MsgJp:
オデ本気出せバ、オマエ一撃！
デモ安心シロ、オデ優しイ！！
MsgEn:
Ode, give it your all, I'll strike you in a single blow!
But, don't worry, Ode is kind!!

MsgJp:
オデ有名！　エライ！
城の中、オデ知らナイヤツイナイ！！
MsgEn:
Ode is famous! Great!
People in the castle, Ode doesn't know that guy!!

MsgJp:
ココ、何しに来タ？　ニンゲン！
ココ、ゴブリンの城！
ギルスタンの城、ホボリック！
MsgEn:
Why did you come here, human?
This is Goblin's castle!
Gilstan's castle, Hobolic!

MsgJp:
ニンゲン来タ！！　ホボリック来タ！
王にアイサツか？　ニンゲン！
MsgEn:
Humans have arrived! Hobolic is here!
An assassination attempt on the king? Human!

MsgJp: ゴブリン、取り引キカ？　ニンゲン！
MsgEn: Goblin, do you want to make a deal? Human!

MsgJp:
ココ、偉イ王、ギルスタン！！
ニンゲン、武器シマエ、無礼スルナ！
MsgEn:
Here is the great king, Gilstan!
Human, weapon away, no disrespect!

MsgJp: ギャ！　ニンゲン！？
MsgEn: Gya! Human!?

MsgJp:
グー！？　むらさきピカピカ、王集メテル
ニンゲン、持ってキタノカ？
MsgEn:
Rock!? Shiny purple, gathered together as kings.
Humans, did you bring it?

MsgJp:
ニンゲン！　王の機嫌損ねるナ！
言ウ事従エ！　イイナ！！
MsgEn:
Human! Do not upset the king's mood. 
Obey me! Be nice!!

MsgJp:
王、ニンゲン嫌イ言ウ
覚者嫌イ言ウ
ケド、オデ知ってル
MsgEn:
The king, despise humans.
Despise Arisen.
But, Ode know.

MsgJp:
王、イロイロ集める好キ
ニンゲンの道具モ、集める好キ
MsgEn:
King likes to collect all kinds of things.
Likes to collect tools of the Human.

MsgJp:
王、覚者倒ス
ソレ、むらさきピカピカ取るタメ
覚者、むらさきピカピカ渡ス、王、喜ブ！
MsgEn:
King, Arisen topples.
Take purple shiny.
Arisen, give shiny purple, king, happy!

MsgJp: グー！　コンナとこ、ナゼ来タ？
MsgEn: Goo!　Why are you here?

MsgJp: ギャギャ！　ニンゲン、来タ！
MsgEn: "GYA GYA! Humans have arrived!"

MsgJp:
ギギギ――、何シニキタ？
オマエ！　怪しイヤツ！
MsgEn: Gigigi— What have you done? You! You're suspicious!

MsgJp: ガぅるるるる――
MsgEn: Garu ru ru ru――

MsgJp: ウガ！！　気安ク話し掛けルナ！！
MsgEn: Uga!! Talk calmly!!

MsgJp: ココ、ホボリック！　ゴブリン族、王ノ城！
MsgEn: Koko, Hobolic! Goblin tribe, King's Castle!

MsgJp: ギャ、ギャギャギャッ！？
MsgEn: Gya, gya gyagyagya!?

MsgJp: 腹減っタ――
MsgEn: I'm hungry――

MsgJp:
グワアアッ！　ニンゲン！！
襲っッテクル！？
MsgEn:
Gwaaa! Human!!
Attack!?

MsgJp:
王、むらさきキラキラ集めテル
オマエもカ？
MsgEn: King, gathering shiny purple. Are you, too?

MsgJp: グワッ！？
MsgEn: Gwah!?

MsgJp: ギャッ！？　何ダ！！
MsgEn: Gya!? What's this!!

MsgJp: ウガッ！？
MsgEn: Ugh!?

MsgJp: ニンゲンダ！！
MsgEn: Human!!

MsgJp: ギギ――？
MsgEn: Gigi-?

MsgJp:
旅の準備をされますか？　覚者様
私で力になれることでしたら
喜んで奉仕させていただきます
MsgEn:
Do you need any assistance in preparing for your journey, Lord Arisen? 
If there's anything I can do to help, I would be happy to serve you.

MsgJp:
休まれますか？　覚者様
恐れ入りますが管理費として
<VAL PRICE_INN>のみ頂戴いたします
よろしいでしょうか
MsgEn:
Will you take a rest, Lord Arisen?
I apologize for the inconvenience, but I would like to request only <VAL PRICE_INN> as a management fee.
Would that be acceptable?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》ですか？　覚者様
恐れ入りますが
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>ほど頂戴いたします
よろしいでしょうか
MsgEn:
Is it "Treat Weakness," Lord Arisen?
I apologize, but it would be <VAL PRICE_WEAK> in total.
Would that be acceptable?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
あら、覚者様は《弱化》状態ではありませんね
安心いたしました
MsgEn:
Oh, you're not in a "weakened" state, are you?
I'm so relieved!

MsgJp:
お疲れですか？　
覚者様、ここはあなた様のための場
すぐに寝所の準備をいたしましょう
MsgEn:
Are you tired?
Lord Arisen, this is a place for you.
Let us prepare your sleeping quarters immediately.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
どうぞこの地でお身体を休め
支度を整えてくださいませ
お力添えできることがあれば、何なりと
MsgEn:
Please rest your body here and prepare yourself. 
If there's anything I can assist you with, please don't hesitate to ask.

MsgJp:
必要な品に関しては
そちらのデレードにお言いつけください
MsgEn: Regarding the necessary items, please inform your squire over there.

MsgJp:
私ども自身を含め、この《ポーン郷》は
全て覚者様のために開かれし場所
そして、お役に立つことこそ私達の存在意義
MsgEn:
Including ourselves, this Pawn Cathedral is a place opened for all Arisen.
And thus, our existence lies in being of service.

MsgJp: ご注文は？
MsgEn: What is your order?

MsgJp: 準備は怠りなく
MsgEn: Be prepared.

MsgJp: 商品はこちらに
MsgEn: Products are here.

MsgJp: 備蓄は十分に
MsgEn: Stockpile well.

MsgJp: 覚者よ、用件を聞こう
MsgEn: Arisen, let's hear what you have to say.

MsgJp:
――異界の狭間
私達ポーンが生まれ、渡り、そして人の中で
貴君ら覚者のみが訪れることのできる場所――
MsgEn:
――The Rift
We, the Pawns, are born, wander, and exist among humans
Only you, the Arisen, can visit this place――

MsgJp:
普段は意識することもないだろうが、ポーンや
他の覚者への呼びかけ、そしてリム転移もまた
あの空間を介し行われるのだ
MsgEn: You may not usually be aware of it, but Pawns and other Arisen, as well as Rift Teleportation, are all carried out through that sky.

MsgJp:
「世界は多層にして、一つは同時に無限」
これは、古のある覚者が残した言葉だ
MsgEn: The world is multi-layered, and yet unified in its infinity. This is a phrase left behind by an ancient Arisen.

MsgJp:
ポーンの身にその真理は知れぬが
あの場所は世界の本来の姿と、最も近いのかもしれぬ
MsgEn:
The pawn may not know the truth,
But that place might be closest to the original form of the world.

MsgJp:
新しき覚者よ
ここは空間の接合点
《異界の狭間》の入り口でもある
必要が生じれば、異界へ赴くがいい
MsgEn:
O new Arisen, this is also the gateway to The Rift. 
If necessary, you may proceed to the Other World.

MsgJp:
私だけではない
ポーンの長たる役目を負いし者は
皆、“理”と縁ある地の守役でもある
MsgEn:
I'm not the only one.
Those who bear the role of the Pawn are all guardians of the land with an "order."

MsgJp:
その役目が、いつ、誰から始まったのか――
それは解らぬがな
MsgEn:
When and from whom that role began--
I don't know.

MsgJp:
武器を鍛える術に
《クレスト》という素材を用いるものがある
これは特殊な力の結晶を、装備に付与する
ポーンの技だ
MsgEn:
There is a way to enhance weapons, using a material called "Crest".
This allows you to imbue your equipment with the power of special crystals.
It is a skill of the Pawns.

MsgJp:
然るべき対価と引き換えに
《クレスト》を譲ろう
MsgEn: In exchange for the appropriate compensation, let us confer the "Crest" upon you.

MsgJp:
貴君の、《異界の狭間》へ行く準備と
覚悟ができたのならば、こちらはいつでもいいぞ？
MsgEn: If you are prepared and ready to go to the Rift of the Other World, my Lord, you can leave anytime.

MsgJp:
ポーンは戦うしもべかもしれないが
粗雑に扱うと貴君の心がすり減るぞ
MsgEn:
The Pawn may be a loyal servant,
But if handled roughly, your heart will wear away.

MsgJp:
大きな脅威を退けても
レスタニアから魔物が消えたわけではない
MsgEn: Even though the great threat has been repelled, the enemies haven't disappeared from Lestania.

MsgJp:
戦いの準備は常に必要だ
これからもポーンが役に立てて、うれしく思うよ
MsgEn:
Preparation for battle is always necessary.
I am glad that I can be of use as a Pawn, and I look forward to it.

MsgJp: 何か？
MsgEn: What is it?

MsgJp:
敵を倒し、物を造る
それが主に求められし私の務め
MsgEn:
Defeating enemies and creating things.
That is primarily the duty demanded of me.

MsgJp:
《異界の狭間》はあまりに冷たく、そして静かだ
そこに長く居すぎたポーンが
己の存在意味を失ってしまうほどに
MsgEn: The chasm between worlds is so cold and silent that a pawn who stays there too long loses the meaning of his existence.

MsgJp:
主が我々ポーンをどう見ているのか
それは、我々が考えても詮なきこと
MsgEn: How does the master see us pawns? It is a matter beyond our understanding.

MsgJp: なんなりと、覚者さま
MsgEn: As you wish, Lord.

MsgJp:
ここは、《ポーン郷》
あなたがた覚者のために存在する
現世における我々ポーンの逗留地です
MsgEn: This is the Pawn Cathedral, a place of residence for us Pawns that exists for the sake of you, the Arisen, in this earthly realm.

MsgJp:
里長アルヴァーさまが管理する《異界の狭間》
もしあなたの従者が異界へ沈み込んだならば
そこを訪れるといいでしょう
連れ返せるかは、覚者さま次第ですが
MsgEn:
The Rift, managed by Lord Alvar.
If your servant has sunk into the Other World, It would be wise to visit there.
Whether they can be brought back depends on the Arisen.

MsgJp:
覚者さま、ようこそ《ポーン郷》へ
どうか、ごゆるりと滞在を
MsgEn:
Welcome, Arisen, to the Pawn Cathedral.
Please, relax and enjoy your stay.

MsgJp: 何かご用でしょうか、覚者様
MsgEn: May I help you, Lord Arisen

MsgJp:
ミスリウ森林の出来事について
関心がおありでしたら
リンウッドのパトリシアをお訪ねください
MsgEn: Regarding the incidents in Mysree Forest, if you are interested, please visit Patricia in Lynwood.

MsgJp:
この先は鐘楼です
《異界の狭間》が覚者様の来訪を待つ時
霊鐘は自然にその音を響かせましょう
MsgEn:
This way leads to the Bell Tower.
When the Arisen's visit to the Rift awaits, let the spirit bell naturally ring its sound.

MsgJp:
鐘楼には治癒師の導き手
カミュ様がおられます
癒しの術を学ぶなら、訪ねてみてはいかがでしょう
MsgEn:
In the bell tower, the guide of the healer, Master Camus is present there.
If you want to learn the art of healing, why not pay a visit?

MsgJp: よぉ、お互い大変だよな
MsgEn: Well, we're both going through a tough time, aren't we?

MsgJp:
お前、自分のポーンの性格どうしてる？
俺はやっぱり《シャイ》だな
MsgEn:
Hey, how do you determine the personality of your Pawns?
As for me, I'm definitely "Shy".

MsgJp:
ほら、守ってあげたくなる方が
戦いに身が入るだろ？
でも《ピュア》もいいよなぁ
MsgEn:
See, the more you want to protect them, the more you want to fight, right?
But "pure" is good too.

MsgJp:
まぁでも、時と自分の状況に合わせて
変えるのもアリだからな
いろいろ試すといいさ
MsgEn: Well, it's also okay to change it depending on the time and your own situation. It's good to try various things.

MsgJp:
しかしなかなか目当ての
《クレスト》が手に入れられなくてなぁ
オーブを手に入れるのに一苦労だ
MsgEn:
But I can't seem to get the "Crest" I'm looking for.
I'm having a hard time getting the orb.

MsgJp:
はぁ～、俺の注意が足りないのかなぁ
どうしてこう、毎度毎度！
自分のポーンを失う羽目に――
MsgEn:
Haaa... I wonder if it's because I'm not paying enough attention. 
Why does this keep happening, every time! 
I end up losing my own pawns...

MsgJp: ま、連れ戻せてるだけマシかな
MsgEn: Well, I suppose it's better than not being able to bring them back.

MsgJp:
はは～ん、さてはアンタもそうだな？
いやいや良いって、お互い覚者だ
解ってるって！
MsgEn:
Haha~n, It seems you're the same, aren't you?
Well, it's okay. We're both Arisen
You understand, right!

MsgJp:
ようこそ、小さき祈りの場へ
私でよければお話を伺いましょう
MsgEn:
Welcome to this humble place of prayer.
If you don't mind, I would like to hear your story.

MsgJp:
なるほど――
そのお話ですか
私はカミュ、この聖堂で癒しと導きをしております
MsgEn:
I see--
That's the story.
I am Camus, and I am here in this cathedral to heal and guide you.

MsgJp:
《プリースト》としてすでに貴方は
多少経験を積まれている様子
では、私からは大きな話をひとつだけ
MsgEn:
As a Priest, you already seem to have gained some experience. 
Now, I have only one important thing to tell you:

MsgJp:
職は数あれど奇跡を祈り
回復の技を主とするは《プリースト》のみ――
MsgEn:
Though there are many professions, only the "Priest" specializes in recovery techniques. 
Praying for miracles, they can heal through the power of time.

MsgJp:
誰を癒やし、誰を援助するのか――
貴方の判断が戦況を大きく左右します
MsgEn:
Who will you heal and who will you aid--
Your decision will greatly affect the war situation!

MsgJp:
ことによると、貴方は、自分自身を
戦場の支配者だと考えるようになるかもしれません
もちろん、それは大いなる間違いです
MsgEn:
According to the situation, you may come to consider yourself as the ruler of the battlefield. 
Of course, that is a great mistake.

MsgJp:
人々に尽くし、その中で己を活かす――
味方、そして敵の状況をも見極め
戦いを終結に導く――
MsgEn:
To serve the people and thrive within their midst—
Assessing the allies and even the enemies' Conditions,
Guiding the battle to its resolution—

MsgJp: それこそが我々《プリースト》の使命なのです
MsgEn: That is our mission as Priests.

MsgJp:
貴方には良き癒し手としての素養があるようです
さらなる癒しの道を歩もうと望むのであれば
私は喜んで力添えをいたしましょう
MsgEn:
It seems that you have the aptitude to be a good healer. 
If you wish to pursue further on the path of healing, I would be delighted to lend a helping hand.

MsgJp:
――《プリースト》
大いなる存在の声に耳を傾け
その恵みを現世にもたらすべく仕える者――
MsgEn:
――"Priest" 
Listen to the voice of the great existence and serve as a servant to bring its blessings to this world.

MsgJp:
神殿におわす白竜様、さらに伝承にある古き
尊き存在、異界の底に在るという邪神
MsgEn: Lord White Dragon, who dwells in the temple, and furthermore, the evil god spoken of in ancient legends, the sacred being said to reside in the depths of the other world.

MsgJp:
どういった存在を仰ぐかは人により異なれど
その御力を借り、己、そして他者へ
その恩恵を分け与えるは同じです
MsgEn: What kind of being we look up to is different for each of us, but it is the same for us to borrow its power and share its benefits with ourselves and with others.

MsgJp:
傷を癒し、不浄を除き、人々を救い慈しむ
そして善き運命への導き手たる自覚をもつならば
プリーストとしての道はいつでも開けています
MsgEn: If you heal wounds, purify impurities, save and show compassion to people, and if you have the awareness of being a guide to a good destiny, The path as a Priest is always open.

MsgJp:
《プリースト》の術は
生命に働きかける癒しの術――
その力は戦いの中で、仲間の傷を
治すだけではありません
MsgEn:
The art of "Priest" is a healing art that affects life. 
Its power is not limited to healing the wounds of comrades in battle, but goes beyond.

MsgJp:
強い生命力を持った巨大な魔物
そういった存在が怒り、気を乱した時
生命力の集まる急所
《シークレットコア》を感知することもできるのです
MsgEn:
An enormous monster with a strong vitality.
When such a being gets angry and loses control, they are able to sense the vital spot where vitality gathers, the "Secret Core".

MsgJp:
仲間、そして敵の生命を感じることは
本質的に同じこと
どちらも命に触れることであることを
ゆめゆめお忘れなきよう
MsgEn:
Feeling the lives of both allies and enemies is fundamentally the same thing.
Both involve touching upon life itself.
Please never forget that.

MsgJp:
ふむ――、よろしいでしょう
貴方は既に癒し手たる資質をお持ちの様子
MsgEn:
Hmmm... good to know.
You already have the makings of a healer.

MsgJp:
《プリースト》として救いの道へ入り
癒しの術を学ぶのです
MsgEn: You've chosen the path of a "Priest" to learn the ways of healing and salvation.

MsgJp:
ほう――
より深き癒しの技を知りたいと
MsgEn: Oh, you wish to learn deeper healing techniques, I see.

MsgJp:
ですが今の貴方にはまだ
体得は難しいでしょう
MsgEn: But it will still be difficult for you to master it now.

MsgJp:
《プリースト》となり、道を歩むのです
ジョブレベルが１８になった頃
神殿の訓練官に相談するとよいでしょう
MsgEn:
Become a "Priest" and stay the course.
When you reach job level 18, you may want to consult with the Temple's Trainer.

MsgJp:
貴方が基本を修めたと認められ
私への指導依頼が出されたのであれば
喜んで引き受けましょう
MsgEn: If it has been recognized that you have mastered the basics and a request for guidance has been made to me, then I would be happy to accept it.

MsgJp:
その時、再び私を訪ねてください
よき癒し手を目指すのです
MsgEn: At that time, please visit me again as you strive to become a skilled healer.

MsgJp:
数多の痛みに触れてきたようですね
そしてその中で、時に貴方は無力を
感じたはず
MsgEn:
It seems like you have experienced a lot of pain.
And in those moments, there were times when you must have felt powerless.

MsgJp:
では――
さらなる癒しの術を教えましょう
今の貴方になら扱えるでしょうから
MsgEn:
Then-
Let me teach you another method of healing.
You should be able to handle it now.

MsgJp:
――貴方が纏う気配、そして眼差し
今や貴方は私以上に多くの生死に
触れてきたのかもしれません
MsgEn:
--The presence you wear, and the look in your eyes... 
Now, you may have touched more lives and deaths than I have!

MsgJp:
貴方はもう、理解しているでしょう
《プリースト》とは生と死にもっとも親しき者
命の真実の姿を見つめ、求道する者
MsgEn:
You probably already understand, don't you?
A "Priest" is one who is most familiar with life and death, gazing at the true nature of life, seeking the path.

MsgJp:
よろしいでしょう
私が識る高次の術を授けましょう
それで、さらに貴方は真理へと近づけるはず
MsgEn:
Very well, then.
Allow me to bestow upon you the knowledge of advanced arts, with that, you should be able to come closer to the truth.

MsgJp:
ジョブレベルは十分――
どうやらすでに癒し手として
初歩の心構えは身に付けたようですね
MsgEn:
The job level is sufficient—
Seems like you've already acquired the basic mindset of being a healer.

MsgJp:
さらにこの道を探求せんというので
あれば、喜んで力添えをいたしましょう
MsgEn: Furthermore, if you are searching for the pursuit of this path, I would be delighted to provide assistance.

MsgJp:
ですがその前に、今の貴方の成長を
神殿の訓練官に報告しておくべきです
MsgEn: But first, you should report your current growth to the temple trainer.

MsgJp:
世話になった者に心を返すこともまた
新たな出発には大切なことですから
MsgEn: Returning gratitude to those who have helped us is also an important aspect of embarking on a new journey.

MsgJp:
この静かな聖堂にて祈りを捧げる毎日
平穏と調和こそ、全ての癒しに通じる
真髄です
MsgEn:
Every day, I offer prayers in this silent holy sanctuary.
Peace and harmony lead to all healing, That is the essence.

MsgJp:
古き癒しの術は、より深き痛みを知らねば
真に体得することは難しいでしょう
MsgEn: If one does not truly understand the depths of pain, it will be difficult to truly master the ancient healing arts of old.

MsgJp:
貴方はもう少し俗世にて、自身のあり様を
見つめてご覧なさい
MsgEn: Please take a moment to look at your own state a little more in the secular world.

MsgJp:
ポーンの魂の姿――
その答えを見出す事ができた時
初めて真の救いへ近づける気がするのです
MsgEn:
The appearance of the soul of the Pawn---
When I can find that answer, I feel like I'm getting closer to true salvation.

MsgJp:
かつて猛威を振るった赤色病も
今は滅びし病です
MsgEn: The Red Blight, which once wielded great devastation, is now a disease that has been eradicated.

MsgJp:
時間は概ね残酷なものですが
まあ、少しくらいは良いこともしますね
MsgEn: Time is generally a cruel thing, but well, it does have its good moments too.

MsgJp: 旅の同伴者をお求めですか？　覚者様
MsgEn: Are you looking for a travel companion, Lord Arisen?

MsgJp: 白竜様のご加護があらんことを
MsgEn: May the blessings of The White Dragon, Lady Arisen, be with you.

MsgJp: リムの輝きは常に貴方と共に
MsgEn: The radiance of Rift Crystal is always with you.

MsgJp:
メンバーの再編をお考えでしたら
なんなりと
MsgEn: If you are thinking of reorganizing your party members, please do not hesitate to ask.

MsgJp: グガァアア！！
MsgEn: Gugaaah!!

MsgJp:
ゴルルルル――アァ？
何だ――おまえ――
MsgEn:
Gorrrl--ah?
What--what--you--

MsgJp: グガアアアッ！
MsgEn: Groarrr!

MsgJp: フウウウウ――
MsgEn: Fuuhhhh

MsgJp: ――人間、ガァ――！
MsgEn: ――Humans, Gaah――!

MsgJp: グおおおおおおおお！！
MsgEn: Goooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!

MsgJp: 破壊ダ、スベテダ――！
MsgEn: Smash! Destroy!

MsgJp: グガアアアッ！
MsgEn: Groarrr!

MsgJp: グアア――！？
MsgEn: Guuaaa!?

MsgJp: グォオオオ――
MsgEn: Guo-oh-oh--

MsgJp: ガハァ――
MsgEn: Gah--

MsgJp: ガァアッ！
MsgEn: Gaah!

MsgJp: ニンゲン、どこからきた――？
MsgEn: Human, where did you come from?

MsgJp: おめ、なんだ？　食われ二来たか？
MsgEn: Oh, what's this? Have you come to be eaten?

MsgJp: 覚者、覚者か――おめ？
MsgEn: Arisen, are you an Arisen? Congratulations?

MsgJp: ガァアッ！
MsgEn: Gaah!

MsgJp: グホホ！　ギヒッ
MsgEn: Guhoho! Gigi.

MsgJp: ゲッゲッゲ――
MsgEn: Hehehe...

MsgJp: ガァアッ？
MsgEn: Gaaaah?

MsgJp: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
MsgEn: Arisen creatures have increased, it's unbearable.

MsgJp:
時が止まり、歪な異界にあっても
私達はやはり人
MsgEn: Even if time stops and we find ourselves in a distorted otherworld, we are still human.

MsgJp:
それが必要であろうがなかろうが
食し、眠り、日々の営みを同じく送ろうとするは
地上と変わりはいたしません
MsgEn: Whether we need it or not, we eat, sleep, and go about our daily lives the same way we do in the land.

MsgJp:
地上では、錬金術は失われたと聞きます
どのように薬を作り、魔物を治めるのか
非常に興味深い
MsgEn:
On the ground, it is said that alchemy has been lost. 
I am very interested in how to make medicine and control enemies with alchemy.

MsgJp:
錬金術についてより深く識りたいのであれば
テオドール様に教えを乞うとよいでしょう
MsgEn: If you wish to deepen your understanding of alchemy, it would be wise to seek guidance from Lord Theodor.

MsgJp:
それが、貴方がたの世界で禁じられた
ものであるなら、勧めはいたしませんが
MsgEn: If it is something prohibited in your world, I will not recommend it.

MsgJp:
泊ってゆくなら、それもよいでしょう
何分資源の少ない地、対価として
<VAL PRICE_INN>いただきますが
よいですか？
MsgEn:
If you plan to stay, that's fine as well.
In this resource-scarce land, as compensation,
I will require <VAL PRICE_INN>.
Is that acceptable?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》ですか――なるほど
分かりました、対価として
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>いただきますがよいですか？
MsgEn: Is it "Treatment of Weakness"? I see. Understood. Shall I receive <VAL PRICE_WEAK> as compensation?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
おや、しかしながら
《弱化》の反応が見られません
思いすごしでありましょう
MsgEn:
Oh, however, there is no sign of a weakened reaction.
It must be just a passing thought.

MsgJp: 地上の者よ、よくぞ訪れました
MsgEn: Ground beings, you have done well to come here.

MsgJp:
時には休養を取るも大事、無理はなさいませんよう
貴方の滞在は実に喜ばしいこと
対価は求めません
MsgEn:
Taking rest occasionally is important, please don't push yourself too hard.
Your presence is truly delightful.
I don't seek any compensation.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
地上の者よ
滅びが訪れる前に
また貴方の顔を見られて嬉しく思います
MsgEn: Ground dwellers, before destruction arrives, I will be happy to see your face again.

MsgJp:
たとえ理が――
この世が滅びようとも
貴方から受けた恩は忘れません
MsgEn: Even if the order is lost, even if this world crumbles, I will not forget the kindness I received from you,

MsgJp:
終わりの見えない苦難の中にあろうと
再びレスタニア、そして神殿と
繋がりを持つことができた
それだけで十分と思えるようになりました
MsgEn:
In the midst of endless hardships, I was able to once again connect with Lestania, and with the Temple.
That alone became enough to me.

MsgJp:
良いのです
考える時間は、もう十分に与えられました
MsgEn: It's good. You have been given enough time to ponder.

MsgJp:
以前よりメルゴダを実質的に支配していたのは
残念な事にディアマンテスです
MsgEn: Unfortunately, Diamantes has been effectively dominating Mergoda more than before.

MsgJp:
かの者の力は強大で恐ろしく、そして鋭い
身体を封じたとはいえ、その支配力まで抑える
ことは私達にはできませんでした
MsgEn:
The power of that person is immense and terrifying, and also sharp. 
Even though their body was sealed, we were unable to suppress their control.

MsgJp: 錬金の徒として、申し訳なく思います
MsgEn: As a student of alchemy, I apologize.

MsgJp:
テオドール様は地上にいらっしゃった時も
ディアマンテスの動向を常に注視しておられました
MsgEn: Lord Theodor always closely monitored Diamantes' movements, even when he was on the surface.

MsgJp:
しかしまさか、王を竜へ変じるなど――
そのような大それた事、私達の誰一人として
想像だにしなかったのです
MsgEn: However, none of us could have imagined something as outrageous as the king transforming into a dragon.

MsgJp:
覚者であり王であるゴルゴラン様が――
よもや、白竜様を裏切るなど――
MsgEn:
Lord Golgorran, who is both an Arisen and a King—
Could it be that he would betray even the White Dragon—

MsgJp:
今私達がこのように在るのは
人の理を持ち得て世の理を越えようとした
その罰なのかもしれませんね
MsgEn: The reason we exist like this now might be a punishment for trying to surpass the principles of humanity and the world's order.

MsgJp:
地上の覚者よ
よくぞいらしてくださいました
MsgEn:
Arisen of the surface,
Thank you very much for coming.

MsgJp:
私は当地のエリアマスター
ベアトリクスと申します
MsgEn: I am the Area Master of this region. My name is Beatrix.

MsgJp:
当年、２７歳になるはずですが
この地の時間がどう流れたのかわからず
困惑しておりますが――
MsgEn: I should be turning 27 this year, but I am at a loss as to how time has passed on this surface.

MsgJp:
ともあれ、ひさしぶりの来訪者ゆえ
至らぬ点、あらかじめお詫びさせて頂きます
MsgEn: At any rate, I apologize in advance for any imperfections, as it has been a long time since we had a visitor.

MsgJp:
加えて、３２３年前――
メルゴダの大多数の住民は白竜様を思って
祈りを捧げたこと――
MsgEn: In addition, 323 years ago, the majority of Mergoda's residents prayed to the White Dragon.

MsgJp:
黄金の竜でもディアマンテスでもなく
白竜様のご無事を願ったこと――
それだけはどうかお知りおきください
MsgEn:
Not the Golden Dragon, nor Diamantes, but prayers for the safety of the White Dragon, Lord.
Please know this, above all else.

MsgJp: メルゴダでの滞在はいかがですか？
MsgEn: How about staying in Mergoda?

MsgJp:
多少は力となれるよう
物資面で協力いたしましょう
MsgEn: We can be of some help with supplies.

MsgJp:
このメルゴダにはいくつか
ディアマンテスに与する者の住居が
残っています
MsgEn: In this Mergoda there remain several residences of those who gave to Diamantes.

MsgJp:
彼らの研究を凍結するため
封印している住居があるのですが
そこに何か、我らにとって有用なものが
あるかもしれません
MsgEn: There is a residence where their research has been frozen solidly sealed. There may be something useful to us there.

MsgJp:
住居の場所を教えましょう
そちらの方も、ぜひ探索を
MsgEn: Let me tell you the location of your residence. Please consider exploring it.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者――
王ゴルゴランが、あなたのようであったなら――
MsgEn: Arisen of Lestania, if only King Golgorran were like you...

MsgJp:
いえ、それは言っても詮なきこと
今はあなたがここを訪れてくれた
その事に感謝いたしましょう
MsgEn:
No, that is something not worth mentioning. 
I am grateful for you visiting here now.
Let us express our gratitude for that fact.

MsgJp: 私達も、あなたに何を返せるか考えねば
MsgEn: We also need to think about what we can give you.

MsgJp:
メルゴダにあなたが来られてしばらく――
もうこの地にも慣れられた頃では
ないでしょうか
MsgEn: Have you been able to get used to this land since you came to Mergoda a while ago?

MsgJp:
もし、その気がおありでしたら覚者よ
より奥深き錬金の道を進むため
テオドール様から錬金術士《アルケミスト》の
手ほどきを受けられてはどうでしょう
MsgEn:
If you are interested, Lord Arisen,
How about receiving guidance from Lord Theodor, to advance further on the profound path of Alchemy?

MsgJp:
錬金術は、善く使えば人が理を
理解するための学問であり、技術です
MsgEn: Alchemized is a study and skill that, when used well, allows people to understand the order of things.

MsgJp:
地上の覚者であるあなたに
正しい姿を知って貰ってこそ
我らの想いも伝わるというもの
MsgEn:
To you, who are an Arisen on surface,
Only by knowing the true form can our feelings be conveyed.

MsgJp:
――その意思があるのでしたら
テオドール様にお話を
MsgEn: If you have such intentions, please speak with Lord Theodore.

MsgJp:
地上の方よ――
あなたが私達のために貸して下さる力
どれほど励みとなりましょう
MsgEn:
O surface one--
how encouraging is the strength you lend to us.

MsgJp:
贈り物を用意しております
どうか、これからもメルゴダを
助けて下さい
MsgEn: We have prepared a gift for you. Please continue to assist Mergoda.

MsgJp:
あなたにもお伝えしなければ
半壊しかけの《錬金研究室》にて
未完成の錬魔が暴走しているようです
MsgEn:
I must inform you as well.

In the nearly destroyed "Alchemy Laboratory", an unfinished alchemized creature seems to be running amok.

MsgJp:
侵入者を感知、排除するために作られる
監視用錬魔――その素体となる
《合成用アイ》と《合成用ゴブリンアルケミー》
の２種ですね
MsgEn:
It consists of two types of Guardian Familiars designed to detect and eliminate intruders:
a Synthetic Eye and a Synthetic Alchemized Goblin.

MsgJp:
もし研究室に向かわれる際は
十分に警戒を
MsgEn: If you are heading to the laboratory, Please exercise sufficient caution.

MsgJp:
地上の方よ、ありがとう
あなたの協力、嬉しく思います
私達からも、小さくはありますが贈り物です
MsgEn: Thank you, people of the surface. We appreciate your cooperation. We also have a small gift to offer from us.

MsgJp:
地上の覚者よ、ありがとう
あなたの協力嬉しく思います
MsgEn: Arisen of the surface, thank you. I appreciate your assistance.

MsgJp:
私達からも、小さくはありますが
物資面でのさらなる力添えを
させていただきます
MsgEn:
We will also provide a small contribution in terms of material support.
Until further notice, we will lend a helping hand.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者よ
あなたがメルゴダを訪れて下さったこと
一同感謝しております
MsgEn:
Oh, great Arisen of Lestania,
We are grateful for your visit to Mergoda.

MsgJp:
限られたこの地にて用意できることは
知れておりますが、これであれば
多少はお役に立ちましょう
MsgEn: I understand that resources are limited in this land, but I hope that this will be somewhat helpful.

MsgJp: いつでも私達はあなたを歓迎いたします
MsgEn: We always welcome you.

MsgJp: 困ったことになりました
MsgEn: I'm in trouble.

MsgJp:
《宮殿前広場》にて、ディアマンテス派の
メルガン技師達が強力な魔道兵器を
動かしているようです
MsgEn: At the "Palace Plaza," it appears that the Mergan engineers of the Diamantes faction are operating powerful magical weapons.

MsgJp:
このままでは、物資の手配にも
メルゴダでの探索にも大きな障害に――
MsgEn: As it is, this will prove to be a significant obstacle to both the procurement of supplies and the exploration in Mergoda.

MsgJp:
非常に強力な相手です
可能な限り戦闘は避け、こちらにおいでに
なる時もリム転移をお使いください
MsgEn: They are a very formidable opponent. Avoid combat if possible and use Rift Teleport when coming to our location.

MsgJp:
地上の方の訪れは
私達にとって驚きであり、そして喜び
MsgEn: The arrival of those from the surface is both a surprise and a joy to us.

MsgJp:
これをどうぞ――
少しでも助けとなればよいのですが
MsgEn:
Here you go - 
I hope this can be of some help.

MsgJp:
地上の覚者よ、あなたが私達のために
貸して下さる力、どれほど励みとなりましょう
MsgEn: O surface one--how encouraging is the strength you lend to us.

MsgJp:
よりあなたの助けとなるであろう物資を
見つくろいました
MsgEn: I have gathered supplies that will be of assistance to you.

MsgJp:
どうか、これからもメルゴダを
助けて下さい
MsgEn: Please, continue to assist Mergoda. We have prepared a gift for you.

MsgJp:
これをどうぞ――
訪れてくれたあなたへのささやかなる礼です
MsgEn:
This is for you ――
It's a small gift for you who visited.

MsgJp:
前にも申し上げましたが
このメルゴダにはいくつか
ディアマンテスに与する者の住居が
残っています
MsgEn: As I mentioned before, there are several residences in this Mergoda that belong to those who served Diamantes.

MsgJp:
彼らメルガンの技師達は
このところ何やら不穏な企みを
進めている様子――
MsgEn:
May I ask you to once again consider our proposal? 
If you are willing to take on this task, we will also prepare a token of appreciation.

MsgJp:
ことに、封鎖していたその一つ
《エリクシル精製室》が
彼らの手に戻ってしまったようなのです
