MsgEn: It seems that one of the blocked Elixir Refining Chambers has fallen back into their hands.

MsgJp:
一度、中をあらためては
いただけないでしょうか？
引き受けてくださるのであれば
礼も用意いたしましょう
MsgEn: Could you please reconsider this matter? If you decide to accept, we would be prepared to offer our thanks.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者よ――
王ゴルゴランが、あなたのようであったなら――
MsgEn:
Arisen of Lestania――
If only King Golgorran were like you...

MsgJp:
いえ、それは言っても詮なきこと
今はあなたがここを訪れてくれたその事に
感謝いたしましょう
MsgEn: No, that is something not worth mentioning. I am grateful for you visiting here now. Let us express our gratitude for that fact.

MsgJp:
私達も、あなたに何を返せるか考えねば
せめて今は補給面で、報いさせてください
MsgEn:
We must also consider what we can pay you with. 
At least for now, please allow us to repay you on the supply front.

MsgJp: 深刻な事態です、地上の覚者よ
MsgEn: It is a profound situation, O Arisen of the surface.

MsgJp:
王宮内の広間――《メルガン・アルケミデア》
のあたりで、ただならぬ気配が
関知されました
MsgEn: In the grand hall of the royal palace, around the area of Mergan Alchemdia, an unusual presence was detected.

MsgJp:
胸騒ぎがしてなりません
どうか、あなたのお力をお貸しください
MsgEn: I have a feeling of unease in my chest. Please, may I ask for your assistance?

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者よ
メルゴダへの来訪、歓迎しましょう
MsgEn: Welcome, Arisen of Lestania. Let us welcome your visit to Mergoda.

MsgJp:
あなたにお伝えしたいことがあるのです
《辺境の礎》が各地に設置されたことは
既にご存知でしょう
MsgEn:
There is something I want to tell you.
You may already know that "Sub Portcrystals" have been set up in various places.

MsgJp:
ここメルゴダの王宮層に設置された礎も
このたび自動解放されたとのことです
MsgEn: The Keystone that was installed in the palace layer of Mergoda is said to have been automatically released.

MsgJp:
――礎が新たに設置されるということは
神殿は我々を見放してはいない
そう考えても、よいのでしょうか――
MsgEn: Is it alright to think that the establishment of a new Keystone means that the Temple has not abandoned us?

MsgJp: 地上の覚者よ、力を貸してください
MsgEn: Arisen of the surface, please lend me your power.

MsgJp:
古き住居に、ディアマンテスの思想に
染まった者の残党が
密かに集まっているのです
MsgEn: Secretly gathering in an old dwelling are the remnants of those stained by the ideology of Diamantes.

MsgJp:
彼らが何かよからぬ企てをしていることに
まず間違いはないでしょう
MsgEn: There is no doubt that they are up to something nefarious.

MsgJp:
どうか、彼らの企てを
未然に防いでいただけないでしょうか
MsgEn: Could you please prevent their plot from happening in advance?

MsgJp:
引き受けてくださるのであれば
礼も用意いたしましょう
MsgEn: If you are willing to take on the task, we will prepare tokens of appreciation.

MsgJp: 少し昔話をさせてください
MsgEn: Could you please allow me to share a little old tale?

MsgJp: かつて、とても優秀な女性技師がいたのです
MsgEn: There once was a very talented woman engineer.

MsgJp:
しかし、彼女はある日を境に
急速にディアマンテスに傾倒してゆき
周囲の人々とも距離を置きました
MsgEn: However, she gradually became obsessed with Diamantes and one day distanced herself from the people around her.

MsgJp:
今や行方も知れぬ彼女は
何故か、とある井戸に
頻繁に出入りしていたとのこと――
MsgEn: Now, she, whose whereabouts are unknown, for some reason, frequented a certain well.

MsgJp:
そこに何があるのかは誰も知りませんが
もしかすると有用なものも
あるかもしれません
MsgEn: Nobody knows what is there, but there might be something useful.

MsgJp:
あなたに場所を教えておきましょう
興味があれば覗いてみるも良いでしょう
MsgEn: Let me tell you the location. If you are interested, it would be good to take a look.

MsgJp: 地上の覚者よ、深刻な状況です
MsgEn: Surface's Arisen, it is a serious condition.

MsgJp:
《秘匿の実験場》にて
強力な何かの気配が感知されました
休眠状態にあった機関が
活動を再開したようなのです
MsgEn:
At the "Secret Proving Ground," a powerful presence has been detected.
It seems that the dormant facility has resumed its activity.

MsgJp:
正体まではわかりませんが
放置すれば災いの種となるでしょう
どうかあなたのお力をお貸しください
MsgEn:
I don't understand the true nature, but if left alone, it will become a source of disaster.
Please lend me your assistance.

MsgJp:
地上の覚者よ、感謝します
あなたが訪れてくださるようになり
ここメルゴダも何かが変わり始めたように思います
MsgEn: Arisen of the surface, I am grateful. It seems that something has started to change here in Mergoda, as you have started visiting.

MsgJp:
あなたの訪れにより
全てから切り離された私達に
新たな流れが運ばれてきたのです
MsgEn: By your visit, to us who have been completely disconnected from everything, a new current has been brought.

MsgJp:
私達も、あなたに何を返せるか考えねば――
せめて補給面だけでも
一層の助けとなりますよう尽力いたしましょう
MsgEn:
We must also think about what we can give back to you—
At least in terms of supplies,
We will do our best to be of further assistance.

MsgJp:
地上の覚者よ
私達にできる協力であれば
惜しむことはありません
MsgEn:
Arisen of the surface,
If there is any aid we can provide, There is no need to hesitate.

MsgJp:
地上の覚者よ
深刻な事態となりましたね
MsgEn:
Arisen of the surface.
A serious situation has occurred, hasn't it?

MsgJp: 学びとは、理を追求すること――
MsgEn: The pursuit of order is what learning is all about.

MsgJp: 錬金
MsgEn: Alchemized

MsgJp:
道を誤った私達ですが
常に理を追い求めてきたと自負しています
どうか、この世の理を破壊させないでください
MsgEn:
We may have lost our way, but we have always prided ourselves on constantly pursuing order.
Please, do not destroy the order of this world.

MsgJp:
ここメルゴダにて長きを過ごしてきたのは
今考えてみると
むしろ喜ばしいことかもしれません
MsgEn: I spent a long time here in Mergoda, and now that I think about it, it might actually be something to be happy about.

MsgJp:
ここにいたからこそ、この事態に
あなたを支えられるのですから
MsgEn: Because I was here, that's why I am able to support you in this situation.

MsgJp:
体力の回復、物資の補給――
どうか協力させてください
存分に、このメルゴダをお使いください
MsgEn:
Please cooperate with me in recovering our stamina and replenishing our supplies. 
Please use Mergoda to the fullest extent possible.

MsgJp:
錬魔達はディアマンテスの傀儡
我らとて、もはやここでは狩られる身
MsgEn:
The Alchemists are puppets of Diamantes.
We, too, are now hunted here.

MsgJp:
幸いにもテオドールの塔には制御杭が
仕込まれているから、錬魔達はこの周囲へ
入れないがな
MsgEn: Fortunately, Theodor's tower has control stakes embedded in it, so the magic practitioners cannot enter this vicinity.

MsgJp:
術杭と錬成した魔物を、我々は錬魔と呼ぶ
騎士団より便利に仕える兵として
ディアマンテスらが生み出した哀れな半生命だ
MsgEn:
We call the monsters created by Diamantes through alchemy "Alchemized".
They are pitiful semi-life forms created to serve the knight order conveniently.

MsgJp:
あやつがそんな研究をしたのも
溶命炉を悪しきことに使ったのも
全てあの男一人が始めたことなのか――
MsgEn: Is it all because of that man, who conducted such research, who also used the Furnace for evil purposes?

MsgJp:
地上か――
戻れるなら戻りたいものだ
MsgEn:
On the ground, perhaps--
If I could go back, I would want to return.

MsgJp:
だが、異なる時を歩み過ぎた我々に
果たして行き場はあるのだろうか
MsgEn: However, for us who have walked through different times, Is there really a place to go?

MsgJp: うむ、何か用でも？
MsgEn: Yes, may I help you with something?

MsgJp:
王宮層の《メルガン・アルケミデア》は
錬金術研究の高等研究室だ
MsgEn: The upper level of the royal palace is the advanced laboratory of Alchemized research, Mergan Alchemdia.

MsgJp:
ディアマンテス派の術師の中には
まだそこで錬魔研究をしている者も
いるようだ
MsgEn: Among the practitioners of the Diamantes faction, there still seem to be those who are conducting alchemy research there.

MsgJp:
何の研究をしているかは不明だが
嫌な予感がする――
MsgEn: I have no idea what research they are conducting, but I have a bad feeling about it.

MsgJp:
地上の水、動物、人、全てが恋しい
貴方達を見ると不思議なことに
そういう想いが湧いてきます
MsgEn:
I miss the water on the surface, the animals, and the people.
When I see all of you, strangely enough such feelings well up within me.

MsgJp: 地上の品があれば、喜んで引きとりましょう
MsgEn: If there are earthly goods, I will gladly accept them.

MsgJp: 役に立ちそうなものはありましたか？
MsgEn: Did you find anything useful?

MsgJp: 品物の取引であれば応じましょう
MsgEn: Let's consider a mere transaction for the goods.

MsgJp:
一つご忠告をしておきましょう
我らの元へ来る時は、可能なかぎり
拠点の礎を利用してください
MsgEn: Let me give you one important piece of advice: When you come to our place, please make use of the Portcrystals, which are the keystones of our Halls, as much as possible.

MsgJp:
《宮殿前広場》には、グリフィンアルケミーなどの
錬魔以外にも、メルガンの高等技師が機兵を
操っていることもあるのです
MsgEn: In the "Palace Plaza," there are not only alchemized Griffins, but also advanced Mergan engineers who control mechanical soldiers.

MsgJp:
――ああ、我々も覚者であったなら
この礎で懐かしき地へ戻ることが
できるのに――
MsgEn: - Sigh... If only we were Arisen, we could return to that nostalgic land with this keystone...

MsgJp:
ええ、あなたとの取引であれば
いついかなる時でも応じましょう
それが助力となるのであれば――
MsgEn: Yes, if it's a mere transaction with you, I will accommodate it at any time, as long as it helps.

MsgJp:
地上のもの全てを恋しく思ってきました
たとえ我々がそれらを二度と見ることが無くとも
この世から失うわけにはゆきません
MsgEn:
I have longingly yearned for everything on the surface.
Even if we never see them again, we cannot lose it from this world.

MsgJp:
忘れないでください
メルゴダの民も、レスタニアの力と
なりたがっていたと
MsgEn:
Please do not forget;
The people of Mergoda, also wished to possess the power of Lestania

MsgJp:
――この世は、全てをあなたに
背負わせることになってしまいましたね
MsgEn: -This world has ended up burdening you with everything, hasn't it?

MsgJp:
うむ――
かつては時を惜しんで術の探究に励んだ
ものだが、今やただ耐えて過ごすばかり
MsgEn:
Indeed――
Once, I earnestly pursued the study of techniques, cherishing every moment.
But now, I merely endure and pass the time.

MsgJp: 我らはこれで良いのだろうか
MsgEn: Are we good with this?

MsgJp:
覚者とは、竜とは何なのだろう
この世界の理、それがどういうものであるのか
あの男には見えていたのだろうか
MsgEn:
What is an Arisen, and what is a dragon? 
The order of this world, what exactly is it? 
Could that man see it?

MsgJp:
森の民エルフ――
竜力増幅のため、ゴルゴランに捧げられた
莫大な数、莫大な量の命――
MsgEn:
Elf of the Forest ――
For the amplification of Dragon Force, 
Countless lives, an immense quantity,
Offered to Golgorran ――

MsgJp: 溶命炉は、まさしく禁忌の技であったのだ
MsgEn: The Furnace of Life Dissolution was truly a forbidden technique.

MsgJp:
私にご用かな
友への呼びかけであれば、力添えをしよう
MsgEn: If it is a call to a friend, I will offer my assistance.

MsgJp:
護政区の礎からここに至るまでに
半壊した建物があっただろう
MsgEn: There must have been partially destroyed buildings along the path from the Imperial Quarter's Keystone to here.

MsgJp:
あの奥には《錬金研究室》があってな
合成用や研究用に選抜された魔物が
これまでに数回、暴走していたことがある
MsgEn:
Behind that is the Alchemy Laboratory. 
Enemies selected for synthesis and research have gone out of control several times in the past.

MsgJp:
魔物を意のままに制御しようなど
もともと手を出してよい研究ではなかったのだ
MsgEn: It was never a permissible field of study to control enemies as one pleases.

MsgJp:
友へ呼びかけたいというのなら
私に任せてくれ
せめて最後まで力になりたいのだ
MsgEn:
If you want to call out to a friend, leave it to me.
I want to at least be of help until the end.

MsgJp:
――ずっと後悔してきた
今ばかりは後悔の無い選択をしたい
MsgEn:
I have been regretting things for a long time.
Now, I just want to make a choice without regrets.

MsgJp:
覚者、竜、理――
どれだけ研究を重ねても
私にはその存在に対し、理解が及ばなかった
MsgEn:
Arisen, Dragon, Order――
No matter how much research I conducted, I could not comprehend the existence of the Arisen

MsgJp:
己の命が、己の身体が滅んでも
この世の理というものは不変であると
そう信じてきたのだ――
MsgEn: Even if my life, even if my body were to be destroyed, I have believed that the order of this world remains unchanged-

MsgJp:
だからこそあれほどまでに
研究に打ち込めたのだろうな
MsgEn: That's why I was able to immerse myself so much in my research.

MsgJp:
それにしても、よくこんなに
きれいな洞窟を見つけられたものね
休息の場を早々に確保できたのは恵まれているわ
MsgEn:
Anyway, it's amazing that we were able to find such a beautiful cave. 
We are fortunate to have secured a resting place so quickly.

MsgJp:
私のところに来るってことは
自分を万全の状態に整えたいってことね
良い心がけだわ
MsgEn:
The fact that you come to me means that you want to prepare yourself to the best possible condition.
That's a good attitude.

MsgJp:
覚者たる者、常に万全の体調を維持すべきね
そのための休息も務めのうちと思って
自分の状態を冷静に把握して
MsgEn:
As an Arisen, one should always maintain optimal physical condition. 
Rest and recuperation should be considered part of our duty. 
It is important to calmly assess one's own state.

MsgJp:
体は全ての資本よ
少しでも違和感を感じたら
無理せず休んだ方がいい結果が出る
MsgEn:
Your body is your most valuable asset. 
If you ever feel any discomfort, it's better to take a break without pushing yourself. 
Better results will follow.

MsgJp:
最後に頼れるのは自分の体だけ
後悔したくなければ、体調には常に気を配りなさい
MsgEn:
In the end, the only one you can rely on is your own body. 
If you want to avoid regrets, always be mindful of your physical condition.

MsgJp:
休息も務めのうちよ
臨時の拠点だけど、それなりの寝床は用意したわ
<VAL PRICE_INN>かかるけど、泊まっていく？
MsgEn:
Rest is also part of the duty.
It's a temporary base, but I've prepared decent sleeping quarters.
It will cost <VAL PRICE_INN>, would you like to stay?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》が必要？
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>かかるけど、いい？
MsgEn:
Is "Treat Weakness" required? 
It costs <VAL PRICE_WEAK>, is that acceptable?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp:
ん？　《弱化》していないようね
健康で何よりだわ
MsgEn:
Hmm? It seems you haven't weakened, huh?
Being healthy is the most important thing after all.

MsgJp:
休息も務めのうちよ
ちょうど寝床が空いているから
好きに休んでいくといいわ
MsgEn:
Rest is also part of the job, you know. 
Since the bed is empty right now, feel free to take a rest as you like.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: Yes

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: No

MsgJp: ――なんだ、欲しいものでもあるのか
MsgEn: ――What is it, is there something you want?

MsgJp:
おい、回復薬とランタンの火種は
多めに持っとけよ
MsgEn: Hey, make sure to bring plenty of healing potions and a lantern's fire source.

MsgJp:
わざわざこんなところまで
運んできてやってんだ――無いと困るだろうが
MsgEn:
I went to all the trouble to bring it here, you know. 
You'd better not be without it.

MsgJp:
いいか、普段見ねぇものを見ても慌てるんじゃねぇ
慌てるとロクなことがねぇからな
MsgEn:
Listen, don't panic when you see things you don't usually see. 
Panicking won't do you any good.

MsgJp:
だからと言って、自分の知っているものに当てはめて
ナメてかかっても痛い目を見る――
MsgEn: But don't get too cocky and assume that what you know applies to everything; you might still run into trouble.

MsgJp:
つまり、大切なのは平常心だ
落ち着いてさえいれば何とかなるからよ
MsgEn: So, what matters most is to keep a calm mind. As long as you remain composed, you can handle anything.

MsgJp:
洞窟の中で過ごすっていうのも
悪くはねぇもんだな
MsgEn: Living within the confines of a cave is not such a dire fate, I must say.

MsgJp:
はい――
ご友人への呼びかけなら、自分がお手伝いします
MsgEn:
Yes--

If it's a call for a friend, I'll help you.

MsgJp:
この地の動植物は――
変わったものが多いですね――
MsgEn: The animals and plants of this land, there are many peculiar ones.

MsgJp:
時間があれば図鑑でも作って
レスタニアの子供たちに見せたいものです――
MsgEn: If you have time, please create an encyclopedia that I would like to show to the children of Lestania.

MsgJp:
自分は見た目がコレですから――
動物や子供はまず寄ってこないんです――
寄ってくるのはモンスターだけですね――
MsgEn:
Since I look like this--
Animals and children won't come near me--
Only monsters approach me--

MsgJp:
時間があれば、この島の植物を摘んで
少し持って帰ろうと思っています――
MsgEn: If you have the time, I'm thinking of picking some plants from this island and bringing them back with me.

MsgJp:
この地のものは
色合いの美しいものが多いですから――
MsgEn: The things of this land are often beautifully colored, so...

MsgJp:
何か言いたそうだな
――いや、言ってくれ
話をしよう
MsgEn:
It seems like you want to say something.
No, go ahead and say it.
Let's talk.

MsgJp:
白衛騎士団はいつも隊として行動するせいか
個人の力を見くびられがちだと感じている
MsgEn: The White Knight Order always acts as a team, which often leads to underestimation of individual abilities.

MsgJp:
だが、心身ともに鍛練を積んだ精鋭一人一人が
結束してさらに力を発揮する――
それが騎士団なのだ
甘く見てもらっては困る
MsgEn:
However, each elite individual in the Knight Order, who has trained both their mind and body, comes together and unleashes even greater power.
That is what the Knight Order is.
It would be troubling if you were to underestimate us.

MsgJp:
今回の任務は
覚者と騎士団員の混合編成だと聞いていたが
実際はほとんどが覚者か
MsgEn: The mission this time was supposed to be a mixed formation of Arisen and Knight members, but in reality, almost all of them are Arisen.

MsgJp:
適正というものがあってのことなのだろうが
俺としてはもう少し騎士団員がいた方が
何かと動きやすかったな――
MsgEn: I suppose there is something to be said for having the appropriate personnel, but personally, I would have found it easier to have a few more Knights around.

MsgJp:
だが――裏を返せば、俺は覚者に劣らぬ働きを
期待されているということ
白衛騎士団の働き、見てろよ
MsgEn:
However, on the other hand, it means that I am expected to work just as well as an Arisen. 
Watch the labor of the White Knight Order.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様は覚者への信頼が厚いようだが――
白衛騎士団とてその信に足るということ
証明してみせる
MsgEn:
Lord Joseph seems to have great trust in the Arisen...
Even the White Knight Order must prove themselves worthy of that trust.
I will show you the proof.

MsgJp: 異国の者、何か用か？
MsgEn: Foreigner, do you have some business with me?

MsgJp:
何か言いたいことがあるなら
それに見合った力を示してもらおう
それがダナのやり方だ
MsgEn:
If you have something to say, show me the corresponding strength for it.
That's Dana's way.

MsgJp:
エリア情報が欲しければ
ラザネイルに聞いてみるがいい
MsgEn: If you want Area Information, you should ask Razanailt.

MsgJp:
俺は戦士として村を空けることもある
その間も滞りなく村を管理しているのが女房だ
この辺りについては誰よりも詳しい
MsgEn:
As a soldier, I sometimes have to leave the village. 
During that time, my wife manages the village smoothly. 
She is more knowledgeable about this area than anyone else.

MsgJp:
――お前たちは別の大陸から来た
別の竜の覚者だと言ったな
MsgEn: You came from a different continent, and claimed to be a different Dragon's Arisen.

MsgJp:
その竜の元を離れても
竜力の恩恵を受けられるものなのか――？
MsgEn: Even if one were to separate from the source of that dragon's power, is it still possible to receive the benefits of Dragon Force?

MsgJp:
数々の無礼を許してくれ
もっとも、その原因の大部分はガルドリンの
口の悪さにある
MsgEn:
Please forgive me for numerous rudenesses.
However, the main cause of them lies in Gurdolin's foul mouth.

MsgJp:
あれさえなければ我らは似たもの同士かも
しれない
MsgEn: If not for that, we might be kindred spirits.

MsgJp:
我々を出会った頃の我々とは思うな
どんな敵が相手でも躊躇はしない
MsgEn:
Do not think of us as the same as when we first met.
We will not hesitate against any enemy.

MsgJp:
客人の助力には感謝しているが
ここは我らの世界だからな
MsgEn: I appreciate the assistance of the guests, but this is our world, you know.

MsgJp:
空気の、匂いの変化がわかるか？
浄化は確実に進んでいるのだ
MsgEn:
Can you sense the change in the air and the scent?
The purification is progressing nicely.

MsgJp:
ダナのことかい？
そんならあたしが話を聞こうじゃないか
MsgEn:
Is it about Dana?
If so, then why don't I listen to the story?

MsgJp:
ここ、ダナでは戦うこと、力強いことが
何よりも大切なのさ
ずっと昔から、そうやって村を支えてきてるんだ
MsgEn:
Is it about Dana?
If so, then why don't I listen to the story?

MsgJp:
戦士たちが強くあることで、この村は
他の部族からも一目置かれてるんだよ
MsgEn: Because the warriors are strong, this village is respected by other tribes.

MsgJp:
あたしは武器持って戦いには出ないけど
戦士たちの世話をすることで戦ってるのさ
MsgEn: I don't wield weapons or join in battle, but I fight by taking care of the soldiers.

MsgJp:
異国の覚者がどれほどのものか知らないけど
とりあえず、エリアマスターとして
自己紹介といこうかね
MsgEn: I don't know how powerful the foreign Arisen is, but for now, as an Area Master, let me introduce myself.

MsgJp:
あたしはラザネイル
ファーラナ平原一帯を預かるエリアマスターさ
MsgEn: I am Razanailt, the Area Master responsible for the entire Farana Plains.

MsgJp:
――ダンナのピサルはダナの族長であり
戦士たちの長でもあって忙しいからね
エリアのことはあたしが仕切ってるのさ
MsgEn:
My husband Pisarr is the chieftain of the Dana tribe and also the leader of the warriors, so he's busy. 
As for the area, I'm the one in charge.

MsgJp:
そう、ダナは戦士の村――
うちの戦士たちの働きで
このファーラナ平原はフィンダムの中じゃ
侵食魔の活動を抑えられてる方だよ
MsgEn:
Yes, Dana is the warrior village.
Thanks to the efforts of our soldiers, the Farana Plains in Phindym is one of the areas with less infected activity.

MsgJp:
強くあることで、人々を
そして大地を守ることができるのさ
大切なものと生き残るために
何よりも大切にすべきは強さってこと――
MsgEn:
By being strong, we can protect the people and so, the land as well.
To survive and protect what is important above all else, strength is what should be cherished —

MsgJp:
アンタもこの村で何か言いたいことがあれば
強さを示すんだね
MsgEn: If you have something to say in this village, then show your strength, okay?

MsgJp:
そうだ、コレ持っていきな！
何かの足しにはなるはずだよ
MsgEn:
That's right, bring this along!
It should be a useful addition to something.

MsgJp:
あんたも覚者なら竜のために戦うのが仕事だろ
これ、持っていきな！
気合入れて戦うんだよ！
MsgEn:
If you're also an Arisen, then it's your job to fight for the sake of the dragon, right? 
Take this with you! Fight with all your might!

MsgJp:
そうだ、これをあんたに渡そうと思って――
ほら、いつも力を貸してもらってるからね！
たまにはお礼しとかないと女がすたるってものよ
MsgEn:
Yes, I thought I'd give this to you.
You know, because you always lend me your strength!
If I don't thank you once in a while, a woman will lose her charm, you know!

MsgJp:
ふぅ――
侵食のせいでピリピリしてるってのに
さらに問題が起きるなんてね
MsgEn:
Phew... 
To think that on top of the irritation caused by the Corruption, even more problems would arise.

MsgJp:
ああ、最近地鳴りがひどいだろ？
タラスクが現れる前触れなんじゃないかって
皆心配してるのさ
MsgEn:
Oh, recently the ground shaking has been really bad, huh?
Everyone is worried that it might be a sign of the Tarasque appearing.

MsgJp:
地鳴りに神経質になってるのは人間だけじゃないよ
特に小さい魔物なんかはすっかり怯えちまって
あちこちに見張りを立ててるみたいだ
MsgEn:
It's not just humans who get nervous about earthquakes, you know.
Especially small enemies seem to be completely terrified.
It looks like they have set up guards everywhere.

MsgJp:
例えば《<SPOT 918>》とかね――
あんたも気を付けときな
小物とはいえ、突然襲いかかってこられたら
ケガするかもしれないんだからね
MsgEn:
For example, "<SPOT 918>", you know...
You should be careful too, you know.
Even though they're small, if they suddenly attack you, you might get injured.

MsgJp:
え？　地鳴りについて、かい？
相変わらずさ――
MsgEn: Huh? About the earthquake, huh? As always...

MsgJp:
せめて、昔の記録でも漁れば
この地鳴りの正体についてわかりそうなものだけど
あいにく、昔の本がある遺跡は
獣だらけになっちまってね
MsgEn:
At least, if we could search through old records, we might be able to understand the true nature of this earth-shaking phenomenon.
Unfortunately, the ancient ruins where old books are said to exist have been overrun by animals.

MsgJp:
ああ、そうそう、本といえば――
あんたに頼みごとをしたいって子がいるんだ
MsgEn: Oh, speaking of books... There's a child who wants to ask you for a favor.

MsgJp:
話を聞きにいってくれるなら
連絡しとくからさ、まずはあたしに話しかけてよ
MsgEn: If you're willing to listen, I'll inform you, so first talk to me.

MsgJp:
いいところに来たね
あんたに伝えたいことがあったんだよ
MsgEn: You've come to a good place, there's something I want to tell you.

MsgJp:
実は、今まで封鎖してた《<STG 860>》を
開放することにしたのさ
MsgEn: Actually, I have decided to unblock the <STG 860> that had been blocked until now.

MsgJp:
あそこにも埃っぽい過去の文献がこれでもかと
しまいこんであるからね――
中を調べれば、何かわかるんじゃないかと思うんだ
MsgEn:
Because there, too, are dusty old documents piled up as far as the eye can see—
I think if we were to investigate inside, we might find something.

MsgJp:
でね、よかったらあんたにも
調査に行ってもらえないかと思ってさ
MsgEn: Hey, if you're up for it, I was thinking maybe you could go on a survey too.

MsgJp:
ウチの若いのだけじゃ、貴重な手がかりがあっても
魔物を狩るのに必死になっちまって
見逃すかもしれないからね――
MsgEn: It's because if it's just our young ones, even if we have valuable clues, they might become desperate in hunting down the enemies, and they might overlook them, you know.

MsgJp:
もう自由に入れるようになってるから
気が向いたら頼むよ
MsgEn: Now you can enter freely, so feel free to ask whenever you feel like it.

MsgJp:
そうそう――ひとつ、面白い話があるよ
聞いてくかい？
MsgEn: Oh, by the way... I have an interesting story. Would you like to hear it?

MsgJp:
遺跡にあった本を持ち帰って調べたら
東の水路は《マグサス古水路》に
繋がってることがわかったんだよ
MsgEn: When I brought back the book I found in the ruins and examined it, I discovered that the eastern waterway connects to the "Magusas Ancient Watercourse".

MsgJp:
《マグサス古水路》は水路と墓場が一緒になった
変わった施設でね――その昔、タラスクと
死闘を繰り広げた古将マグサスが眠っているのさ
MsgEn:
The Magusas Ancient Watercourse is a peculiar facility where a watercourse and a graveyard have merged. 
From ancient times, the renowned general Magusas who engaged in a fierce battle with the Tarasque, lies asleep within.

MsgJp:
何せ、ダナの誇る英雄が眠ってるんだ――
きっとタラスク撃退のための、何らかの
手がかりが遺されてるに違いないよ
MsgEn:
Well, because Dana's proud hero is sleeping--
There must surely be some kind of clue left behind for repelling the Tarasque.

MsgJp:
今、《マグサス古水路》に向かうための橋を
大急ぎで復旧しているところさ
橋ができたら、きっとあんたも便利になるよ！
MsgEn:
Right now, they're rushing to quickly restore the bridge that leads to the "Magusas Ancient Watercourse". 
Once the bridge is complete, it will surely become more convenient for you too!

MsgJp:
まぁ、《<SPOT 920>》辺りに魔物が出てきて
何度も工事が止まっちまってるんだけどね――
MsgEn: Well, it seems that monsters have been appearing around <SPOT 920>, causing the construction to stop multiple times...

MsgJp:
あんた、よかったらあの辺りを探索して
出る魔物を片っ端からぶん殴ってくれないかい？
一応お礼もするからさ
引き受けてくれるんなら、もう一度声かけておくれよ
MsgEn:
Hey, if you're up for it, how about exploring around that area and beating up enemies one after another?
I'll give you a reward for it, so if you're willing to accept, please let me know again.

MsgJp:
あ、あんた
前に言ってた《マグサス古水路》に向かうための
橋だけど、修復が終わったから
自由に通っていいからね！
MsgEn:
Ah, it's you. This is the bridge that leads to the "Magusas Ancient Watercourse" I mentioned before. 
The repairs are finished, so feel free to pass through!

MsgJp:
でも、いざ《マグサス古水路》の封鎖を
解こうとしたら、突然鎧の魔物が出てきてね――
鍵を奪われちまったのさ
MsgEn: But when we tried to unblock the Magusas Ancient Watercourse, suddenly an armored enemy appeared... and they stole the key.

MsgJp:
鎧の魔物は
そこらへんをウロウロしてるから
討伐しさえすれば問題は解決なんだけどね
MsgEn: The armored enemies are wandering around there, so if we just defeat them, the problem will be resolved.

MsgJp:
討伐に向かう戦士を決める
ところまではいったんだけど
最近は侵食魔の動きも活発だろ？
村の守りを固めるのが先になっちゃったんだよ――
MsgEn:
We've decided on the warriors who will head out for the expedition, but lately, the movements of the Corrupted have been quite active, haven't they?
We had to prioritize fortifying the village's defenses first--

MsgJp:
地鳴りは問題だけど、子供もいるこの村の
守りを固めることが何より大切なんだよ――
うちの戦士たちも、この状況で村を放ってまで
外に行きたがるような子たちじゃないからね
MsgEn:
While the earthquake is a problem, the most important thing is to strengthen the defense of this village, where our children dwell. 
Our soldiers are not so immature to want to leave the village and go outside in this situation, you know.

MsgJp:
――そうだ、あんたが手伝ってくれたら
あたしら、すっごく助かるんだけど――
お礼はするよ、どう？
MsgEn:
- If you could help us, we would be really grateful... 
- We'll make sure to thank you, how about that?

MsgJp:
もし手伝ってくれるなら
元々調査に行くはずだった戦士を紹介するから
その件でもう一度話しかけてもらえるかい
MsgEn:
If you're willing to help, allow me to introduce a soldier who was originally supposed to go on the investigation. 
Could you please talk to them about that matter again?

MsgJp:
そうそう！　この前は《<SPOT 921>》の
魔物の討伐に行ってくれてありがとうね！
エリアマスターとして、お礼を言っとくよ
MsgEn:
Oh, right! Thank you so much for going to defeat the enemy in the <SPOT 921> the other day! 
As an Area Master, I'll express my gratitude.

MsgJp:
あの後、《マグサス古水路》の封鎖も
解いておいたよ
MsgEn: Afterwards, I also unblocked the Magusas Ancient Watercourse.

MsgJp:
何せ古将の墓ってだけあって
昔から時々盗掘者が出るようなところでね――
多分、中では武具か何かが手に入るはずさ
MsgEn:
Considering that it's the tomb of an ancient general, it's no wonder that occasionally there are grave robbers, you know. 
Perhaps inside, we can find some equipment or something.

MsgJp:
あんたも興味があったら行ってみな！
なに、色々手伝ってくれてるんだ
自由に入ってくれていいよ
あたしが許すんだから
MsgEn:
If you're interested, you should give it a try too!
What? You've been helping me with various things.
You're free to enter.
I'll allow it.

MsgJp:
あんたも感じること、あるかい？
最近は特に地鳴りがひどくなってきたじゃないか
MsgEn: Do you also feel it? Lately, the earthquakes have been getting worse, haven't they?

MsgJp:
やっぱり、いよいよタラスクの出現が
近いみたいだね――
MsgEn: Indeed, it seems that the appearance of the Tarasque is finally near.

MsgJp:
あんたもいざという時のために
装備や道具なんかには気を付けときな！
MsgEn: For the sake of emergencies, make sure to be careful with your equipment and tools!

MsgJp:
そういや、あんた《白骨岩》は知ってる？
ここら辺で時々採れる鉱石なんだけど
何かに使えると思うから、見つけたら採っとくといい
いいかい、戦士たるもの常に備え、だよ
MsgEn:
By the way, have you heard of White Bone Rock? 
It's a type of ore that can sometimes be found around here. 
I think it can be useful for something, so it's a good idea to collect it if you come across it. 
Remember, as a soldier, you should always be prepared.

MsgJp:
ちょうどいいところに来てくれたじゃないか！
大事件だよ！
――とうとうタラスクが現れたのさ！
MsgEn:
You came at just the right time, didn't you! It's a huge event!
―― The Tarasque has finally appeared!

MsgJp:
さっそくうちの戦士たちが討伐に向かったんだけど
今まで侵食魔との戦いもあって
みんな疲労してたんだろうね――
負けて帰ってきちまってさ――
MsgEn:
Our warriors immediately headed out to subdue it, but they had been battling the Corruption and such up until now,
so I guess everyone was exhausted---
and they ended up returning in defeat---

MsgJp:
あんた、異国の覚者なんだろ！？
あのタラスクの討伐してきてくれないかい？
MsgEn:
Are you an Arisen from a foreign land?! 
Would you be willing to vanquish the Tarasque for us?

MsgJp:
引き受けてくれるなら
タラスクの居場所を知ってる子に話を通すから
あたしに話しかけておくれ
MsgEn:
If you're willing to take on the task, I'll have a conversation with the child who knows the whereabouts of the Tarasque.
Please speak to me.

MsgJp:
ああ、よく来たね！
あんたがタラスクを退治してくれたおかげで
地鳴りも聞こえなくなったよ！
MsgEn: Ah, you've come! Thanks to you for defeating the Tarasque, we can no longer hear the rumbling of the land!

MsgJp:
最近色んなことが起こるから
うちの戦士たちも疲れててさ――
あんたに助けてもらえて、本当に感謝してるよ
MsgEn: Lately, so many things have been happening, and my soldiers are tired... I really appreciate your help.

MsgJp:
武勇の恩には報いるのが
このダナのならわしだよ！
支援品を格上げしておいたから
またいつでもダナに顔見せにきとくれ！
MsgEn:
It is our custom to repay the debt of bravery. 
I have upgraded the support goods for you. 
So please feel free to come and show your face in Dana anytime!

MsgJp:
また困ったことが起きたよ――
こんなに問題が起きるなんて
一体フィンダムはどうしちまったのかね
MsgEn:
Another problem has occurred -
I never thought so many issues would arise.
What on earth happened to Phindym?

MsgJp:
実は、また地鳴りがするようになったんだ
あんたにタラスクを退治してもらったはずなのに
おかしいだろ？
MsgEn:
Actually, the ground is shaking again.
We asked you to defeat the Tarasque, didn't we?
Something's not right.

MsgJp:
あの地鳴り――タラスクのものじゃなかったのかねぇ
もうあたしらには見当もつかないよ
MsgEn:
That shaking ground... it wasn't caused by the Tarasque, was it?
We have no idea anymore.

MsgJp:
――このファーラナ平原のはずれ
《<SPOT 904>》に、異文化を持った村があるんだ
そこの住人なら何かを知っているかも――
MsgEn:
At the outskirts of the Farana Plain, there's a village known as <SPOT 904>, inhabited by people of a different culture. 
Those villagers might know something...

MsgJp:
でも、あそこの住人、どうもダナの人間が
嫌いみたいで交流が難しいんだよねぇ――
MsgEn: But it seems like the people living there really don't like the residents of Dana, so it's difficult to interact with them.

MsgJp:
ねぇ、もしよかったらあんたが探りを
入れてきてくれないかい？
通りかかったらでいいからさ
MsgEn:
Hey, if you don't mind, could you do some probing for me?
If you happen to pass by, that would be great.

MsgJp:
ああ――そういえば、あんた
《マヌンの集落》に顔出してくれたんだろ？
MsgEn: Ah, by the way, didn't you show up in Manun Village?

MsgJp:
あそこの長老のエナン――とか
いう人から手紙が届いたんだ
MsgEn: I received a letter from the elder of that place, Henin.

MsgJp:
なんでも
「信頼に値する相手だと証明してくれ」
「そのために《<SPOT 901>》
　の魔物を倒してくれ」ってことらしいよ
MsgEn:
It seems they want you to 'prove yourself as a trustworthy ally.' 
You can do that by 'defeating the monsters in <SPOT 901>,' according to the villagers.

MsgJp:
要するに、武勇を見せろってことさ――
マヌンの住人たちって、もしかしたら
あたしらと似た文化を持ってるのかもね
MsgEn: In short, they're telling us to show our bravery, you know? The residents of Manun might actually have a similar culture to ours.

MsgJp:
まぁ、とにかくそういうことなんだ
彼らに“信頼に値する相手”だって証明するため
魔物退治に行ってくれる気になったら
また声かけておくれよ
MsgEn:
Well, anyway, that's how it is. 
In order to prove that we are "trustworthy allies" to them, if you ever feel like going on a monster extermination, please let us know again.

MsgJp:
そうそう、あんたが
《マヌンの集落》のエナン爺さんに
聞いてきてくれた《知恵の小塔》なんだけどさ
MsgEn: Oh, that's right. You brought me info about the Small Tower of Wisdom that you asked Henin from Manun Village about, didn't you?

MsgJp:
なんでも、あそこに収められた昔の本に
今度こそ手がかりがあるかもっていうから
封鎖を解くことにしたんだ
MsgEn: Because there might be a clue in the old books stored there, we decided to lift the blockade this time.

MsgJp:
今、手の空いてる子たちに
本を漁らせてるところさ
MsgEn: Now, I'm letting the children who have free hands search for books.

MsgJp:
古臭い本以外にも色々ありそうだから
あんたも入りたかったら入っていいよ
何か見つけたら、好きに持って帰りな
MsgEn:
Besides old-fashioned books, there seem to be various other things here. 
If you want to join, you're welcome to. 
If you find something you like, feel free to take it home.

MsgJp:
まぁ、わかってるとは思うけど
本の持ち出しは禁止させてもらうけどね
MsgEn: Well, I think you understand, but I have to prohibit taking books out.

MsgJp:
ああ！
何だってあんたはいつも
村が危ないって時に来てくれるんだろうね？
MsgEn:
Ah!
Why is it that you always come when the village is in danger, I wonder?

MsgJp:
実は今、大変なのさ
タラスクみたいな巨大な動くものを
見たって報告があってね――
MsgEn:
Actually, right now things are tough.
There have been reports of a gigantic moving creature, like a Tarasque.

MsgJp:
最悪、すぐにでも村ごと別の場所へ
移動しなけりゃ踏み潰されちまうかもしれない
そうなったら、あんたにも
手を貸してもらうかも――
MsgEn:
At worst, we may need to move the entire village to a different location immediately, or else we might be crushed. 
If that happens, I may ask for your help as well...

MsgJp:
とにかく今は情報を集めることで
手一杯なんだ
何か用があるなら、改めて話しかけてもらえるかい
MsgEn:
Right now, I'm really busy gathering information. 
If you have something to discuss, could you please talk to me again later?

MsgJp:
あんたのお陰で地鳴りも止んで
平和な生活が戻ってきたよ
ずいぶん世話になったね！
MsgEn:
Thanks to you, even the earthquakes have stopped, and peace has returned to our lives.
We are truly grateful for all your help!

MsgJp:
まだまだ侵食魔はウロウロしちゃいるけど
ダナは戦士の村だ
そこら辺にいる侵食魔くらい、痛くもかゆくもないさ
MsgEn:
The corrupting monsters are still lurking around, but Dana is a warrior's village. 
The infected around here are nothing to be worried about.

MsgJp:
侵食と地鳴り――
二つの厄介ごとを抱えてたこの村に
手を貸してくれてありがとう
MsgEn:
Corruption and Earthquakes -
Thank you for lending a hand to this village burdened with two troubles.

MsgJp:
これほど力を貸してもらったんだ
エリアマスターとして
それからダナの族長ピサルの女房として
あんたには十分なお礼をしなきゃならない
MsgEn:
I've received so much help.
As an Area Master, and also as the wife of Pisarr, the chief of Dana, I must express my gratitude to you properly.

MsgJp:
とりあえず、あんたへの支給品に
より一層良いものを揃えるってことは
決まってるんだけど――
MsgEn: For now, it has been decided to gather even better supplies for you, but...

MsgJp:
それ以外に、どんなお礼をしようか
迷ってるところなんだよ
何せ、この恩を返せるようなお礼なんて
中々思い浮かばないもんだからさ！
MsgEn:
Apart from that, I'm at a loss as to what kind of gratitude I should express. 
After all, it's not easy to come up with a way to repay this favor!

MsgJp:
まぁ、これからもダナには寄るんだろ？
勇敢な戦士として、いつでも迎えるからさ
お礼についても追々考えていくことにしようか――
MsgEn:
Well, I guess I'll continue relying on Dana from now on, right?
As a brave soldier, I'll always be there to welcome you.
Let's think about the expression of gratitude little by little as well.

MsgJp:
あんた、覚者ってなら竜のために戦うんだろ？
エモノは一体何なんだい？
大剣？　それとも弓？
MsgEn:
Hey, if you're an Arisen, then you fight for the dragons, right? 
So what exactly are those? 
Are they like greatswords or bows?

MsgJp:
もしもあんたがそこそこ槍を使えるようなら――
いつか、精霊槍の達人に紹介してやってもいいよ
レスタニアには精霊槍を扱う戦士は
いなさそうだからね
MsgEn:
If you're reasonably skilled with a spear, then someday I could introduce you to a master of the Spirit Lance. 
There don't seem to be any soldiers in Lestania who handle Spirit Lances, you see.

MsgJp:
戦士に休息の場を提供するのがわしの仕事だ
宿の手配から弱化回復まで、何でも言ってくれ
MsgEn:
It is my job to provide a place of rest for warriors. 
From arranging accommodations to weakening recovery, tell me anything you need.

MsgJp:
勇猛な戦士にも休息は必要だ
必要な時に必要なだけ休まねばならん
MsgEn:
Even a brave warrior needs rest.
You must rest as much as necessary, when necessary.

MsgJp:
寝床を使うなら<VAL PRICE_INN>貰うことになるが
いいか？
MsgEn: If you use the bed, you will have to pay <VAL PRICE_INN> gold, but are you okay with that?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
見ての通り、今は空いている
よし、好きな寝床を使うといい！
MsgEn:
As you can see, it is currently vacant.
Alright, you should use whichever sleeping spot you like!

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
戦って、一時の休息を楽しむ――
そしてまた戦いに出る！
どうだ、これこそ戦士として理想の生活だろう
MsgEn:
Fight, and enjoy a momentary rest--
And then, go forth to battle again!
How is it? This is surely the ideal life as a Soldier, isn't it?

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》なら
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>必要だが――
MsgEn: If it's "Treat Weakness", it's <VAL PRICE_WEAK>. What do you want to do?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
ハッハッハ！
弱化にはなっていないようだ
弱気にはなっているようだがな
MsgEn:
Hahaha!
You don't seem to have weakened.
You seem to have become more timid, though.

MsgJp:
わしも今は引退してのんびりしているが
鍛練は怠っていないぞ
MsgEn: I am also currently retired and enjoying a leisurely life, but I have not neglected my training.

MsgJp:
――まずは身の証を立ててから
来るべきじゃないのか？
MsgEn: First, shouldn't we establish our credibility before we come?

MsgJp:
身の証を立てる前に
休息を取りたいというなら
そりゃ、かまわんが――
MsgEn:
Before proving your innocence, if you wish to take some rest,
Well then, it's fine...

MsgJp:
ハーイ、色々揃えてるわよ
どうぞ見て行ってね
MsgEn:
Yes, I have various things.
Please feel free to take a look!

MsgJp:
ピサルとラザネイル、素敵でしょ？
ああいう夫婦が理想なのよね
MsgEn:
Pisarr and Razanailt, aren't they wonderful?
That's the ideal kind of couple.

MsgJp:
たくさん覚者がいたら
一人一人が受けられる竜力が少なくならない？
何人もの覚者より、強い覚者が一人いた方が
安心できると思うんだけど
MsgEn:
If there were many Arisen, wouldn't the Dragon Force that each one can receive be diminished?
I think it would be more reassuring to have one strong Arisen than a number of Arisen.

MsgJp: あれ？　何も買っていかないの？
MsgEn: Huh? You're not buying anything?

MsgJp:
あ――もしかして、騒ぎになってた
異国の覚者さん？
MsgEn: Oh, are you the Arisen from the foreign land that caused all the commotion?

MsgJp:
――まずは身の証を立ててから
買い物しに来てくれるとうれしいわ
ちょっと信用できないもの
MsgEn: --First, I would be happy if you could prove your identity before shopping. I can't trust you that easily.

MsgJp:
や、やぁ――
クレストのことかな？
MsgEn: Ah, um... Is it about Crests?

MsgJp:
クレストっていうのは、装備に付けられる
特殊な力の結晶らしいよ
僕は管理を任されてるだけなんだけど――
MsgEn:
Crests are apparently crystals that can be attached to equipment, possessing special powers. 
I'm just in charge of managing them...

MsgJp:
僕は子供の頃から線が細くて
戦いでも狩りでも中々手柄を上げられなくて――
MsgEn: Since I was a child, I have always been frail, unable to achieve any remarkable feats in battles or hunts...

MsgJp:
なんて、よそから来た人には
この気持ち、わからないよな
MsgEn: Oh, someone who comes from elsewhere would never understand this feeling.

MsgJp:
戦いよりもこういうことの方が向いてるだろうって
ピサルからこの仕事を任されたんだ
自分でもそう思うよ
MsgEn:
I was entrusted with this job by Pisarr, who believed that I was more suited for something like this than for battle. 
I think so too.

MsgJp:
――だけど、イーヴィの好みは
“誰よりも強い男”なんだよなぁ
MsgEn: But Evey's preference is for a 'man stronger than anyone else,' you know.

MsgJp:
あの――
身の証を立ててから来てもらえないかな
こういうのって信用が大事だからさ
MsgEn:
You know, it would be great if you could come after proving yourself.
Because trust is important in situations like this.

MsgJp:
戦いに行くの？
パーティの編成なら私がお手伝いするわ！
MsgEn:
Are you going to the battle?
If you need help with party formation, I can assist you!

MsgJp:
力強く、信頼できる仲間と集まることで
一人ひとりの戦士の働きもよくなるはずよ！
MsgEn: By gathering together strong and reliable comrades, the efforts of each individual soldier should also improve!

MsgJp:
ポーンを呼ぶこともできるけど――
どうする？
MsgEn:
You can also call for Pawns.
What will you do?

MsgJp:
変わった衣装――
それがあなたたちの力を引き出す衣なのね
ううん、見慣れないだけで――素敵よ
MsgEn:
Unusual costumes...
Those clothes bring out your power, don't they?
No, it's just because they're unfamiliar... They're wonderful.

MsgJp:
あっ――
えっと、異国の方――
身の証を立ててもいない怪しい人と喋ってたら
族長に怒られちゃうから――
MsgEn:
Ah—
Um, traveler from a foreign land—
Talking to a suspicious person like me, who hasn't even proven their identity might anger the clan chief—

MsgJp: ――何だ
MsgEn: ...What is it?

MsgJp:
この村を纏めているのは
壮健で誇り高き族長、ピサルだ
MsgEn: The one who leads this village is the robust and proud chieftain, Pisarr.

MsgJp: 異国の覚者、か――
MsgEn: The Arisen from a foreign land, eh――

MsgJp:
ほう、なるほど
中々鋭い目をしている
MsgEn: Oh, I see. You have quite sharp eyes.

MsgJp: まずは身の証を立てるんだな
MsgEn: First, prove yourself.

MsgJp: おっ、何か用かよ？
MsgEn: Oh, do you need something?

MsgJp:
武器の手入れはいつでも万全だ！
早いとこ戦いに出て手柄を立てたいぜ
MsgEn:
I always ensure that my weapons are in perfect condition!
I can't wait to go into battle and earn some credit!

MsgJp:
俺だってダナの戦士
狩りでもいい働きをしているはずだ！
MsgEn:
I, too, am a soldier of Dana.
I should be able to contribute to the hunt!

MsgJp:
族長が狩りに行く時にでも
同行させてもらえりゃ早いんだけどな――
中々アピールするタイミングが――
MsgEn:
If I could just accompany the chief when they go hunting, we could expedite things, you know――
It's just difficult to find the right timing to make my appeal――

MsgJp:
盾も剣も、毎日点検しては磨いてるんだぜ
もちろん鍛錬も欠かさねぇ！
MsgEn: I inspect and polish my shield and sword every day, and of course, I never neglect my training!

MsgJp:
てめぇ、まずは身の証を立ててからにしろよな
この村で怪しげなことしたら承知しねぇぞ
MsgEn:
First, prove yourself before you speak.
I won't tolerate any suspicious activities in this village.

MsgJp: 私に用か？
MsgEn: You wanted to see me?

MsgJp:
村に外敵が侵入しないように
ここで見張っているのだ
MsgEn: I'm here to watch over this place and to ensure no enemies invade the village.

MsgJp:
ダナはフィンダムでも知られた勇猛な部族の村だが
子供や年寄り、戦いの苦手な者もいる
彼らを守ってこその部族だ
MsgEn:
Dana is a village known all over Phindym for its brave and fierce tribe, but it also has children, elders, and those who are not skilled in combat. 
Protecting them is what makes our tribe strong.

MsgJp:
ずっと見張りをしていて疲れないのか、だと？
この程度どうということはない
MsgEn: Do you mean that you never get tired from keeping watch? It's nothing to be concerned about.

MsgJp:
私に構ってないで村に入ったらどうだ
大方、ピサルかラザネイルに会いに来たのだろう？
MsgEn:
Why don't you enter the village instead of ignoring me?
Most likely, you've come to meet Pisarr or Razanailt, haven't you?

MsgJp: すまないが、まずは身の証を立てるのが先だろう
MsgEn: I'm sorry, but first you should prove your identity.

MsgJp: はいはい、何の御用？
MsgEn: Yes, yes. What can I help you with?

MsgJp:
うちも育ち盛りの子が多いからね
山のように用意した食事が
あっという間に無くなるのは見てて気分いいもんさ
MsgEn:
We also have many children who are in their growing years, you know. 
It's satisfying to see the meals we prepared like a mountain disappear in no time.

MsgJp:
アンタも覚者だったら戦いに出ること、あるんだろ？
この村でしっかり食べて、体を休めて
次の旅立ちに備えるんだよ
MsgEn:
If you are also an Arisen, there must be something you fight for, right?
Eat well and rest your body in this village, and prepare yourself for the next journey.

MsgJp:
ふぅ、洗濯物は済んだし
次は家畜の世話でもしに行こうかな
MsgEn:
Phew, the laundry is done.
Now, should I go take care of the livestock?

MsgJp:
あっ――
あんた、さっき表で騒いでた奴らの仲間だね？
MsgEn: Ah... Are you one of the people who were causing a ruckus outside earlier?

MsgJp:
本当に覚者だっていうんなら
さっさと身の証を立ててきちまいなよ
そしたらややこしいことも無くなるんだからさ
MsgEn:
If you really claim to be an Arisen, then quickly prove yourself and settle it.
That way, there won't be any more complications.

MsgJp:
《武霊の庵》のそばにある物見台はサイコーなんだ！
フィンダム全体が見渡せるし
“芯なる樹”がすっごくキレイに見えるよ
MsgEn:
The observation deck next to the Spirit Arts Hut is awesome!
You can oversee the entire Phindym, and the Core Tree looks incredibly beautiful.

MsgJp: 何だよ？　ここはオレの場所だかんな！
MsgEn: What's going on? This is my spot, you know!

MsgJp:
ここからは村の中くらいなら見渡せるよ
でも、やっぱり村の外を眺めたいなぁ――
MsgEn:
From here, you can see around the middle of the village.
But, I still want to gaze at the outside of the village...

MsgJp:
村の入り口はワイニが守ってる
万が一魔物が村に入ってきたって
ダナは戦士の村だからへっちゃらだ！
MsgEn:
The village entrance is guarded by Wine. 
Even if monsters somehow get into the village, it's no big deal because Dana is a warrior's village!

MsgJp:
一人前の戦士になったら
ワイニみたいに武器を持って村を守りたいんだ
MsgEn: Once I become a skilled warrior, I want to protect the village like Wine does, wielding a weapon.

MsgJp: ――怪しい人とはあんまり喋っちゃダメなんだ
MsgEn: - You shouldn't talk too much with suspicious people.

MsgJp: なによ
MsgEn: What is it?

MsgJp:
これからは腕力だけじゃやってけないわ
知識よ、あらゆる状況に対応できる知識が必要なの！
みんなわかってないの！
MsgEn:
From now on, it won't be enough to rely on arm strength alone.
Knowledge, I need knowledge that can adapt to any situation!
Everyone just doesn't understand!

MsgJp:
属性がどうとか弱点がなんだとか
そういう知識だけじゃなくて！
もっと幅広い知識を身に付けたいの――
戦いの役に立つはずよ
MsgEn:
It's not just about knowing attributes and weaknesses. 
I want to acquire a broader range of knowledge. 
It should be useful in battle.

MsgJp:
暇なの？
ボーッとしてないで、知識を蓄えるなり
身体を鍛えるなりした方がいいんじゃない？
MsgEn:
Are you free? 
Instead of spacing out, it would be better to accumulate knowledge or train your body, wouldn't it?

MsgJp:
なんなの、怪しい人ね！
信用してほしいんなら、さっさと身の証を
立ててこればいいじゃない！
MsgEn:
What's the matter? You're such a suspicious person! 
If you want me to trust you, then quickly provide some proof and establish it!

MsgJp: どうした？
MsgEn: Hm, what is it?

MsgJp:
何か面白い話は無いか、だと？
昔話でもすると思ったか
ヌムム――年寄り扱いしおって
MsgEn:
Do you want to hear an interesting story or something? 
Did you think I was going to tell you an old tale? 
Gah, treating me like an old man.

MsgJp:
昔話を聞いて喜ぶ暇があれば
将来のために何ができるかを考えるんだな
MsgEn: If you have time to rejoice in listening to old tales, then ponder what you can do for the future.

MsgJp:
ダナの村は戦士の村だ
強くあるからこそ、護るべきものを
支えることができるのだ
MsgEn:
Dana's village is a village of Soldiers.
It is because they are strong that they can protect what needs to be protected and support it.

MsgJp:
確かに――
俺も、そこのオドランも
すでに戦士としての役からは降りておる――
MsgEn: Indeed, I and Audran over there have already retired from our roles as soldiers.

MsgJp:
だが！
だからといって日々の研鑽を怠ることはない
若者に道を譲っただけのこと
MsgEn:
However! I will never neglect my daily training and pursuit of knowledge. 
It's just a matter of giving way to the younger generation.

MsgJp:
お前は今、別のミッションを進行している
ようだな――
MsgEn: It seems that you are currently engaged in another Mission, my lord.

MsgJp:
そのミッションの参加を取りやめてから
あらためてここに来るんだな
MsgEn: After canceling your participation in that mission, you have come here again.

MsgJp:
自分の今の状況を把握することは
戦う者にとって常に重要なことだ
MsgEn: Understanding one's current situation is always important for a warrior.

MsgJp:
覚者だと言う割に
身の証も立てられんのか？
そんなことでは信用できんな
MsgEn:
Even though you claim to be an Arisen, can you not provide any proof of your abilities?
I can't trust someone who can't even do that.

MsgJp:
アンタ――他のミッションを
受けている最中じゃないか
MsgEn: Are you――in the middle of receiving another mission?

MsgJp:
そちらを先に片づけるか、エントリーを
中止してからまた来るんだね
MsgEn: Shall we tidy up that area first, or should we cancel the entry and come back later?

MsgJp: さ、用件は何？
MsgEn: So, what's the subject?

MsgJp:
――ふぅん
なかなか鍛えてるね
MsgEn: Oh, I see. You're quite well trained.

MsgJp:
大物を狩りに行くなら
レウェラに声をかけて
仲間を集めた方がいいよ
MsgEn: If you're going to hunt a big game, it's better to ask Lewela for help and gather your comrades.

MsgJp:
覚者が何人も居るってことは
ポーンもいっぱいいるんだろうね
アンタのところの大陸には
MsgEn: There must be many Arisen, which means there are probably plenty of Pawns too in your continent.

MsgJp:
いざという時の戦力に
余裕がありそうで羨ましいよ
MsgEn: It's enviable to have such a surplus of strength when the time comes.

MsgJp: 身の証を立ててから出直してくるんだね
MsgEn: Come back after proving your worth.

MsgJp:
別の国の覚者――
何だ、話聞く
MsgEn:
Arisen from another country...
Well, what's the story?

MsgJp:
安全守るの、手間かかってる
泊まるなら<VAL PRICE_INN>いる
MsgEn:
Protecting safety is time-consuming.
If you stay, it will cost <VAL PRICE_INN>.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
金、いらない
安全な寝床、好きに休んでいけ
MsgEn:
Gold, I don't need it.
A safe sleeping place, rest as you please.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
俺《弱化の治療》できる
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>だ
MsgEn: If it's "Treat Weakness", it's <VAL PRICE_WEAK>. What do you want to do?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
弱化――？
なってない
気にしすぎだ
MsgEn:
Weakened――?
Not at all.
You're worrying too much.

MsgJp:
お前、珍しい客だ
皆、お前が気になってる
MsgEn:
You're a rare customer. 
Everyone is curious about you.

MsgJp:
皆が安全に眠れる
毎日食べられる
何かに襲われない――
これが大事、一番大事だ
MsgEn:
Everyone being able to sleep safely, being able to eat every day, not being attacked by anything――
This is important, the most important thing.

MsgJp:
外に出ると魔物に襲われる
争いに巻き込まれる
病気にもなる――
なら、ここで仲間を守っていきたい
MsgEn:
When you go outside, you will be attacked by enemies.
You will be drawn into conflicts.
You can even fall ill--
So, I want to protect my comrades here.

MsgJp:
お前も、大人しくしてるなら
ここにずっと居ていい
好きにしろ
MsgEn:
If you're staying here quietly, you can stay here as long as you like. 
Do as you please.

MsgJp:
オレ、コレ調べてる！
使い方ワカル！　仲間呼ぶなら手伝う！
MsgEn:
I'm researching this!
I understand how to use it! If you call your comrades, I'll help!

MsgJp:
コレ青く光る――
キレイだろ？
MsgEn:
This shines blue—
Isn't it beautiful?

MsgJp:
コレ、昔からココにある
ずっとずっと前からある
MsgEn: This has been here since long, long ago.

MsgJp:
オレ、一番コレに詳しい
分からないなら教える
MsgEn:
I'm the most knowledgeable about this. 
If you don't know, I'll teach you.

MsgJp:
ナニ？
資材欲しい？
MsgEn:
What? 
Do you want materials?

MsgJp:
資材、ゴールドと引き換え
ゴールド持ってるか？
MsgEn:
Do you have any Gold? 
We can exchange it for materials.

MsgJp:
ゴールド集める
資材買える
――わかった？
MsgEn:
Collect Gold.
Buy Materials.
- Got it?

MsgJp:
ゴールドない？
なら、お前に資材ない
MsgEn:
Don't you have any Gold? 
If not, then you don't have any materials either.

MsgJp: ム、何の用ダ！
MsgEn: Hmm, what's your business!

MsgJp: ココ、魔物来ないか見張ってる
MsgEn: I am keeping watch here, in case enemies appear.

MsgJp:
お前――魔物連れて来てないな？
後つけられたら、困ることなる
MsgEn:
You... haven't brought any enemies, have you?
If you bring them later, it will become troublesome.

MsgJp:
見張ってないと、村、襲われる
――オレ忙しいだが、オマエひまなのか？
MsgEn:
If we don't keep watch, the village will be attacked.
- I'm busy, but are you free?

MsgJp: えっと、あの、ナニ？
MsgEn: Um, uh, what?

MsgJp:
ココ、安心ヨ
眠れる、食べれる、怖いことナイ――
MsgEn:
Here, you can rest easy.
You can sleep, eat, and there's nothing to fear.

MsgJp:
ちゃんと幸せヨ
外出ようと思ワナイ
MsgEn:
I want to be truly happy.
I don't want to go out.

MsgJp: え、あの――外は怖いカラ――
MsgEn: Um, well— it's scary outside—

MsgJp: ハーイ、ナニ？
MsgEn: Hello, what's up?

MsgJp:
ネェネェ、手伝って！
クエストボードに
ミンナの“お願い”貼ってるダカラ！
MsgEn:
Hey, hey, can you help me out?
I've posted everyone's "requests" on the Quest Board, you see!

MsgJp:
クエストボードの“お願い”やっつけてくれたら
お礼もあるヨー！
MsgEn: If you can help me with the "requests" on the Quest Board, there will be a reward too!

MsgJp:
クエストボードの“お願い”やっつけて減らす
でもまた“お願い”増える――
ダカラ、ミンナでやっつけよ！
MsgEn:
Complete the requests on the quest board and whittle them down. 
But then, more requests keep coming— So let's all take care of them together!

MsgJp:
おお、お客人
ワシに何か聞きたいことでも？
MsgEn:
Oh, esteemed customer.
Is there something you would like to ask me?

MsgJp:
ワシは若い頃、一度この集落から出て
他の集落を旅して回ったことがありましてな
MsgEn: When I was young, I once left this village and traveled to other villages.

MsgJp:
外はどうだったか、ですか？
こうしてまたこの集落に戻り、この歳に
なるまで過ごしているのです
――もう、お分かりでしょう
MsgEn:
How was it outside, you ask? 
Well, I returned to this settlement, and I've been here until this age. 
— You probably understand by now.

MsgJp:
この集落の者は他所と少し言葉が違うでしょう
交流が無いまま過ごすとね
こうなるんですよ
MsgEn:
The people in this settlement might have slightly different language compared to others. 
When you spend your time without much interaction, this is what happens.

MsgJp:
フィンダム全体で見ても
ワシは年寄りの部類ですわな
この洞窟が外部の災厄から守ってくれるお陰です
MsgEn:
Even in the whole Phindym, I suppose I belong to the old folks category.
Thanks to this cave, it protects us from external calamities.

MsgJp:
ようこそ、異国の覚者様
モルフォールにご用でしょうか？
MsgEn:
Welcome, esteemed Arisen.
Are you in need of assistance in Morfaul?

MsgJp:
かつて村を支えてくれていた大地が
突然我々に牙をむくというのは――
頭ではわかっていても、悲しさを覚えるものです
MsgEn:
The fact that the land, which once supported our village, suddenly shows its fangs towards us... 
Even though we understand it in our heads, it brings forth a sense of sadness.

MsgJp:
この村はまたも危機にさらされています
――異国の覚者様
再三で申し訳なく思う気持ちはあります
しかし、お力を貸していただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
This village is once again facing a crisis.
――Lord of a foreign land, I apologize for the repeated inconvenience...
Would you lend us your power?

MsgJp:
ご協力いただける時に
また私にお声をかけていただければ
詳細を知る者にお取り次ぎいたします
MsgEn: When you are able to assist, please also reach out to me and I will relay the details to someone who can provide more information.

MsgJp:
おや、ここモルフォールの族長はガラダですよ
私は彼の信を得て、この地域を
切り盛りしているだけです
MsgEn:
Oh, here in Morfaul, the chieftain is Gearóid. 
I just manage this area with his trust.

MsgJp:
モルフォールは代々精霊竜の
守りをしてきた一族の村です
MsgEn: Morfaul is the village of a clan that has been protecting the Spirit Dragons for generations.

MsgJp:
精霊竜の守番となったものは、ここから東に行った
《始まりの洞》にて過ごすことになります
村に残った者は彼らを全力で支えるのが務めです
MsgEn:
Those who become guardians of the Spirit Dragon will spend their time in the Hollow of Beginnings, located to the east from here. 
Those who stay in the village have the duty to support them with all their might.

MsgJp:
侵食がはびこるこのような状況ですから
族長ガラダの補佐として
モードレッドが就いています
MsgEn: Given the prevalence of corruption in this situation, Mordred has taken on the role of assisting Chief Gearóid.

MsgJp:
彼も最初は精霊竜の守番として
竜のお傍にて務めるはずだったのですよ
MsgEn: He was also supposed to serve as the guardian of the Spirit Dragon at first, by its side.

MsgJp:
はじめまして、私はアルトフェイル
このモロー樹林一帯を任されたエリアマスターです
MsgEn: Nice to meet you, I am Arthfael, the Area Master entrusted with this entire Morrow Forest.

MsgJp:
モロー樹林はその呼び名の通り
フィンダム大陸の中でも深き森を
数多く有しています
MsgEn: The Morrow Forest, as its name suggests, is one of the deep forests found in the continent of Phindym.

MsgJp:
森の恩恵を受け、これまでは恵まれた
環境であったと言えるでしょう
そう、“侵食”が始まる前までは――
MsgEn:
Thanks to the blessings of the forest, it can be said that we have been fortunate to exist in a favorable environment. 
Yes, until the "corruption" began to spread...

MsgJp:
現在は村の総力を挙げて
侵食の被害を食い止めるため尽力しています
ここで我々が屈することは、フィンダムが
屈することに等しいと考えています――
MsgEn:
Currently, we are making every effort with the combined strength of the village to halt the spread of Corruption. 
We believe that surrendering at this point would be tantamount to Phindym's surrender.

MsgJp:
聞けば、覚者様たちは
セシリーを助けてくださっているとか――
彼女はこの村の出身なのですよ
同胞として感謝いたします
MsgEn:
I've heard that you, as Arisen, are helping Lady Cecily— She is from this village, you know. 
We are grateful for your assistance as fellow villagers.

MsgJp:
このモルフォールに滞在されている間
何かわからないことがあれば
気がねなく私にお聞きください
MsgEn: During your stay in Morfaul, if there is anything you don't understand, please feel free to ask me.

MsgJp:
そうそう、こちらをお持ちください
モルフォールの平穏に貢献してくださった方に
お渡ししているのです
MsgEn:
That's right. Please take this with you. 
We give it to those who have contributed to the peace of Morfaul.

MsgJp:
立ち寄ってくださってありがとうございます
よろしければこちらをお持ちください
日々の感謝の気持ちです
MsgEn:
Thank you for stopping by.
If you don't mind, please take this.
It's a daily expression of gratitude.

MsgJp:
異なる竜に仕える身だというのに
このモルフォールのために日々尽力してくださり
ここを代表して感謝いたします
どうぞ、これをお役立てください
MsgEn:
Even though I am serving a different dragon, I am grateful for your daily efforts for Morfaul.
Please accept this, and may it be of use to you.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者様
実は折り入ってお願いがございます――
MsgEn: Arisen of the White Dragon, I have a favor to ask, if I may...

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 907>》の付近、森の南側に
侵食が拡がっていないかを
調査していただけないでしょうか
MsgEn: Could you please investigate if there is no spreading of corruption or infected near the vicinity of《<SPOT 907>》, on the south side of the forest?

MsgJp:
もしも侵食が拡がっている形跡が認められれば
それらを排除してくださると幸いです
MsgEn: If there are any signs of the corruption spreading, I would be grateful if you could eliminate them.

MsgJp:
元より《<SPOT 907>》は侵食魔が潜むため
一時立ち入りを禁じていたのですが
どうやら出入り口を塞げばよいというものでも
なさそうなのです
MsgEn:
Because the area around <SPOT 907> is infested with the Corruption, entry was temporarily prohibited. 
However, it seems that simply blocking the entrance is not a viable solution.

MsgJp:
この侵食という災いに対し
有効な対策を立てられていないというのは
実に不甲斐ないことです
MsgEn: It is truly disgraceful that we have not been able to come up with effective measures against this calamity of corruption.

MsgJp:
侵食について――
事態は悪くなる一方ですね
MsgEn:
About the corruption—
The situation is only getting worse, isn't it?

MsgJp:
先日も、森へ入った者より
侵食魔が群れているところを見たと
報告が入ってきました――
MsgEn: We have received a report from someone who recently entered the forest, saying that they saw a swarm of Infected creatures.

MsgJp:
森へ入ってその恵みを得ることが
できなくなってしまえば
我々の生活は苦しいものとなるでしょう
MsgEn: If we are unable to enter the forest and obtain its blessings, our lives will surely become difficult.

MsgJp:
――森に入った者からの報告を
お聞きになりたいのですか？
ええ、いつでもお話しいたしますよ
私に再び声をおかけください
MsgEn:
- you want to hear the reports from those who entered the forest? 
Yes, I'll be ready to talk whenever. Please call on me again.

MsgJp:
やはり、侵食に対して“封鎖する”という手段は
気休め程度にしかならないようですね――
MsgEn: Indeed, "blocking" locations as a means to counter corruption seems to be nothing more than a mere illusion.

MsgJp:
封鎖した《<SPOT 906>》から
魔物が這い出てきているようなのです
どこかに抜け道でもあるのでしょう
MsgEn: It seems that enemies are crawling out from the blocked spot <SPOT 906>. There must be some kind of escape route somewhere.

MsgJp:
このまま封鎖し続けても後はありません
《<SPOT 906>》も調査の対象とできるよう
封鎖を解除いたしました
MsgEn:
There is no future if we continue to keep it blocked like this. 
In order to include 《<SPOT 906>》 in the investigation, we have released the blockade.

MsgJp:
覚者様も、もしよろしければ
一度現状を確認していただけないでしょうか
MsgEn: Lord Arisen, if you wouldn't mind, could you please take a moment to review the current situation?

MsgJp:
侵食についての調査進捗ですか？
――芳しいとはいえませんね
MsgEn:
Is this regarding the progress of the investigation on corruption?
- It's not going well, I'm afraid.

MsgJp:
やはり、侵食に対しては封鎖して時が過ぎるのを
待つという手は愚策となるようです
MsgEn: Indeed, it seems that blocking and waiting for time to pass is a foolish strategy when it comes to corruption.

MsgJp:
大地が侵食されている以上
侵食のひどいところを封鎖しても
いずれ侵食は他のところに拡がってしまいます
MsgEn: As long as the earth is being corrupted even if we block the heavily infected areas the corruption will eventually spread to other places.

MsgJp:
ここは《モルフォール北門》をも開放し
侵食への対策法を探ってゆこうと考えています
MsgEn: Here; we also plan to open the "Morfaul Northern Gate" and explore ways to counter the Infected.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者様
異なる大陸の方にこのようなお願いをするのは
心苦しいのですが――どうか、この難局への
お力添えをいただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
Arisen of the White Dragon, 
It pains my heart to make such a request to someone from a different continent, but could you please lend us your aid in this dire situation? 
We humbly ask for your assistance in overcoming this adversity.

MsgJp:
覚者様――
人間も侵食される、という話を
お聞きになったことはあるでしょうか
MsgEn: Oh, honorable Arisen, have you ever heard the tale of humans being corrupted?

MsgJp:
侵食された人々によって
このモルフォールが危機に晒されているのです
MsgEn: Morfaul is being exposed to danger by the infected people who have been corrupted.

MsgJp:
あまり大きな声では申し上げられません
詳しくは、もう一度私に話しかけてください
MsgEn:
I have to speak quietly about this. 
Please talk to me again for more details.

MsgJp:
この未曾有の危機はフィンダム全体に
降りかかっているとはいえ――
大変なことというのは重なるものですね
MsgEn: Yes, even though this unprecedented crisis is weighing down on all of Phindym... it seems that difficult times tend to pile up, don't they?

MsgJp:
村全体の落ち着かない空気を察したのか
《<SPOT 942>》に
狂侵ゴアサイクロプスが現れたのです
MsgEn: Perhaps sensing the unsettled atmosphere of the entire village, a Severely Infected Gorecyclops appeared at <<SPOT 942>>.

MsgJp:
狂侵ゴアサイクロプスは、侵食の犠牲となった
ゴアサイクロプスの成れの果て――
肉体が朽ちる前にさらに侵食が進んでしまった
非常に凶悪な魔物です
MsgEn:
The Severely Infected Gorecyclops is the tragic result of the corruption, the ultimate fate of a Gore Cyclops. 
The corruption has progressed even further before its body decayed, making it an extremely vicious creature.

MsgJp:
装備に不安がある状態で遭遇した際には
逃げることも必要となりましょう
常に冷静なご判断を――
MsgEn:
When faced with a situation where there is uncertainty about your equipment, it is also necessary to consider retreating.
Always make calm judgments—

MsgJp:
フィンダム中でも特に侵食の進んだ
このモロー樹林に、絶えず足を運んでくださり
感謝の気持ちしかありません
MsgEn:
Among the lands of Phindym, the Morrow Forest has been particularly ravaged by the Infected. 
I have nothing but gratitude for those who constantly venture into this heavily corrupted forest.

MsgJp:
日々のお礼として、この辺りで
役にたちそうな情報をお教えいたしましょう
MsgEn: As a daily expression of gratitude, allow me to provide you with some useful information in this area.

MsgJp:
ここモロー樹林では
《ヘンルーダ》というハーブが採れるのです
小さな花を付ける、一見地味なハーブですので
草花を採取される際には少し注意してご覧ください
MsgEn:
In Morrow Forest here, you can find a herb called "Wijnruit". 
It's a seemingly plain herb that bears small flowers. 
When collecting herbs, please be wary and handle with caution.

MsgJp:
《ヘンルーダ》は爽やかな香りで
虫を寄せ付けないという効果を持っています
魔物相手にその効果は無いでしょうが――
きっと覚者様のお役に立つことと思いますよ
MsgEn:
"Wijnruit" has a refreshing fragrance that repels insects. 
Its effects may not work against monsters, but I'm sure it will be helpful to you, Arisen.

MsgJp:
覚者様のお力添えがあるおかげで
モルフォールも何とか持ちこたえられています
MsgEn: Thanks to the assistance of esteemed Arisen like yourself, Morfaul has managed to hold on somehow.

MsgJp:
この村を、村人の日々を守ってくださって
ありがとうございます――
MsgEn: Thank you for protecting this village and its villagers day by day.

MsgJp:
覚者様により良い支援品をお届けできるよう
村の者で力を合わせて手配しております
これからも、どうぞよろしくお願いいたします
MsgEn:
To provide better support goods for esteemed Arisen, the villagers are joining forces to make arrangements.
We humbly ask for your continued support.
Thank you very much.

MsgJp:
覚者様がこの辺りの魔物討伐を進めて
くださったおかげで、奥地へ続く道を埋めていた
がれきを撤去することが叶いました
MsgEn: Thanks to the efforts of the esteemed Arisen in defeating the nearby enemies, we were able to remove the debris that was blocking the path to the deeper regions.

MsgJp:
今回の整備によって
《<SPOT 909>》へ足を踏み入れることが
できるようになっています、が――
MsgEn: Thanks to this maintenance, you will now be able to set foot into 《<SPOT 909>》, but...

MsgJp:
かの地はこのモルフォール一帯においても
特に侵食の進んだ森のひとつ
MsgEn: That area is one of the forests in this entire Morfaul region that has been particularly ravaged by corruption.

MsgJp:
調査に行かれるときには
くれぐれも装備を揃え、細心の注意を――
MsgEn: When going on a survey, please make sure to prepare your equipment properly and pay close attention--

MsgJp:
侵食の勢いはますます増すばかり――
先日は、村周辺の巡回に出た若者が
妙なものを見たと報告がありました
MsgEn:
The momentum of corruption only continues to grow--
Recently, a young adventurer who was patrolling the village noticed something strange and reported it.

MsgJp:
なんでも爆発のようなものと、侵食胞子が
大量に巻き上がるのを見た――というのです
MsgEn: I heard that they witnessed something like a massive explosion, and an abundance of corroding spores swirling around.

MsgJp:
すぐにでも調査に向かいたいところなのですが
新手の侵食魔が出現しており
危険度の高さから人が近寄ることを
制限せざるをえません
MsgEn: I would love to head to the investigation immediately, but there is a new type of corruption-infected monster appearing, and due to its high level of danger, we have no choice but to restrict people from approaching.

MsgJp:
覚者様、どうか危険度の高い
新手の侵食魔を排除していただけないでしょうか
MsgEn: Lord Arisen, could you please eliminate the highly dangerous new infected enemies?

MsgJp:
我が村には戦える人員が少なく
覚者様のお力添えなくては
調査に向かうことができないのです――
MsgEn:
In our village, we have a shortage of capable personnel to fight. 
We cannot proceed with the investigation without the assistance of the Arisen's power.

MsgJp:
討伐に向かっていただけるのならば
再度私にお声をかけてください
今回の件を取りまとめている者に
取り次がせていただきます
MsgEn:
If you are willing to head out for the subjugation, please reach out to me again. 
I will relay your voice to the person in charge of handling this matter.

MsgJp:
覚者様、この度
崖崩れのあった《<SPOT 944>》付近を
復旧することに成功いたしました
MsgEn: Dear Arisen, We have successfully restored the area near "<SPOT 944>" where the cliff collapsed.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 910>》に入れるようになったので
早速、調査のために
何人か人を向かわせたのですが――
MsgEn: We've gained access to <SPOT 910> now, and we immediately sent a few people there for investigation, but—

MsgJp:
なにやら、大地に大穴が――
クレーターというのでしょうか
そういったものができているとの
報告があったのです
MsgEn:
It seems there's a massive hole in the ground— a crater, you might call it. 
We received reports that such a thing has formed.

MsgJp:
一体何が起こっているのか
見当もつきませんが――
MsgEn: I have no idea what's going on, but...

MsgJp:
覚者様も、よろしければ
一度調査に向かってくださるよう
お願いいたします
MsgEn: If you are willing, Arisen, we would appreciate it if you could head there for an investigation when you have the time.

MsgJp:
ああ、白き竜の覚者様――
今一度、お力をお貸しいただけないでしょうか
MsgEn:
Ah, esteemed Arisen of the white dragon.
Could you lend me your power once again, if you please?

MsgJp:
先日見つかった謎のクレーター
その正体が判明したのです
MsgEn:
The mysterious crater that was discovered the other day...
Its true identity has been revealed.

MsgJp:
この願いを聞いていただけるのであれば
再び私に話しかけてください
――どうか、お願いいたします
MsgEn:
If you are willing to grant this request, please speak to me again. 
— Please, we beseech you.

MsgJp:
今日もこのモルフォールに足を運んでくださり
ありがとうございます
MsgEn: Thank you for visiting Morfaul once again today.

MsgJp:
白き竜の覚者様
あなたのお力でモルフォールは
侵食の拡大を食い止めることができました
MsgEn:
Lord of the White Dragon,
With your power, we were able to halt the spread of corruption by Morfaul.

MsgJp:
これからも、フィンダムにいらした際には
ぜひモルフォールにお立ち寄りください
MsgEn: When you come to Phindym in the future, please make sure to stop by Morfaul.

MsgJp:
より良い支援品もご用意して
いつでもお待ちしております
MsgEn:
We also have better support goods prepared for you. 
We are always ready to assist you.

MsgJp:
自分の故郷にあなたが足を運んでくだされば
きっとセシリーも喜ぶことでしょう
MsgEn: If you would come visit my hometown, Cecily would surely rejoice.

MsgJp:
《原始の雫》の効能に懐疑的な者もいます
しかし、今、他に何を信じれば良いというのでしょう
MsgEn:
There are also those who are skeptical of the effects of "Primeval Drops". 
However, what else should we believe in now?

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者たちよ
どうか、我々とともに歩んでください
MsgEn: Arisen of Lestania, please, walk with us.

MsgJp:
フィンダムに生きる我々は“さだめ”に忠実でした
大いなる流れに逆らって、一時、生きのびても
なんになるというのか――
MsgEn:
We, who live in Phindym, remained faithful to "destiny"
Even if it meant going against the great current and surviving temporarily, what would we become――

MsgJp:
こんな考え方の犠牲者が大勢いたのは事実
周囲の諦めが殺してしまった者も多い――
それは認めねばなりません
MsgEn:
It is a fact that there were many victims of such a way of thinking.
Many were killed by the resignation of those around them -
That must be acknowledged.

MsgJp:
ロイグの乱心――黒い騎士の暗躍――
両方ともフィンダムに生きる我々の
気風が招いた凶事ということでしょうか
MsgEn:
Loeg's Madness - The Dark Machinations of the Black Knight. 
Both of these unfortunate events have been brought upon us, who live in Phindym, by our own way of life, wouldn't you say?

MsgJp: 何かご用かな？
MsgEn: Hello, do you need anything?

MsgJp:
戦技というものは奥が深い
常に学ばせていただく身だよ
MsgEn:
The art of warfare is profound.
I am always a student, constantly learning.

MsgJp:
宿泊だったら<VAL PRICE_INN>だよ
ハーブで編んだ特製の寝床を
用意してあるけど、どうかな？
MsgEn:
If it's lodging, it'll be <VAL PRICE_INN>.
I have prepared a specially woven bed made of herbs, how about it?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
ハーブの香りを楽しめる寝床を用意してある
疲れていたら泊まっていくといいよ
MsgEn:
We have prepared a sleeping area where you can enjoy the scent of herbs. 
If you're tired, feel free to stay overnight.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
ふむ――この《弱化の治療》には
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>かかりそうだ
いいかな？
MsgEn: Hmm... for this "Treat Weakness", it seems like it will cost <VAL PRICE_WEAK>. Is that alright?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
おや、弱化していないようだね
元気で何よりだ
MsgEn:
Oh, it seems you haven't weakened, huh? 
Being healthy is the most important thing after all.

MsgJp:
おや、何か必要なものがあるのか？
ここにあるといいんだが――
MsgEn:
Oh, is there something you need? 
It would be great if it's something that's here...

MsgJp:
討伐に行くにしろ、採取を楽しむにしろ
出発前の準備は大切だ
その時々に必要なものを選別することだ
MsgEn:
Whether you're going on a quest or simply enjoying gathering, preparation before departure is crucial.
It's important to select the necessary items for each occasion.

MsgJp:
ここ、モルフォール付近の森では
質の良いハーブがよく採れる
我々はそれを生活に役立てているんだ
MsgEn:
Here, in the forest near Morfaul, we often find high-quality herbs.
We make good use of them in our daily lives.

MsgJp:
採取が目当ての場合でも
回復薬は多めに持っておくんだ
森では何が起こるかわからないぞ
MsgEn:
Even if your purpose is exploration, make sure to carry plenty of recovery potions.
You never know what could happen in the forest.

MsgJp:
ハァイ、旅の仲間を集めたいの？
私がお手伝いできると思うわ
MsgEn:
Hello, do you want to gather fellow travelers?
I think I can help you with that.

MsgJp:
森へ行くのね
気を付けていってらっしゃい！
MsgEn:
You're going to the forest, huh? 
Take care and have a safe journey!

MsgJp:
森の情報はアルトフェイルに聞いてみて
私たちも、何かあれば
まずアルトフェイルに報告してるから
MsgEn:
If you want information about the forest, ask Arthfael. 
We always report to Arthfael first if anything happens.

MsgJp:
森には危険も多いけど
美味しい木の実なんかの恵みも豊富なの！
――今は侵食っていう問題があるけど
MsgEn:
In the forest, there are many dangers, but there is also an abundance of blessings, like delicious nuts and fruits!
- Although now there is a problem of corruption.

MsgJp: ん？　何か？
MsgEn: Hmm? Something wrong?

MsgJp:
村には家畜も作物もあるから
隙あらばと狙っている魔物もたくさんいるんだ
だからこうして見張っているのさ
MsgEn:
Because there are both livestock and crops in the village, there are also many monsters lurking, waiting for an opportunity. 
That's why we are keeping watch like this.

MsgJp:
他の村ではどうか知らないけど
この村では、子供を一人で
村の外に出さない決まりがあるんだ
魔物に狙われたらコトだからね
MsgEn:
I don't know about other villages, but in this village, there is a rule not to let children go outside alone. 
It's to protect them from being targeted by enemies.

MsgJp:
僕も子供に同行を頼まれた時には
最優先で引き受けるようにしているよ
MsgEn: When I'm asked to accompany a child, I always make it a top priority to accept.

MsgJp:
君は中々の実力を持っていそうだけど――
森に入るなら、友か従者を呼んだ方がいいよ
MsgEn: You seem to have quite a bit of skill, but if you're going into the forest, it would be wise to bring a friend or a servant.

MsgJp: お、畑をいじりながらでもよいかな？
MsgEn: Oh, can I tinker with the field even while doing it?

MsgJp: 手間ひまかけるほど、野菜は美味くなるからの――
MsgEn: The more effort you put into it, the more delicious the vegetables become.

MsgJp:
こうして大地の恵みを楽しめるのも
精霊竜様あってのこと――
はやく“侵食”が収まればいいんじゃが――
MsgEn:
It's all thanks to the Spirit Dragon that we can enjoy the blessings of the earth.
I hope the "Corruption" subsides soon.

MsgJp:
おっと、あの辺りは踏まないようにしてくれ
ようやく芽が出始めたところなんじゃ
MsgEn:
Oh, please be careful not to step on that area.
It looks like the buds are finally starting to sprout.

MsgJp:
実はな、若い頃は精霊竜様のお傍で
守番として仕事をしていたこともあった――
光栄だったよ
MsgEn: Actually, when I was young, there was a time when I worked as a guardian by the side of the Spirit Dragon. It was an honor.

MsgJp: あ、はい――
MsgEn: Oh, yes...

MsgJp: じ、実は侵食魔に襲われたことがあって――
MsgEn: Um, actually, I've been attacked by the Infected before...

MsgJp:
その時はケガするだけで済みましたけど
もし傷口からあの“侵食胞子”が入り込んでいたら
どうなっちゃってたんだろうって――
MsgEn: At that time, I only ended up with an injury, but if those "corruption spores" had entered through the wound, I wonder what would have happened...

MsgJp:
僕はもう村からはあんまり出たくないんですよ
外には侵食魔がいるでしょう
MsgEn:
I don't really want to leave the village anymore. 
There are corrupted Infected outside, you know.

MsgJp:
村が侵食魔に襲われないよう
祈るばかりですね――
MsgEn: We can only pray that the village won't be attacked by the Corruption.

MsgJp: あ、こんにちは――
MsgEn: Oh, hello...

MsgJp:
僕の仕事ですか？
村の皆のお手伝いをしています
そこのクエストボードを整理したり――
MsgEn:
Is this my job?
I'm helping everyone in the village by organizing the quest board and...

MsgJp:
まだまだ半人前ですから
皆の仕事内容を
少しずつ教えてもらってるんです
MsgEn: I'm still just a half-baked novice, so I'm slowly learning about everyone's job responsibilities.

MsgJp:
父の仕事を手伝いたいのですが――
父は多忙なので、僕がそばにいると
逆に手を煩わせてしまって
MsgEn:
I want to help my father with his work, but...
Since he is very busy, when I am by his side, I end up just getting in his way instead.

MsgJp:
何かあれば遠慮なくおっしゃってくださいね
旅人に失礼が無いように、と
父に言われています
MsgEn:
If there's anything, please don't hesitate to speak up.
It's to avoid any disrespect to the traveler, I have been told by my father.

MsgJp: はいはい、何でしょう
MsgEn: Yes, what is it?

MsgJp:
森で採れるハーブは生活に欠かせませんよ
それだけに、森の侵食が進むのは怖くって――
MsgEn:
Herbs harvested from the forest are indispensable in daily life. 
That's why I'm scared to see the forest being corrupted and overrun.

MsgJp:
草木の侵食が進んでいるところや
侵食魔がいた辺りでは
ハーブを採らないようにしてるんですよ
MsgEn: In areas where the corruption of vegetation is advancing, or where there are infected beings, I make sure not to gather herbs.

MsgJp:
ハーブは料理にも使いますから
気をつけなくちゃって
MsgEn: Since herbs are also used in cooking, you have to be careful.

MsgJp:
ふぅ、少し休んだら
干したハーブの様子を見に行かなくちゃ
MsgEn:
Phew.
After taking a little break I should go check on the dried herbs.

MsgJp: あら、覚者様
MsgEn: Oh, Lord Arisen.

MsgJp:
異国の地でご不便はありませんか？
セントラムに大体のものは揃っているので
何かご用があれば、ぜひ
MsgEn:
Do you have any inconveniences in this foreign land?
Most things are available in Centrum, so if you need anything, please feel free to ask.

MsgJp:
旅人がこの村を訪れた時は
親身にもてなそうというのが
族長と族長補佐の方針なんです
MsgEn: When a traveler visits this village, it is the policy of the Chief and the Chief's assistant to warmly welcome them.

MsgJp:
この村の族長はガラダ
族長補佐がモードレッドです
もし責任者と話したい、ということでしたら
彼らのところへどうぞ
MsgEn:
The chief of this village is Gearóid.
The chief assistant is Mordred.
If you wish to speak with the leaders, please go to their place.

MsgJp:
あ、でもエリアマスターの役目は
アルトフェイルが任されているんです！
エリアの情報なら彼に聞いてみてくださいね
MsgEn:
Ah, but the role of the Area Master is entrusted to Arthfael!
If you're looking for information about the area, please ask him.

MsgJp: おや、何か？
MsgEn: Oh, something wrong?

MsgJp:
わたしのことか？
――今は族長補佐をしているが
何事も無ければ、精霊竜の守番長を
務める予定だったのだ
MsgEn:
Is it about me?
- Currently, I am serving as the assistant to the clan chief.
If nothing goes wrong, I was supposed to be the head guardian of the Spirit Dragon.

MsgJp:
守番長として務め始めれば
しばらく村には帰って来られない
村にいる間は精一杯族長補佐として働くつもりだ
MsgEn:
If I am to serve as the Chief Guardian, I won't be able to return to the village for a while.
While I'm here in the village, I intend to work my hardest as the Deputy Chief.

MsgJp:
これでなかなか忙しいもので
家でゆっくり休む間も無い――
とはいえ、うちの息子が
しっかりした子で助かっている
MsgEn:
With all this, it's quite busy indeed. I have no time to rest at home. 
However, I'm grateful that my son is a reliable child.

MsgJp:
《芯なる樹》はフィンダムに
暮らす者にとって崇敬の対象であり
同時に、心の拠り所となる景色の一部ともいえる
MsgEn: The Core Tree is not only revered by those who live in Phindym, but also considered a part of the scenic landscape that serves as a sanctuary for the heart.

MsgJp:
雄大な《芯なる樹》を眺められる場所は
フィンダムのあちこちにある
自分の気に入る場所を探してみるのも
悪くないだろう
MsgEn:
There are various places in Phindym where you can admire the majestic Core Tree. 
It wouldn't hurt to try and find a place that you like.

MsgJp:
わたしはモルフォール村のモードレッド
ガラダの留守を預かっている
MsgEn: I am Mordred, from the village of Morfaul, currently looking after Gearóid's place while he's away.

MsgJp:
セシリーの恩人はガラダの恩人
そしてわたしの恩人でもある
何もないところだが、くつろいでくれ
MsgEn:
Cecily's benefactor is Gearóid's benefactor, and also my benefactor. 
There isn't much here, but please make yourself comfortable.

MsgJp:
ガラダが一刻も早く回復するように
客人たちも祈ってくれ
MsgEn: Please pray for Gearóid's swift recovery, so that he may heal as soon as possible.

MsgJp:
祈りなど我々の習慣にはなかったが
やってみると、心に刺さったトゲが
抜けていくのがわかるのだ
MsgEn: Praying was not part of our customs, but when we tried it, we could feel the thorns being pulled out of our hearts.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの大地を汚してしまったこと――
おまえたちと出会えたこと――
どちらもわたしは等しく受け入れいている
MsgEn: I have tarnished the land of Phindym, and yet, I accept both that and the fact that I have encountered all of you.

MsgJp:
それがいかんのだろうなあ
善し悪しを区別し、悪しきは排除しなくては
世はいつまでたっても変わらない
MsgEn: That's the way it goes, isn't it? Distinguishing between right and wrong, and eliminating the wicked is necessary. The world won't change unless we do.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの危機におまえたちの世界と
交流を持てたことを幸運と呼ばずして
なんと呼べばいいのか――
MsgEn: To have been able to establish a connection with your world during the crisis in Phindym, what should I call it if not lucky?

MsgJp: 邪悪な世界と繋がる可能性もあったのだからな
MsgEn: There was even a possibility of being connected to an evil world.

MsgJp:
フィンダムはもう大丈夫だ
これからは客人として
この美しい世界を楽しんでくれ
MsgEn:
Phindym is already fine.
From now on, as our esteemed guest, please enjoy this beautiful world.

MsgJp:
我らの竜の目覚めはまだ先のようだが
大地や空気は徐々に清められている
MsgEn: It seems that the awakening of our dragon is still ahead, but the land and the air are gradually being purified.

MsgJp: セシリーの息吹を感じるよ
MsgEn: I can feel Cecily's breath.

MsgJp: ふむ、何か必要なものでも？
MsgEn: Hmm, do you need something?

MsgJp:
フィンダムにあるものは
全て精霊竜様の恵みの賜物だ
何一つとて無駄にしてよいものは無いと心得よ
MsgEn:
Everything in Phindym is a gift from the Spirit Dragon's blessing.
Remember that nothing is to be wasted, for everything serves a purpose.

MsgJp: 何だ、用も無いのに話しかけたのか？
MsgEn: Why did you talk to me when you have no business?

MsgJp: ここに保管してある資材を数え直さねば――
MsgEn: I have to count the materials stored here again...

MsgJp:
必要なものがあるなら、遠慮せず言ってくれ
今この大陸に覚者はいない
我々にとっても、君だけが希望だ
MsgEn:
If you need anything, don't hesitate to tell me.
There are no Arisen on this continent right now.
You are our only hope.

MsgJp:
一つ聞きたい
――モルフォールはどんな様子だ？
MsgEn:
I have one question.
What is Morfaul like?

MsgJp:
何が起こるかはわからない
だが、何が起こってもいいように
資材の管理は万全にしておかねば
MsgEn: We never know what will happen, but in order to be prepared for anything, we must manage our resources with utmost care.

MsgJp:
覚悟はしている
――家族への手紙も書いた
あの渦にすべてが飲み込まれようと
精霊竜様のお傍にいるつもりだ
MsgEn:
I am prepared
―― I have also written a letter to my family
Even if everything is swallowed by that vortex I intend to stay by the side of the Spirit Dragon.

MsgJp:
異なる大陸からの客人よ
私でお力になれることでしょうか？
MsgEn:
Guest from a different continent,
how may I be of assistance to you?

MsgJp:
癒しを、救いを求めることは
決して悪いことではないはずです
MsgEn: Seeking healing, seeking salvation, should never be a bad thing.

MsgJp:
病にかかるは宿命です
しかし、病んだ“芯なる樹”は助けを求めている――
この現状に、我々はどう対処すればいいのでしょう
MsgEn:
It is fate to fall ill.
However, the ailing "Core Tree" is seeking help.
How should we deal with this situation?

MsgJp:
精霊竜の守番として
我々は全力を尽くす所存です――
MsgEn:
As guardians of the Spirit Dragon
We are determined to do our best —

MsgJp:
旅の方にはこの寝床を
<VAL PRICE_INN>にて貸し出しています
簡素な宿ですが――
休んでいかれますか？
MsgEn:
For travelers, we lend out this sleeping space at <VAL PRICE_INN>.
It is a modest inn, but...
Would you like to rest here?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
本日は旅の方のため、宿を解放しております
どうぞ疲れを癒していってください
MsgEn:
Today, we have opened the inn for travelers.
Please rest and heal your fatigue.

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》には<VAL PRICE_WEAK>いただいています
時が経てば自然と治るものですが――
今すぐの回復をご希望でしょうか？
MsgEn:
I am receiving <VAL PRICE_WEAK> for "Treat Weakness", yes?
While it usually heals naturally over time, would you like immediate recovery?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
おや、困りました――
弱化していないようですよ
気持ちがお疲れなのかもしれません
少しここでゆっくりしていかれては？
MsgEn:
Oh, dear, this is troublesome――
It seems that you are not weakened.
Perhaps you are feeling tired?
Why don't you take a rest here for a while?

MsgJp:
異なる大陸からの客人よ
――空の異変の件で
来てくださったのですか？
MsgEn:
Greetings, visitor from a different continent.
――Did you come here regarding the abnormality in the sky?

MsgJp:
フィンダムの空に
あのような禍禍しいものが――
MsgEn: In the sky of Phindym, such a calamitous presence looms――

MsgJp:
何が起ころうと
我々は精霊竜の守番
ここを離れるわけにはまいりません
MsgEn:
No matter what may happen, We are the guardians of the Spirit Dragon.
We cannot leave this place

MsgJp:
精霊竜セシリーの心も
常にあなたとともにあることでしょう
MsgEn: Surely, the heart of the Spirit Dragon Cecily is always with you.

MsgJp: はい――
MsgEn: Yes...

MsgJp:
この周辺の見張りには自分が出ています
他の２人よりも体力がありますから
MsgEn:
I am on watch duty in this area.
Because I have more stamina than the other two.

MsgJp:
“芯なる樹”から伸びる
各聖域の見回りも自分の仕事です
MsgEn: It is also my job to patrol each sacred ground that extends from the "Core Tree".

MsgJp:
――何かあれば一早く気付くことが
できる立場でしょう
MsgEn: In a position where you can notice anything early on, if something were to happen.

MsgJp:
精霊竜様のご様子を常に傍で見守る役割
それが“精霊竜の守番”です
誇りに思う者も多いのですよ
MsgEn:
The role of constantly watching over the Spirit Dragon's condition, that's what it means to be a "Spirit Dragon Guardian." 
Many take pride in this role.

MsgJp:
険しい顔をされていますね
――この状況です、無理もありませんが
MsgEn:
You have a stern expression
――Given the situation, it's understandable

MsgJp:
お一人では危険です
共に進む仲間が必要であれば
自分が手配いたしましょう
MsgEn:
It is dangerous to go alone.
If you need companions to journey together, I will make arrangements for you.

MsgJp:
マイアとドハティも
落ち着こうと努めているようです
彼らはまだ若い――
それぞれに葛藤があることでしょう
MsgEn:
Maia and Doherty also seem to be trying to calm down. 
They are still young - each surely has their own struggles.

MsgJp:
あの禍禍しい渦については
あまり話したくありませんね
よく、わからないものですから
MsgEn:
Regarding that ominous whirlpool...
I don't really want to talk about it, because it's something I don't understand well.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷を訪れし異国の覚者よ
このキアランが用件を聞こう
MsgEn:
Oh Arisen from a distant land who has visited the Kingal Canyon.
Let Ciarán hear your purpose.

MsgJp:
神殿や遺跡に対し、畏怖の念を持つことは大切だ
そうやって伝統が守られ
また、伝統によって我らが守られてきたのだ
MsgEn: It is important to have a sense of awe towards temples and ruins. It is through this respect that traditions are preserved, and it is through these traditions that we have been protected.

MsgJp:
我らが変化を拒もうと
我らを取り巻く環境は常に変わってゆくのでは――
“侵食”という災厄に触れ
一層そう思うことが多くなった
MsgEn:
As we try to resist change the environment surrounding us is constantly shifting.
I have come to think this even more after experiencing the calamity known as "Corruption."

MsgJp:
若者の柔らかい感性が、環境の変化を
敏感に感じ取っているというのであれば
遅かれ早かれ、我らも
意識を改めねばならないのかもしれないと――
MsgEn: If the sensitive sensibilities of the younger generation can keenly perceive environmental changes, then sooner or later, we may need to reconsider our own awareness as well.

MsgJp:
むむ、話が長くなってしまった
これだからいつもメーヴに呆れられる
すまない
MsgEn:
Hmm, the conversation has become rather lengthy.
This is why Maeve always finds me exasperating.
I apologize.

MsgJp:
村の若者には
伝統を重んじるこの村の空気を
嫌う者もいるようだ
MsgEn: It seems that some of the village's young people dislike the atmosphere of this village, which values tradition.

MsgJp:
族長として頭の痛い問題だ
彼らも成長すればきっと
わかってくれると信じたいが――
MsgEn:
As the clan chief, it's a headache-inducing problem. 
I want to believe that they will understand, once they grow up.

MsgJp:
キンガルに来るのは初めてだったな
少しこの地について話しておこう
俺はエリアマスターのキアランという
MsgEn:
This was my first time coming to Kingal. 
Let me tell you a little bit about this place. 
I am Ciarán, one of the Area Masters.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷は多くの遺跡や神殿を残す
フィンダム文化の要所的地帯だ
MsgEn: Kingal Canyon is a crucial region of the Phindym culture, with many ruins and temples remaining.

MsgJp:
そのような地に住まう者として
我々グリンデュアの民は古来よりの伝承や
伝統の守り手としての側面を持っている
MsgEn: As inhabitants of such a land, the people of Glyndwr have long been keepers of ancient traditions and guardians of our heritage.

MsgJp:
貴君もこの地に留まるのであれば――
キンガルの伝統に敬意を払うべきだ
そうすれば村人との衝突も無いだろう
MsgEn:
If you are going to stay in this land—
You should respect Kingal's traditions.
That way, there will be no conflict with the villagers.

MsgJp:
他の村は侵食魔との戦いに
やっきになっているようだが
グリンデュアは――また別の問題に直面している
MsgEn: While other villages are becoming obsessed with the battle against the Corruption, Glyndwr is facing another problem.

MsgJp:
遺跡を守ってきたグリンデュアならではの
問題というものがあるのだ――
MsgEn: Glyndwr, who has protected the ruins, has its own unique issues to deal with.

MsgJp:
――いや、異国から旅をしてきた者に
このようなこと話すべきではなかったかもしれん
忘れてくれ
MsgEn:
No, perhaps I should not have spoken of such things to one who has traveled from a distant land. 
Please, forget about it.

MsgJp:
大方、このグリンデュアには少しの間
留まるだけのつもりなのだろう
――この辺りは質の良い鉱石が採れる
それらを拾って帰ることだ
MsgEn:
Most likely, I intend to stay in Glyndwr for a little while. 
This area has some high-quality ore to be mined, so I plan to gather them and take them back.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷は地形の複雑さもあって
なかなか冒険がしづらいのではないか？
少しだが、これを足しにするといい
MsgEn: Kingal Canyon's complex terrain can make it challenging for adventurers, don't you think? Adding a little something to it could be beneficial.

MsgJp:
グリンデュアの大地――
いや、我々のために尽力してくれて感謝している
これは日々の礼のつもりだ
MsgEn:
The land of Glyndwr, or rather, I'm grateful for your efforts on our behalf. 
This is meant to be a daily expression of gratitude.

MsgJp:
これを受け取ってくれ
お前のためにと、村の者たちから
自然と集まったものだ
旅に役立ててもらえれば我々も本望だ
MsgEn:
Please accept this. 
It is gathered naturally from the villagers, for your sake. 
We would be grateful if you could make use of it on your journey.

MsgJp:
異国の覚者か――
エリアマスターとして忠告しておこう
