Please do not hesitate to take them with you.

MsgJp:
覚者様、何もおっしゃらないで――
ただ、これをお持ちください
わたしたちが取り戻した希望、あなた様に
物資として託させてください
MsgEn:
Lord Arisen, please don't say anything...
Just please accept this.
Allow us to entrust you with the hope we have regained as provisions.

MsgJp:
覚者様
この地にて新たな素材が
取れる場所をお教えします
あなたを守る武具に加工できるかもしれません
MsgEn:
Arisen, I shall reveal a new location in this area where you can gather materials. 
They might be suitable for crafting protective armor for you.

MsgJp:
それと、もしよろしければ――
僅かな希望を胸に戦う兵たちをお救い下さい
どうか、よろしくお願いいたします――
MsgEn:
Also, if you would, please help the soldiers who fight with a glimmer of hope in their hearts. 
Please, we're counting on you.

MsgJp:
この村からほど近い北の地に
悪しき魔物たちが
集まろうとしているようです――
MsgEn: It seems that wicked creatures are gathering in the northern lands near this village.

MsgJp:
ここは、わたしたちに唯一のこされた憩いの村
どうかそのお力をお借りできないでしょうか――
MsgEn:
This is the only remaining peaceful village for us.
Could we please borrow your power here?

MsgJp:
覚者様、僅かではありますが
支援品を増やすことができるようになりました
力無きわたしたちも、少しでもお役に立てればと
MsgEn:
Arisen, we've managed to increase our supply of aid items. 
Even those of us with little strength want to be of assistance to you.

MsgJp:
この大陸の南方を統べる展望城――
王家ゆかりのこの城は、軍事だけでなく
貿易、文化面においても重要な城でした
MsgEn:
Lookout Castle, which governs the southern part of this continent--
This castle, with its royal lineage, was not only important in terms of military affairs, but also in trade and culture.

MsgJp:
その城下には、貴重な素材が
手に入る地下遺跡が残っているのです
危険な場所ですが、あなたのお力と
なるかも知れません
MsgEn:
Beneath that castle town, there's an underground ruin that contains valuable materials. 
It's a dangerous place, but with your abilities, it might be possible to obtain them.

MsgJp:
このエリア中心部の湿原に悪しき魔物たちが
集まっているようです
覚者様、力を貸していただけないでしょうか？
MsgEn:
It seems that wicked creatures have gathered in the central marsh of this area. 
Arisen, could you lend your strength?

MsgJp:
展望城の奪還――この報せは
アッカーシェランで生きる者にとって
大きな希望となります
MsgEn: The recapture of Lookout Castle – this news is a great hope for those living in Acre Selund.

MsgJp:
長くこの国と共にあった歴史ある城ですから
城自体も、また王家の手に戻ったことを
喜んでいることでしょう！
MsgEn: Since the castle has a long history with this nation, it will surely rejoice to be back in the hands of the royal family!

MsgJp: しかし覚者様、少し急ぐべきかも知れません
MsgEn: However, Arisen, we may need to hurry a little.

MsgJp:
実は――このエリアの脅威は
ジフール砦の骸の将だけではないのです
MsgEn: In fact, the threat in this area is not just the Necro Master of Jifule Fortress.

MsgJp:
近頃、民の間で恐ろしき噂が
囁かれています
――いえ、今は奪還の喜びを享受する時でしょうか
このお話はまたの機会にいたしましょう
MsgEn:
Lately, there have been terrifying rumors circulating among the people...
No, now is the time to savor the joy of recapture. 
Let us save this story for another occasion.

MsgJp:
覚者様だからこそお伝えできることなのですが――
ジフール砦の南方、ぬかるみの大地の先に
深い闇に包まれた地下水路があります
MsgEn:
It's because you're the Arisen that I can share this information. 
To the south of Jifule Fortress, beyond the muddy expanse, there is a subterranean waterway shrouded in deep darkness.

MsgJp:
すでに命無き魔物たちの巣窟となり果てた
恐ろしい場所ではありますが、そこには
特別な価値を持つモノが眠っているそうです
MsgEn:
Although it has already become a lair for lifeless creatures, it's a dreadful place. 
However, there are items with special value sleeping there.

MsgJp:
覚者様――
折り入ってお願いがございます
王家の歴史にまつわるとても古い話――
MsgEn:
Esteemed Arisen,
I humbly ask for a favor.
A very ancient tale concerning the history of the royal family...

MsgJp:
このエリアを蝕む、魔軍とは異なる
脅威についてお話しさせてください
MsgEn: Please allow me to talk about the threat that is different from the Demon Army that corrupts this area.

MsgJp:
国の言い伝えとなっていた古き魔物が
再び活動を始めていたなんて――
MsgEn: The ancient creatures that were supposed to be legends in the country have started to become active again.

MsgJp:
そしてその邪悪な魔物を
討ち果たして頂けただなんて！
この国はまたひとつ救われました――
感謝いたします
MsgEn:
To think you would be able to defeat those evil creatures! 
Once again, our country has been saved. Thank you.

MsgJp:
あら――
既に別のミッションを受注されているみたいですね
MsgEn: Oh, you already have another mission? It seems so.

MsgJp:
受注されているミッションを取り消して頂き
再度お尋ねください
MsgEn: Please cancel the accepted missions and ask again.

MsgJp:
黒い鎧の騎士のことでお話しできるのは
その容姿と強さだけです
何しろ混乱していたので――
MsgEn: I can only speak about the Black-armored Knight in terms of their appearance and strength. After all, I was quite confused at the time.

MsgJp:
黒い騎士を見かけたら
すぐにお知らせしますからね
MsgEn: If you happen to see the Black Knight, please inform me immediately.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランがこれからどうなるにせよ
前より悪くなることはないでしょう
MsgEn: Whatever happens to Acre Selund from now on, at least it won't get worse than before.

MsgJp:
何しろ我々は今や希望を忘れては
いけないことを知っていますからね
MsgEn: We mustn't forget that we know how important it is not to forget hope now.

MsgJp:
わたしが伝えたことで
ジリアンが父上のことを
見直してくれると良いのだがな
MsgEn: I hope that what I've conveyed will make Gillian reconsider her feelings toward her father.

MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者たちよ
我が戦友の娘ジリアンを頼むぞ
MsgEn: Arisen of Lestania, I entrust you with Gillian, the daughter of my comrade in battle.

MsgJp:
生きて戦いを終えられることが
これほど嬉しいとはね
MsgEn: To be able to end the battle and live on, I am so happy.

MsgJp: 絶望のぬかるみで転ばなくて良かったよ
MsgEn: I'm glad I didn't slip in the quagmire of despair.

MsgJp:
あら、こんにちは！
休んでいかれますか？
それとも、《弱化の回復》？
MsgEn:
Oh, hello!
Are you taking a break?
Or are you hoping to recover from weakness?

MsgJp:
細々とやっているところですので――
休憩されるなら<VAL PRICE_INN>いただいても
よろしいでしょうか？
MsgEn:
Since we are doing things in a small scale――
If you would like to take a break, would it be acceptable to charge you <VAL PRICE_INN>?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
辛い時はお互い様、ですもんね
どうぞ、奥にベッドがありますから
疲れがとれるまで休んでいってくださいね！
MsgEn:
When times are tough, it's only fair to help each other, right? 
Please, there's a bed over there. Take a rest until you're refreshed, okay!

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》ですね
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>です
しっかり治療しますから、安心してください！
MsgEn:
"Treat Weakness," is it? 
It's <VAL PRICE_WEAK>. 
Rest assured, I will provide thorough treatment!

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK

MsgJp: いいえ
MsgEn: Cancel

MsgJp:
うーん、わたしが見たところ
《弱化》はしてないみたいです
ここに来るまでに治ったのかしら――
MsgEn:
Hmm, from what I've seen, it doesn't seem like you've been weakened.
I wonder if you healed before coming here...

MsgJp:
あ、わたしばっかり座りながらでごめんなさい
ここに来るまでに足を痛めてしまって
立っていられないんです
MsgEn: Ah, I'm sorry for sitting here by myself. I injured my leg before coming here, so I can't stand.

MsgJp:
村が――鎧を付けた大きな魔物に
襲われたんです
気付いたら家族ともはぐれて――
MsgEn:
The village was attacked by a large monster wearing armor. 
Before I knew it, I got separated from my family.

MsgJp:
でも、逃げてくる途中で
ナヤジークさんに会えたんです
足を痛めたわたしに肩を貸してくださって
それで今、ここにいられています
MsgEn:
However, on the way while I was fleeing, I encountered Lord Nayajiku. 
He kindly lent me his shoulder as I had injured my leg. 
Thanks to that, I am able to be here now.

MsgJp:
父の真似事から始めたんですけど
医療の勉強をしていてよかったです
こうして皆さんのお役に立てますから
MsgEn:
I started by imitating my father, but I'm glad I studied medicine.
Because I can help all of you this way.

MsgJp:
よう
要る物があるなら見ていけよ
MsgEn: If you have something you need, go ahead and take a look.

MsgJp:
俺もだけど、商人ってのは強いぜ
こんな状況になっても、まだ生きてるコネがある
そこから物やら情報を仕入れられるんだからな
MsgEn:
Not just me, but merchants are strong too.
Even in a situation like this, they still have connections to keep them alive.
They can gather goods and information from there.

MsgJp:
ちっと展望城に用があってな
今はまだ様子見だが――
MsgEn:
I have something to do at Lookout Castle.
Right now, I'm just observing the situation though...

MsgJp:
この一軒家が拠点として機能してるのは
ナヤジークのお陰だな
裏手では野菜まで作ってるんだぜ
MsgEn:
This single house is functioning as a base, thanks to Nayajiku. 
They even grow vegetables in the backyard.

MsgJp:
ああ、どうも
旅の仲間をお探しでしょうか？
MsgEn:
Ah, I see.
Are you looking for travel companions?

MsgJp:
仲間といえば――
私は牛をたくさん飼ってましてね
仲間みたいなもんでしたよ、ええ
MsgEn:
Speaking of companions...
I used to have a lot of oxen, you know.
They were like my companions, yes.

MsgJp:
ここでの生活に不満はありませんが
村に残してきた牛たちが気がかりです
連れて逃げられたら良かったのですが
MsgEn:
I have no complaints about life here, but I am worried about the cows I left behind in the village. 
It would have been good if I could have brought them with me.

MsgJp:
ナヤジークさんの案で
近くの高台の上に畑を作ってるんです
あんな風に、家畜小屋も作れたらなぁ――
MsgEn:
With Nayajiku's suggestion, we are creating a field on a nearby high hill. 
It would be nice if we could also build livestock sheds like that...

MsgJp: えっと、何か？
MsgEn: Um, is there something you need?

MsgJp: ――はい
MsgEn: Yes, what is it?

MsgJp:
あっ、覚者さん
どうしたの？
MsgEn: Oh, Arisen, what's wrong?

MsgJp:
早くお父さんとお母さんが
迎えに来てくれないかなって――
妹にも会いたい――怖いよ――
MsgEn:
I wish my father and mother would come pick me up quickly...
I want to see my sister too... I'm scared...

MsgJp:
ぼくがここにいるって、どうしたら
家族に伝わるんだろう？
ぼくも、家族がどこにいるかわからないのに――
MsgEn:
How can I make my presence known to my family?
Even though I don't know where my family is...

MsgJp:
どこに行ったらいいのか
何にもわからなくて――
どうしよう――
MsgEn:
Where should I go?
I don't know anything...
What should I do...

MsgJp:
ナヤジークさんがね
人が多いところに来た方が、お父さんや
お母さんが見つかりやすいかもって
ここに連れてきてくれたんだ
MsgEn:
Nayajiku told me that if we come to a place with many people, it might be easier to find my father or mother. 
That's why they brought me here.

MsgJp:
ここにいれば、きっといつか
お父さんたちのことを知ってる人に会えるよね！
だって、これだけたくさんの人がいるんだもん
MsgEn:
If I stay here, I'm sure I'll eventually meet someone who knows about Dad. 
After all, there are so many people here.

MsgJp:
ここに来てから、ちょっと気分が良いよ
アデムと遊ぶのも楽しいしね！
MsgEn:
Since coming here, I've been feeling a little better. 
It's fun playing with Adem, too!

MsgJp:
迷子になった時は変に動くよりも
迎えを待ちなさいって、お父さんが言ってたんだ
MsgEn: When you get lost, instead of wandering aimlessly, my father used to say, "Wait for someone to come and find you."

MsgJp:
俺は村の警備があって
ここを離れられないが――話だけなら
MsgEn: I am responsible for guarding the village, so I cannot leave here... but if it's just talking, then I can.

MsgJp:
ちょっと場所は辺鄙だが
一見平和そうな村に見えるだろう
――最初はただの空き屋だったなんて
俺も信じられない
MsgEn:
The location is a bit remote, but at first glance, it may seem like a peaceful village. 
I can't believe that it was just an abandoned house.

MsgJp:
疲れてるなら、小屋の中で
休んでいくといい
ここまで来るのも大変だったろう
MsgEn:
If you're tired, it's a good idea to rest inside the hut.
It must have been tough to come all the way here.

MsgJp:
そこにいるデニスって子なんだが――
すすまみれでトボトボ歩いてるのを
俺が保護してきたんだ
MsgEn:
There's this kid named Dennis over there---
I found him walking slowly, covered in soot, and brought him under my protection.

MsgJp:
家族とはぐれたのが堪えたらしくて
どうにも元気が出ないみたいだ
まだ子供なのに、可哀想にな――
MsgEn: It seems like they are feeling down because they have been separated from their family, and they can't seem to muster up any energy. Even though they are still a child, it's quite pitiful.

MsgJp:
ああ、デニスって子は
ナヤジークさんが展望城に連れてったよ
そっちの方が家族も見つかりやすいだろうからってね
MsgEn:
Ah, that child Dennis, Nayajiku took him to Lookout Castle.
They said it would be easier to find a family there.

MsgJp:
家族、無事に見つかるといいんだが――
あの子も期待してたみたいだからな
MsgEn:
I hope the family is found safe and sound.
That child seemed to have high expectations too, so...

MsgJp: なになに？　私に何か用？
MsgEn: What is it, what is it? Do you have something you need from me?

MsgJp:
この村、すごいよねぇ
色んなところから逃げてきた人たちが
それぞれに働いてこんなにうまく回ってるんだって
MsgEn:
This village, isn't it amazing?
People who have escaped from various places are all working and it's running so smoothly.

MsgJp:
ナヤジークさんって
昔は大女優だったらしいよ～
確かに、今もそんな感じだよね
MsgEn:
Nayajiku, I heard she used to be a famous actress back in the day. 
Honestly, she still has that kind of presence even now.

MsgJp:
私も弓の腕はなかなかなんだよ
ま、今はまだそれを見せつける時
じゃないかな～なんて
MsgEn:
My skill with a bow is not bad either, you know?
Well, now is probably not the time to show it off.
Or so I think~

MsgJp:
え？　どうしてこんなところにって――
いやあ、ここら辺なんか怪しいな～って
勘なんだけどね、勘！
MsgEn:
Huh? Why am I in a place like this...?
Well, I have a feeling that this area is a bit suspicious, you know~ Just using my intuition, that's all!

MsgJp:
それで、今日はどんな感じにする？
戦技を変えるんでしょ？
MsgEn:
So, how are we going to approach it today?
Are we going to change our tactics?

MsgJp:
展望城も取り返せたことだし
これからグイグイいけそうな気がしてるんだ
――君がいるからかな？
MsgEn:
Now that we've reclaimed Lookout Castle, I feel like we can go full steam ahead from here.... 
Is it because you're here?

MsgJp:
まだ立ち直れない人もいれば
慎重な人もいるけど、あたしはちょっとでも
希望を見つけて喜んでいきたいよ
MsgEn:
There are still some people who haven't been able to recover,
and there are also cautious individuals, but as for me,
I want to find even a glimmer of hope and embrace it joyfully.

MsgJp:
状況に応じて戦技を付け替えてるのね
感心感心！　それってとっても重要だよね
MsgEn:
It seems like you're changing your combat techniques depending on the situation. I'm really impressed! 
That's extremely important, isn't it?

MsgJp:
あら、覚者様じゃない
今日はどうしました？
MsgEn: Oh, it's not the Arisen, is it? What can I do for you today?

MsgJp:
ぐっすり眠ると、心も体も癒されますものね
適切な休養って大切なんですよ
ああ、お代は<VAL PRICE_INN>です
休んでいかれるでしょう？
MsgEn:
When you sleep soundly, both your heart and body are healed, you know. 
Proper rest is really important. Ah, the cost is <VAL PRICE_INN>. 
Will you be taking a rest?

MsgJp: はい
MsgEn: OK
